# copyright_long:       "New English Translation<br>The NET Bible is a completely new translation of the Bible with 60,932 translators’ notes! It was completed by more than 25 scholars – experts in the original biblical languages - who worked directly from the best currently available Hebrew, Aramaic, and Greek texts. Turn the pages and see the breadth of the translators’ notes, documenting their decisions and choices as they worked. The translators’ notes make the original languages far more accessible, allowing you to look over the translator's shoulder at the very process of translation. This level of documentation is a first for a Bible translation, making transparent the textual basis and the rationale for key renderings (including major interpretive options and alternative translations). This unparalleled level of detail helps connect people to the Bible in the original languages in a way never before possible without years of study of Hebrew, Aramaic, and Greek. It unlocks the riches of the Bible’s truth from entirely new perspectives.<br>To learn more about the NET Bible download the Copyright and About PDF: http://ext.youversion.com/pdf/net.pdf.
40001001	This is the record of the genealogy of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
40001002	Abraham was the father of Isaac , Isaac the father of Jacob , Jacob the father of Judah and his brothers ,
40001003	Judah the father of Perez and Zerah ( by Tamar ) , Perez the father of Hezron , Hezron the father of Ram ,
40001004	Ram the father of Amminadab , Amminadab the father of Nahshon , Nahshon the father of Salmon ,
40001005	Salmon the father of Boaz ( by Rahab ) , Boaz the father of Obed ( by Ruth ) , Obed the father of Jesse ,
40001006	and Jesse the father of David the king . David was the father of Solomon ( by the wife of Uriah ) ,
40001007	Solomon the father of Rehoboam , Rehoboam the father of Abijah , Abijah the father of Asa ,
40001008	Asa the father of Jehoshaphat , Jehoshaphat the father of Joram , Joram the father of Uzziah ,
40001009	Uzziah the father of Jotham , Jotham the father of Ahaz , Ahaz the father of Hezekiah ,
40001010	Hezekiah the father of Manasseh , Manasseh the father of Amon , Amon the father of Josiah ,
40001011	and Josiah the father of Jeconiah and his brothers , at the time of the deportation to Babylon .
40001012	After the deportation to Babylon , Jeconiah became the father of Shealtiel , Shealtiel the father of Zerubbabel ,
40001013	Zerubbabel the father of Abiud , Abiud the father of Eliakim , Eliakim the father of Azor ,
40001014	Azor the father of Zadok , Zadok the father of Achim , Achim the father of Eliud ,
40001015	Eliud the father of Eleazar , Eleazar the father of Matthan , Matthan the father of Jacob ,
40001016	and Jacob the father of Joseph , the husband of Mary , by whom Jesus was born , who is called Christ .
40001017	So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations , and from David to the deportation to Babylon , fourteen generations , and from the deportation to Babylon to Christ , fourteen generations .
40001018	Now the birth of Jesus Christ happened this way . While his mother Mary was engaged to Joseph , but before they came together , she was found to be pregnant through the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Because Joseph , her husband to be , was a righteous man , and because he did not want to disgrace her , he intended to divorce her privately .
40001020	When he had contemplated this , an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream and said , “ Joseph , son of David , do not be afraid to take Mary as your wife , because the child conceived in her is from the Holy Spirit .
40001021	She will give birth to a son and you will name him Jesus , because he will save his people from their sins . ”
40001022	This all happened so that what was spoken by the Lord through the prophet would be fulfilled :
40001023	“ Look ! The virgin will conceive and bear a son , and they will call him Emmanuel , ” which means “ God with us . ”
40001024	When Joseph awoke from sleep he did what the angel of the Lord told him . He took his wife ,
40001025	but did not have marital relations with her until she gave birth to a son , whom he named Jesus .
40002001	After Jesus was born in Bethlehem in Judea , in the time of King Herod , wise men from the East came to Jerusalem
40002002	saying , “ Where is the one who is born king of the Jews ? For we saw his star when it rose and have come to worship him . ”
40002003	When King Herod heard this he was alarmed , and all Jerusalem with him .
40002004	After assembling all the chief priests and experts in the law , he asked them where the Christ was to be born .
40002005	“ In Bethlehem of Judea , ” they said , “ for it is written this way by the prophet :
40002006	‘ And you , Bethlehem , in the land of Judah , are in no way least among the rulers of Judah , for out of you will come a ruler who will shepherd my people Israel . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herod privately summoned the wise men and determined from them when the star had appeared .
40002008	He sent them to Bethlehem and said , “ Go and look carefully for the child . When you find him , inform me so that I can go and worship him as well . ”
40002009	After listening to the king they left , and once again the star they saw when it rose led them until it stopped above the place where the child was .
40002010	When they saw the star they shouted joyfully .
40002011	As they came into the house and saw the child with Mary his mother , they bowed down and worshiped him . They opened their treasure boxes and gave him gifts of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	After being warned in a dream not to return to Herod , they went back by another route to their own country .
40002013	After they had gone , an angel of the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream and said , “ Get up , take the child and his mother and flee to Egypt , and stay there until I tell you , for Herod is going to look for the child to kill him . ”
40002014	Then he got up , took the child and his mother during the night , and went to Egypt .
40002015	He stayed there until Herod died . In this way what was spoken by the Lord through the prophet was fulfilled : “ I called my Son out of Egypt . ”
40002016	When Herod saw that he had been tricked by the wise men , he became enraged . He sent men to kill all the children in Bethlehem and throughout the surrounding region from the age of two and under , according to the time he had learned from the wise men .
40002017	Then what was spoken by Jeremiah the prophet was fulfilled :
40002018	“ A voice was heard in Ramah , weeping and loud wailing , Rachel weeping for her children , and she did not want to be comforted , because they were gone . ”
40002019	After Herod had died , an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt
40002020	saying , “ Get up , take the child and his mother , and go to the land of Israel , for those who were seeking the child’s life are dead . ”
40002021	So he got up and took the child and his mother and returned to the land of Israel .
40002022	But when he heard that Archelaus was reigning over Judea in place of his father Herod , he was afraid to go there . After being warned in a dream , he went to the regions of Galilee .
40002023	He came to a town called Nazareth and lived there . Then what had been spoken by the prophets was fulfilled , that Jesus would be called a Nazarene .
40003001	In those days John the Baptist came into the wilderness of Judea proclaiming ,
40003002	“ Repent , for the kingdom of heaven is near . ”
40003003	For he is the one about whom Isaiah the prophet had spoken : “ The voice of one shouting in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord , make his paths straight . ’ ”
40003004	Now John wore clothing made from camel’s hair with a leather belt around his waist , and his diet consisted of locusts and wild honey .
40003005	Then people from Jerusalem , as well as all Judea and all the region around the Jordan , were going out to him ,
40003006	and he was baptizing them in the Jordan River as they confessed their sins .
40003007	But when he saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to his baptism , he said to them , “ You offspring of vipers ! Who warned you to flee from the coming wrath ?
40003008	Therefore produce fruit that proves your repentance ,
40003009	and don’t think you can say to yourselves , ‘ We have Abraham as our father . ’ For I tell you that God can raise up children for Abraham from these stones !
40003010	Even now the ax is laid at the root of the trees , and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire .
40003011	“ I baptize you with water , for repentance , but the one coming after me is more powerful than I am – I am not worthy to carry his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire .
40003012	His winnowing fork is in his hand , and he will clean out his threshing floor and will gather his wheat into the storehouse , but the chaff he will burn up with inextinguishable fire . ”
40003013	Then Jesus came from Galilee to John to be baptized by him in the Jordan River .
40003014	But John tried to prevent him , saying , “ I need to be baptized by you , and yet you come to me ? ”
40003015	So Jesus replied to him , “ Let it happen now , for it is right for us to fulfill all righteousness . ” Then John yielded to him .
40003016	After Jesus was baptized , just as he was coming up out of the water , the heavens opened and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove and coming on him .
40003017	And a voice from heaven said , “ This is my one dear Son ; in him I take great delight . ”
40004001	Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil .
40004002	After he fasted forty days and forty nights he was famished .
40004003	The tempter came and said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , command these stones to become bread . ”
40004004	But he answered , “ It is written , ‘ Man does not live by bread alone , but by every word that comes from the mouth of God . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil took him to the holy city , had him stand on the highest point of the temple ,
40004006	and said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , throw yourself down . For it is written , ‘ He will command his angels concerning you ’ and ‘ with their hands they will lift you up , so that you will not strike your foot against a stone . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus said to him , “ Once again it is written : ‘ You are not to put the Lord your God to the test . ’ ”
40004008	Again , the devil took him to a very high mountain , and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their grandeur .
40004009	And he said to him , “ I will give you all these things if you throw yourself to the ground and worship me . ”
40004010	Then Jesus said to him , “ Go away , Satan ! For it is written : ‘ You are to worship the Lord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
40004011	Then the devil left him , and angels came and began ministering to his needs .
40004012	Now when Jesus heard that John had been imprisoned , he went into Galilee .
40004013	While in Galilee , he moved from Nazareth to make his home in Capernaum by the sea , in the region of Zebulun and Naphtali ,
40004014	so that what was spoken by Isaiah the prophet would be fulfilled :
40004015	“ Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali , the way by the sea , beyond the Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles –
40004016	the people who sit in darkness have seen a great light , and on those who sit in the region and shadow of death a light has dawned . ”
40004017	From that time Jesus began to preach this message : “ Repent , for the kingdom of heaven is near . ”
40004018	As he was walking by the Sea of Galilee he saw two brothers , Simon ( called Peter ) and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea ( for they were fishermen ) .
40004019	He said to them , “ Follow me , and I will turn you into fishers of people . ”
40004020	They left their nets immediately and followed him .
40004021	Going on from there he saw two other brothers , James the son of Zebedee and John his brother , in a boat with Zebedee their father , mending their nets . Then he called them .
40004022	They immediately left the boat and their father and followed him .
40004023	Jesus went throughout all of Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all kinds of disease and sickness among the people .
40004024	So a report about him spread throughout Syria . People brought to him all who suffered with various illnesses and afflictions , those who had seizures , paralytics , and those possessed by demons , and he healed them .
40004025	And large crowds followed him from Galilee , the Decapolis , Jerusalem , Judea , and beyond the Jordan River .
40005001	When he saw the crowds , he went up the mountain . After he sat down his disciples came to him .
40005002	Then he began to teach them by saying :
40005003	“ Blessed are the poor in spirit , for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005004	“ Blessed are those who mourn , for they will be comforted .
40005005	“ Blessed are the meek , for they will inherit the earth .
40005006	“ Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness , for they will be satisfied .
40005007	“ Blessed are the merciful , for they will be shown mercy .
40005008	“ Blessed are the pure in heart , for they will see God .
40005009	“ Blessed are the peacemakers , for they will be called the children of God .
40005010	“ Blessed are those who are persecuted for righteousness , for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005011	“ Blessed are you when people insult you and persecute you and say all kinds of evil things about you falsely on account of me .
40005012	Rejoice and be glad because your reward is great in heaven , for they persecuted the prophets before you in the same way .
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth . But if salt loses its flavor , how can it be made salty again ? It is no longer good for anything except to be thrown out and trampled on by people .
40005014	You are the light of the world . A city located on a hill cannot be hidden .
40005015	People do not light a lamp and put it under a basket but on a lampstand , and it gives light to all in the house .
40005016	In the same way , let your light shine before people , so that they can see your good deeds and give honor to your Father in heaven .
40005017	“ Do not think that I have come to abolish the law or the prophets . I have not come to abolish these things but to fulfill them .
40005018	I tell you the truth , until heaven and earth pass away not the smallest letter or stroke of a letter will pass from the law until everything takes place .
40005019	So anyone who breaks one of the least of these commands and teaches others to do so will be called least in the kingdom of heaven , but whoever obeys them and teaches others to do so will be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	For I tell you , unless your righteousness goes beyond that of the experts in the law and the Pharisees , you will never enter the kingdom of heaven .
40005021	“ You have heard that it was said to an older generation , ‘ Do not murder , ’ and ‘ whoever murders will be subjected to judgment . ’
40005022	But I say to you that anyone who is angry with a brother will be subjected to judgment . And whoever insults a brother will be brought before the council , and whoever says ‘ Fool ’ will be sent to fiery hell .
40005023	So then , if you bring your gift to the altar and there remember that your brother has something against you ,
40005024	leave your gift there in front of the altar . First go and be reconciled to your brother and then come and present your gift .
40005025	Reach agreement quickly with your accuser while on the way to court , or he may hand you over to the judge , and the judge hand you over to the warden , and you will be thrown into prison .
40005026	I tell you the truth , you will never get out of there until you have paid the last penny !
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Do not commit adultery . ’
40005028	But I say to you that whoever looks at a woman to desire her has already committed adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	If your right eye causes you to sin , tear it out and throw it away ! It is better to lose one of your members than to have your whole body thrown into hell .
40005030	If your right hand causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away ! It is better to lose one of your members than to have your whole body go into hell .
40005031	“ It was said , ‘ Whoever divorces his wife must give her a legal document . ’
40005032	But I say to you that everyone who divorces his wife , except for immorality , makes her commit adultery , and whoever marries a divorced woman commits adultery .
40005033	“ Again , you have heard that it was said to an older generation , ‘ Do not break an oath , but fulfill your vows to the Lord . ’
40005034	But I say to you , do not take oaths at all – not by heaven , because it is the throne of God ,
40005035	not by earth , because it is his footstool , and not by Jerusalem , because it is the city of the great King .
40005036	Do not take an oath by your head , because you are not able to make one hair white or black .
40005037	Let your word be ‘ Yes , yes ’ or ‘ No , no . ’ More than this is from the evil one .
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But I say to you , do not resist the evildoer . But whoever strikes you on the right cheek , turn the other to him as well .
40005040	And if someone wants to sue you and to take your tunic , give him your coat also .
40005041	And if anyone forces you to go one mile , go with him two .
40005042	Give to the one who asks you , and do not reject the one who wants to borrow from you .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Love your neighbor ’ and ‘ hate your enemy . ’
40005044	But I say to you , love your enemy and pray for those who persecute you ,
40005045	so that you may be like your Father in heaven , since he causes the sun to rise on the evil and the good , and sends rain on the righteous and the unrighteous .
40005046	For if you love those who love you , what reward do you have ? Even the tax collectors do the same , don’t they ?
40005047	And if you only greet your brothers , what more do you do ? Even the Gentiles do the same , don’t they ?
40005048	So then , be perfect , as your heavenly Father is perfect .
40006001	“ Be careful not to display your righteousness merely to be seen by people . Otherwise you have no reward with your Father in heaven .
40006002	Thus whenever you do charitable giving , do not blow a trumpet before you , as the hypocrites do in synagogues and on streets so that people will praise them . I tell you the truth , they have their reward .
40006003	But when you do your giving , do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing ,
40006004	so that your gift may be in secret . And your Father , who sees in secret , will reward you .
40006005	“ Whenever you pray , do not be like the hypocrites , because they love to pray while standing in synagogues and on street corners so that people can see them . Truly I say to you , they have their reward .
40006006	But whenever you pray , go into your room , close the door , and pray to your Father in secret . And your Father , who sees in secret , will reward you .
40006007	When you pray , do not babble repetitiously like the Gentiles , because they think that by their many words they will be heard .
40006008	Do not be like them , for your Father knows what you need before you ask him .
40006009	So pray this way : Our Father in heaven , may your name be honored ,
40006010	may your kingdom come , may your will be done on earth as it is in heaven .
40006011	Give us today our daily bread ,
40006012	and forgive us our debts , as we ourselves have forgiven our debtors .
40006013	And do not lead us into temptation , but deliver us from the evil one .
40006014	“ For if you forgive others their sins , your heavenly Father will also forgive you .
40006015	But if you do not forgive others , your Father will not forgive you your sins .
40006016	“ When you fast , do not look sullen like the hypocrites , for they make their faces unattractive so that people will see them fasting . I tell you the truth , they have their reward .
40006017	When you fast , put oil on your head and wash your face ,
40006018	so that it will not be obvious to others when you are fasting , but only to your Father who is in secret . And your Father , who sees in secret , will reward you .
40006019	“ Do not accumulate for yourselves treasures on earth , where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal .
40006020	But accumulate for yourselves treasures in heaven , where moth and rust do not destroy , and thieves do not break in and steal .
40006021	For where your treasure is , there your heart will be also .
40006022	“ The eye is the lamp of the body . If then your eye is healthy , your whole body will be full of light .
40006023	But if your eye is diseased , your whole body will be full of darkness . If then the light in you is darkness , how great is the darkness !
40006024	“ No one can serve two masters , for either he will hate the one and love the other , or he will be devoted to the one and despise the other . You cannot serve God and money .
40006025	“ Therefore I tell you , do not worry about your life , what you will eat or drink , or about your body , what you will wear . Isn’t there more to life than food and more to the body than clothing ?
40006026	Look at the birds in the sky : They do not sow , or reap , or gather into barns , yet your heavenly Father feeds them . Aren’t you more valuable than they are ?
40006027	And which of you by worrying can add even one hour to his life ?
40006028	Why do you worry about clothing ? Think about how the flowers of the field grow ; they do not work or spin .
40006029	Yet I tell you that not even Solomon in all his glory was clothed like one of these !
40006030	And if this is how God clothes the wild grass , which is here today and tomorrow is tossed into the fire to heat the oven , won’t he clothe you even more , you people of little faith ?
40006031	So then , don’t worry saying , ‘ What will we eat ? ’ or ‘ What will we drink ? ’ or ‘ What will we wear ? ’
40006032	For the unconverted pursue these things , and your heavenly Father knows that you need them .
40006033	But above all pursue his kingdom and righteousness , and all these things will be given to you as well .
40006034	So then , do not worry about tomorrow , for tomorrow will worry about itself . Today has enough trouble of its own .
40007001	“ Do not judge so that you will not be judged .
40007002	For by the standard you judge you will be judged , and the measure you use will be the measure you receive .
40007003	Why do you see the speck in your brother’s eye , but fail to see the beam of wood in your own ?
40007004	Or how can you say to your brother , ‘ Let me remove the speck from your eye , ’ while there is a beam in your own ?
40007005	You hypocrite ! First remove the beam from your own eye , and then you can see clearly to remove the speck from your brother’s eye .
40007006	Do not give what is holy to dogs or throw your pearls before pigs ; otherwise they will trample them under their feet and turn around and tear you to pieces .
40007007	“ Ask and it will be given to you ; seek and you will find ; knock and the door will be opened for you .
40007008	For everyone who asks receives , and the one who seeks finds , and to the one who knocks , the door will be opened .
40007009	Is there anyone among you who , if his son asks for bread , will give him a stone ?
40007010	Or if he asks for a fish , will give him a snake ?
40007011	If you then , although you are evil , know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your Father in heaven give good gifts to those who ask him !
40007012	In everything , treat others as you would want them to treat you , for this fulfills the law and the prophets .
40007013	“ Enter through the narrow gate , because the gate is wide and the way is spacious that leads to destruction , and there are many who enter through it .
40007014	But the gate is narrow and the way is difficult that leads to life , and there are few who find it .
40007015	“ Watch out for false prophets , who come to you in sheep’s clothing but inwardly are voracious wolves .
40007016	You will recognize them by their fruit . Grapes are not gathered from thorns or figs from thistles , are they ?
40007017	In the same way , every good tree bears good fruit , but the bad tree bears bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree is not able to bear bad fruit , nor a bad tree to bear good fruit .
40007019	Every tree that does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	So then , you will recognize them by their fruit .
40007021	“ Not everyone who says to me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ will enter into the kingdom of heaven – only the one who does the will of my Father in heaven .
40007022	On that day , many will say to me , ‘ Lord , Lord , didn’t we prophesy in your name , and in your name cast out demons and do many powerful deeds ? ’
40007023	Then I will declare to them , ‘ I never knew you . Go away from me , you lawbreakers ! ’
40007024	“ Everyone who hears these words of mine and does them is like a wise man who built his house on rock .
40007025	The rain fell , the flood came , and the winds beat against that house , but it did not collapse because it had been founded on rock .
40007026	Everyone who hears these words of mine and does not do them is like a foolish man who built his house on sand .
40007027	The rain fell , the flood came , and the winds beat against that house , and it collapsed ; it was utterly destroyed ! ”
40007028	When Jesus finished saying these things , the crowds were amazed by his teaching ,
40007029	because he taught them like one who had authority , not like their experts in the law .
40008001	After he came down from the mountain , large crowds followed him .
40008002	And a leper approached , and bowed low before him , saying , “ Lord , if you are willing , you can make me clean . ”
40008003	He stretched out his hand and touched him saying , “ I am willing . Be clean ! ” Immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
40008004	Then Jesus said to him , “ See that you do not speak to anyone , but go , show yourself to a priest , and bring the offering that Moses commanded , as a testimony to them . ”
40008005	When he entered Capernaum , a centurion came to him asking for help :
40008006	“ Lord , my servant is lying at home paralyzed , in terrible anguish . ”
40008007	Jesus said to him , “ I will come and heal him . ”
40008008	But the centurion replied , “ Lord , I am not worthy to have you come under my roof . Instead , just say the word and my servant will be healed .
40008009	For I too am a man under authority , with soldiers under me . I say to this one , ‘ Go ’ and he goes , and to another ‘ Come ’ and he comes , and to my slave ‘ Do this ’ and he does it . ”
40008010	When Jesus heard this he was amazed and said to those who followed him , “ I tell you the truth , I have not found such faith in anyone in Israel !
40008011	I tell you , many will come from the east and west to share the banquet with Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven ,
40008012	but the sons of the kingdom will be thrown out into the outer darkness , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ”
40008013	Then Jesus said to the centurion , “ Go ; just as you believed , it will be done for you . ” And the servant was healed at that hour .
40008014	Now when Jesus entered Peter’s house , he saw his mother-in-law lying down , sick with a fever .
40008015	He touched her hand , and the fever left her . Then she got up and began to serve them .
40008016	When it was evening , many demon-possessed people were brought to him . He drove out the spirits with a word , and healed all who were sick .
40008017	In this way what was spoken by Isaiah the prophet was fulfilled : “ He took our weaknesses and carried our diseases . ”
40008018	Now when Jesus saw a large crowd around him , he gave orders to go to the other side of the lake .
40008019	Then an expert in the law came to him and said , “ Teacher , I will follow you wherever you go . ”
40008020	Jesus said to him , “ Foxes have dens , and the birds in the sky have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to lay his head . ”
40008021	Another of the disciples said to him , “ Lord , let me first go and bury my father . ”
40008022	But Jesus said to him , “ Follow me , and let the dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	As he got into the boat , his disciples followed him .
40008024	And a great storm developed on the sea so that the waves began to swamp the boat . But he was asleep .
40008025	So they came and woke him up saying , “ Lord , save us ! We are about to die ! ”
40008026	But he said to them , “ Why are you cowardly , you people of little faith ? ” Then he got up and rebuked the winds and the sea , and it was dead calm .
40008027	And the men were amazed and said , “ What sort of person is this ? Even the winds and the sea obey him ! ”
40008028	When he came to the other side , to the region of the Gadarenes , two demon-possessed men coming from the tombs met him . They were extremely violent , so that no one was able to pass by that way .
40008029	They cried out , “ Son of God , leave us alone ! Have you come here to torment us before the time ? ”
40008030	A large herd of pigs was feeding some distance from them .
40008031	Then the demons begged him , “ If you drive us out , send us into the herd of pigs . ”
40008032	And he said , “ Go ! ” So they came out and went into the pigs , and the herd rushed down the steep slope into the lake and drowned in the water .
40008033	The herdsmen ran off , went into the town , and told everything that had happened to the demon-possessed men .
40008034	Then the entire town came out to meet Jesus . And when they saw him , they begged him to leave their region .
40009001	After getting into a boat he crossed to the other side and came to his own town .
40009002	Just then some people brought to him a paralytic lying on a stretcher . When Jesus saw their faith , he said to the paralytic , “ Have courage , son ! Your sins are forgiven . ”
40009003	Then some of the experts in the law said to themselves , “ This man is blaspheming ! ”
40009004	When Jesus saw their reaction he said , “ Why do you respond with evil in your hearts ?
40009005	Which is easier , to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven ’ or to say , ‘ Stand up and walk ’ ?
40009006	But so that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins ” – then he said to the paralytic – “ Stand up , take your stretcher , and go home . ”
40009007	And he stood up and went home .
40009008	When the crowd saw this , they were afraid and honored God who had given such authority to men .
40009009	As Jesus went on from there , he saw a man named Matthew sitting at the tax booth . “ Follow me , ” he said to him . And he got up and followed him .
40009010	As Jesus was having a meal in Matthew’s house , many tax collectors and sinners came and ate with Jesus and his disciples .
40009011	When the Pharisees saw this they said to his disciples , “ Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
40009012	When Jesus heard this he said , “ Those who are healthy don’t need a physician , but those who are sick do .
40009013	Go and learn what this saying means : ‘ I want mercy and not sacrifice . ’ For I did not come to call the righteous , but sinners . ”
40009014	Then John’s disciples came to Jesus and asked , “ Why do we and the Pharisees fast often , but your disciples don’t fast ? ”
40009015	Jesus said to them , “ The wedding guests cannot mourn while the bridegroom is with them , can they ? But the days are coming when the bridegroom will be taken from them , and then they will fast .
40009016	No one sews a patch of unshrunk cloth on an old garment , because the patch will pull away from the garment and the tear will be worse .
40009017	And no one pours new wine into old wineskins ; otherwise the skins burst and the wine is spilled out and the skins are destroyed . Instead they put new wine into new wineskins and both are preserved . ”
40009018	As he was saying these things , a ruler came , bowed low before him , and said , “ My daughter has just died , but come and lay your hand on her and she will live . ”
40009019	Jesus and his disciples got up and followed him .
40009020	But a woman who had been suffering from a hemorrhage for twelve years came up behind him and touched the edge of his cloak .
40009021	For she kept saying to herself , “ If only I touch his cloak , I will be healed . ”
40009022	But when Jesus turned and saw her he said , “ Have courage , daughter ! Your faith has made you well . ” And the woman was healed from that hour .
40009023	When Jesus entered the ruler’s house and saw the flute players and the disorderly crowd ,
40009024	he said , “ Go away , for the girl is not dead but asleep . ” And they began making fun of him .
40009025	But when the crowd had been put outside , he went in and gently took her by the hand , and the girl got up .
40009026	And the news of this spread throughout that region .
40009027	As Jesus went on from there , two blind men followed him , shouting , “ Have mercy on us , Son of David ! ”
40009028	When he went into the house , the blind men came to him . Jesus said to them , “ Do you believe that I am able to do this ? ” They said to him , “ Yes , Lord . ”
40009029	Then he touched their eyes saying , “ Let it be done for you according to your faith . ”
40009030	And their eyes were opened . Then Jesus sternly warned them , “ See that no one knows about this . ”
40009031	But they went out and spread the news about him throughout that entire region .
40009032	As they were going away , a man who could not talk and was demon-possessed was brought to him .
40009033	After the demon was cast out , the man who had been mute spoke . The crowds were amazed and said , “ Never has anything like this been seen in Israel ! ”
40009034	But the Pharisees said , “ By the ruler of demons he casts out demons . ”
40009035	Then Jesus went throughout all the towns and villages , teaching in their synagogues , preaching the good news of the kingdom , and healing every kind of disease and sickness .
40009036	When he saw the crowds , he had compassion on them because they were bewildered and helpless , like sheep without a shepherd .
40009037	Then he said to his disciples , “ The harvest is plentiful , but the workers are few .
40009038	Therefore ask the Lord of the harvest to send out workers into his harvest . ”
40010001	Jesus called his twelve disciples and gave them authority over unclean spirits so they could cast them out and heal every kind of disease and sickness .
40010002	Now these are the names of the twelve apostles : first , Simon ( called Peter ) , and Andrew his brother ; James son of Zebedee and John his brother ;
40010003	Philip and Bartholomew ; Thomas and Matthew the tax collector ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus ;
40010004	Simon the Zealot and Judas Iscariot , who betrayed him .
40010005	Jesus sent out these twelve , instructing them as follows : “ Do not go to Gentile regions and do not enter any Samaritan town .
40010006	Go instead to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
40010007	As you go , preach this message : ‘ The kingdom of heaven is near ! ’
40010008	Heal the sick , raise the dead , cleanse lepers , cast out demons . Freely you received , freely give .
40010009	Do not take gold , silver , or copper in your belts ,
40010010	no bag for the journey , or an extra tunic , or sandals or staff , for the worker deserves his provisions .
40010011	Whenever you enter a town or village , find out who is worthy there and stay with them until you leave .
40010012	As you enter the house , give it greetings .
40010013	And if the house is worthy , let your peace come on it , but if it is not worthy , let your peace return to you .
40010014	And if anyone will not welcome you or listen to your message , shake the dust off your feet as you leave that house or that town .
40010015	I tell you the truth , it will be more bearable for the region of Sodom and Gomorrah on the day of judgment than for that town !
40010016	“ I am sending you out like sheep surrounded by wolves , so be wise as serpents and innocent as doves .
40010017	Beware of people , because they will hand you over to councils and flog you in their synagogues .
40010018	And you will be brought before governors and kings because of me , as a witness to them and the Gentiles .
40010019	Whenever they hand you over for trial , do not worry about how to speak or what to say , for what you should say will be given to you at that time .
40010020	For it is not you speaking , but the Spirit of your Father speaking through you .
40010021	“ Brother will hand over brother to death , and a father his child . Children will rise against parents and have them put to death .
40010022	And you will be hated by everyone because of my name . But the one who endures to the end will be saved .
40010023	Whenever they persecute you in one place , flee to another . I tell you the truth , you will not finish going through all the towns of Israel before the Son of Man comes .
40010024	“ A disciple is not greater than his teacher , nor a slave greater than his master .
40010025	It is enough for the disciple to become like his teacher , and the slave like his master . If they have called the head of the house ‘ Beelzebul , ’ how much more will they defame the members of his household !
40010026	“ Do not be afraid of them , for nothing is hidden that will not be revealed , and nothing is secret that will not be made known .
40010027	What I say to you in the dark , tell in the light , and what is whispered in your ear , proclaim from the housetops .
40010028	Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul . Instead , fear the one who is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
40010029	Aren’t two sparrows sold for a penny ? Yet not one of them falls to the ground apart from your Father’s will .
40010030	Even all the hairs on your head are numbered .
40010031	So do not be afraid ; you are more valuable than many sparrows .
40010032	“ Whoever , then , acknowledges me before people , I will acknowledge before my Father in heaven .
40010033	But whoever denies me before people , I will deny him also before my Father in heaven .
40010034	“ Do not think that I have come to bring peace to the earth . I have not come to bring peace but a sword .
40010035	For I have come to set a man against his father , a daughter against her mother , and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law ,
40010036	and a man’s enemies will be the members of his household .
40010037	“ Whoever loves father or mother more than me is not worthy of me , and whoever loves son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
40010038	And whoever does not take up his cross and follow me is not worthy of me .
40010039	Whoever finds his life will lose it , and whoever loses his life because of me will find it .
40010040	“ Whoever receives you receives me , and whoever receives me receives the one who sent me .
40010041	Whoever receives a prophet in the name of a prophet will receive a prophet’s reward . Whoever receives a righteous person in the name of a righteous person will receive a righteous person’s reward .
40010042	And whoever gives only a cup of cold water to one of these little ones in the name of a disciple , I tell you the truth , he will never lose his reward . ”
40011001	When Jesus had finished instructing his twelve disciples , he went on from there to teach and preach in their towns .
40011002	Now when John heard in prison about the deeds Christ had done , he sent his disciples to ask a question :
40011003	“ Are you the one who is to come , or should we look for another ? ”
40011004	Jesus answered them , “ Go tell John what you hear and see :
40011005	The blind see , the lame walk , lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , and the poor have good news proclaimed to them .
40011006	Blessed is anyone who takes no offense at me . ”
40011007	While they were going away , Jesus began to speak to the crowd about John : “ What did you go out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken by the wind ?
40011008	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed in fancy clothes ? Look , those who wear fancy clothes are in the homes of kings !
40011009	What did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , I tell you , and more than a prophet .
40011010	This is the one about whom it is written : ‘ Look , I am sending my messenger ahead of you , who will prepare your way before you . ’
40011011	“ I tell you the truth , among those born of women , no one has arisen greater than John the Baptist . Yet the one who is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he is .
40011012	From the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven has suffered violence , and forceful people lay hold of it .
40011013	For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John appeared .
40011014	And if you are willing to accept it , he is Elijah , who is to come .
40011015	The one who has ears had better listen !
40011016	“ To what should I compare this generation ? They are like children sitting in the marketplaces who call out to one another ,
40011017	‘ We played the flute for you , yet you did not dance ; we wailed in mourning , yet you did not weep . ’
40011018	For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , ‘ He has a demon ! ’
40011019	The Son of Man came eating and drinking , and they say , ‘ Look at him , a glutton and a drunk , a friend of tax collectors and sinners ! ’ But wisdom is vindicated by her deeds . ”
40011020	Then Jesus began to criticize openly the cities in which he had done many of his miracles , because they did not repent .
40011021	“ Woe to you , Chorazin ! Woe to you , Bethsaida ! If the miracles done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
40011022	But I tell you , it will be more bearable for Tyre and Sidon on the day of judgment than for you !
40011023	And you , Capernaum , will you be exalted to heaven ? No , you will be thrown down to Hades ! For if the miracles done among you had been done in Sodom , it would have continued to this day .
40011024	But I tell you , it will be more bearable for the region of Sodom on the day of judgment than for you ! ”
40011025	At that time Jesus said , “ I praise you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because you have hidden these things from the wise and intelligent , and revealed them to little children .
40011026	Yes , Father , for this was your gracious will .
40011027	All things have been handed over to me by my Father . No one knows the Son except the Father , and no one knows the Father except the Son and anyone to whom the Son decides to reveal him .
40011028	Come to me , all you who are weary and burdened , and I will give you rest .
40011029	Take my yoke on you and learn from me , because I am gentle and humble in heart , and you will find rest for your souls .
40011030	For my yoke is easy to bear , and my load is not hard to carry . ”
40012001	At that time Jesus went through the grain fields on a Sabbath . His disciples were hungry , and they began to pick heads of wheat and eat them .
40012002	But when the Pharisees saw this they said to him , “ Look , your disciples are doing what is against the law to do on the Sabbath . ”
40012003	He said to them , “ Haven’t you read what David did when he and his companions were hungry –
40012004	how he entered the house of God and they ate the sacred bread , which was against the law for him or his companions to eat , but only for the priests ?
40012005	Or have you not read in the law that the priests in the temple desecrate the Sabbath and yet are not guilty ?
40012006	I tell you that something greater than the temple is here .
40012007	If you had known what this means : ‘ I want mercy and not sacrifice , ’ you would not have condemned the innocent .
40012008	For the Son of Man is lord of the Sabbath . ”
40012009	Then Jesus left that place and entered their synagogue .
40012010	A man was there who had a withered hand . And they asked Jesus , “ Is it lawful to heal on the Sabbath ? ” so that they could accuse him .
40012011	He said to them , “ Would not any one of you , if he had one sheep that fell into a pit on the Sabbath , take hold of it and lift it out ?
40012012	How much more valuable is a person than a sheep ! So it is lawful to do good on the Sabbath . ”
40012013	Then he said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” He stretched it out and it was restored , as healthy as the other .
40012014	But the Pharisees went out and plotted against him , as to how they could assassinate him .
40012015	Now when Jesus learned of this , he went away from there . Great crowds followed him , and he healed them all .
40012016	But he sternly warned them not to make him known .
40012017	This fulfilled what was spoken by Isaiah the prophet :
40012018	“ Here is my servant whom I have chosen , the one I love , in whom I take great delight . I will put my Spirit on him , and he will proclaim justice to the nations .
40012019	He will not quarrel or cry out , nor will anyone hear his voice in the streets .
40012020	He will not break a bruised reed or extinguish a smoldering wick , until he brings justice to victory .
40012021	And in his name the Gentiles will hope . ”
40012022	Then they brought to him a demon-possessed man who was blind and mute . Jesus healed him so that he could speak and see .
40012023	All the crowds were amazed and said , “ Could this one be the Son of David ? ”
40012024	But when the Pharisees heard this they said , “ He does not cast out demons except by the power of Beelzebul , the ruler of demons ! ”
40012025	Now when Jesus realized what they were thinking , he said to them , “ Every kingdom divided against itself is destroyed , and no town or house divided against itself will stand .
40012026	So if Satan casts out Satan , he is divided against himself . How then will his kingdom stand ?
40012027	And if I cast out demons by Beelzebul , by whom do your sons cast them out ? For this reason they will be your judges .
40012028	But if I cast out demons by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God has already overtaken you .
40012029	How else can someone enter a strong man’s house and steal his property , unless he first ties up the strong man ? Then he can thoroughly plunder the house .
40012030	Whoever is not with me is against me , and whoever does not gather with me scatters .
40012031	For this reason I tell you , people will be forgiven for every sin and blasphemy , but the blasphemy against the Spirit will not be forgiven .
40012032	Whoever speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven . But whoever speaks against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven , either in this age or in the age to come .
40012033	“ Make a tree good and its fruit will be good , or make a tree bad and its fruit will be bad , for a tree is known by its fruit .
40012034	Offspring of vipers ! How are you able to say anything good , since you are evil ? For the mouth speaks from what fills the heart .
40012035	The good person brings good things out of his good treasury , and the evil person brings evil things out of his evil treasury .
40012036	I tell you that on the day of judgment , people will give an account for every worthless word they speak .
40012037	For by your words you will be justified , and by your words you will be condemned . ”
40012038	Then some of the experts in the law along with some Pharisees answered him , “ Teacher , we want to see a sign from you . ”
40012039	But he answered them , “ An evil and adulterous generation asks for a sign , but no sign will be given to it except the sign of the prophet Jonah .
40012040	For just as Jonah was in the belly of the huge fish for three days and three nights , so the Son of Man will be in the heart of the earth for three days and three nights .
40012041	The people of Nineveh will stand up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it , because they repented when Jonah preached to them – and now , something greater than Jonah is here !
40012042	The queen of the South will rise up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it , because she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon – and now , something greater than Solomon is here !
40012043	“ When an unclean spirit goes out of a person , it passes through waterless places looking for rest but does not find it .
40012044	Then it says , ‘ I will return to the home I left . ’ When it returns , it finds the house empty , swept clean , and put in order .
40012045	Then it goes and brings with it seven other spirits more evil than itself , and they go in and live there , so the last state of that person is worse than the first . It will be that way for this evil generation as well ! ”
40012046	While Jesus was still speaking to the crowds , his mother and brothers came and stood outside , asking to speak to him .
40012047	Someone told him , “ Look , your mother and your brothers are standing outside wanting to speak to you . ”
40012048	To the one who had said this , Jesus replied , “ Who is my mother and who are my brothers ? ”
40012049	And pointing toward his disciples he said , “ Here are my mother and my brothers !
40012050	For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother . ”
40013001	On that day after Jesus went out of the house , he sat by the lake .
40013002	And such a large crowd gathered around him that he got into a boat to sit while the whole crowd stood on the shore .
40013003	He told them many things in parables , saying : “ Listen ! A sower went out to sow .
40013004	And as he sowed , some seeds fell along the path , and the birds came and devoured them .
40013005	Other seeds fell on rocky ground where they did not have much soil . They sprang up quickly because the soil was not deep .
40013006	But when the sun came up , they were scorched , and because they did not have sufficient root , they withered .
40013007	Other seeds fell among the thorns , and they grew up and choked them .
40013008	But other seeds fell on good soil and produced grain , some a hundred times as much , some sixty , and some thirty .
40013009	The one who has ears had better listen ! ”
40013010	Then the disciples came to him and said , “ Why do you speak to them in parables ? ”
40013011	He replied , “ You have been given the opportunity to know the secrets of the kingdom of heaven , but they have not .
40013012	For whoever has will be given more , and will have an abundance . But whoever does not have , even what he has will be taken from him .
40013013	For this reason I speak to them in parables : Although they see they do not see , and although they hear they do not hear nor do they understand .
40013014	And concerning them the prophecy of Isaiah is fulfilled that says : ‘ You will listen carefully yet will never understand , you will look closely yet will never comprehend .
40013015	For the heart of this people has become dull ; they are hard of hearing , and they have shut their eyes , so that they would not see with their eyes and hear with their ears and understand with their hearts and turn , and I would heal them . ’
40013016	“ But your eyes are blessed because they see , and your ears because they hear .
40013017	For I tell you the truth , many prophets and righteous people longed to see what you see but did not see it , and to hear what you hear but did not hear it .
40013018	“ So listen to the parable of the sower :
40013019	When anyone hears the word about the kingdom and does not understand it , the evil one comes and snatches what was sown in his heart ; this is the seed sown along the path .
40013020	The seed sown on rocky ground is the person who hears the word and immediately receives it with joy .
40013021	But he has no root in himself and does not endure ; when trouble or persecution comes because of the word , immediately he falls away .
40013022	The seed sown among thorns is the person who hears the word , but worldly cares and the seductiveness of wealth choke the word , so it produces nothing .
40013023	But as for the seed sown on good soil , this is the person who hears the word and understands . He bears fruit , yielding a hundred , sixty , or thirty times what was sown . ”
40013024	He presented them with another parable : “ The kingdom of heaven is like a person who sowed good seed in his field .
40013025	But while everyone was sleeping , an enemy came and sowed weeds among the wheat and went away .
40013026	When the plants sprouted and bore grain , then the weeds also appeared .
40013027	So the slaves of the owner came and said to him , ‘ Sir , didn’t you sow good seed in your field ? Then where did the weeds come from ? ’
40013028	He said , ‘ An enemy has done this . ’ So the slaves replied , ‘ Do you want us to go and gather them ? ’
40013029	But he said , ‘ No , since in gathering the weeds you may uproot the wheat with them .
40013030	Let both grow together until the harvest . At harvest time I will tell the reapers , “ First collect the weeds and tie them in bundles to be burned , but then gather the wheat into my barn . ” ’ ”
40013031	He gave them another parable : “ The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed that a man took and sowed in his field .
40013032	It is the smallest of all the seeds , but when it has grown it is the greatest garden plant and becomes a tree , so that the wild birds come and nest in its branches . ”
40013033	He told them another parable : “ The kingdom of heaven is like yeast that a woman took and mixed with three measures of flour until all the dough had risen . ”
40013034	Jesus spoke all these things in parables to the crowds ; he did not speak to them without a parable .
40013035	This fulfilled what was spoken by the prophet : “ I will open my mouth in parables , I will announce what has been hidden from the foundation of the world . ”
40013036	Then he left the crowds and went into the house . And his disciples came to him saying , “ Explain to us the parable of the weeds in the field . ”
40013037	He answered , “ The one who sowed the good seed is the Son of Man .
40013038	The field is the world and the good seed are the people of the kingdom . The weeds are the people of the evil one ,
40013039	and the enemy who sows them is the devil . The harvest is the end of the age , and the reapers are angels .
40013040	As the weeds are collected and burned with fire , so it will be at the end of the age .
40013041	The Son of Man will send his angels , and they will gather from his kingdom everything that causes sin as well as all lawbreakers .
40013042	They will throw them into the fiery furnace , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013043	Then the righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father . The one who has ears had better listen !
40013044	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure , hidden in a field , that a person found and hid . Then because of joy he went and sold all that he had and bought that field .
40013045	“ Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a merchant searching for fine pearls .
40013046	When he found a pearl of great value , he went out and sold everything he had and bought it .
40013047	“ Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a net that was cast into the sea that caught all kinds of fish .
40013048	When it was full , they pulled it ashore , sat down , and put the good fish into containers and threw the bad away .
40013049	It will be this way at the end of the age . Angels will come and separate the evil from the righteous
40013050	and throw them into the fiery furnace , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013051	“ Have you understood all these things ? ” They replied , “ Yes . ”
40013052	Then he said to them , “ Therefore every expert in the law who has been trained for the kingdom of heaven is like the owner of a house who brings out of his treasure what is new and old . ”
40013053	Now when Jesus finished these parables , he moved on from there .
40013054	Then he came to his hometown and began to teach the people in their synagogue . They were astonished and said , “ Where did this man get such wisdom and miraculous powers ?
40013055	Isn’t this the carpenter’s son ? Isn’t his mother named Mary ? And aren’t his brothers James , Joseph , Simon , and Judas ?
40013056	And aren’t all his sisters here with us ? Where did he get all this ? ”
40013057	And so they took offense at him . But Jesus said to them , “ A prophet is not without honor except in his hometown and in his own house . ”
40013058	And he did not do many miracles there because of their unbelief .
40014001	At that time Herod the tetrarch heard reports about Jesus ,
40014002	and he said to his servants , “ This is John the Baptist . He has been raised from the dead ! And because of this , miraculous powers are at work in him . ”
40014003	For Herod had arrested John , bound him , and put him in prison on account of Herodias , his brother Philip’s wife ,
40014004	because John had repeatedly told him , “ It is not lawful for you to have her . ”
40014005	Although Herod wanted to kill John , he feared the crowd because they accepted John as a prophet .
40014006	But on Herod’s birthday , the daughter of Herodias danced before them and pleased Herod ,
40014007	so much that he promised with an oath to give her whatever she asked .
40014008	Instructed by her mother , she said , “ Give me the head of John the Baptist here on a platter . ”
40014009	Although it grieved the king , because of his oath and the dinner guests he commanded it to be given .
40014010	So he sent and had John beheaded in the prison .
40014011	His head was brought on a platter and given to the girl , and she brought it to her mother .
40014012	Then John’s disciples came and took the body and buried it and went and told Jesus .
40014013	Now when Jesus heard this he went away from there privately in a boat to an isolated place . But when the crowd heard about it , they followed him on foot from the towns .
40014014	As he got out he saw the large crowd , and he had compassion on them and healed their sick .
40014015	When evening arrived , his disciples came to him saying , “ This is an isolated place and the hour is already late . Send the crowds away so that they can go into the villages and buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	But he replied , “ They don’t need to go . You give them something to eat . ”
40014017	They said to him , “ We have here only five loaves and two fish . ”
40014018	“ Bring them here to me , ” he replied .
40014019	Then he instructed the crowds to sit down on the grass . He took the five loaves and two fish , and looking up to heaven he gave thanks and broke the loaves . He gave them to the disciples , who in turn gave them to the crowds .
40014020	They all ate and were satisfied , and they picked up the broken pieces left over , twelve baskets full .
40014021	Not counting women and children , there were about five thousand men who ate .
40014022	Immediately Jesus made the disciples get into the boat and go ahead of him to the other side , while he dispersed the crowds .
40014023	And after he sent the crowds away , he went up the mountain by himself to pray . When evening came , he was there alone .
40014024	Meanwhile the boat , already far from land , was taking a beating from the waves because the wind was against it .
40014025	As the night was ending , Jesus came to them walking on the sea .
40014026	When the disciples saw him walking on the water they were terrified and said , “ It’s a ghost ! ” and cried out with fear .
40014027	But immediately Jesus spoke to them : “ Have courage ! It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
40014028	Peter said to him , “ Lord , if it is you , order me to come to you on the water . ”
40014029	So he said , “ Come . ” Peter got out of the boat , walked on the water , and came toward Jesus .
40014030	But when he saw the strong wind he became afraid . And starting to sink , he cried out , “ Lord , save me ! ”
40014031	Immediately Jesus reached out his hand and caught him , saying to him , “ You of little faith , why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	When they went up into the boat , the wind ceased .
40014033	Then those who were in the boat worshiped him , saying , “ Truly you are the Son of God . ”
40014034	After they had crossed over , they came to land at Gennesaret .
40014035	When the people there recognized him , they sent word into all the surrounding area , and they brought all their sick to him .
40014036	They begged him if they could only touch the edge of his cloak , and all who touched it were healed .
40015001	Then Pharisees and experts in the law came from Jerusalem to Jesus and said ,
40015002	“ Why do your disciples disobey the tradition of the elders ? For they don’t wash their hands when they eat . ”
40015003	He answered them , “ And why do you disobey the commandment of God because of your tradition ?
40015004	For God said , ‘ Honor your father and mother ’ and ‘ Whoever insults his father or mother must be put to death . ’

40015010	Then he called the crowd to him and said , “ Listen and understand .

40015020	These are the things that defile a person ; it is not eating with unwashed hands that defiles a person . ”

40015032	Then Jesus called the disciples and said , “ I have compassion on the crowd , because they have already been here with me three days and they have nothing to eat . I don’t want to send them away hungry since they may faint on the way . ”

40018001	At that time the disciples came to Jesus saying , “ Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ? ”

40018027	The lord had compassion on that slave and released him , and forgave him the debt .
40018028	After he went out , that same slave found one of his fellow slaves who owed him one hundred silver coins . So he grabbed him by the throat and started to choke him , saying , ‘ Pay back what you owe me ! ’
40018029	Then his fellow slave threw himself down and begged him , ‘ Be patient with me , and I will repay you . ’
40018030	But he refused . Instead , he went out and threw him in prison until he repaid the debt .
40018031	When his fellow slaves saw what had happened , they were very upset and went and told their lord everything that had taken place .

40018033	Should you not have shown mercy to your fellow slave , just as I showed it to you ? ’

40020001	“ For the kingdom of heaven is like a landowner who went out early in the morning to hire workers for his vineyard .

40020004	He said to them , ‘ You go into the vineyard too , and I will give you whatever is right . ’

40020009	When those hired about five o’clock came , each received a full day’s pay .

40022001	Jesus spoke to them again in parables , saying :
40022002	“ The kingdom of heaven can be compared to a king who gave a wedding banquet for his son .

40022004	Again he sent other slaves , saying , ‘ Tell those who have been invited , “ Look ! The feast I have prepared for you is ready . My oxen and fattened cattle have been slaughtered , and everything is ready . Come to the wedding banquet . ” ’

40022023	The same day Sadducees ( who say there is no resurrection ) came to him and asked him ,

40022026	The second did the same , and the third , down to the seventh .

40023001	Then Jesus said to the crowds and to his disciples ,
