40027003	Now when Judas , who had betrayed him , saw that Jesus had been condemned , he regretted what he had done and returned the thirty silver coins to the chief priests and the elders ,
40027004	saying , “ I have sinned by betraying innocent blood ! ” But they said , “ What is that to us ? You take care of it yourself ! ”
40027005	So Judas threw the silver coins into the temple and left . Then he went out and hanged himself .
40027006	The chief priests took the silver and said , “ It is not lawful to put this into the temple treasury , since it is blood money . ”
40027007	After consulting together they bought the Potter’s Field with it , as a burial place for foreigners .
40027008	For this reason that field has been called the “ Field of Blood ” to this day .
40027009	Then what was spoken by Jeremiah the prophet was fulfilled : “ They took the thirty silver coins , the price of the one whose price had been set by the people of Israel ,
40027010	and they gave them for the potter’s field , as the Lord commanded me . ”
40027011	Then Jesus stood before the governor , and the governor asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” Jesus said , “ You say so . ”
40027012	But when he was accused by the chief priests and the elders , he did not respond .
40027013	Then Pilate said to him , “ Don’t you hear how many charges they are bringing against you ? ”
40027014	But he did not answer even one accusation , so that the governor was quite amazed .
40027015	During the feast the governor was accustomed to release one prisoner to the crowd , whomever they wanted .
40027016	At that time they had in custody a notorious prisoner named Jesus Barabbas .
40027017	So after they had assembled , Pilate said to them , “ Whom do you want me to release for you , Jesus Barabbas or Jesus who is called the Christ ? ”
40027018	( For he knew that they had handed him over because of envy . )
40027019	As he was sitting on the judgment seat , his wife sent a message to him : “ Have nothing to do with that innocent man ; I have suffered greatly as a result of a dream about him today . ”
40027020	But the chief priests and the elders persuaded the crowds to ask for Barabbas and to have Jesus killed .
40027021	The governor asked them , “ Which of the two do you want me to release for you ? ” And they said , “ Barabbas ! ”
40027022	Pilate said to them , “ Then what should I do with Jesus who is called the Christ ? ” They all said , “ Crucify him ! ”
40027023	He asked , “ Why ? What wrong has he done ? ” But they shouted more insistently , “ Crucify him ! ”
40027024	When Pilate saw that he could do nothing , but that instead a riot was starting , he took some water , washed his hands before the crowd and said , “ I am innocent of this man’s blood . You take care of it yourselves ! ”
40027025	In reply all the people said , “ Let his blood be on us and on our children ! ”
40027026	Then he released Barabbas for them . But after he had Jesus flogged , he handed him over to be crucified .
40027027	Then the governor’s soldiers took Jesus into the governor’s residence and gathered the whole cohort around him .
40027028	They stripped him and put a scarlet robe around him ,
40027029	and after braiding a crown of thorns , they put it on his head . They put a staff in his right hand , and kneeling down before him , they mocked him : “ Hail , king of the Jews ! ”
40027030	They spat on him and took the staff and struck him repeatedly on the head .
40027031	When they had mocked him , they stripped him of the robe and put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him away to crucify him .
40027032	As they were going out , they found a man from Cyrene named Simon , whom they forced to carry his cross .
40027033	They came to a place called Golgotha ( which means “ Place of the Skull ” )
40027034	and offered Jesus wine mixed with gall to drink . But after tasting it , he would not drink it .
40027035	When they had crucified him , they divided his clothes by throwing dice .
40027036	Then they sat down and kept guard over him there .
40027037	Above his head they put the charge against him , which read : “ This is Jesus , the king of the Jews . ”
40027038	Then two outlaws were crucified with him , one on his right and one on his left .
40027039	Those who passed by defamed him , shaking their heads
40027040	and saying , “ You who can destroy the temple and rebuild it in three days , save yourself ! If you are God’s Son , come down from the cross ! ”
40027041	In the same way even the chief priests – together with the experts in the law and elders – were mocking him :
40027042	“ He saved others , but he cannot save himself ! He is the king of Israel ! If he comes down now from the cross , we will believe in him !
40027043	H e trusts in God – let God , if he wants to , deliver him now because he said , ‘ I am God’s Son ’ ! ”
40027044	The robbers who were crucified with him also spoke abusively to him .
40027045	Now from noon until three , darkness came over all the land .
40027046	At about three o’clock Jesus shouted with a loud voice , “ Eli , Eli , lema sabachthani ? ” that is , “ My God , my God , why have you forsaken me ? ”
40027047	When some of the bystanders heard it , they said , “ This man is calling for Elijah . ”
40027048	Immediately one of them ran and got a sponge , filled it with sour wine , put it on a stick , and gave it to him to drink .
40027049	But the rest said , “ Leave him alone ! Let’s see if Elijah will come to save him . ”
40027050	Then Jesus cried out again with a loud voice and gave up his spirit .
40027051	Just then the temple curtain was torn in two , from top to bottom . The earth shook and the rocks were split apart .
40027052	And tombs were opened , and the bodies of many saints who had died were raised .
40027053	( They came out of the tombs after his resurrection and went into the holy city and appeared to many people . )
40027054	Now when the centurion and those with him who were guarding Jesus saw the earthquake and what took place , they were extremely terrified and said , “ Truly this one was God’s Son ! ”
40027055	Many women who had followed Jesus from Galilee and given him support were also there , watching from a distance .
40027056	Among them were Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James and Joseph , and the mother of the sons of Zebedee .
40027057	Now when it was evening , there came a rich man from Arimathea , named Joseph , who was also a disciple of Jesus .
40027058	He went to Pilate and asked for the body of Jesus . Then Pilate ordered that it be given to him .
40027059	Joseph took the body , wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
40027060	and placed it in his own new tomb that he had cut in the rock . Then he rolled a great stone across the entrance of the tomb and went away .
40027061	( Now Mary Magdalene and the other Mary were sitting there , opposite the tomb . )
40027062	The next day ( which is after the day of preparation ) the chief priests and the Pharisees assembled before Pilate
40027063	and said , “ Sir , we remember that while that deceiver was still alive he said , ‘ After three days I will rise again . ’
40027064	So give orders to secure the tomb until the third day . Otherwise his disciples may come and steal his body and say to the people , ‘ He has been raised from the dead , ’ and the last deception will be worse than the first . ”
40027065	Pilate said to them , “ Take a guard of soldiers . Go and make it as secure as you can . ”
40027066	So they went with the soldiers of the guard and made the tomb secure by sealing the stone .
40028001	Now after the Sabbath , at dawn on the first day of the week , Mary Magdalene and the other Mary went to look at the tomb .
40028002	Suddenly there was a severe earthquake , for an angel of the Lord descending from heaven came and rolled away the stone and sat on it .
40028003	His appearance was like lightning , and his clothes were white as snow .
40028004	The guards were shaken and became like dead men because they were so afraid of him .
40028005	But the angel said to the women , “ Do not be afraid ; I know that you are looking for Jesus , who was crucified .
40028006	He is not here , for he has been raised , just as he said . Come and see the place where he was lying .
40028007	Then go quickly and tell his disciples , ‘ He has been raised from the dead . He is going ahead of you into Galilee . You will see him there . ’ Listen , I have told you ! ”
40028008	So they left the tomb quickly , with fear and great joy , and ran to tell his disciples .
40028009	But Jesus met them , saying , “ Greetings ! ” They came to him , held on to his feet and worshiped him .
40028010	Then Jesus said to them , “ Do not be afraid . Go and tell my brothers to go to Galilee . They will see me there . ”
40028011	While they were going , some of the guard went into the city and told the chief priests everything that had happened .
40028012	After they had assembled with the elders and formed a plan , they gave a large sum of money to the soldiers ,
40028013	telling them , “ You are to say , ‘ His disciples came at night and stole his body while we were asleep . ’
40028014	If this matter is heard before the governor , we will satisfy him and keep you out of trouble . ”
40028015	So they took the money and did as they were instructed . And this story is told among the Jews to this day .
40028016	So the eleven disciples went to Galilee to the mountain Jesus had designated .
40028017	When they saw him , they worshiped him , but some doubted .
40028018	Then Jesus came up and said to them , “ All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me .
40028019	Therefore go and make disciples of all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit ,
40028020	teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you . And remember , I am with you always , to the end of the age . ”
41001001	The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God .
41001002	As it is written in Isaiah the prophet , “ Look , I am sending my messenger ahead of you , who will prepare your way ,
41001003	the voice of one shouting in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord , make his paths straight . ’ ”
41001004	In the wilderness John the baptizer began preaching a baptism of repentance for the forgiveness of sins .
41001005	People from the whole Judean countryside and all of Jerusalem were going out to him , and he was baptizing them in the Jordan River as they confessed their sins .
41001006	John wore a garment made of camel’s hair with a leather belt around his waist , and he ate locusts and wild honey .
41001007	He proclaimed , “ One more powerful than I am is coming after me ; I am not worthy to bend down and untie the strap of his sandals .
41001008	I baptize you with water , but he will baptize you with the Holy Spirit . ”
41001009	Now in those days Jesus came from Nazareth in Galilee and was baptized by John in the Jordan River .
41001010	And just as Jesus was coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens splitting apart and the Spirit descending on him like a dove .
41001011	And a voice came from heaven : “ You are my one dear Son ; in you I take great delight . ”
41001012	The Spirit immediately drove him into the wilderness .
41001013	He was in the wilderness forty days , enduring temptations from Satan . He was with wild animals , and angels were ministering to his needs .
41001014	Now after John was imprisoned , Jesus went into Galilee and proclaimed the gospel of God .
41001015	He said , “ The time is fulfilled and the kingdom of God is near . Repent and believe the gospel ! ”
41001016	As he went along the Sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew , Simon’s brother , casting a net into the sea ( for they were fishermen ) .
41001017	Jesus said to them , “ Follow me , and I will turn you into fishers of people . ”
41001018	They left their nets immediately and followed him .
41001019	Going on a little farther , he saw James , the son of Zebedee , and John his brother in their boat mending nets .
41001020	Immediately he called them , and they left their father Zebedee in the boat with the hired men and followed him .
41001021	Then they went to Capernaum . When the Sabbath came , Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach .
41001022	The people there were amazed by his teaching , because he taught them like one who had authority , not like the experts in the law .
41001023	Just then there was a man in their synagogue with an unclean spirit , and he cried out ,
41001024	“ Leave us alone , Jesus the Nazarene ! Have you come to destroy us ? I know who you are – the Holy One of God ! ”
41001025	But Jesus rebuked him : “ Silence ! Come out of him ! ”
41001026	After throwing him into convulsions , the unclean spirit cried out with a loud voice and came out of him .
41001027	They were all amazed so that they asked each other , “ What is this ? A new teaching with authority ! He even commands the unclean spirits and they obey him . ”
41001028	So the news about him spread quickly throughout all the region around Galilee .
41001029	Now as soon as they left the synagogue , they entered Simon and Andrew’s house , with James and John .
41001030	Simon’s mother-in-law was lying down , sick with a fever , so they spoke to Jesus at once about her .
41001031	He came and raised her up by gently taking her hand . Then the fever left her and she began to serve them .
41001032	When it was evening , after sunset , they brought to him all who were sick and demon-possessed .
41001033	The whole town gathered by the door .
41001034	So he healed many who were sick with various diseases and drove out many demons . But he would not permit the demons to speak , because they knew him .
41001035	Then Jesus got up early in the morning when it was still very dark , departed , and went out to a deserted place , and there he spent time in prayer .
41001036	Simon and his companions searched for him .
41001037	When they found him , they said , “ Everyone is looking for you . ”
41001038	He replied , “ Let us go elsewhere , into the surrounding villages , so that I can preach there too . For that is what I came out here to do . ”
41001039	So he went into all of Galilee preaching in their synagogues and casting out demons .
41001040	Now a leper came to him and fell to his knees , asking for help . “ If you are willing , you can make me clean , ” he said .
41001041	Moved with compassion , Jesus stretched out his hand and touched him , saying , “ I am willing . Be clean ! ”
41001042	The leprosy left him at once , and he was clean .
41001043	Immediately Jesus sent the man away with a very strong warning .
41001044	He told him , “ See that you do not say anything to anyone , but go , show yourself to a priest , and bring the offering that Moses commanded for your cleansing , as a testimony to them . ”
41001045	But as the man went out he began to announce it publicly and spread the story widely , so that Jesus was no longer able to enter any town openly but stayed outside in remote places . Still they kept coming to him from everywhere .
41002001	Now after some days , when he returned to Capernaum , the news spread that he was at home .
41002002	So many gathered that there was no longer any room , not even by the door , and he preached the word to them .
41002003	Some people came bringing to him a paralytic , carried by four of them .
41002004	When they were not able to bring him in because of the crowd , they removed the roof above Jesus . Then , after tearing it out , they lowered the stretcher the paralytic was lying on .
41002005	When Jesus saw their faith , he said to the paralytic , “ Son , your sins are forgiven . ”
41002006	Now some of the experts in the law were sitting there , turning these things over in their minds :
41002007	“ Why does this man speak this way ? He is blaspheming ! Who can forgive sins but God alone ? ”
41002008	Now immediately , when Jesus realized in his spirit that they were contemplating such thoughts , he said to them , “ Why are you thinking such things in your hearts ?
41002009	Which is easier , to say to the paralytic , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Stand up , take your stretcher , and walk ’ ?
41002010	But so that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins , ” – he said to the paralytic –
41002011	“ I tell you , stand up , take your stretcher , and go home . ”
41002012	And immediately the man stood up , took his stretcher , and went out in front of them all . They were all amazed and glorified God , saying , “ We have never seen anything like this ! ”
41002013	Jesus went out again by the sea . The whole crowd came to him , and he taught them .
41002014	As he went along , he saw Levi , the son of Alphaeus , sitting at the tax booth . “ Follow me , ” he said to him . And he got up and followed him .
41002015	As Jesus was having a meal in Levi’s home , many tax collectors and sinners were eating with Jesus and his disciples , for there were many who followed him .
41002016	When the experts in the law and the Pharisees saw that he was eating with sinners and tax collectors , they said to his disciples , “ Why does he eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
41002017	When Jesus heard this he said to them , “ Those who are healthy don’t need a physician , but those who are sick do . I have not come to call the righteous , but sinners . ”
41002018	Now John’s disciples and the Pharisees were fasting . So they came to Jesus and said , “ Why do the disciples of John and the disciples of the Pharisees fast , but your disciples don’t fast ? ”
41002019	Jesus said to them , “ The wedding guests cannot fast while the bridegroom is with them , can they ? As long as they have the bridegroom with them they do not fast .
41002020	But the days are coming when the bridegroom will be taken from them , and at that time they will fast .
41002021	No one sews a patch of unshrunk cloth on an old garment ; otherwise , the patch pulls away from it , the new from the old , and the tear becomes worse .
41002022	And no one pours new wine into old wineskins ; otherwise , the wine will burst the skins , and both the wine and the skins will be destroyed . Instead new wine is poured into new wineskins . ”
41002023	Jesus was going through the grain fields on a Sabbath , and his disciples began to pick some heads of wheat as they made their way .
41002024	So the Pharisees said to him , “ Look , why are they doing what is against the law on the Sabbath ? ”
41002025	He said to them , “ Have you never read what David did when he was in need and he and his companions were hungry –
41002026	how he entered the house of God when Abiathar was high priest and ate the sacred bread , which is against the law for any but the priests to eat , and also gave it to his companions ? ”
41002027	Then he said to them , “ The Sabbath was made for people , not people for the Sabbath .
41002028	For this reason the Son of Man is lord even of the Sabbath . ”
41003001	Then Jesus entered the synagogue again , and a man was there who had a withered hand .
41003002	They watched Jesus closely to see if he would heal him on the Sabbath , so that they could accuse him .
41003003	So he said to the man who had the withered hand , “ Stand up among all these people . ”
41003004	Then he said to them , “ Is it lawful to do good on the Sabbath , or evil , to save a life or destroy it ? ” But they were silent .
41003005	After looking around at them in anger , grieved by the hardness of their hearts , he said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” He stretched it out , and his hand was restored .
41003006	So the Pharisees went out immediately and began plotting with the Herodians , as to how they could assassinate him .
41003007	Then Jesus went away with his disciples to the sea , and a great multitude from Galilee followed him . And from Judea ,
41003008	Jerusalem , Idumea , beyond the Jordan River , and around Tyre and Sidon a great multitude came to him when they heard about the things he had done .
41003009	Because of the crowd , he told his disciples to have a small boat ready for him so the crowd would not press toward him .
41003010	For he had healed many , so that all who were afflicted with diseases pressed toward him in order to touch him .
41003011	And whenever the unclean spirits saw him , they fell down before him and cried out , “ You are the Son of God . ”
41003012	But he sternly ordered them not to make him known .
41003013	Now Jesus went up the mountain and called for those he wanted , and they came to him .
41003014	He appointed twelve ( whom he named apostles ) , so that they would be with him and he could send them to preach
41003015	and to have authority to cast out demons .
41003016	He appointed twelve : To Simon he gave the name Peter ;
41003017	to James and his brother John , the sons of Zebedee , he gave the name Boanerges ( that is , “ sons of thunder ” ) ;
41003018	and Andrew , Philip , Bartholomew , Matthew , Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , Thaddaeus , Simon the Zealot ,
41003019	and Judas Iscariot , who betrayed him .
41003020	Now Jesus went home , and a crowd gathered so that they were not able to eat .
41003021	When his family heard this they went out to restrain him , for they said , “ He is out of his mind . ”
41003022	The experts in the law who came down from Jerusalem said , “ He is possessed by Beelzebul , ” and , “ By the ruler of demons he casts out demons . ”
41003023	So he called them and spoke to them in parables : “ How can Satan cast out Satan ?
41003024	If a kingdom is divided against itself , that kingdom will not be able to stand .
41003025	If a house is divided against itself , that house will not be able to stand .
41003026	And if Satan rises against himself and is divided , he is not able to stand and his end has come .
41003027	But no one is able to enter a strong man’s house and steal his property unless he first ties up the strong man . Then he can thoroughly plunder his house .
41003028	I tell you the truth , people will be forgiven for all sins , even all the blasphemies they utter .
41003029	But whoever blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven , but is guilty of an eternal sin ”
41003030	( because they said , “ He has an unclean spirit ” ) .
41003031	Then Jesus’ mother and his brothers came . Standing outside , they sent word to him , to summon him .
41003032	A crowd was sitting around him and they said to him , “ Look , your mother and your brothers are outside looking for you . ”
41003033	He answered them and said , “ Who are my mother and my brothers ? ”
41003034	And looking at those who were sitting around him in a circle , he said , “ Here are my mother and my brothers !
41003035	For whoever does the will of God is my brother and sister and mother . ”
41004001	Again he began to teach by the lake . Such a large crowd gathered around him that he got into a boat on the lake and sat there while the whole crowd was on the shore by the lake .
41004002	He taught them many things in parables , and in his teaching said to them :
41004003	“ Listen ! A sower went out to sow .
41004004	And as he sowed , some seed fell along the path , and the birds came and devoured it .
41004005	Other seed fell on rocky ground where it did not have much soil . It sprang up at once because the soil was not deep .
41004006	When the sun came up it was scorched , and because it did not have sufficient root , it withered .
41004007	Other seed fell among the thorns , and they grew up and choked it , and it did not produce grain .
41004008	But other seed fell on good soil and produced grain , sprouting and growing ; some yielded thirty times as much , some sixty , and some a hundred times . ”
41004009	And he said , “ Whoever has ears to hear had better listen ! ”
41004010	When he was alone , those around him with the twelve asked him about the parables .
41004011	He said to them , “ The secret of the kingdom of God has been given to you . But to those outside , everything is in parables ,
41004012	so that although they look they may look but not see , and although they hear they may hear but not understand , so they may not repent and be forgiven . ”
41004013	He said to them , “ Don’t you understand this parable ? Then how will you understand any parable ?
41004014	The sower sows the word .
41004015	These are the ones on the path where the word is sown : Whenever they hear , immediately Satan comes and snatches the word that was sown in them .
41004016	These are the ones sown on rocky ground : As soon as they hear the word , they receive it with joy .
41004017	But they have no root in themselves and do not endure . Then , when trouble or persecution comes because of the word , immediately they fall away .
41004018	Others are the ones sown among thorns : They are those who hear the word ,
41004019	but worldly cares , the seductiveness of wealth , and the desire for other things come in and choke the word , and it produces nothing .
41004020	But these are the ones sown on good soil : They hear the word and receive it and bear fruit , one thirty times as much , one sixty , and one a hundred . ”
41004021	He also said to them , “ A lamp isn’t brought to be put under a basket or under a bed , is it ? Isn’t it to be placed on a lampstand ?
41004022	For nothing is hidden except to be revealed , and nothing concealed except to be brought to light .
41004023	If anyone has ears to hear , he had better listen ! ”
41004024	And he said to them , “ Take care about what you hear . The measure you use will be the measure you receive , and more will be added to you .
41004025	For whoever has will be given more , but whoever does not have , even what he has will be taken from him . ”
41004026	He also said , “ The kingdom of God is like someone who spreads seed on the ground .
41004027	He goes to sleep and gets up , night and day , and the seed sprouts and grows , though he does not know how .
41004028	By itself the soil produces a crop , first the stalk , then the head , then the full grain in the head .
41004029	And when the grain is ripe , he sends in the sickle because the harvest has come . ”
41004030	He also asked , “ To what can we compare the kingdom of God , or what parable can we use to present it ?
41004031	It is like a mustard seed that when sown in the ground , even though it is the smallest of all the seeds in the ground –
41004032	when it is sown , it grows up , becomes the greatest of all garden plants , and grows large branches so that the wild birds can nest in its shade . ”
41004033	So with many parables like these , he spoke the word to them , as they were able to hear .
41004034	He did not speak to them without a parable . But privately he explained everything to his own disciples .
41004035	On that day , when evening came , Jesus said to his disciples , “ Let’s go across to the other side of the lake . ”
41004036	So after leaving the crowd , they took him along , just as he was , in the boat , and other boats were with him .
41004037	Now a great windstorm developed and the waves were breaking into the boat , so that the boat was nearly swamped .
41004038	But he was in the stern , sleeping on a cushion . They woke him up and said to him , “ Teacher , don’t you care that we are about to die ? ”
41004039	So he got up and rebuked the wind , and said to the sea , “ Be quiet ! Calm down ! ” Then the wind stopped , and it was dead calm .
41004040	And he said to them , “ Why are you cowardly ? Do you still not have faith ? ”
41004041	They were overwhelmed by fear and said to one another , “ Who then is this ? Even the wind and sea obey him ! ”
41005001	So they came to the other side of the lake , to the region of the Gerasenes .
41005002	Just as Jesus was getting out of the boat , a man with an unclean spirit came from the tombs and met him .
41005003	He lived among the tombs , and no one could bind him anymore , not even with a chain .
41005004	For his hands and feet had often been bound with chains and shackles , but he had torn the chains apart and broken the shackles in pieces . No one was strong enough to subdue him .
41005005	Each night and every day among the tombs and in the mountains , he would cry out and cut himself with stones .
41005006	When he saw Jesus from a distance , he ran and bowed down before him .
41005007	Then he cried out with a loud voice , “ Leave me alone , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ! I implore you by God – do not torment me ! ”
41005008	( For Jesus had said to him , “ Come out of that man , you unclean spirit ! ” )
41005009	Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” And he said , “ My name is Legion , for we are many . ”
41005010	He begged Jesus repeatedly not to send them out of the region .
41005011	There on the hillside , a great herd of pigs was feeding .
41005012	And the demonic spirits begged him , “ Send us into the pigs . Let us enter them . ”
41005013	Jesus gave them permission . So the unclean spirits came out and went into the pigs . Then the herd rushed down the steep slope into the lake , and about two thousand were drowned in the lake .
41005014	Now the herdsmen ran off and spread the news in the town and countryside , and the people went out to see what had happened .
41005015	They came to Jesus and saw the demon-possessed man sitting there , clothed and in his right mind – the one who had the “ Legion ” – and they were afraid .
41005016	Those who had seen what had happened to the demon-possessed man reported it , and they also told about the pigs .
41005017	Then they asked Jesus to leave their region .
41005018	As he was getting into the boat the man who had been demon-possessed asked if he could go with him .
41005019	But Jesus did not permit him to do so . Instead , he said to him , “ Go to your home and to your people and tell them what the Lord has done for you , that he had mercy on you . ”
41005020	So he went away and began to proclaim in the Decapolis what Jesus had done for him , and all were amazed .
41005021	When Jesus had crossed again in a boat to the other side , a large crowd gathered around him , and he was by the sea .
41005022	Then one of the synagogue rulers , named Jairus , came up , and when he saw Jesus , he fell at his feet .
41005023	He asked him urgently , “ My little daughter is near death . Come and lay your hands on her so that she may be healed and live . ”
41005024	Jesus went with him , and a large crowd followed and pressed around him .
41005025	Now a woman was there who had been suffering from a hemorrhage for twelve years .
41005026	She had endured a great deal under the care of many doctors and had spent all that she had . Yet instead of getting better , she grew worse .
41005027	When she heard about Jesus , she came up behind him in the crowd and touched his cloak ,
41005028	for she kept saying , “ If only I touch his clothes , I will be healed . ”
41005029	At once the bleeding stopped , and she felt in her body that she was healed of her disease .
41005030	Jesus knew at once that power had gone out from him . He turned around in the crowd and said , “ Who touched my clothes ? ”
41005031	His disciples said to him , “ You see the crowd pressing against you and you say , ‘ Who touched me ? ’ ”
41005032	But he looked around to see who had done it .
41005033	Then the woman , with fear and trembling , knowing what had happened to her , came and fell down before him and told him the whole truth .
41005034	He said to her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace , and be healed of your disease . ”
41005035	While he was still speaking , people came from the synagogue ruler’s house saying , “ Your daughter has died . Why trouble the teacher any longer ? ”
41005036	But Jesus , paying no attention to what was said , told the synagogue ruler , “ Do not be afraid ; just believe . ”
41005037	He did not let anyone follow him except Peter , James , and John , the brother of James .
41005038	They came to the house of the synagogue ruler where he saw noisy confusion and people weeping and wailing loudly .
41005039	When he entered he said to them , “ Why are you distressed and weeping ? The child is not dead but asleep . ”
41005040	And they began making fun of him . But he put them all outside and he took the child’s father and mother and his own companions and went into the room where the child was .
41005041	Then , gently taking the child by the hand , he said to her , “ Talitha koum , ” which means , “ Little girl , I say to you , get up . ”
41005042	The girl got up at once and began to walk around ( she was twelve years old ) . They were completely astonished at this .
41005043	He strictly ordered that no one should know about this , and told them to give her something to eat .
41006001	Now Jesus left that place and came to his hometown , and his disciples followed him .
41006002	When the Sabbath came , he began to teach in the synagogue . Many who heard him were astonished , saying , “ Where did he get these ideas ? And what is this wisdom that has been given to him ? What are these miracles that are done through his hands ?
41006003	Isn’t this the carpenter , the son of Mary and brother of James , Joses , Judas , and Simon ? And aren’t his sisters here with us ? ” And so they took offense at him .
41006004	Then Jesus said to them , “ A prophet is not without honor except in his hometown , and among his relatives , and in his own house . ”
41006005	He was not able to do a miracle there , except to lay his hands on a few sick people and heal them .
41006006	And he was amazed because of their unbelief . Then he went around among the villages and taught .
41006007	Jesus called the twelve and began to send them out two by two . He gave them authority over the unclean spirits .
41006008	He instructed them to take nothing for the journey except a staff – no bread , no bag , no money in their belts –
41006009	and to put on sandals but not to wear two tunics .
41006010	He said to them , “ Wherever you enter a house , stay there until you leave the area .
41006011	If a place will not welcome you or listen to you , as you go out from there , shake the dust off your feet as a testimony against them . ”
41006012	So they went out and preached that all should repent .
41006013	They cast out many demons and anointed many sick people with oil and healed them .
41006014	Now King Herod heard this , for Jesus’ name had become known . Some were saying , “ John the baptizer has been raised from the dead , and because of this , miraculous powers are at work in him . ”
41006015	Others said , “ He is Elijah . ” Others said , “ He is a prophet , like one of the prophets from the past . ”
41006016	But when Herod heard this , he said , “ John , whom I beheaded , has been raised ! ”
41006017	For Herod himself had sent men , arrested John , and bound him in prison on account of Herodias , his brother Philip’s wife , because Herod had married her .
41006018	For John had repeatedly told Herod , “ It is not lawful for you to have your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	So Herodias nursed a grudge against him and wanted to kill him . But she could not
41006020	because Herod stood in awe of John and protected him , since he knew that John was a righteous and holy man . When Herod heard him , he was thoroughly baffled , and yet he liked to listen to John .
41006021	But a suitable day came , when Herod gave a banquet on his birthday for his court officials , military commanders , and leaders of Galilee .
41006022	When his daughter Herodias came in and danced , she pleased Herod and his dinner guests . The king said to the girl , “ Ask me for whatever you want and I will give it to you . ”
41006023	He swore to her , “ Whatever you ask I will give you , up to half my kingdom . ”
41006024	So she went out and said to her mother , “ What should I ask for ? ” Her mother said , “ The head of John the baptizer . ”
41006025	Immediately she hurried back to the king and made her request : “ I want the head of John the Baptist on a platter immediately . ”
41006026	Although it grieved the king deeply , he did not want to reject her request because of his oath and his guests .
41006027	So the king sent an executioner at once to bring John’s head , and he went and beheaded John in prison .
41006028	He brought his head on a platter and gave it to the girl , and the girl gave it to her mother .
41006029	When John’s disciples heard this , they came and took his body and placed it in a tomb .
41006030	Then the apostles gathered around Jesus and told him everything they had done and taught .
41006031	He said to them , “ Come with me privately to an isolated place and rest a while ” ( for many were coming and going , and there was no time to eat ) .
41006032	So they went away by themselves in a boat to some remote place .
41006033	But many saw them leaving and recognized them , and they hurried on foot from all the towns and arrived there ahead of them .
41006034	As Jesus came ashore he saw the large crowd and he had compassion on them , because they were like sheep without a shepherd . So he taught them many things .
41006035	When it was already late , his disciples came to him and said , “ This is an isolated place and it is already very late .
41006036	Send them away so that they can go into the surrounding countryside and villages and buy something for themselves to eat . ”
41006037	But he answered them , “ You give them something to eat . ” And they said , “ Should we go and buy bread for two hundred silver coins and give it to them to eat ? ”
41006038	He said to them , “ How many loaves do you have ? Go and see . ” When they found out , they said , “ Five – and two fish . ”
41006039	Then he directed them all to sit down in groups on the green grass .
41006040	So they reclined in groups of hundreds and fifties .
41006041	He took the five loaves and the two fish , and looking up to heaven , he gave thanks and broke the loaves . He gave them to his disciples to serve the people , and he divided the two fish among them all .
41006042	They all ate and were satisfied ,
41006043	and they picked up the broken pieces and fish that were left over , twelve baskets full .
41006044	Now there were five thousand men who ate the bread .
41006045	Immediately Jesus made his disciples get into the boat and go on ahead to the other side , to Bethsaida , while he dispersed the crowd .
41006046	After saying good-bye to them , he went to the mountain to pray .
41006047	When evening came , the boat was in the middle of the sea and he was alone on the land .
41006048	He saw them straining at the oars , because the wind was against them . As the night was ending , he came to them walking on the sea , for he wanted to pass by them .
41006049	When they saw him walking on the water they thought he was a ghost . They cried out ,
41006050	for they all saw him and were terrified . But immediately he spoke to them : “ Have courage ! It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
41006051	Then he went up with them into the boat , and the wind ceased . They were completely astonished ,
41006052	because they did not understand about the loaves , but their hearts were hardened .
41006053	After they had crossed over , they came to land at Gennesaret and anchored there .
41006054	As they got out of the boat , people immediately recognized Jesus .
41006055	They ran through that whole region and began to bring the sick on mats to wherever he was rumored to be .
41006056	And wherever he would go – into villages , towns , or countryside – they would place the sick in the marketplaces , and would ask him if they could just touch the edge of his cloak , and all who touched it were healed .
41007001	Now the Pharisees and some of the experts in the law who came from Jerusalem gathered around him .
41007002	And they saw that some of Jesus’ disciples ate their bread with unclean hands , that is , unwashed .
41007003	( For the Pharisees and all the Jews do not eat unless they perform a ritual washing , holding fast to the tradition of the elders .
41007004	And when they come from the marketplace , they do not eat unless they wash . They hold fast to many other traditions : the washing of cups , pots , kettles , and dining couches . )
41007005	The Pharisees and the experts in the law asked him , “ Why do your disciples not live according to the tradition of the elders , but eat with unwashed hands ? ”
41007006	He said to them , “ Isaiah prophesied correctly about you hypocrites , as it is written : ‘ This people honors me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
41007007	They worship me in vain , teaching as doctrine the commandments of men . ’
41007008	Having no regard for the command of God , you hold fast to human tradition . ”
41007009	He also said to them , “ You neatly reject the commandment of God in order to set up your tradition .
41007010	For Moses said , ‘ Honor your father and your mother , ’ and , ‘ Whoever insults his father or mother must be put to death . ’
41007011	But you say that if anyone tells his father or mother , ‘ Whatever help you would have received from me is corban ’ ( that is , a gift for God ) ,
41007012	then you no longer permit him to do anything for his father or mother .
41007013	Thus you nullify the word of God by your tradition that you have handed down . And you do many things like this . ”
41007014	Then he called the crowd again and said to them , “ Listen to me , everyone , and understand .
41007015	There is nothing outside of a person that can defile him by going into him . Rather , it is what comes out of a person that defiles him . ”
41007017	Now when Jesus had left the crowd and entered the house , his disciples asked him about the parable .
41007018	He said to them , “ Are you so foolish ? Don’t you understand that whatever goes into a person from outside cannot defile him ?
41007019	For it does not enter his heart but his stomach , and then goes out into the sewer . ” ( This means all foods are clean . )
41007020	He said , “ What comes out of a person defiles him .
41007021	For from within , out of the human heart , come evil ideas , sexual immorality , theft , murder ,
41007022	adultery , greed , evil , deceit , debauchery , envy , slander , pride , and folly .
41007023	All these evils come from within and defile a person . ”
41007024	After Jesus left there , he went to the region of Tyre . When he went into a house , he did not want anyone to know , but he was not able to escape notice .
41007025	Instead , a woman whose young daughter had an unclean spirit immediately heard about him and came and fell at his feet .
41007026	The woman was a Greek , of Syrophoenician origin . She asked him to cast the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	He said to her , “ Let the children be satisfied first , for it is not right to take the children’s bread and to throw it to the dogs . ”
41007028	She answered , “ Yes , Lord , but even the dogs under the table eat the children’s crumbs . ”
41007029	Then he said to her , “ Because you said this , you may go . The demon has left your daughter . ”
41007030	She went home and found the child lying on the bed , and the demon gone .
41007031	Then Jesus went out again from the region of Tyre and came through Sidon to the Sea of Galilee in the region of the Decapolis .
41007032	They brought to him a deaf man who had difficulty speaking , and they asked him to place his hands on him .
41007033	After Jesus took him aside privately , away from the crowd , he put his fingers in the man’s ears , and after spitting , he touched his tongue .
41007034	Then he looked up to heaven and said with a sigh , “ Ephphatha ” ( that is , “ Be opened ” ) .
41007035	And immediately the man’s ears were opened , his tongue loosened , and he spoke plainly .
41007036	Jesus ordered them not to tell anything . But as much as he ordered them not to do this , they proclaimed it all the more .
41007037	People were completely astounded and said , “ He has done everything well . He even makes the deaf hear and the mute speak . ”
41008001	In those days there was another large crowd with nothing to eat . So Jesus called his disciples and said to them ,
41008002	“ I have compassion on the crowd , because they have already been here with me three days , and they have nothing to eat .
41008003	If I send them home hungry , they will faint on the way , and some of them have come from a great distance . ”

41008007	They also had a few small fish . After giving thanks for these , he told them to serve these as well .
41008008	Everyone ate and was satisfied , and they picked up the broken pieces left over , seven baskets full .

41008020	“ When I broke the seven loaves for the four thousand , how many baskets full of pieces did you pick up ? ” They replied , “ Seven . ”
41008021	Then he said to them , “ Do you still not understand ? ”
41008022	Then they came to Bethsaida . They brought a blind man to Jesus and asked him to touch him .

41008024	Regaining his sight he said , “ I see people , but they look like trees walking . ”
41008025	Then Jesus placed his hands on the man’s eyes again . And he opened his eyes , his sight was restored , and he saw everything clearly .

41008037	What can a person give in exchange for his life ?
41008038	For if anyone is ashamed of me and my words in this adulterous and sinful generation , the Son of Man will also be ashamed of him when he comes in the glory of his Father with the holy angels . ”
41009001	And he said to them , “ I tell you the truth , there are some standing here who will not experience death before they see the kingdom of God come with power . ”
41009002	Six days later Jesus took with him Peter , James , and John and led them alone up a high mountain privately . And he was transfigured before them ,
41009003	and his clothes became radiantly white , more so than any launderer in the world could bleach them .
41009004	Then Elijah appeared before them along with Moses , and they were talking with Jesus .

41009006	( For they were afraid , and he did not know what to say . )
41009007	Then a cloud overshadowed them , and a voice came from the cloud , “ This is my one dear Son . Listen to him ! ”
41009008	Suddenly when they looked around , they saw no one with them any more except Jesus .

41009014	When they came to the disciples , they saw a large crowd around them and experts in the law arguing with them .

41009018	Whenever it seizes him , it throws him down , and he foams at the mouth , grinds his teeth , and becomes rigid . I asked your disciples to cast it out , but they were not able to do so . ”
41009019	He answered them , “ You unbelieving generation ! How much longer must I be with you ? How much longer must I endure you ? Bring him to me . ”
41009020	So they brought the boy to him . When the spirit saw him , it immediately threw the boy into a convulsion . He fell on the ground and rolled around , foaming at the mouth .
41009021	Jesus asked his father , “ How long has this been happening to him ? ” And he said , “ From childhood .
41009022	It has often thrown him into fire or water to destroy him . But if you are able to do anything , have compassion on us and help us . ”

41009024	Immediately the father of the boy cried out and said , “ I believe ; help my unbelief ! ”

41009027	But Jesus gently took his hand and raised him to his feet , and he stood up .

41009045	If your foot causes you to sin , cut it off ! It is better to enter life lame than to have two feet and be thrown into hell .
41009047	If your eye causes you to sin , tear it out ! It is better to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into hell ,
41009048	where their worm never dies and the fire is never quenched .
41009049	Everyone will be salted with fire .
41009050	Salt is good , but if it loses its saltiness , how can you make it salty again ? Have salt in yourselves , and be at peace with each other . ”
41010001	Then Jesus left that place and went to the region of Judea and beyond the Jordan River . Again crowds gathered to him , and again , as was his custom , he taught them .

41010019	You know the commandments : ‘ Do not murder , do not commit adultery , do not steal , do not give false testimony , do not defraud , honor your father and mother . ’ ”
41010020	The man said to him , “ Teacher , I have wholeheartedly obeyed all these laws since my youth . ”
41010021	As Jesus looked at him , he felt love for him and said , “ You lack one thing . Go , sell whatever you have and give the money to the poor , and you will have treasure in heaven . Then come , follow me . ”
41010022	But at this statement , the man looked sad and went away sorrowful , for he was very rich .

41010028	Peter began to speak to him , “ Look , we have left everything to follow you ! ”
