41010046	They came to Jericho . As Jesus and his disciples and a large crowd were leaving Jericho , Bartimaeus the son of Timaeus , a blind beggar , was sitting by the road .
41010047	When he heard that it was Jesus the Nazarene , he began to shout , “ Jesus , Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010048	Many scolded him to get him to be quiet , but he shouted all the more , “ Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010049	Jesus stopped and said , “ Call him . ” So they called the blind man and said to him , “ Have courage ! Get up ! He is calling you . ”
41010050	He threw off his cloak , jumped up , and came to Jesus .
41010051	Then Jesus said to him , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ” The blind man replied , “ Rabbi , let me see again . ”
41010052	Jesus said to him , “ Go , your faith has healed you . ” Immediately he regained his sight and followed him on the road .
41011001	Now as they approached Jerusalem , near Bethphage and Bethany , at the Mount of Olives , Jesus sent two of his disciples
41011002	and said to them , “ Go to the village ahead of you . As soon as you enter it , you will find a colt tied there that has never been ridden . Untie it and bring it here .
41011003	If anyone says to you , ‘ Why are you doing this ? ’ say , ‘ The Lord needs it and will send it back here soon . ’ ”
41011004	So they went and found a colt tied at a door , outside in the street , and untied it .
41011005	Some people standing there said to them , “ What are you doing , untying that colt ? ”
41011006	They replied as Jesus had told them , and the bystanders let them go .
41011007	Then they brought the colt to Jesus , threw their cloaks on it , and he sat on it .
41011008	Many spread their cloaks on the road and others spread branches they had cut in the fields .
41011009	Both those who went ahead and those who followed kept shouting , “ Hosanna ! Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord !
41011010	Blessed is the coming kingdom of our father David ! Hosanna in the highest ! ”
41011011	Then Jesus entered Jerusalem and went to the temple . And after looking around at everything , he went out to Bethany with the twelve since it was already late .
41011012	Now the next day , as they went out from Bethany , he was hungry .
41011013	After noticing in the distance a fig tree with leaves , he went to see if he could find any fruit on it . When he came to it he found nothing but leaves , for it was not the season for figs .
41011014	He said to it , “ May no one ever eat fruit from you again . ” And his disciples heard it .
41011015	Then they came to Jerusalem . Jesus entered the temple area and began to drive out those who were selling and buying in the temple courts . He turned over the tables of the money changers and the chairs of those selling doves ,
41011016	and he would not permit anyone to carry merchandise through the temple courts .
41011017	Then he began to teach them and said , “ Is it not written : ‘ My house will be called a house of prayer for all nations ’ ? But you have turned it into a den of robbers ! ”
41011018	The chief priests and the experts in the law heard it and they considered how they could assassinate him , for they feared him , because the whole crowd was amazed by his teaching .
41011019	When evening came , Jesus and his disciples went out of the city .
41011020	In the morning as they passed by , they saw the fig tree withered from the roots .
41011021	Peter remembered and said to him , “ Rabbi , look ! The fig tree you cursed has withered . ”
41011022	Jesus said to them , “ Have faith in God .
41011023	I tell you the truth , if someone says to this mountain , ‘ Be lifted up and thrown into the sea , ’ and does not doubt in his heart but believes that what he says will happen , it will be done for him .
41011024	For this reason I tell you , whatever you pray and ask for , believe that you have received it , and it will be yours .
41011025	Whenever you stand praying , if you have anything against anyone , forgive him , so that your Father in heaven will also forgive you your sins . ”
41011027	They came again to Jerusalem . While Jesus was walking in the temple courts , the chief priests , the experts in the law , and the elders came up to him
41011028	and said , “ By what authority are you doing these things ? Or who gave you this authority to do these things ? ”
41011029	Jesus said to them , “ I will ask you one question . Answer me and I will tell you by what authority I do these things :
41011030	John’s baptism – was it from heaven or from people ? Answer me . ”
41011031	They discussed with one another , saying , “ If we say , ‘ From heaven , ’ he will say , ‘ Then why did you not believe him ? ’
41011032	But if we say , ‘ From people – ’ ” ( they feared the crowd , for they all considered John to be truly a prophet ) .
41011033	So they answered Jesus , “ We don’t know . ” Then Jesus said to them , “ Neither will I tell you by what authority I am doing these things . ”
41012001	Then he began to speak to them in parables : “ A man planted a vineyard . He put a fence around it , dug a pit for its winepress , and built a watchtower . Then he leased it to tenant farmers and went on a journey .
41012002	At harvest time he sent a slave to the tenants to collect from them his portion of the crop .
41012003	But those tenants seized his slave , beat him , and sent him away empty-handed .
41012004	So he sent another slave to them again . This one they struck on the head and treated outrageously .
41012005	He sent another , and that one they killed . This happened to many others , some of whom were beaten , others killed .
41012006	He had one left , his one dear son . Finally he sent him to them , saying , ‘ They will respect my son . ’
41012007	But those tenants said to one another , ‘ This is the heir . Come , let’s kill him and the inheritance will be ours ! ’
41012008	So they seized him , killed him , and threw his body out of the vineyard .
41012009	What then will the owner of the vineyard do ? He will come and destroy those tenants and give the vineyard to others .
41012010	Have you not read this scripture : ‘ The stone the builders rejected has become the cornerstone .
41012011	This is from the Lord , and it is marvelous in our eyes ’ ? ”
41012012	Now they wanted to arrest him ( but they feared the crowd ) , because they realized that he told this parable against them . So they left him and went away .
41012013	Then they sent some of the Pharisees and Herodians to trap him with his own words .
41012014	When they came they said to him , “ Teacher , we know that you are truthful and do not court anyone’s favor , because you show no partiality but teach the way of God in accordance with the truth . Is it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not ? Should we pay or shouldn’t we ? ”
41012015	But he saw through their hypocrisy and said to them , “ Why are you testing me ? Bring me a denarius and let me look at it . ”
41012016	So they brought one , and he said to them , “ Whose image is this , and whose inscription ? ” They replied , “ Caesar’s . ”
41012017	Then Jesus said to them , “ Give to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s , and to God the things that are God’s . ” And they were utterly amazed at him .
41012018	Sadducees ( who say there is no resurrection ) also came to him and asked him ,
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses wrote for us : ‘ If a man ’ s brother dies and leaves a wife but no children , that man must marry the widow and father children for his brother . ’
41012020	There were seven brothers . The first one married , and when he died he had no children .
41012021	The second married her and died without any children , and likewise the third .
41012022	None of the seven had children . Finally , the woman died too .
41012023	In the resurrection , when they rise again , whose wife will she be ? For all seven had married her . ”
41012024	Jesus said to them , “ Aren’t you deceived for this reason , because you don’t know the scriptures or the power of God ?
41012025	For when they rise from the dead , they neither marry nor are given in marriage , but are like angels in heaven .
41012026	Now as for the dead being raised , have you not read in the book of Moses , in the passage about the bush , how God said to him , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ’ ?
41012027	He is not the God of the dead but of the living . You are badly mistaken ! ”
41012028	Now one of the experts in the law came and heard them debating . When he saw that Jesus answered them well , he asked him , “ Which commandment is the most important of all ? ”
41012029	Jesus answered , “ The most important is : ‘ Listen , Israel , the Lord our God , the Lord is one .
41012030	Love the Lord your God with all your heart , with all your soul , with all your mind , and with all your strength . ’
41012031	The second is : ‘ Love your neighbor as yourself . ’ There is no other commandment greater than these . ”
41012032	The expert in the law said to him , “ That is true , Teacher ; you are right to say that he is one , and there is no one else besides him .
41012033	And to love him with all your heart , with all your mind , and with all your strength and to love your neighbor as yourself is more important than all burnt offerings and sacrifices . ”
41012034	When Jesus saw that he had answered thoughtfully , he said to him , “ You are not far from the kingdom of God . ” Then no one dared any longer to question him .
41012035	While Jesus was teaching in the temple courts , he said , “ How is it that the experts in the law say that the Christ is David’s son ?
41012036	David himself , by the Holy Spirit , said , ‘ The Lord said to my lord , “ Sit at my right hand , until I put your enemies under your feet . ” ’
41012037	If David himself calls him ‘ Lord , ’ how can he be his son ? ” And the large crowd was listening to him with delight .
41012038	In his teaching Jesus also said , “ Watch out for the experts in the law . They like walking around in long robes and elaborate greetings in the marketplaces ,
41012039	and the best seats in the synagogues and the places of honor at banquets .
41012040	They devour widows’ property , and as a show make long prayers . These men will receive a more severe punishment . ”
41012041	Then he sat down opposite the offering box , and watched the crowd putting coins into it . Many rich people were throwing in large amounts .
41012042	And a poor widow came and put in two small copper coins , worth less than a penny .
41012043	He called his disciples and said to them , “ I tell you the truth , this poor widow has put more into the offering box than all the others .
41012044	For they all gave out of their wealth . But she , out of her poverty , put in what she had to live on , everything she had . ”
41013001	Now as Jesus was going out of the temple courts , one of his disciples said to him , “ Teacher , look at these tremendous stones and buildings ! ”
41013002	Jesus said to him , “ Do you see these great buildings ? Not one stone will be left on another . All will be torn down ! ”
41013003	So while he was sitting on the Mount of Olives opposite the temple , Peter , James , John , and Andrew asked him privately ,
41013004	“ Tell us , when will these things happen ? And what will be the sign that all these things are about to take place ? ”
41013005	Jesus began to say to them , “ Watch out that no one misleads you .
41013006	Many will come in my name , saying , ‘ I am he , ’ and they will mislead many .
41013007	When you hear of wars and rumors of wars , do not be alarmed . These things must happen , but the end is still to come .
41013008	For nation will rise up in arms against nation , and kingdom against kingdom . There will be earthquakes in various places , and there will be famines . These are but the beginning of birth pains .
41013009	“ You must watch out for yourselves . You will be handed over to councils and beaten in the synagogues . You will stand before governors and kings because of me , as a witness to them .
41013010	First the gospel must be preached to all nations .
41013011	When they arrest you and hand you over for trial , do not worry about what to speak . But say whatever is given you at that time , for it is not you speaking , but the Holy Spirit .
41013012	Brother will hand over brother to death , and a father his child . Children will rise against parents and have them put to death .
41013013	You will be hated by everyone because of my name . But the one who endures to the end will be saved .
41013014	“ But when you see the abomination of desolation standing where it should not be ( let the reader understand ) , then those in Judea must flee to the mountains .
41013015	The one on the roof must not come down or go inside to take anything out of his house .
41013016	The one in the field must not turn back to get his cloak .
41013017	Woe to those who are pregnant and to those who are nursing their babies in those days !
41013018	Pray that it may not be in winter .
41013019	For in those days there will be suffering unlike anything that has happened from the beginning of the creation that God created until now , or ever will happen .
41013020	And if the Lord had not cut short those days , no one would be saved . But because of the elect , whom he chose , he has cut them short .
41013021	Then if anyone says to you , ‘ Look , here is the Christ ! ’ or ‘ Look , there he is ! ’ do not believe him .
41013022	For false messiahs and false prophets will appear and perform signs and wonders to deceive , if possible , the elect .
41013023	Be careful ! I have told you everything ahead of time .
41013024	“ But in those days , after that suffering , the sun will be darkened and the moon will not give its light ;
41013025	the stars will be falling from heaven , and the powers in the heavens will be shaken .
41013026	Then everyone will see the Son of Man arriving in the clouds with great power and glory .
41013027	Then he will send angels and they will gather his elect from the four winds , from the ends of the earth to the ends of heaven .
41013028	“ Learn this parable from the fig tree : Whenever its branch becomes tender and puts out its leaves , you know that summer is near .
41013029	So also you , when you see these things happening , know that he is near , right at the door .
41013030	I tell you the truth , this generation will not pass away until all these things take place .
41013031	Heaven and earth will pass away , but my words will never pass away .
41013032	“ But as for that day or hour no one knows it – neither the angels in heaven , nor the Son – except the Father .
41013033	Watch out ! Stay alert ! For you do not know when the time will come .
41013034	It is like a man going on a journey . He left his house and put his slaves in charge , assigning to each his work , and commanded the doorkeeper to stay alert .
41013035	Stay alert , then , because you do not know when the owner of the house will return – whether during evening , at midnight , when the rooster crows , or at dawn –
41013036	or else he might find you asleep when he returns suddenly .
41013037	What I say to you I say to everyone : Stay alert ! ”
41014001	Two days before the Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread , the chief priests and the experts in the law were trying to find a way to arrest Jesus by stealth and kill him .
41014002	For they said , “ Not during the feast , so there won’t be a riot among the people . ”
41014003	Now while Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon the leper , reclining at the table , a woman came with an alabaster jar of costly aromatic oil from pure nard . After breaking open the jar , she poured it on his head .
41014004	But some who were present indignantly said to one another , “ Why this waste of expensive ointment ?
41014005	It could have been sold for more than three hundred silver coins and the money given to the poor ! ” So they spoke angrily to her .
41014006	But Jesus said , “ Leave her alone . Why are you bothering her ? She has done a good service for me .
41014007	For you will always have the poor with you , and you can do good for them whenever you want . But you will not always have me !
41014008	She did what she could . She anointed my body beforehand for burial .
41014009	I tell you the truth , wherever the gospel is proclaimed in the whole world , what she has done will also be told in memory of her . ”
41014010	Then Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went to the chief priests to betray Jesus into their hands .
41014011	When they heard this , they were delighted and promised to give him money . So Judas began looking for an opportunity to betray him .
41014012	Now on the first day of the feast of Unleavened Bread , when the Passover lamb is sacrificed , Jesus’ disciples said to him , “ Where do you want us to prepare for you to eat the Passover ? ”
41014013	He sent two of his disciples and told them , “ Go into the city , and a man carrying a jar of water will meet you . Follow him .
41014014	Wherever he enters , tell the owner of the house , ‘ The Teacher says , “ Where is my guest room where I may eat the Passover with my disciples ? ” ’
41014015	He will show you a large room upstairs , furnished and ready . Make preparations for us there . ”
41014016	So the disciples left , went into the city , and found things just as he had told them , and they prepared the Passover .
41014017	Then , when it was evening , he came to the house with the twelve .
41014018	While they were at the table eating , Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , one of you eating with me will betray me . ”
41014019	They were distressed , and one by one said to him , “ Surely not I ? ”
41014020	He said to them , “ It is one of the twelve , one who dips his hand with me into the bowl .
41014021	For the Son of Man will go as it is written about him , but woe to that man by whom the Son of Man is betrayed ! It would be better for him if he had never been born . ”
41014022	While they were eating , he took bread , and after giving thanks he broke it , gave it to them , and said , “ Take it . This is my body . ”
41014023	And after taking the cup and giving thanks , he gave it to them , and they all drank from it .
41014024	He said to them , “ This is my blood , the blood of the covenant , that is poured out for many .
41014025	I tell you the truth , I will no longer drink of the fruit of the vine until that day when I drink it new in the kingdom of God . ”
41014026	After singing a hymn , they went out to the Mount of Olives .
41014027	Then Jesus said to them , “ You will all fall away , for it is written , ‘ I will strike the shepherd , and the sheep will be scattered . ’
41014028	But after I am raised , I will go ahead of you into Galilee . ”
41014029	Peter said to him , “ Even if they all fall away , I will not ! ”
41014030	Jesus said to him , “ I tell you the truth , today – this very night – before a rooster crows twice , you will deny me three times . ”
41014031	But Peter insisted emphatically , “ Even if I must die with you , I will never deny you . ” And all of them said the same thing .
41014032	Then they went to a place called Gethsemane , and Jesus said to his disciples , “ Sit here while I pray . ”
41014033	He took Peter , James , and John with him , and became very troubled and distressed .
41014034	He said to them , “ My soul is deeply grieved , even to the point of death . Remain here and stay alert . ”
41014035	Going a little farther , he threw himself to the ground and prayed that if it were possible the hour would pass from him .
41014036	He said , “ Abba , Father , all things are possible for you . Take this cup away from me . Yet not what I will , but what you will . ”
41014037	Then he came and found them sleeping , and said to Peter , “ Simon , are you sleeping ? Couldn’t you stay awake for one hour ?
41014038	Stay awake and pray that you will not fall into temptation . The spirit is willing , but the flesh is weak . ”
41014039	He went away again and prayed the same thing .
41014040	When he came again he found them sleeping ; they could not keep their eyes open . And they did not know what to tell him .
41014041	He came a third time and said to them , “ Are you still sleeping and resting ? Enough of that ! The hour has come . Look , the Son of Man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
41014042	Get up , let us go . Look ! My betrayer is approaching ! ”
41014043	Right away , while Jesus was still speaking , Judas , one of the twelve , arrived . With him came a crowd armed with swords and clubs , sent by the chief priests and experts in the law and elders .
41014044	( Now the betrayer had given them a sign , saying , “ The one I kiss is the man . Arrest him and lead him away under guard . ” )
41014045	When Judas arrived , he went up to Jesus immediately and said , “ Rabbi ! ” and kissed him .
41014046	Then they took hold of him and arrested him .
41014047	One of the bystanders drew his sword and struck the high priest’s slave , cutting off his ear .
41014048	Jesus said to them , “ Have you come with swords and clubs to arrest me like you would an outlaw ?
41014049	Day after day I was with you , teaching in the temple courts , yet you did not arrest me . But this has happened so that the scriptures would be fulfilled . ”
41014050	Then all the disciples left him and fled .
41014051	A young man was following him , wearing only a linen cloth . They tried to arrest him ,
41014052	but he ran off naked , leaving his linen cloth behind .
41014053	Then they led Jesus to the high priest , and all the chief priests and elders and experts in the law came together .
41014054	And Peter had followed him from a distance , up to the high priest’s courtyard . He was sitting with the guards and warming himself by the fire .
41014055	The chief priests and the whole Sanhedrin were looking for evidence against Jesus so that they could put him to death , but they did not find anything .
41014056	Many gave false testimony against him , but their testimony did not agree .
41014057	Some stood up and gave this false testimony against him :
41014058	“ We heard him say , ‘ I will destroy this temple made with hands and in three days build another not made with hands . ’ ”
41014059	Yet even on this point their testimony did not agree .
41014060	Then the high priest stood up before them and asked Jesus , “ Have you no answer ? What is this that they are testifying against you ? ”
41014061	But he was silent and did not answer . Again the high priest questioned him , “ Are you the Christ , the Son of the Blessed One ? ”
41014062	“ I am , ” said Jesus , “ and you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of the Power and coming with the clouds of heaven . ”
41014063	Then the high priest tore his clothes and said , “ Why do we still need witnesses ?
41014064	You have heard the blasphemy ! What is your verdict ? ” They all condemned him as deserving death .
41014065	Then some began to spit on him , and to blindfold him , and to strike him with their fists , saying , “ Prophesy ! ” The guards also took him and beat him .
41014066	Now while Peter was below in the courtyard , one of the high priest’s slave girls came by .
41014067	When she saw Peter warming himself , she looked directly at him and said , “ You also were with that Nazarene , Jesus . ”
41014068	But he denied it : “ I don’t even understand what you’re talking about ! ” Then he went out to the gateway , and a rooster crowed .
41014069	When the slave girl saw him , she began again to say to the bystanders , “ This man is one of them . ”
41014070	But he denied it again . A short time later the bystanders again said to Peter , “ You must be one of them , because you are also a Galilean . ”
41014071	Then he began to curse , and he swore with an oath , “ I do not know this man you are talking about ! ”
41014072	Immediately a rooster crowed a second time . Then Peter remembered what Jesus had said to him : “ Before a rooster crows twice , you will deny me three times . ” And he broke down and wept .
41015001	Early in the morning , after forming a plan , the chief priests with the elders and the experts in the law and the whole Sanhedrin tied Jesus up , led him away , and handed him over to Pilate .
41015002	So Pilate asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” He replied , “ You say so . ”
41015003	Then the chief priests began to accuse him repeatedly .
41015004	So Pilate asked him again , “ Have you nothing to say ? See how many charges they are bringing against you ! ”
41015005	But Jesus made no further reply , so that Pilate was amazed .
41015006	During the feast it was customary to release one prisoner to the people , whomever they requested .
41015007	A man named Barabbas was imprisoned with rebels who had committed murder during an insurrection .
41015008	Then the crowd came up and began to ask Pilate to release a prisoner for them , as was his custom .
41015009	So Pilate asked them , “ Do you want me to release the king of the Jews for you ? ”
41015010	( For he knew that the chief priests had handed him over because of envy . )
41015011	But the chief priests stirred up the crowd to have him release Barabbas instead .
41015012	So Pilate spoke to them again , “ Then what do you want me to do with the one you call king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	They shouted back , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015014	Pilate asked them , “ Why ? What has he done wrong ? ” But they shouted more insistently , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015015	Because he wanted to satisfy the crowd , Pilate released Barabbas for them . Then , after he had Jesus flogged , he handed him over to be crucified .
41015016	So the soldiers led him into the palace ( that is , the governor’s residence ) and called together the whole cohort .
41015017	They put a purple cloak on him and after braiding a crown of thorns , they put it on him .
41015018	They began to salute him : “ Hail , king of the Jews ! ”
41015019	Again and again they struck him on the head with a staff and spit on him . Then they knelt down and paid homage to him .
41015020	When they had finished mocking him , they stripped him of the purple cloak and put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him away to crucify him .
41015021	The soldiers forced a passerby to carry his cross , Simon of Cyrene , who was coming in from the country ( he was the father of Alexander and Rufus ) .
41015022	They brought Jesus to a place called Golgotha ( which is translated , “ Place of the Skull ” ) .
41015023	They offered him wine mixed with myrrh , but he did not take it .
41015024	Then they crucified him and divided his clothes , throwing dice for them , to decide what each would take .
41015025	It was nine o’clock in the morning when they crucified him .
41015026	The inscription of the charge against him read , “ The king of the Jews . ”
41015027	And they crucified two outlaws with him , one on his right and one on his left .
41015029	Those who passed by defamed him , shaking their heads and saying , “ Aha ! You who can destroy the temple and rebuild it in three days ,
41015030	save yourself and come down from the cross ! ”
41015031	In the same way even the chief priests – together with the experts in the law – were mocking him among themselves : “ He saved others , but he cannot save himself !
41015032	Let the Christ , the king of Israel , come down from the cross now , that we may see and believe ! ” Those who were crucified with him also spoke abusively to him .
41015033	Now when it was noon , darkness came over the whole land until three in the afternoon .
41015034	Around three o’clock Jesus cried out with a loud voice , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema sabachthani ? ” which means , “ My God , my God , why have you forsaken me ? ”
41015035	When some of the bystanders heard it they said , “ Listen , he is calling for Elijah ! ”
41015036	Then someone ran , filled a sponge with sour wine , put it on a stick , and gave it to him to drink , saying , “ Leave him alone ! Let’s see if Elijah will come to take him down ! ”
41015037	But Jesus cried out with a loud voice and breathed his last .
41015038	And the temple curtain was torn in two , from top to bottom .
41015039	Now when the centurion , who stood in front of him , saw how he died , he said , “ Truly this man was God’s Son ! ”
41015040	There were also women , watching from a distance . Among them were Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the younger and of Joses , and Salome .
41015041	When he was in Galilee , they had followed him and given him support . Many other women who had come up with him to Jerusalem were there too .
41015042	Now when evening had already come , since it was the day of preparation ( that is , the day before the Sabbath ) ,
41015043	Joseph of Arimathea , a highly regarded member of the council , who was himself looking forward to the kingdom of God , went boldly to Pilate and asked for the body of Jesus .
41015044	Pilate was surprised that he was already dead . He called the centurion and asked him if he had been dead for some time .
41015045	When Pilate was informed by the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
41015046	After Joseph bought a linen cloth and took down the body , he wrapped it in the linen and placed it in a tomb cut out of the rock . Then he rolled a stone across the entrance of the tomb .
41015047	Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses saw where the body was placed .
41016001	When the Sabbath was over , Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James , and Salome bought aromatic spices so that they might go and anoint him .
41016002	And very early on the first day of the week , at sunrise , they went to the tomb .
41016003	They had been asking each other , “ Who will roll away the stone for us from the entrance to the tomb ? ”
41016004	But when they looked up , they saw that the stone , which was very large , had been rolled back .
41016005	Then as they went into the tomb , they saw a young man dressed in a white robe sitting on the right side ; and they were alarmed .
41016006	But he said to them , “ Do not be alarmed . You are looking for Jesus the Nazarene , who was crucified . He has been raised ! He is not here . Look , there is the place where they laid him .
41016007	But go , tell his disciples , even Peter , that he is going ahead of you into Galilee . You will see him there , just as he told you . ”
41016008	Then they went out and ran from the tomb , for terror and bewilderment had seized them . And they said nothing to anyone , because they were afraid . [ [
41016009	Early on the first day of the week , after he arose , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , from whom he had driven out seven demons .
41016010	She went out and told those who were with him , while they were mourning and weeping .
41016011	And when they heard that he was alive and had been seen by her , they did not believe .
41016012	After this he appeared in a different form to two of them while they were on their way to the country .
41016013	They went back and told the rest , but they did not believe them .
41016014	Then he appeared to the eleven themselves , while they were eating , and he rebuked them for their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they did not believe those who had seen him resurrected .
41016015	He said to them , “ Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature .
41016016	The one who believes and is baptized will be saved , but the one who does not believe will be condemned .
41016017	These signs will accompany those who believe : In my name they will drive out demons ; they will speak in new languages ;
41016018	they will pick up snakes with their hands , and whatever poison they drink will not harm them ; they will place their hands on the sick and they will be well . ”
41016019	After the Lord Jesus had spoken to them , he was taken up into heaven and sat down at the right hand of God .
41016020	They went out and proclaimed everywhere , while the Lord worked with them and confirmed the word through the accompanying signs . ] ]
42001001	Now many have undertaken to compile an account of the things that have been fulfilled among us ,
42001002	like the accounts passed on to us by those who were eyewitnesses and servants of the word from the beginning .
42001003	So it seemed good to me as well , because I have followed all things carefully from the beginning , to write an orderly account for you , most excellent Theophilus ,
42001004	so that you may know for certain the things you were taught .
42001005	During the reign of Herod king of Judea , there lived a priest named Zechariah who belonged to the priestly division of Abijah , and he had a wife named Elizabeth , who was a descendant of Aaron .
42001006	They were both righteous in the sight of God , following all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blamelessly .
42001007	But they did not have a child , because Elizabeth was barren , and they were both very old .
42001008	Now while Zechariah was serving as priest before God when his division was on duty ,
42001009	he was chosen by lot , according to the custom of the priesthood , to enter the holy place of the Lord and burn incense .
42001010	Now the whole crowd of people were praying outside at the hour of the incense offering .
42001011	An angel of the Lord , standing on the right side of the altar of incense , appeared to him .
42001012	And Zechariah , visibly shaken when he saw the angel , was seized with fear .
42001013	But the angel said to him , “ Do not be afraid , Zechariah , for your prayer has been heard , and your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son ; you will name him John .
42001014	Joy and gladness will come to you , and many will rejoice at his birth ,
42001015	for he will be great in the sight of the Lord . He must never drink wine or strong drink , and he will be filled with the Holy Spirit , even before his birth .
42001016	He will turn many of the people of Israel to the Lord their God .
42001017	And he will go as forerunner before the Lord in the spirit and power of Elijah , to turn the hearts of the fathers back to their children and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just , to make ready for the Lord a people prepared for him . ”
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ How can I be sure of this ? For I am an old man , and my wife is old as well . ”
42001019	The angel answered him , “ I am Gabriel , who stands in the presence of God , and I was sent to speak to you and to bring you this good news .
42001020	And now , because you did not believe my words , which will be fulfilled in their time , you will be silent , unable to speak , until the day these things take place . ”
42001021	Now the people were waiting for Zechariah , and they began to wonder why he was delayed in the holy place .
42001022	When he came out , he was not able to speak to them . They realized that he had seen a vision in the holy place , because he was making signs to them and remained unable to speak .
42001023	When his time of service was over , he went to his home .
42001024	After some time his wife Elizabeth became pregnant , and for five months she kept herself in seclusion . She said ,
42001025	“ This is what the Lord has done for me at the time when he has been gracious to me , to take away my disgrace among people . ”
42001026	In the sixth month of Elizabeth’s pregnancy , the angel Gabriel was sent by God to a town of Galilee called Nazareth ,
42001027	to a virgin engaged to a man whose name was Joseph , a descendant of David , and the virgin’s name was Mary .
42001028	The angel came to her and said , “ Greetings , favored one , the Lord is with you ! ”
42001029	But she was greatly troubled by his words and began to wonder about the meaning of this greeting .
42001030	So the angel said to her , “ Do not be afraid , Mary , for you have found favor with God !
42001031	Listen : You will become pregnant and give birth to a son , and you will name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be great , and will be called the Son of the Most High , and the Lord God will give him the throne of his father David .
42001033	He will reign over the house of Jacob forever , and his kingdom will never end . ”
42001034	Mary said to the angel , “ How will this be , since I have not had sexual relations with a man ? ”
42001035	The angel replied , “ The Holy Spirit will come upon you , and the power of the Most High will overshadow you . Therefore the child to be born will be holy ; he will be called the Son of God .
42001036	“ And look , your relative Elizabeth has also become pregnant with a son in her old age – although she was called barren , she is now in her sixth month !
42001037	For nothing will be impossible with God . ”
42001038	So Mary said , “ Yes , I am a servant of the Lord ; let this happen to me according to your word . ” Then the angel departed from her .
42001039	In those days Mary got up and went hurriedly into the hill country , to a town of Judah ,
42001040	and entered Zechariah’s house and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard Mary’s greeting , the baby leaped in her womb , and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	She exclaimed with a loud voice , “ Blessed are you among women , and blessed is the child in your womb !
42001043	And who am I that the mother of my Lord should come and visit me ?
42001044	For the instant the sound of your greeting reached my ears , the baby in my womb leaped for joy .
42001045	And blessed is she who believed that what was spoken to her by the Lord would be fulfilled . ”
42001046	And Mary said , “ My soul exalts the Lord ,
42001047	and my spirit has begun to rejoice in God my Savior ,
42001048	because he has looked upon the humble state of his servant . For from now on all generations will call me blessed ,
42001049	because he who is mighty has done great things for me , and holy is his name ;
42001050	from generation to generation he is merciful to those who fear him .
42001051	He has demonstrated power with his arm ; he has scattered those whose pride wells up from the sheer arrogance of their hearts .
42001052	He has brought down the mighty from their thrones , and has lifted up those of lowly position ;
42001053	he has filled the hungry with good things , and has sent the rich away empty .
42001054	He has helped his servant Israel , remembering his mercy ,
42001055	as he promised to our ancestors , to Abraham and to his descendants forever . ”
42001056	So Mary stayed with Elizabeth about three months and then returned to her home .
42001057	Now the time came for Elizabeth to have her baby , and she gave birth to a son .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had shown great mercy to her , and they rejoiced with her .
42001059	On the eighth day they came to circumcise the child , and they wanted to name him Zechariah after his father .
42001060	But his mother replied , “ No ! He must be named John . ”
42001061	They said to her , “ But none of your relatives bears this name . ”
42001062	So they made signs to the baby’s father , inquiring what he wanted to name his son .
42001063	He asked for a writing tablet and wrote , “ His name is John . ” And they were all amazed .
42001064	Immediately Zechariah’s mouth was opened and his tongue released , and he spoke , blessing God .
42001065	All their neighbors were filled with fear , and throughout the entire hill country of Judea all these things were talked about .
42001066	All who heard these things kept them in their hearts , saying , “ What then will this child be ? ” For the Lord’s hand was indeed with him .
42001067	Then his father Zechariah was filled with the Holy Spirit and prophesied ,
42001068	“ Blessed be the Lord God of Israel , because he has come to help and has redeemed his people .
42001069	For he has raised up a horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ,
42001070	as he spoke through the mouth of his holy prophets from long ago ,
42001071	that we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all who hate us .
42001072	He has done this to show mercy to our ancestors , and to remember his holy covenant –
42001073	the oath that he swore to our ancestor Abraham . This oath grants
42001074	that we , being rescued from the hand of our enemies , may serve him without fear ,
42001075	in holiness and righteousness before him for as long as we live .
42001076	And you , child , will be called the prophet of the Most High . For you will go before the Lord to prepare his ways ,
42001077	to give his people knowledge of salvation through the forgiveness of their sins .
42001078	Because of our God’s tender mercy the dawn will break upon us from on high
42001079	to give light to those who sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace . ”
42001080	And the child kept growing and becoming strong in spirit , and he was in the wilderness until the day he was revealed to Israel .
42002001	Now in those days a decree went out from Caesar Augustus to register all the empire for taxes .
42002002	This was the first registration , taken when Quirinius was governor of Syria .
42002003	Everyone went to his own town to be registered .
42002004	So Joseph also went up from the town of Nazareth in Galilee to Judea , to the city of David called Bethlehem , because he was of the house and family line of David .
42002005	He went to be registered with Mary , who was promised in marriage to him , and who was expecting a child .
42002006	While they were there , the time came for her to deliver her child .
42002007	And she gave birth to her firstborn son and wrapped him in strips of cloth and laid him in a manger , because there was no place for them in the inn .
42002008	Now there were shepherds nearby living out in the field , keeping guard over their flock at night .
42002009	An angel of the Lord appeared to them , and the glory of the Lord shone around them , and they were absolutely terrified .
42002010	But the angel said to them , “ Do not be afraid ! Listen carefully , for I proclaim to you good news that brings great joy to all the people :
42002011	Today your Savior is born in the city of David . He is Christ the Lord .
42002012	This will be a sign for you : You will find a baby wrapped in strips of cloth and lying in a manger . ”
42002013	Suddenly a vast , heavenly army appeared with the angel , praising God and saying ,
42002014	“ Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace among people with whom he is pleased ! ”
42002015	When the angels left them and went back to heaven , the shepherds said to one another , “ Let us go over to Bethlehem and see this thing that has taken place , that the Lord has made known to us . ”
42002016	So they hurried off and located Mary and Joseph , and found the baby lying in a manger .
42002017	When they saw him , they related what they had been told about this child ,
42002018	and all who heard it were astonished at what the shepherds said .
42002019	But Mary treasured up all these words , pondering in her heart what they might mean .
42002020	So the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all they had heard and seen ; everything was just as they had been told .
42002021	At the end of eight days , when he was circumcised , he was named Jesus , the name given by the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
42002022	Now when the time came for their purification according to the law of Moses , Joseph and Mary brought Jesus up to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord
42002023	( just as it is written in the law of the Lord , “ Every firstborn male will be set apart to the Lord ” ) ,
42002024	and to offer a sacrifice according to what is specified in the law of the Lord , a pair of doves or two young pigeons .
42002025	Now there was a man in Jerusalem named Simeon who was righteous and devout , looking for the restoration of Israel , and the Holy Spirit was upon him .
42002026	It had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit that he would not die before he had seen the Lord’s Christ .
42002027	So Simeon , directed by the Spirit , came into the temple courts , and when the parents brought in the child Jesus to do for him what was customary according to the law ,
42002028	Simeon took him in his arms and blessed God , saying ,
42002029	“ Now , according to your word , Sovereign Lord , permit your servant to depart in peace .
42002030	For my eyes have seen your salvation
42002031	that you have prepared in the presence of all peoples :
42002032	a light , for revelation to the Gentiles , and for glory to your people Israel . ”
42002033	So the child’s father and mother were amazed at what was said about him .
42002034	Then Simeon blessed them and said to his mother Mary , “ Listen carefully : This child is destined to be the cause of the falling and rising of many in Israel and to be a sign that will be rejected .
42002035	Indeed , as a result of him the thoughts of many hearts will be revealed – and a sword will pierce your own soul as well ! ”
42002036	There was also a prophetess , Anna the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Asher . She was very old , having been married to her husband for seven years until his death .
42002037	She had lived as a widow since then for eighty-four years . She never left the temple , worshiping with fasting and prayer night and day .
42002038	At that moment , she came up to them and began to give thanks to God and to speak about the child to all who were waiting for the redemption of Jerusalem .
42002039	So when Joseph and Mary had performed everything according to the law of the Lord , they returned to Galilee , to their own town of Nazareth .
42002040	And the child grew and became strong , filled with wisdom , and the favor of God was upon him .
42002041	Now Jesus’ parents went to Jerusalem every year for the feast of the Passover .
42002042	When he was twelve years old , they went up according to custom .
42002043	But when the feast was over , as they were returning home , the boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem . His parents did not know it ,
42002044	but ( because they assumed that he was in their group of travelers ) they went a day’s journey . Then they began to look for him among their relatives and acquaintances .
42002045	When they did not find him , they returned to Jerusalem to look for him .
42002046	After three days they found him in the temple courts , sitting among the teachers , listening to them and asking them questions .
42002047	And all who heard Jesus were astonished at his understanding and his answers .
42002048	When his parents saw him , they were overwhelmed . His mother said to him , “ Child , why have you treated us like this ? Look , your father and I have been looking for you anxiously . ”
42002049	But he replied , “ Why were you looking for me ? Didn’t you know that I must be in my Father’s house ? ”
42002050	Yet his parents did not understand the remark he made to them .
42002051	Then he went down with them and came to Nazareth , and was obedient to them . But his mother kept all these things in her heart .
42002052	And Jesus increased in wisdom and in stature , and in favor with God and with people .
42003001	In the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , when Pontius Pilate was governor of Judea , and Herod was tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip was tetrarch of the region of Iturea and Trachonitis , and Lysanias was tetrarch of Abilene ,
42003002	during the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas , the word of God came to John the son of Zechariah in the wilderness .
42003003	He went into all the region around the Jordan River , preaching a baptism of repentance for the forgiveness of sins .
42003004	As it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet , “ The voice of one shouting in the wilderness : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord , make his paths straight .
42003005	Every valley will be filled , and every mountain and hill will be brought low , and the crooked will be made straight , and the rough ways will be made smooth ,
42003006	and all humanity will see the salvation of God . ’ ”
42003007	So John said to the crowds that came out to be baptized by him , “ You offspring of vipers ! Who warned you to flee from the coming wrath ?
42003008	Therefore produce fruit that proves your repentance , and don’t begin to say to yourselves , ‘ We have Abraham as our father . ’ For I tell you that God can raise up children for Abraham from these stones !
42003009	Even now the ax is laid at the root of the trees , and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire . ”
42003010	So the crowds were asking him , “ What then should we do ? ”
42003011	John answered them , “ The person who has two tunics must share with the person who has none , and the person who has food must do likewise . ”
42003012	Tax collectors also came to be baptized , and they said to him , “ Teacher , what should we do ? ”
42003013	He told them , “ Collect no more than you are required to . ”
42003014	Then some soldiers also asked him , “ And as for us – what should we do ? ” He told them , “ Take money from no one by violence or by false accusation , and be content with your pay . ”
42003015	While the people were filled with anticipation and they all wondered whether perhaps John could be the Christ ,
42003016	John answered them all , “ I baptize you with water , but one more powerful than I am is coming – I am not worthy to untie the strap of his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire .
42003017	His winnowing fork is in his hand to clean out his threshing floor and to gather the wheat into his storehouse , but the chaff he will burn up with inextinguishable fire . ”
42003018	And in this way , with many other exhortations , John proclaimed good news to the people .
42003019	But when John rebuked Herod the tetrarch because of Herodias , his brother’s wife , and because of all the evil deeds that he had done ,
42003020	Herod added this to them all : He locked up John in prison .
42003021	Now when all the people were baptized , Jesus also was baptized . And while he was praying , the heavens opened ,
42003022	and the Holy Spirit descended on him in bodily form like a dove . And a voice came from heaven , “ You are my one dear Son ; in you I take great delight . ”

42003029	the son of Joshua , the son of Eliezer , the son of Jorim , the son of Matthat , the son of Levi ,
42003030	the son of Simeon , the son of Judah , the son of Joseph , the son of Jonam , the son of Eliakim ,
