42004001	Then Jesus , full of the Holy Spirit , returned from the Jordan River and was led by the Spirit in the wilderness ,
42004002	where for forty days he endured temptations from the devil . He ate nothing during those days , and when they were completed , he was famished .
42004003	The devil said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , command this stone to become bread . ”
42004004	Jesus answered him , “ It is written , ‘ Man does not live by bread alone . ’ ”
42004005	Then the devil led him up to a high place and showed him in a flash all the kingdoms of the world .
42004006	And he said to him , “ To you I will grant this whole realm – and the glory that goes along with it , for it has been relinquished to me , and I can give it to anyone I wish .
42004007	So then , if you will worship me , all this will be yours . ”
42004008	Jesus answered him , “ It is written , ‘ You are to worship the Lord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
42004009	Then the devil brought him to Jerusalem , had him stand on the highest point of the temple , and said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , throw yourself down from here ,
42004010	for it is written , ‘ He will command his angels concerning you , to protect you , ’
42004011	and ‘ with their hands they will lift you up , so that you will not strike your foot against a stone . ’ ”
42004012	Jesus answered him , “ It is said , ‘ You are not to put the Lord your God to the test . ’ ”
42004013	So when the devil had completed every temptation , he departed from him until a more opportune time .
42004014	Then Jesus , in the power of the Spirit , returned to Galilee , and news about him spread throughout the surrounding countryside .
42004015	He began to teach in their synagogues and was praised by all .
42004016	Now Jesus came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up , and went into the synagogue on the Sabbath day , as was his custom . He stood up to read ,
42004017	and the scroll of the prophet Isaiah was given to him . He unrolled the scroll and found the place where it was written ,
42004018	“ The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor . He has sent me to proclaim release to the captives and the regaining of sight to the blind , to set free those who are oppressed ,
42004019	to proclaim the year of the Lord ’ s favor . ”
42004020	Then he rolled up the scroll , gave it back to the attendant , and sat down . The eyes of everyone in the synagogue were fixed on him .
42004021	Then he began to tell them , “ Today this scripture has been fulfilled even as you heard it being read . ”
42004022	All were speaking well of him , and were amazed at the gracious words coming out of his mouth . They said , “ Isn’t this Joseph’s son ? ”
42004023	Jesus said to them , “ No doubt you will quote to me the proverb , ‘ Physician , heal yourself ! ’ and say , ‘ What we have heard that you did in Capernaum , do here in your hometown too . ’ ”
42004024	And he added , “ I tell you the truth , no prophet is acceptable in his hometown .
42004025	But in truth I tell you , there were many widows in Israel in Elijah’s days , when the sky was shut up three and a half years , and there was a great famine over all the land .
42004026	Yet Elijah was sent to none of them , but only to a woman who was a widow at Zarephath in Sidon .
42004027	And there were many lepers in Israel in the time of the prophet Elisha , yet none of them was cleansed except Naaman the Syrian . ”
42004028	When they heard this , all the people in the synagogue were filled with rage .
42004029	They got up , forced him out of the town , and brought him to the brow of the hill on which their town was built , so that they could throw him down the cliff .
42004030	But he passed through the crowd and went on his way .
42004031	So he went down to Capernaum , a town in Galilee , and on the Sabbath he began to teach the people .
42004032	They were amazed at his teaching , because he spoke with authority .
42004033	Now in the synagogue there was a man who had the spirit of an unclean demon , and he cried out with a loud voice ,
42004034	“ Ha ! Leave us alone , Jesus the Nazarene ! Have you come to destroy us ? I know who you are – the Holy One of God . ”
42004035	But Jesus rebuked him : “ Silence ! Come out of him ! ” Then , after the demon threw the man down in their midst , he came out of him without hurting him .
42004036	They were all amazed and began to say to one another , “ What’s happening here ? For with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits , and they come out ! ”
42004037	So the news about him spread into all areas of the region .
42004038	After Jesus left the synagogue , he entered Simon’s house . Now Simon’s mother-in-law was suffering from a high fever , and they asked Jesus to help her .
42004039	So he stood over her , commanded the fever , and it left her . Immediately she got up and began to serve them .
42004040	As the sun was setting , all those who had any relatives sick with various diseases brought them to Jesus . He placed his hands on every one of them and healed them .
42004041	Demons also came out of many , crying out , “ You are the Son of God ! ” But he rebuked them , and would not allow them to speak , because they knew that he was the Christ .
42004042	The next morning Jesus departed and went to a deserted place . Yet the crowds were seeking him , and they came to him and tried to keep him from leaving them .
42004043	But Jesus said to them , “ I must proclaim the good news of the kingdom of God to the other towns too , for that is what I was sent to do . ”
42004044	So he continued to preach in the synagogues of Judea .
42005001	Now Jesus was standing by the Lake of Gennesaret , and the crowd was pressing around him to hear the word of God .
42005002	He saw two boats by the lake , but the fishermen had gotten out of them and were washing their nets .
42005003	He got into one of the boats , which was Simon’s , and asked him to put out a little way from the shore . Then Jesus sat down and taught the crowds from the boat .
42005004	When he had finished speaking , he said to Simon , “ Put out into the deep water and lower your nets for a catch . ”
42005005	Simon answered , “ Master , we worked hard all night and caught nothing ! But at your word I will lower the nets . ”
42005006	When they had done this , they caught so many fish that their nets started to tear .
42005007	So they motioned to their partners in the other boat to come and help them . And they came and filled both boats , so that they were about to sink .
42005008	But when Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus’ knees , saying , “ Go away from me , Lord , for I am a sinful man ! ”
42005009	For Peter and all who were with him were astonished at the catch of fish that they had taken ,
42005010	and so were James and John , Zebedee’s sons , who were Simon’s business partners . Then Jesus said to Simon , “ Do not be afraid ; from now on you will be catching people . ”
42005011	So when they had brought their boats to shore , they left everything and followed him .
42005012	While Jesus was in one of the towns , a man came to him who was covered with leprosy . When he saw Jesus , he bowed down with his face to the ground and begged him , “ Lord , if you are willing , you can make me clean . ”
42005013	So he stretched out his hand and touched him , saying , “ I am willing . Be clean ! ” And immediately the leprosy left him .
42005014	Then he ordered the man to tell no one , but commanded him , “ Go and show yourself to a priest , and bring the offering for your cleansing , as Moses commanded , as a testimony to them . ”
42005015	But the news about him spread even more , and large crowds were gathering together to hear him and to be healed of their illnesses .
42005016	Yet Jesus himself frequently withdrew to the wilderness and prayed .
42005017	Now on one of those days , while he was teaching , there were Pharisees and teachers of the law sitting nearby ( who had come from every village of Galilee and Judea and from Jerusalem ) , and the power of the Lord was with him to heal .
42005018	Just then some men showed up , carrying a paralyzed man on a stretcher . They were trying to bring him in and place him before Jesus .
42005019	But since they found no way to carry him in because of the crowd , they went up on the roof and let him down on the stretcher through the roof tiles right in front of Jesus .
42005020	When Jesus saw their faith he said , “ Friend , your sins are forgiven . ”
42005021	Then the experts in the law and the Pharisees began to think to themselves , “ Who is this man who is uttering blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins but God alone ? ”
42005022	When Jesus perceived their hostile thoughts , he said to them , “ Why are you raising objections within yourselves ?
42005023	Which is easier , to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Stand up and walk ’ ?
42005024	But so that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins ” – he said to the paralyzed man – “ I tell you , stand up , take your stretcher and go home . ”
42005025	Immediately he stood up before them , picked up the stretcher he had been lying on , and went home , glorifying God .
42005026	Then astonishment seized them all , and they glorified God . They were filled with awe , saying , “ We have seen incredible things today . ”
42005027	After this , Jesus went out and saw a tax collector named Levi sitting at the tax booth . “ Follow me , ” he said to him .
42005028	And he got up and followed him , leaving everything behind .
42005029	Then Levi gave a great banquet in his house for Jesus , and there was a large crowd of tax collectors and others sitting at the table with them .
42005030	But the Pharisees and their experts in the law complained to his disciples , saying , “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
42005031	Jesus answered them , “ Those who are well don’t need a physician , but those who are sick do .
42005032	I have not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance . ”
42005033	Then they said to him , “ John’s disciples frequently fast and pray , and so do the disciples of the Pharisees , but yours continue to eat and drink . ”
42005034	So Jesus said to them , “ You cannot make the wedding guests fast while the bridegroom is with them , can you ?
42005035	But those days are coming , and when the bridegroom is taken from them , at that time they will fast . ”
42005036	He also told them a parable : “ No one tears a patch from a new garment and sews it on an old garment . If he does , he will have torn the new , and the piece from the new will not match the old .
42005037	And no one pours new wine into old wineskins . If he does , the new wine will burst the skins and will be spilled , and the skins will be destroyed .
42005038	Instead new wine must be poured into new wineskins .
42005039	No one after drinking old wine wants the new , for he says , ‘ The old is good enough . ’ ”
42006001	Jesus was going through the grain fields on a Sabbath , and his disciples picked some heads of wheat , rubbed them in their hands , and ate them .
42006002	But some of the Pharisees said , “ Why are you doing what is against the law on the Sabbath ? ”
42006003	Jesus answered them , “ Haven’t you read what David did when he and his companions were hungry –
42006004	how he entered the house of God , took and ate the sacred bread , which is not lawful for any to eat but the priests alone , and gave it to his companions ? ”
42006005	Then he said to them , “ The Son of Man is lord of the Sabbath . ”
42006006	On another Sabbath , Jesus entered the synagogue and was teaching . Now a man was there whose right hand was withered .
42006007	The experts in the law and the Pharisees watched Jesus closely to see if he would heal on the Sabbath , so that they could find a reason to accuse him .
42006008	But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man who had the withered hand , “ Get up and stand here . ” So he rose and stood there .
42006009	Then Jesus said to them , “ I ask you , is it lawful to do good on the Sabbath or to do evil , to save a life or to destroy it ? ”
42006010	After looking around at them all , he said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” The man did so , and his hand was restored .
42006011	But they were filled with mindless rage and began debating with one another what they would do to Jesus .
42006012	Now it was during this time that Jesus went out to the mountain to pray , and he spent all night in prayer to God .
42006013	When morning came , he called his disciples and chose twelve of them , whom he also named apostles :
42006014	Simon ( whom he named Peter ) , and his brother Andrew ; and James , John , Philip , Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew , Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , Simon who was called the Zealot ,
42006016	Judas the son of James , and Judas Iscariot , who became a traitor .
42006017	Then he came down with them and stood on a level place . And a large number of his disciples had gathered along with a vast multitude from all over Judea , from Jerusalem , and from the seacoast of Tyre and Sidon . They came to hear him and to be healed of their diseases ,
42006018	and those who suffered from unclean spirits were cured .
42006019	The whole crowd was trying to touch him , because power was coming out from him and healing them all .
42006020	Then he looked up at his disciples and said : “ Blessed are you who are poor , for the kingdom of God belongs to you .
42006021	“ Blessed are you who hunger now , for you will be satisfied . “ Blessed are you who weep now , for you will laugh .
42006022	“ Blessed are you when people hate you , and when they exclude you and insult you and reject you as evil on account of the Son of Man !
42006023	Rejoice in that day , and jump for joy , because your reward is great in heaven . For their ancestors did the same things to the prophets .
42006024	“ But woe to you who are rich , for you have received your comfort already .
42006025	“ Woe to you who are well satisfied with food now , for you will be hungry . “ Woe to you who laugh now , for you will mourn and weep .
42006026	“ Woe to you when all people speak well of you , for their ancestors did the same things to the false prophets .
42006027	“ But I say to you who are listening : Love your enemies , do good to those who hate you ,
42006028	bless those who curse you , pray for those who mistreat you .
42006029	To the person who strikes you on the cheek , offer the other as well , and from the person who takes away your coat , do not withhold your tunic either .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks you , and do not ask for your possessions back from the person who takes them away .
42006031	Treat others in the same way that you would want them to treat you .
42006032	“ If you love those who love you , what credit is that to you ? For even sinners love those who love them .
42006033	And if you do good to those who do good to you , what credit is that to you ? Even sinners do the same .
42006034	And if you lend to those from whom you hope to be repaid , what credit is that to you ? Even sinners lend to sinners , so that they may be repaid in full .
42006035	But love your enemies , and do good , and lend , expecting nothing back . Then your reward will be great , and you will be sons of the Most High , because he is kind to ungrateful and evil people .
42006036	Be merciful , just as your Father is merciful .
42006037	“ Do not judge , and you will not be judged ; do not condemn , and you will not be condemned ; forgive , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and it will be given to you : A good measure , pressed down , shaken together , running over , will be poured into your lap . For the measure you use will be the measure you receive . ”
42006039	He also told them a parable : “ Someone who is blind cannot lead another who is blind , can he ? Won’t they both fall into a pit ?
42006040	A disciple is not greater than his teacher , but everyone when fully trained will be like his teacher .
42006041	Why do you see the speck in your brother’s eye , but fail to see the beam of wood in your own ?
42006042	How can you say to your brother , ‘ Brother , let me remove the speck from your eye , ’ while you yourself don’t see the beam in your own ? You hypocrite ! First remove the beam from your own eye , and then you can see clearly to remove the speck from your brother’s eye .
42006043	“ For no good tree bears bad fruit , nor again does a bad tree bear good fruit ,
42006044	for each tree is known by its own fruit . For figs are not gathered from thorns , nor are grapes picked from brambles .
42006045	The good person out of the good treasury of his heart produces good , and the evil person out of his evil treasury produces evil , for his mouth speaks from what fills his heart .
42006046	“ Why do you call me ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ and don’t do what I tell you ?
42006047	“ Everyone who comes to me and listens to my words and puts them into practice – I will show you what he is like :
42006048	He is like a man building a house , who dug down deep , and laid the foundation on bedrock . When a flood came , the river burst against that house but could not shake it , because it had been well built .
42006049	But the person who hears and does not put my words into practice is like a man who built a house on the ground without a foundation . When the river burst against that house , it collapsed immediately , and was utterly destroyed ! ”
42007001	After Jesus had finished teaching all this to the people , he entered Capernaum .
42007002	A centurion there had a slave who was highly regarded , but who was sick and at the point of death .
42007003	When the centurion heard about Jesus , he sent some Jewish elders to him , asking him to come and heal his slave .
42007004	When they came to Jesus , they urged him earnestly , “ He is worthy to have you do this for him ,
42007005	because he loves our nation , and even built our synagogue . ”
42007006	So Jesus went with them . When he was not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to say to him , “ Lord , do not trouble yourself , for I am not worthy to have you come under my roof .
42007007	That is why I did not presume to come to you . Instead , say the word , and my servant must be healed .
42007008	For I too am a man set under authority , with soldiers under me . I say to this one , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes , and to another , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes , and to my slave , ‘ Do this , ’ and he does it . ”
42007009	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed at him . He turned and said to the crowd that followed him , “ I tell you , not even in Israel have I found such faith ! ”
42007010	So when those who had been sent returned to the house , they found the slave well .
42007011	Soon afterward Jesus went to a town called Nain , and his disciples and a large crowd went with him .
42007012	As he approached the town gate , a man who had died was being carried out , the only son of his mother ( who was a widow ) , and a large crowd from the town was with her .
42007013	When the Lord saw her , he had compassion for her and said to her , “ Do not weep . ”
42007014	Then he came up and touched the bier , and those who carried it stood still . He said , “ Young man , I say to you , get up ! ”
42007015	So the dead man sat up and began to speak , and Jesus gave him back to his mother .
42007016	Fear seized them all , and they began to glorify God , saying , “ A great prophet has appeared among us ! ” and “ God has come to help his people ! ”
42007017	This report about Jesus circulated throughout Judea and all the surrounding country .
42007018	John’s disciples informed him about all these things . So John called two of his disciples
42007019	and sent them to Jesus to ask , “ Are you the one who is to come , or should we look for another ? ”
42007020	When the men came to Jesus , they said , “ John the Baptist has sent us to you to ask , ‘ Are you the one who is to come , or should we look for another ? ’ ”
42007021	At that very time Jesus cured many people of diseases , sicknesses , and evil spirits , and granted sight to many who were blind .
42007022	So he answered them , “ Go tell John what you have seen and heard : The blind see , the lame walk , lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , the poor have good news proclaimed to them .
42007023	Blessed is anyone who takes no offense at me . ”
42007024	When John’s messengers had gone , Jesus began to speak to the crowds about John : “ What did you go out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken by the wind ?
42007025	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed in fancy clothes ? Look , those who wear fancy clothes and live in luxury are in kings’ courts !
42007026	What did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , I tell you , and more than a prophet .
42007027	This is the one about whom it is written , ‘ Look , I am sending my messenger ahead of you , who will prepare your way before you . ’
42007028	I tell you , among those born of women no one is greater than John . Yet the one who is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he is . ”
42007029	( Now all the people who heard this , even the tax collectors , acknowledged God’s justice , because they had been baptized with John’s baptism .
42007030	However , the Pharisees and the experts in religious law rejected God’s purpose for themselves , because they had not been baptized by John . )
42007031	“ To what then should I compare the people of this generation , and what are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace and calling out to one another , ‘ We played the flute for you , yet you did not dance ; we wailed in mourning , yet you did not weep . ’
42007033	For John the Baptist has come eating no bread and drinking no wine , and you say , ‘ He has a demon ! ’
42007034	The Son of Man has come eating and drinking , and you say , ‘ Look at him , a glutton and a drunk , a friend of tax collectors and sinners ! ’
42007035	But wisdom is vindicated by all her children . ”
42007036	Now one of the Pharisees asked Jesus to have dinner with him , so he went into the Pharisee’s house and took his place at the table .
42007037	Then when a woman of that town , who was a sinner , learned that Jesus was dining at the Pharisee’s house , she brought an alabaster jar of perfumed oil .
42007038	As she stood behind him at his feet , weeping , she began to wet his feet with her tears . She wiped them with her hair , kissed them , and anointed them with the perfumed oil .
42007039	Now when the Pharisee who had invited him saw this , he said to himself , “ If this man were a prophet , he would know who and what kind of woman this is who is touching him , that she is a sinner . ”
42007040	So Jesus answered him , “ Simon , I have something to say to you . ” He replied , “ Say it , Teacher . ”
42007041	“ A certain creditor had two debtors ; one owed him five hundred silver coins , and the other fifty .
42007042	When they could not pay , he canceled the debts of both . Now which of them will love him more ? ”
42007043	Simon answered , “ I suppose the one who had the bigger debt canceled . ” Jesus said to him , “ You have judged rightly . ”
42007044	Then , turning toward the woman , he said to Simon , “ Do you see this woman ? I entered your house . You gave me no water for my feet , but she has wet my feet with her tears and wiped them with her hair .
42007045	You gave me no kiss of greeting , but from the time I entered she has not stopped kissing my feet .
42007046	You did not anoint my head with oil , but she has anointed my feet with perfumed oil .
42007047	Therefore I tell you , her sins , which were many , are forgiven , thus she loved much ; but the one who is forgiven little loves little . ”
42007048	Then Jesus said to her , “ Your sins are forgiven . ”
42007049	But those who were at the table with him began to say among themselves , “ Who is this , who even forgives sins ? ”
42007050	He said to the woman , “ Your faith has saved you ; go in peace . ”
42008001	Some time afterward he went on through towns and villages , preaching and proclaiming the good news of the kingdom of God . The twelve were with him ,
42008002	and also some women who had been healed of evil spirits and disabilities : Mary ( called Magdalene ) , from whom seven demons had gone out ,
42008003	and Joanna the wife of Cuza ( Herod’s household manager ) , Susanna , and many others who provided for them out of their own resources .
42008004	While a large crowd was gathering and people were coming to Jesus from one town after another , he spoke to them in a parable :
42008005	“ A sower went out to sow his seed . And as he sowed , some fell along the path and was trampled on , and the wild birds devoured it .
42008006	Other seed fell on rock , and when it came up , it withered because it had no moisture .
42008007	Other seed fell among the thorns , and they grew up with it and choked it .
42008008	But other seed fell on good soil and grew , and it produced a hundred times as much grain . ” As he said this , he called out , “ The one who has ears to hear had better listen ! ”
42008009	Then his disciples asked him what this parable meant .
42008010	He said , “ You have been given the opportunity to know the secrets of the kingdom of God , but for others they are in parables , so that although they see they may not see , and although they hear they may not understand .
42008011	“ Now the parable means this : The seed is the word of God .
42008012	Those along the path are the ones who have heard ; then the devil comes and takes away the word from their hearts , so that they may not believe and be saved .
42008013	Those on the rock are the ones who receive the word with joy when they hear it , but they have no root . They believe for a while , but in a time of testing fall away .
42008014	As for the seed that fell among thorns , these are the ones who hear , but as they go on their way they are choked by the worries and riches and pleasures of life , and their fruit does not mature .
42008015	But as for the seed that landed on good soil , these are the ones who , after hearing the word , cling to it with an honest and good heart , and bear fruit with steadfast endurance .
42008016	“ No one lights a lamp and then covers it with a jar or puts it under a bed , but puts it on a lampstand so that those who come in can see the light .
42008017	For nothing is hidden that will not be revealed , and nothing concealed that will not be made known and brought to light .
42008018	So listen carefully , for whoever has will be given more , but whoever does not have , even what he thinks he has will be taken from him . ”
42008019	Now Jesus’ mother and his brothers came to him , but they could not get near him because of the crowd .
42008020	So he was told , “ Your mother and your brothers are standing outside , wanting to see you . ”
42008021	But he replied to them , “ My mother and my brothers are those who hear the word of God and do it . ”
42008022	One day Jesus got into a boat with his disciples and said to them , “ Let’s go across to the other side of the lake . ” So they set out ,
42008023	and as they sailed he fell asleep . Now a violent windstorm came down on the lake , and the boat started filling up with water , and they were in danger .
42008024	They came and woke him , saying , “ Master , Master , we are about to die ! ” So he got up and rebuked the wind and the raging waves ; they died down , and it was calm .
42008025	Then he said to them , “ Where is your faith ? ” But they were afraid and amazed , saying to one another , “ Who then is this ? He commands even the winds and the water , and they obey him ! ”
42008026	So they sailed over to the region of the Gerasenes , which is opposite Galilee .
42008027	As Jesus stepped ashore , a certain man from the town met him who was possessed by demons . For a long time this man had worn no clothes and had not lived in a house , but among the tombs .
42008028	When he saw Jesus , he cried out , fell down before him , and shouted with a loud voice , “ Leave me alone , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ! I beg you , do not torment me ! ”
42008029	For Jesus had started commanding the evil spirit to come out of the man . ( For it had seized him many times , so he would be bound with chains and shackles and kept under guard . But he would break the restraints and be driven by the demon into deserted places . )
42008030	Jesus then asked him , “ What is your name ? ” He said , “ Legion , ” because many demons had entered him .
42008031	And they began to beg him not to order them to depart into the abyss .
42008032	Now a large herd of pigs was feeding there on the hillside , and the demonic spirits begged Jesus to let them go into them . He gave them permission .
42008033	So the demons came out of the man and went into the pigs , and the herd of pigs rushed down the steep slope into the lake and drowned .
42008034	When the herdsmen saw what had happened , they ran off and spread the news in the town and countryside .
42008035	So the people went out to see what had happened , and they came to Jesus . They found the man from whom the demons had gone out , sitting at Jesus’ feet , clothed and in his right mind , and they were afraid .
42008036	Those who had seen it told them how the man who had been demon-possessed had been healed .
42008037	Then all the people of the Gerasenes and the surrounding region asked Jesus to leave them alone , for they were seized with great fear . So he got into the boat and left .
42008038	The man from whom the demons had gone out begged to go with him , but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Return to your home , and declare what God has done for you . ” So he went away , proclaiming throughout the whole town what Jesus had done for him .
42008040	Now when Jesus returned , the crowd welcomed him , because they were all waiting for him .
42008041	Then a man named Jairus , who was a ruler of the synagogue , came up . Falling at Jesus’ feet , he pleaded with him to come to his house ,
42008042	because he had an only daughter , about twelve years old , and she was dying . As Jesus was on his way , the crowds pressed around him .
42008043	Now a woman was there who had been suffering from a hemorrhage for twelve years but could not be healed by anyone .
42008044	She came up behind Jesus and touched the edge of his cloak , and at once the bleeding stopped .
42008045	Then Jesus asked , “ Who was it who touched me ? ” When they all denied it , Peter said , “ Master , the crowds are surrounding you and pressing against you ! ”
42008046	But Jesus said , “ Someone touched me , for I know that power has gone out from me . ”
42008047	When the woman saw that she could not escape notice , she came trembling and fell down before him . In the presence of all the people , she explained why she had touched him and how she had been immediately healed .
42008048	Then he said to her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While he was still speaking , someone from the synagogue ruler’s house came and said , “ Your daughter is dead ; do not trouble the teacher any longer . ”
42008050	But when Jesus heard this , he told him , “ Do not be afraid ; just believe , and she will be healed . ”
42008051	Now when he came to the house , Jesus did not let anyone go in with him except Peter , John , and James , and the child’s father and mother .
42008052	Now they were all wailing and mourning for her , but he said , “ Stop your weeping ; she is not dead but asleep . ”
42008053	And they began making fun of him , because they knew that she was dead .
42008054	But Jesus gently took her by the hand and said , “ Child , get up . ”
42008055	Her spirit returned , and she got up immediately . Then he told them to give her something to eat .
42008056	Her parents were astonished , but he ordered them to tell no one what had happened .
42009001	After Jesus called the twelve together , he gave them power and authority over all demons and to cure diseases ,
42009002	and he sent them out to proclaim the kingdom of God and to heal the sick .
42009003	He said to them , “ Take nothing for your journey – no staff , no bag , no bread , no money , and do not take an extra tunic .
42009004	Whatever house you enter , stay there until you leave the area .
42009005	Wherever they do not receive you , as you leave that town , shake the dust off your feet as a testimony against them . ”
42009006	Then they departed and went throughout the villages , proclaiming the good news and healing people everywhere .
42009007	Now Herod the tetrarch heard about everything that was happening , and he was thoroughly perplexed , because some people were saying that John had been raised from the dead ,
42009008	while others were saying that Elijah had appeared , and still others that one of the prophets of long ago had risen .

42009011	But when the crowds found out , they followed him . He welcomed them , spoke to them about the kingdom of God , and cured those who needed healing .

42009013	But he said to them , “ You give them something to eat . ” They replied , “ We have no more than five loaves and two fish – unless we go and buy food for all these people . ”
42009014	( Now about five thousand men were there . ) Then he said to his disciples , “ Have them sit down in groups of about fifty each . ”

42009018	Once when Jesus was praying by himself , and his disciples were nearby , he asked them , “ Who do the crowds say that I am ? ”

42009020	Then he said to them , “ But who do you say that I am ? ” Peter answered , “ The Christ of God . ”

42009025	For what does it benefit a person if he gains the whole world but loses or forfeits himself ?

42009027	But I tell you most certainly , there are some standing here who will not experience death before they see the kingdom of God . ”
42009028	Now about eight days after these sayings , Jesus took with him Peter , John , and James , and went up the mountain to pray .

42009035	Then a voice came from the cloud , saying , “ This is my Son , my Chosen One . Listen to him ! ”
42009036	After the voice had spoken , Jesus was found alone . So they kept silent and told no one at that time anything of what they had seen .
42009037	Now on the next day , when they had come down from the mountain , a large crowd met him .
42009038	Then a man from the crowd cried out , “ Teacher , I beg you to look at my son – he is my only child !
42009039	A spirit seizes him , and he suddenly screams ; it throws him into convulsions and causes him to foam at the mouth . It hardly ever leaves him alone , torturing him severely .
42009040	I begged your disciples to cast it out , but they could not do so . ”
42009041	Jesus answered , “ You unbelieving and perverse generation ! How much longer must I be with you and endure you ? Bring your son here . ”

42009043	Then they were all astonished at the mighty power of God . But while the entire crowd was amazed at everything Jesus was doing , he said to his disciples ,
42009044	“ Take these words to heart , for the Son of Man is going to be betrayed into the hands of men . ”
42009045	But they did not understand this statement ; its meaning had been concealed from them , so that they could not grasp it . Yet they were afraid to ask him about this statement .
42009046	Now an argument started among the disciples as to which of them might be the greatest .
42009047	But when Jesus discerned their innermost thoughts , he took a child , had him stand by his side ,
42009048	and said to them , “ Whoever welcomes this child in my name welcomes me , and whoever welcomes me welcomes the one who sent me , for the one who is least among you all is the one who is great . ”
42009049	John answered , “ Master , we saw someone casting out demons in your name , and we tried to stop him because he is not a disciple along with us . ”
42009050	But Jesus said to him , “ Do not stop him , for whoever is not against you is for you . ”
42009051	Now when the days drew near for him to be taken up , Jesus set out resolutely to go to Jerusalem .
42009052	He sent messengers on ahead of him . As they went along , they entered a Samaritan village to make things ready in advance for him ,
42009053	but the villagers refused to welcome him , because he was determined to go to Jerusalem .
42009054	Now when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , “ Lord , do you want us to call fire to come down from heaven and consume them ? ”
42009055	But Jesus turned and rebuked them ,
42009056	and they went on to another village .
42009057	As they were walking along the road , someone said to him , “ I will follow you wherever you go . ”
42009058	Jesus said to him , “ Foxes have dens and the birds in the sky have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to lay his head . ”
42009059	Jesus said to another , “ Follow me . ” But he replied , “ Lord , first let me go and bury my father . ”
42009060	But Jesus said to him , “ Let the dead bury their own dead , but as for you , go and proclaim the kingdom of God . ”
42009061	Yet another said , “ I will follow you , Lord , but first let me say goodbye to my family . ”
42009062	Jesus said to him , “ No one who puts his hand to the plow and looks back is fit for the kingdom of God . ”
42010001	After this the Lord appointed seventy-two others and sent them on ahead of him two by two into every town and place where he himself was about to go .
42010002	He said to them , “ The harvest is plentiful , but the workers are few . Therefore ask the Lord of the harvest to send out workers into his harvest .
42010003	Go ! I am sending you out like lambs surrounded by wolves .
42010004	Do not carry a money bag , a traveler’s bag , or sandals , and greet no one on the road .
42010005	Whenever you enter a house , first say , ‘ May peace be on this house ! ’
42010006	And if a peace-loving person is there , your peace will remain on him , but if not , it will return to you .
42010007	Stay in that same house , eating and drinking what they give you , for the worker deserves his pay . Do not move around from house to house .
42010008	Whenever you enter a town and the people welcome you , eat what is set before you .
42010009	Heal the sick in that town and say to them , ‘ The kingdom of God has come upon you ! ’
42010010	But whenever you enter a town and the people do not welcome you , go into its streets and say ,
42010011	‘ Even the dust of your town that clings to our feet we wipe off against you . Nevertheless know this : The kingdom of God has come . ’
42010012	I tell you , it will be more bearable on that day for Sodom than for that town !
42010013	“ Woe to you , Chorazin ! Woe to you , Bethsaida ! For if the miracles done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
42010014	But it will be more bearable for Tyre and Sidon in the judgment than for you !
42010015	And you , Capernaum , will you be exalted to heaven ? No , you will be thrown down to Hades !
42010016	“ The one who listens to you listens to me , and the one who rejects you rejects me , and the one who rejects me rejects the one who sent me . ”
42010017	Then the seventy-two returned with joy , saying , “ Lord , even the demons submit to us in your name ! ”
42010018	So he said to them , “ I saw Satan fall like lightning from heaven .
42010019	Look , I have given you authority to tread on snakes and scorpions and on the full force of the enemy , and nothing will hurt you .
42010020	Nevertheless , do not rejoice that the spirits submit to you , but rejoice that your names stand written in heaven . ”
42010021	On that same occasion Jesus rejoiced in the Holy Spirit and said , “ I praise you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because you have hidden these things from the wise and intelligent , and revealed them to little children . Yes , Father , for this was your gracious will .
42010022	All things have been given to me by my Father . No one knows who the Son is except the Father , or who the Father is except the Son and anyone to whom the Son decides to reveal him . ”
42010023	Then Jesus turned to his disciples and said privately , “ Blessed are the eyes that see what you see !
42010024	For I tell you that many prophets and kings longed to see what you see but did not see it , and to hear what you hear but did not hear it . ”
42010025	Now an expert in religious law stood up to test Jesus , saying , “ Teacher , what must I do to inherit eternal life ? ”
42010026	He said to him , “ What is written in the law ? How do you understand it ? ”
42010027	The expert answered , “ Love the Lord your God with all your heart , with all your soul , with all your strength , and with all your mind , and love your neighbor as yourself . ”
42010028	Jesus said to him , “ You have answered correctly ; do this , and you will live . ”
42010029	But the expert , wanting to justify himself , said to Jesus , “ And who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	Jesus replied , “ A man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell into the hands of robbers , who stripped him , beat him up , and went off , leaving him half dead .
42010031	Now by chance a priest was going down that road , but when he saw the injured man he passed by on the other side .
42010032	So too a Levite , when he came up to the place and saw him , passed by on the other side .
42010033	But a Samaritan who was traveling came to where the injured man was , and when he saw him , he felt compassion for him .
42010034	He went up to him and bandaged his wounds , pouring oil and wine on them . Then he put him on his own animal , brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
42010035	The next day he took out two silver coins and gave them to the innkeeper , saying , ‘ Take care of him , and whatever else you spend , I will repay you when I come back this way . ’
42010036	Which of these three do you think became a neighbor to the man who fell into the hands of the robbers ? ”
42010037	The expert in religious law said , “ The one who showed mercy to him . ” So Jesus said to him , “ Go and do the same . ”
42010038	Now as they went on their way , Jesus entered a certain village where a woman named Martha welcomed him as a guest .
42010039	She had a sister named Mary , who sat at the Lord’s feet and listened to what he said .
42010040	But Martha was distracted with all the preparations she had to make , so she came up to him and said , “ Lord , don’t you care that my sister has left me to do all the work alone ? Tell her to help me . ”
42010041	But the Lord answered her , “ Martha , Martha , you are worried and troubled about many things ,
42010042	but one thing is needed . Mary has chosen the best part ; it will not be taken away from her . ”
42011001	Now Jesus was praying in a certain place . When he stopped , one of his disciples said to him , “ Lord , teach us to pray , just as John taught his disciples . ”
42011002	So he said to them , “ When you pray , say : Father , may your name be honored ; may your kingdom come .
42011003	Give us each day our daily bread ,
42011004	and forgive us our sins , for we also forgive everyone who sins against us . And do not lead us into temptation . ”
42011005	Then he said to them , “ Suppose one of you has a friend , and you go to him at midnight and say to him , ‘ Friend , lend me three loaves of bread ,
42011006	because a friend of mine has stopped here while on a journey , and I have nothing to set before him . ’
42011007	Then he will reply from inside , ‘ Do not bother me . The door is already shut , and my children and I are in bed . I cannot get up and give you anything . ’
42011008	I tell you , even though the man inside will not get up and give him anything because he is his friend , yet because of the first man’s sheer persistence he will get up and give him whatever he needs .
42011009	“ So I tell you : Ask , and it will be given to you ; seek , and you will find ; knock , and the door will be opened for you .
42011010	For everyone who asks receives , and the one who seeks finds , and to the one who knocks , the door will be opened .
42011011	What father among you , if your son asks for a fish , will give him a snake instead of a fish ?
42011012	Or if he asks for an egg , will give him a scorpion ?
42011013	If you then , although you are evil , know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will the heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him ! ”
42011014	Now he was casting out a demon that was mute . When the demon had gone out , the man who had been mute began to speak , and the crowds were amazed .
42011015	But some of them said , “ By the power of Beelzebul , the ruler of demons , he casts out demons . ”
42011016	Others , to test him , began asking for a sign from heaven .
42011017	But Jesus , realizing their thoughts , said to them , “ Every kingdom divided against itself is destroyed , and a divided household falls .
42011018	So if Satan too is divided against himself , how will his kingdom stand ? I ask you this because you claim that I cast out demons by Beelzebul .
42011019	Now if I cast out demons by Beelzebul , by whom do your sons cast them out ? Therefore they will be your judges .
42011020	But if I cast out demons by the finger of God , then the kingdom of God has already overtaken you .
42011021	When a strong man , fully armed , guards his own palace , his possessions are safe .
42011022	But when a stronger man attacks and conquers him , he takes away the first man’s armor on which the man relied and divides up his plunder .
42011023	Whoever is not with me is against me , and whoever does not gather with me scatters .
42011024	“ When an unclean spirit goes out of a person , it passes through waterless places looking for rest but not finding any . Then it says , ‘ I will return to the home I left . ’
42011025	When it returns , it finds the house swept clean and put in order .
42011026	Then it goes and brings seven other spirits more evil than itself , and they go in and live there , so the last state of that person is worse than the first . ”
42011027	As he said these things , a woman in the crowd spoke out to him , “ Blessed is the womb that bore you and the breasts at which you nursed ! ”
42011028	But he replied , “ Blessed rather are those who hear the word of God and obey it ! ”
42011029	As the crowds were increasing , Jesus began to say , “ This generation is a wicked generation ; it looks for a sign , but no sign will be given to it except the sign of Jonah .
42011030	For just as Jonah became a sign to the people of Nineveh , so the Son of Man will be a sign to this generation .
42011031	The queen of the South will rise up at the judgment with the people of this generation and condemn them , because she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon – and now , something greater than Solomon is here !
42011032	The people of Nineveh will stand up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it , because they repented when Jonah preached to them – and now , something greater than Jonah is here !
42011033	“ No one after lighting a lamp puts it in a hidden place or under a basket , but on a lampstand , so that those who come in can see the light .
42011034	Your eye is the lamp of your body . When your eye is healthy , your whole body is full of light , but when it is diseased , your body is full of darkness .
42011035	Therefore see to it that the light in you is not darkness .
42011036	If then your whole body is full of light , with no part in the dark , it will be as full of light as when the light of a lamp shines on you . ”
42011037	As he spoke , a Pharisee invited Jesus to have a meal with him , so he went in and took his place at the table .
42011038	The Pharisee was astonished when he saw that Jesus did not first wash his hands before the meal .
42011039	But the Lord said to him , “ Now you Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and the plate , but inside you are full of greed and wickedness .
42011040	You fools ! Didn’t the one who made the outside make the inside as well ?
42011041	But give from your heart to those in need , and then everything will be clean for you .
42011042	“ But woe to you Pharisees ! You give a tenth of your mint , rue , and every herb , yet you neglect justice and love for God ! But you should have done these things without neglecting the others .
42011043	Woe to you Pharisees ! You love the best seats in the synagogues and elaborate greetings in the marketplaces !
42011044	Woe to you ! You are like unmarked graves , and people walk over them without realizing it ! ”
42011045	One of the experts in religious law answered him , “ Teacher , when you say these things you insult us too . ”
42011046	But Jesus replied , “ Woe to you experts in religious law as well ! You load people down with burdens difficult to bear , yet you yourselves refuse to touch the burdens with even one of your fingers !
42011047	Woe to you ! You build the tombs of the prophets whom your ancestors killed .
42011048	So you testify that you approve of the deeds of your ancestors , because they killed the prophets and you build their tombs !
42011049	For this reason also the wisdom of God said , ‘ I will send them prophets and apostles , some of whom they will kill and persecute , ’
42011050	so that this generation may be held accountable for the blood of all the prophets that has been shed since the beginning of the world ,
42011051	from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zechariah , who was killed between the altar and the sanctuary . Yes , I tell you , it will be charged against this generation .
42011052	Woe to you experts in religious law ! You have taken away the key to knowledge ! You did not go in yourselves , and you hindered those who were going in . ”
42011053	When he went out from there , the experts in the law and the Pharisees began to oppose him bitterly , and to ask him hostile questions about many things ,
42011054	plotting against him , to catch him in something he might say .
42012001	Meanwhile , when many thousands of the crowd had gathered so that they were trampling on one another , Jesus began to speak first to his disciples , “ Be on your guard against the yeast of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	Nothing is hidden that will not be revealed , and nothing is secret that will not be made known .
42012003	So then whatever you have said in the dark will be heard in the light , and what you have whispered in private rooms will be proclaimed from the housetops .
42012004	“ I tell you , my friends , do not be afraid of those who kill the body , and after that have nothing more they can do .
42012005	But I will warn you whom you should fear : Fear the one who , after the killing , has authority to throw you into hell . Yes , I tell you , fear him !
42012006	Aren’t five sparrows sold for two pennies ? Yet not one of them is forgotten before God .
42012007	In fact , even the hairs on your head are all numbered . Do not be afraid ; you are more valuable than many sparrows .
42012008	“ I tell you , whoever acknowledges me before men , the Son of Man will also acknowledge before God’s angels .
42012009	But the one who denies me before men will be denied before God’s angels .
42012010	And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven , but the person who blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
42012011	But when they bring you before the synagogues , the rulers , and the authorities , do not worry about how you should make your defense or what you should say ,
42012012	for the Holy Spirit will teach you at that moment what you must say . ”
42012013	Then someone from the crowd said to him , “ Teacher , tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me . ”
42012014	But Jesus said to him , “ Man , who made me a judge or arbitrator between you two ? ”
42012015	Then he said to them , “ Watch out and guard yourself from all types of greed , because one’s life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions . ”
42012016	He then told them a parable : “ The land of a certain rich man produced an abundant crop ,
42012017	so he thought to himself , ‘ What should I do , for I have nowhere to store my crops ? ’
42012018	Then he said , ‘ I will do this : I will tear down my barns and build bigger ones , and there I will store all my grain and my goods .
42012019	And I will say to myself , “ You have plenty of goods stored up for many years ; relax , eat , drink , celebrate ! ” ’
42012020	But God said to him , ‘ You fool ! This very night your life will be demanded back from you , but who will get what you have prepared for yourself ? ’
42012021	So it is with the one who stores up riches for himself , but is not rich toward God . ”
42012022	Then Jesus said to his disciples , “ Therefore I tell you , do not worry about your life , what you will eat , or about your body , what you will wear .
42012023	For there is more to life than food , and more to the body than clothing .
42012024	Consider the ravens : They do not sow or reap , they have no storeroom or barn , yet God feeds them . How much more valuable are you than the birds !
42012025	And which of you by worrying can add an hour to his life ?
42012026	So if you cannot do such a very little thing as this , why do you worry about the rest ?
42012027	Consider how the flowers grow ; they do not work or spin . Yet I tell you , not even Solomon in all his glory was clothed like one of these !
42012028	And if this is how God clothes the wild grass , which is here today and tomorrow is tossed into the fire to heat the oven , how much more will he clothe you , you people of little faith !
42012029	So do not be overly concerned about what you will eat and what you will drink , and do not worry about such things .
42012030	For all the nations of the world pursue these things , and your Father knows that you need them .
42012031	Instead , pursue his kingdom , and these things will be given to you as well .
42012032	“ Do not be afraid , little flock , for your Father is well pleased to give you the kingdom .
42012033	Sell your possessions and give to the poor . Provide yourselves purses that do not wear out – a treasure in heaven that never decreases , where no thief approaches and no moth destroys .
42012034	For where your treasure is , there your heart will be also .
42012035	“ Get dressed for service and keep your lamps burning ;
42012036	be like people waiting for their master to come back from the wedding celebration , so that when he comes and knocks they can immediately open the door for him .
42012037	Blessed are those slaves whom their master finds alert when he returns ! I tell you the truth , he will dress himself to serve , have them take their place at the table , and will come and wait on them !
42012038	Even if he comes in the second or third watch of the night and finds them alert , blessed are those slaves !
42012039	But understand this : If the owner of the house had known at what hour the thief was coming , he would not have let his house be broken into .
42012040	You also must be ready , because the Son of Man will come at an hour when you do not expect him . ”
42012041	Then Peter said , “ Lord , are you telling this parable for us or for everyone ? ”
42012042	The Lord replied , “ Who then is the faithful and wise manager , whom the master puts in charge of his household servants , to give them their allowance of food at the proper time ?
42012043	Blessed is that slave whom his master finds at work when he returns .
42012044	I tell you the truth , the master will put him in charge of all his possessions .
42012045	But if that slave should say to himself , ‘ My master is delayed in returning , ’ and he begins to beat the other slaves , both men and women , and to eat , drink , and get drunk ,
42012046	then the master of that slave will come on a day when he does not expect him and at an hour he does not foresee , and will cut him in two , and assign him a place with the unfaithful .
42012047	That servant who knew his master’s will but did not get ready or do what his master asked will receive a severe beating .
42012048	But the one who did not know his master’s will and did things worthy of punishment will receive a light beating . From everyone who has been given much , much will be required , and from the one who has been entrusted with much , even more will be asked .
42012049	“ I have come to bring fire on the earth – and how I wish it were already kindled !
42012050	I have a baptism to undergo , and how distressed I am until it is finished !
42012051	Do you think I have come to bring peace on earth ? No , I tell you , but rather division !
42012052	For from now on there will be five in one household divided , three against two and two against three .
42012053	They will be divided , father against son and son against father , mother against daughter and daughter against mother , mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law and daughter-in-law against mother-in-law . ”
42012054	Jesus also said to the crowds , “ When you see a cloud rising in the west , you say at once , ‘ A rainstorm is coming , ’ and it does .
42012055	And when you see the south wind blowing , you say , ‘ There will be scorching heat , ’ and there is .
42012056	You hypocrites ! You know how to interpret the appearance of the earth and the sky , but how can you not know how to interpret the present time ?
42012057	“ And why don’t you judge for yourselves what is right ?
42012058	As you are going with your accuser before the magistrate , make an effort to settle with him on the way , so that he will not drag you before the judge , and the judge hand you over to the officer , and the officer throw you into prison .
42012059	I tell you , you will never get out of there until you have paid the very last cent ! ”
42013001	Now there were some present on that occasion who told him about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices .
42013002	He answered them , “ Do you think these Galileans were worse sinners than all the other Galileans , because they suffered these things ?
42013003	No , I tell you ! But unless you repent , you will all perish as well !
42013004	Or those eighteen who were killed when the tower in Siloam fell on them , do you think they were worse offenders than all the others who live in Jerusalem ?
42013005	No , I tell you ! But unless you repent you will all perish as well ! ”
42013006	Then Jesus told this parable : “ A man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard , and he came looking for fruit on it and found none .
42013007	So he said to the worker who tended the vineyard , ‘ For three years now , I have come looking for fruit on this fig tree , and each time I inspect it I find none . Cut it down ! Why should it continue to deplete the soil ? ’
42013008	But the worker answered him , ‘ Sir , leave it alone this year too , until I dig around it and put fertilizer on it .
42013009	Then if it bears fruit next year , very well , but if not , you can cut it down . ’ ”
42013010	Now he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the Sabbath ,
42013011	and a woman was there who had been disabled by a spirit for eighteen years . She was bent over and could not straighten herself up completely .
42013012	When Jesus saw her , he called her to him and said , “ Woman , you are freed from your infirmity . ”
42013013	Then he placed his hands on her , and immediately she straightened up and praised God .
42013014	But the president of the synagogue , indignant because Jesus had healed on the Sabbath , said to the crowd , “ There are six days on which work should be done ! So come and be healed on those days , and not on the Sabbath day . ”
42013015	Then the Lord answered him , “ You hypocrites ! Does not each of you on the Sabbath untie his ox or his donkey from its stall , and lead it to water ?
42013016	Then shouldn’t this woman , a daughter of Abraham whom Satan bound for eighteen long years , be released from this imprisonment on the Sabbath day ? ”
42013017	When he said this all his adversaries were humiliated , but the entire crowd was rejoicing at all the wonderful things he was doing .
42013018	Thus Jesus asked , “ What is the kingdom of God like ? To what should I compare it ?
42013019	It is like a mustard seed that a man took and sowed in his garden . It grew and became a tree , and the wild birds nested in its branches . ”
42013020	Again he said , “ To what should I compare the kingdom of God ?
42013021	It is like yeast that a woman took and mixed with three measures of flour until all the dough had risen . ”
42013022	Then Jesus traveled throughout towns and villages , teaching and making his way toward Jerusalem .
42013023	Someone asked him , “ Lord , will only a few be saved ? ” So he said to them ,
42013024	“ Exert every effort to enter through the narrow door , because many , I tell you , will try to enter and will not be able to .
42013025	Once the head of the house gets up and shuts the door , then you will stand outside and start to knock on the door and beg him , ‘ Lord , let us in ! ’ But he will answer you , ‘ I don’t know where you come from . ’
42013026	Then you will begin to say , ‘ We ate and drank in your presence , and you taught in our streets . ’
42013027	But he will reply , ‘ I don’t know where you come from ! Go away from me , all you evildoers ! ’
42013028	There will be weeping and gnashing of teeth when you see Abraham , Isaac , Jacob , and all the prophets in the kingdom of God but you yourselves thrown out .
42013029	Then people will come from east and west , and from north and south , and take their places at the banquet table in the kingdom of God .
42013030	But indeed , some are last who will be first , and some are first who will be last . ”
42013031	At that time , some Pharisees came up and said to Jesus , “ Get away from here , because Herod wants to kill you . ”
42013032	But he said to them , “ Go and tell that fox , ‘ Look , I am casting out demons and performing healings today and tomorrow , and on the third day I will complete my work .
42013033	Nevertheless I must go on my way today and tomorrow and the next day , because it is impossible that a prophet should be killed outside Jerusalem . ’
42013034	O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , you who kill the prophets and stone those who are sent to you ! How often I have longed to gather your children together as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings , but you would have none of it !
42013035	Look , your house is forsaken ! And I tell you , you will not see me until you say , ‘ Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’ ”
42014001	Now one Sabbath when Jesus went to dine at the house of a leader of the Pharisees , they were watching him closely .
42014002	There right in front of him was a man suffering from dropsy .
42014003	So Jesus asked the experts in religious law and the Pharisees , “ Is it lawful to heal on the Sabbath or not ? ”
42014004	But they remained silent . So Jesus took hold of the man , healed him , and sent him away .
42014005	Then he said to them , “ Which of you , if you have a son or an ox that has fallen into a well on a Sabbath day , will not immediately pull him out ? ”
42014006	But they could not reply to this .
42014007	Then when Jesus noticed how the guests chose the places of honor , he told them a parable . He said to them ,
42014008	“ When you are invited by someone to a wedding feast , do not take the place of honor , because a person more distinguished than you may have been invited by your host .
42014009	So the host who invited both of you will come and say to you , ‘ Give this man your place . ’ Then , ashamed , you will begin to move to the least important place .
42014010	But when you are invited , go and take the least important place , so that when your host approaches he will say to you , ‘ Friend , move up here to a better place . ’ Then you will be honored in the presence of all who share the meal with you .
42014011	For everyone who exalts himself will be humbled , but the one who humbles himself will be exalted . ”
42014012	He said also to the man who had invited him , “ When you host a dinner or a banquet , don’t invite your friends or your brothers or your relatives or rich neighbors so you can be invited by them in return and get repaid .
42014013	But when you host an elaborate meal , invite the poor , the crippled , the lame , and the blind .
42014014	Then you will be blessed , because they cannot repay you , for you will be repaid at the resurrection of the righteous . ”
42014015	When one of those at the meal with Jesus heard this , he said to him , “ Blessed is everyone who will feast in the kingdom of God ! ”
42014016	But Jesus said to him , “ A man once gave a great banquet and invited many guests .
42014017	At the time for the banquet he sent his slave to tell those who had been invited , ‘ Come , because everything is now ready . ’
42014018	But one after another they all began to make excuses . The first said to him , ‘ I have bought a field , and I must go out and see it . Please excuse me . ’
42014019	Another said , ‘ I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I am going out to examine them . Please excuse me . ’
42014020	Another said , ‘ I just got married , and I cannot come . ’
42014021	So the slave came back and reported this to his master . Then the master of the household was furious and said to his slave , ‘ Go out quickly to the streets and alleys of the city , and bring in the poor , the crippled , the blind , and the lame . ’
42014022	Then the slave said , ‘ Sir , what you instructed has been done , and there is still room . ’
42014023	So the master said to his slave , ‘ Go out to the highways and country roads and urge people to come in , so that my house will be filled .
42014024	For I tell you , not one of those individuals who were invited will taste my banquet ! ’ ”
42014025	Now large crowds were accompanying Jesus , and turning to them he said ,
42014026	“ If anyone comes to me and does not hate his own father and mother , and wife and children , and brothers and sisters , and even his own life , he cannot be my disciple .
42014027	Whoever does not carry his own cross and follow me cannot be my disciple .
42014028	For which of you , wanting to build a tower , doesn’t sit down first and compute the cost to see if he has enough money to complete it ?
42014029	Otherwise , when he has laid a foundation and is not able to finish the tower , all who see it will begin to make fun of him .
42014030	They will say , ‘ This man began to build and was not able to finish ! ’
42014031	Or what king , going out to confront another king in battle , will not sit down first and determine whether he is able with ten thousand to oppose the one coming against him with twenty thousand ?
42014032	If he cannot succeed , he will send a representative while the other is still a long way off and ask for terms of peace .
42014033	In the same way therefore not one of you can be my disciple if he does not renounce all his own possessions .
42014034	“ Salt is good , but if salt loses its flavor , how can its flavor be restored ?
42014035	It is of no value for the soil or for the manure pile ; it is to be thrown out . The one who has ears to hear had better listen ! ”
42015001	Now all the tax collectors and sinners were coming to hear him .
42015002	But the Pharisees and the experts in the law were complaining , “ This man welcomes sinners and eats with them . ”
42015003	So Jesus told them this parable :
42015004	“ Which one of you , if he has a hundred sheep and loses one of them , would not leave the ninety-nine in the open pasture and go look for the one that is lost until he finds it ?
42015005	Then when he has found it , he places it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
42015006	Returning home , he calls together his friends and neighbors , telling them , ‘ Rejoice with me , because I have found my sheep that was lost . ’
42015007	I tell you , in the same way there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents than over ninety-nine righteous people who have no need to repent .
42015008	“ Or what woman , if she has ten silver coins and loses one of them , does not light a lamp , sweep the house , and search thoroughly until she finds it ?
42015009	Then when she has found it , she calls together her friends and neighbors , saying , ‘ Rejoice with me , for I have found the coin that I had lost . ’
42015010	In the same way , I tell you , there is joy in the presence of God’s angels over one sinner who repents . ”
42015011	Then Jesus said , “ A man had two sons .
42015012	The younger of them said to his father , ‘ Father , give me the share of the estate that will belong to me . ’ So he divided his assets between them .
42015013	After a few days , the younger son gathered together all he had and left on a journey to a distant country , and there he squandered his wealth with a wild lifestyle .
42015014	Then after he had spent everything , a severe famine took place in that country , and he began to be in need .
42015015	So he went and worked for one of the citizens of that country , who sent him to his fields to feed pigs .
42015016	He was longing to eat the carob pods the pigs were eating , but no one gave him anything .
42015017	But when he came to his senses he said , ‘ How many of my father’s hired workers have food enough to spare , but here I am dying from hunger !
42015018	I will get up and go to my father and say to him , “ Father , I have sinned against heaven and against you .
42015019	I am no longer worthy to be called your son ; treat me like one of your hired workers . ” ’
42015020	So he got up and went to his father . But while he was still a long way from home his father saw him , and his heart went out to him ; he ran and hugged his son and kissed him .
42015021	Then his son said to him , ‘ Father , I have sinned against heaven and against you ; I am no longer worthy to be called your son . ’
42015022	But the father said to his slaves , ‘ Hurry ! Bring the best robe , and put it on him ! Put a ring on his finger and sandals on his feet !
42015023	Bring the fattened calf and kill it ! Let us eat and celebrate ,
42015024	because this son of mine was dead , and is alive again – he was lost and is found ! ’ So they began to celebrate .
42015025	“ Now his older son was in the field . As he came and approached the house , he heard music and dancing .
42015026	So he called one of the slaves and asked what was happening .
42015027	The slave replied , ‘ Your brother has returned , and your father has killed the fattened calf because he got his son back safe and sound . ’
42015028	But the older son became angry and refused to go in . His father came out and appealed to him ,
42015029	but he answered his father , ‘ Look ! These many years I have worked like a slave for you , and I never disobeyed your commands . Yet you never gave me even a goat so that I could celebrate with my friends !
42015030	But when this son of yours came back , who has devoured your assets with prostitutes , you killed the fattened calf for him ! ’
42015031	Then the father said to him , ‘ Son , you are always with me , and everything that belongs to me is yours .
42015032	It was appropriate to celebrate and be glad , for your brother was dead , and is alive ; he was lost and is found . ’ ”
42016001	Jesus also said to the disciples , “ There was a rich man who was informed of accusations that his manager was wasting his assets .
42016002	So he called the manager in and said to him , ‘ What is this I hear about you ? Turn in the account of your administration , because you can no longer be my manager . ’
42016003	Then the manager said to himself , ‘ What should I do , since my master is taking my position away from me ? I’m not strong enough to dig , and I’m too ashamed to beg .
42016004	I know what to do so that when I am put out of management , people will welcome me into their homes . ’
42016005	So he contacted his master’s debtors one by one . He asked the first , ‘ How much do you owe my master ? ’
42016006	The man replied , ‘ A hundred measures of olive oil . ’ The manager said to him , ‘ Take your bill , sit down quickly , and write fifty . ’
42016007	Then he said to another , ‘ And how much do you owe ? ’ The second man replied , ‘ A hundred measures of wheat . ’ The manager said to him , ‘ Take your bill , and write eighty . ’
42016008	The master commended the dishonest manager because he acted shrewdly . For the people of this world are more shrewd in dealing with their contemporaries than the people of light .
42016009	And I tell you , make friends for yourselves by how you use worldly wealth , so that when it runs out you will be welcomed into the eternal homes .
42016010	“ The one who is faithful in a very little is also faithful in much , and the one who is dishonest in a very little is also dishonest in much .
42016011	If then you haven’t been trustworthy in handling worldly wealth , who will entrust you with the true riches ?
42016012	And if you haven’t been trustworthy with someone else’s property , who will give you your own ?
42016013	No servant can serve two masters , for either he will hate the one and love the other , or he will be devoted to the one and despise the other . You cannot serve God and money . ”
42016014	The Pharisees ( who loved money ) heard all this and ridiculed him .
42016015	But Jesus said to them , “ You are the ones who justify yourselves in men’s eyes , but God knows your hearts . For what is highly prized among men is utterly detestable in God’s sight .
42016016	“ The law and the prophets were in force until John ; since then , the good news of the kingdom of God has been proclaimed , and everyone is urged to enter it .

42016018	“ Everyone who divorces his wife and marries someone else commits adultery , and the one who marries a woman divorced from her husband commits adultery .
42016019	“ There was a rich man who dressed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day .
42016020	But at his gate lay a poor man named Lazarus whose body was covered with sores ,

42017001	Jesus said to his disciples , “ Stumbling blocks are sure to come , but woe to the one through whom they come !

42017011	Now on the way to Jerusalem , Jesus was passing along between Samaria and Galilee .

42019016	So the first one came before him and said , ‘ Sir , your mina has made ten minas more . ’

42019018	Then the second one came and said , ‘ Sir , your mina has made five minas . ’
42019019	So the king said to him , ‘ And you are to be over five cities . ’

42020030	The second

42021005	Now while some were speaking about the temple , how it was adorned with beautiful stones and offerings , Jesus said ,
