42021007	So they asked him , “ Teacher , when will these things happen ? And what will be the sign that these things are about to take place ? ”
42021008	He said , “ Watch out that you are not misled . For many will come in my name , saying , ‘ I am he , ’ and , ‘ The time is near . ’ Do not follow them !
42021009	And when you hear of wars and rebellions , do not be afraid . For these things must happen first , but the end will not come at once . ”
42021010	Then he said to them , “ Nation will rise up in arms against nation , and kingdom against kingdom .
42021011	There will be great earthquakes , and famines and plagues in various places , and there will be terrifying sights and great signs from heaven .
42021012	But before all this , they will seize you and persecute you , handing you over to the synagogues and prisons . You will be brought before kings and governors because of my name .
42021013	This will be a time for you to serve as witnesses .
42021014	Therefore be resolved not to rehearse ahead of time how to make your defense .
42021015	For I will give you the words along with the wisdom that none of your adversaries will be able to withstand or contradict .
42021016	You will be betrayed even by parents , brothers , relatives , and friends , and they will have some of you put to death .
42021017	You will be hated by everyone because of my name .
42021018	Yet not a hair of your head will perish .
42021019	By your endurance you will gain your lives .
42021020	“ But when you see Jerusalem surrounded by armies , then know that its desolation has come near .
42021021	Then those who are in Judea must flee to the mountains . Those who are inside the city must depart . Those who are out in the country must not enter it ,
42021022	because these are days of vengeance , to fulfill all that is written .
42021023	Woe to those who are pregnant and to those who are nursing their babies in those days ! For there will be great distress on the earth and wrath against this people .
42021024	They will fall by the edge of the sword and be led away as captives among all nations . Jerusalem will be trampled down by the Gentiles until the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled .
42021025	“ And there will be signs in the sun and moon and stars , and on the earth nations will be in distress , anxious over the roaring of the sea and the surging waves .
42021026	People will be fainting from fear and from the expectation of what is coming on the world , for the powers of the heavens will be shaken .
42021027	Then they will see the Son of Man arriving in a cloud with power and great glory .
42021028	But when these things begin to happen , stand up and raise your heads , because your redemption is drawing near . ”
42021029	Then he told them a parable : “ Look at the fig tree and all the other trees .
42021030	When they sprout leaves , you see for yourselves and know that summer is now near .
42021031	So also you , when you see these things happening , know that the kingdom of God is near .
42021032	I tell you the truth , this generation will not pass away until all these things take place .
42021033	Heaven and earth will pass away , but my words will never pass away .
42021034	“ But be on your guard so that your hearts are not weighed down with dissipation and drunkenness and the worries of this life , and that day close down upon you suddenly like a trap .
42021035	For it will overtake all who live on the face of the whole earth .
42021036	But stay alert at all times , praying that you may have strength to escape all these things that must happen , and to stand before the Son of Man . ”
42021037	So every day Jesus was teaching in the temple courts , but at night he went and stayed on the Mount of Olives .
42021038	And all the people came to him early in the morning to listen to him in the temple courts .
42022001	Now the Feast of Unleavened Bread , which is called the Passover , was approaching .
42022002	The chief priests and the experts in the law were trying to find some way to execute Jesus , for they were afraid of the people .
42022003	Then Satan entered Judas , the one called Iscariot , who was one of the twelve .
42022004	He went away and discussed with the chief priests and officers of the temple guard how he might betray Jesus , handing him over to them .
42022005	They were delighted and arranged to give him money .
42022006	So Judas agreed and began looking for an opportunity to betray Jesus when no crowd was present .
42022007	Then the day for the feast of Unleavened Bread came , on which the Passover lamb had to be sacrificed .
42022008	Jesus sent Peter and John , saying , “ Go and prepare the Passover for us to eat . ”
42022009	They said to him , “ Where do you want us to prepare it ? ”
42022010	He said to them , “ Listen , when you have entered the city , a man carrying a jar of water will meet you . Follow him into the house that he enters ,
42022011	and tell the owner of the house , ‘ The Teacher says to you , “ Where is the guest room where I may eat the Passover with my disciples ? ” ’
42022012	Then he will show you a large furnished room upstairs . Make preparations there . ”
42022013	So they went and found things just as he had told them , and they prepared the Passover .
42022014	Now when the hour came , Jesus took his place at the table and the apostles joined him .
42022015	And he said to them , “ I have earnestly desired to eat this Passover with you before I suffer .
42022016	For I tell you , I will not eat it again until it is fulfilled in the kingdom of God . ”
42022017	Then he took a cup , and after giving thanks he said , “ Take this and divide it among yourselves .
42022018	For I tell you that from now on I will not drink of the fruit of the vine until the kingdom of God comes . ”
42022019	Then he took bread , and after giving thanks he broke it and gave it to them , saying , “ This is my body which is given for you . Do this in remembrance of me . ”
42022020	And in the same way he took the cup after they had eaten , saying , “ This cup that is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood .
42022021	“ But look , the hand of the one who betrays me is with me on the table .

42022024	A dispute also started among them over which of them was to be regarded as the greatest .
42022025	So Jesus said to them , “ The kings of the Gentiles lord it over them , and those in authority over them are called ‘ benefactors . ’
42022026	Not so with you ; instead the one who is greatest among you must become like the youngest , and the leader like the one who serves .
42022027	For who is greater , the one who is seated at the table , or the one who serves ? Is it not the one who is seated at the table ? But I am among you as one who serves .
42022028	“ You are the ones who have remained with me in my trials .

42022030	that you may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and you will sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .

42022032	but I have prayed for you , Simon , that your faith may not fail . When you have turned back , strengthen your brothers . ”
42022033	But Peter said to him , “ Lord , I am ready to go with you both to prison and to death ! ”
42022034	Jesus replied , “ I tell you , Peter , the rooster will not crow today until you have denied three times that you know me . ”
42022035	Then Jesus said to them , “ When I sent you out with no money bag , or traveler’s bag , or sandals , you didn’t lack anything , did you ? ” They replied , “ Nothing . ”
42022036	He said to them , “ But now , the one who has a money bag must take it , and likewise a traveler’s bag too . And the one who has no sword must sell his cloak and buy one .
42022037	For I tell you that this scripture must be fulfilled in me , ‘ And he was counted with the transgressors . ’ For what is written about me is being fulfilled . ”
42022038	So they said , “ Look , Lord , here are two swords . ” Then he told them , “ It is enough . ”
42022039	Then Jesus went out and made his way , as he customarily did , to the Mount of Olives , and the disciples followed him .
42022040	When he came to the place , he said to them , “ Pray that you will not fall into temptation . ”
42022041	He went away from them about a stone’s throw , knelt down , and prayed ,
42022042	“ Father , if you are willing , take this cup away from me . Yet not my will but yours be done . ” [
42022043	Then an angel from heaven appeared to him and strengthened him .
42022044	And in his anguish he prayed more earnestly , and his sweat was like drops of blood falling to the ground . ]
42022045	When he got up from prayer , he came to the disciples and found them sleeping , exhausted from grief .
42022046	So he said to them , “ Why are you sleeping ? Get up and pray that you will not fall into temptation ! ”
42022047	While he was still speaking , suddenly a crowd appeared , and the man named Judas , one of the twelve , was leading them . He walked up to Jesus to kiss him .
42022048	But Jesus said to him , “ Judas , would you betray the Son of Man with a kiss ? ”

42022050	Then one of them struck the high priest’s slave , cutting off his right ear .
42022051	But Jesus said , “ Enough of this ! ” And he touched the man’s ear and healed him .

42022053	Day after day when I was with you in the temple courts , you did not arrest me . But this is your hour , and that of the power of darkness ! ”
42022054	Then they arrested Jesus , led him away , and brought him into the high priest’s house . But Peter was following at a distance .
42022055	When they had made a fire in the middle of the courtyard and sat down together , Peter sat down among them .
42022056	Then a slave girl , seeing him as he sat in the firelight , stared at him and said , “ This man was with him too ! ”
42022057	But Peter denied it : “ Woman , I don’t know him ! ”
42022058	Then a little later someone else saw him and said , “ You are one of them too . ” But Peter said , “ Man , I am not ! ”
42022059	And after about an hour still another insisted , “ Certainly this man was with him , because he too is a Galilean . ”
42022060	But Peter said , “ Man , I don’t know what you’re talking about ! ” At that moment , while he was still speaking , a rooster crowed .
42022061	Then the Lord turned and looked straight at Peter , and Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said to him , “ Before a rooster crows today , you will deny me three times . ”

42022063	Now the men who were holding Jesus under guard began to mock him and beat him .

42022065	They also said many other things against him , reviling him .
42022066	When day came , the council of the elders of the people gathered together , both the chief priests and the experts in the law . Then they led Jesus away to their council
42022067	and said , “ If you are the Christ , tell us . ” But he said to them , “ If I tell you , you will not believe ,
42022068	and if I ask you , you will not answer .
42022069	But from now on the Son of Man will be seated at the right hand of the power of God . ”
42022070	So they all said , “ Are you the Son of God , then ? ” He answered them , “ You say that I am . ”

42023001	Then the whole group of them rose up and brought Jesus before Pilate .
42023002	They began to accuse him , saying , “ We found this man subverting our nation , forbidding us to pay the tribute tax to Caesar and claiming that he himself is Christ , a king . ”
42023003	So Pilate asked Jesus , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” He replied , “ You say so . ”
42023004	Then Pilate said to the chief priests and the crowds , “ I find no basis for an accusation against this man . ”
42023005	But they persisted in saying , “ He incites the people by teaching throughout all Judea . It started in Galilee and ended up here ! ”
42023006	Now when Pilate heard this , he asked whether the man was a Galilean .
42023007	When he learned that he was from Herod’s jurisdiction , he sent him over to Herod , who also happened to be in Jerusalem at that time .
42023008	When Herod saw Jesus , he was very glad , for he had long desired to see him , because he had heard about him and was hoping to see him perform some miraculous sign .
42023009	So Herod questioned him at considerable length ; Jesus gave him no answer .
42023010	The chief priests and the experts in the law were there , vehemently accusing him .
42023011	Even Herod with his soldiers treated him with contempt and mocked him . Then , dressing him in elegant clothes , Herod sent him back to Pilate .
42023012	That very day Herod and Pilate became friends with each other , for prior to this they had been enemies .
42023013	Then Pilate called together the chief priests , the rulers , and the people ,
42023014	and said to them , “ You brought me this man as one who was misleading the people . When I examined him before you , I did not find this man guilty of anything you accused him of doing .
42023015	Neither did Herod , for he sent him back to us . Look , he has done nothing deserving death .
42023016	I will therefore have him flogged and release him . ”
42023018	But they all shouted out together , “ Take this man away ! Release Barabbas for us ! ”
42023019	( This was a man who had been thrown into prison for an insurrection started in the city , and for murder . )
42023020	Pilate addressed them once again because he wanted to release Jesus .
42023021	But they kept on shouting , “ Crucify , crucify him ! ”
42023022	A third time he said to them , “ Why ? What wrong has he done ? I have found him guilty of no crime deserving death . I will therefore flog him and release him . ”
42023023	But they were insistent , demanding with loud shouts that he be crucified . And their shouts prevailed .
42023024	So Pilate decided that their demand should be granted .
42023025	He released the man they asked for , who had been thrown in prison for insurrection and murder . But he handed Jesus over to their will .
42023026	As they led him away , they seized Simon of Cyrene , who was coming in from the country . They placed the cross on his back and made him carry it behind Jesus .
42023027	A great number of the people followed him , among them women who were mourning and wailing for him .
42023028	But Jesus turned to them and said , “ Daughters of Jerusalem , do not weep for me , but weep for yourselves and for your children .

42023030	Then they will begin to say to the mountains , ‘ Fall on us ! ’ and to the hills , ‘ Cover us ! ’
42023031	For if such things are done when the wood is green , what will happen when it is dry ? ”

42023033	So when they came to the place that is called “ The Skull , ” they crucified him there , along with the criminals , one on his right and one on his left .
42023034	[ But Jesus said , “ Father , forgive them , for they don’t know what they are doing . ” ] Then they threw dice to divide his clothes .
42023035	The people also stood there watching , but the rulers ridiculed him , saying , “ He saved others . Let him save himself if he is the Christ of God , his chosen one ! ”
42023036	The soldiers also mocked him , coming up and offering him sour wine ,
42023037	and saying , “ If you are the king of the Jews , save yourself ! ”
42023038	There was also an inscription over him , “ This is the king of the Jews . ”
42023039	One of the criminals who was hanging there railed at him , saying , “ Aren’t you the Christ ? Save yourself and us ! ”

42023050	Now there was a man named Joseph who was a member of the council , a good and righteous man .
42023051	( He had not consented to their plan and action . ) He was from the Judean town of Arimathea , and was looking forward to the kingdom of God .

42024001	Now on the first day of the week , at early dawn , the women went to the tomb , taking the aromatic spices they had prepared .
42024002	They found that the stone had been rolled away from the tomb ,
42024003	but when they went in , they did not find the body of the Lord Jesus .

42024013	Now that very day two of them were on their way to a village called Emmaus , about seven miles from Jerusalem .

42024015	While they were talking and debating these things , Jesus himself approached and began to accompany them
42024016	( but their eyes were kept from recognizing him ) .

42024040	When he had said this , he showed them his hands and his feet .

43001001	In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was fully God .
43001002	The Word was with God in the beginning .
43001003	All things were created by him , and apart from him not one thing was created that has been created .
43001004	In him was life , and the life was the light of mankind .
43001005	And the light shines on in the darkness , but the darkness has not mastered it .
43001006	A man came , sent from God , whose name was John .
43001007	He came as a witness to testify about the light , so that everyone might believe through him .
43001008	He himself was not the light , but he came to testify about the light .
43001009	The true light , who gives light to everyone , was coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world was created by him , but the world did not recognize him .
43001011	He came to what was his own , but his own people did not receive him .
43001012	But to all who have received him – those who believe in his name – he has given the right to become God’s children
43001013	– children not born by human parents or by human desire or a husband’s decision , but by God .
43001014	Now the Word became flesh and took up residence among us . We saw his glory – the glory of the one and only , full of grace and truth , who came from the Father .
43001015	John testified about him and shouted out , “ This one was the one about whom I said , ‘ He who comes after me is greater than I am , because he existed before me . ’ ”
43001016	For we have all received from his fullness one gracious gift after another .
43001017	For the law was given through Moses , but grace and truth came about through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has ever seen God . The only one , himself God , who is in closest fellowship with the Father , has made God known .
43001019	Now this was John’s testimony when the Jewish leaders sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	He confessed – he did not deny but confessed – “ I am not the Christ ! ”
43001021	So they asked him , “ Then who are you ? Are you Elijah ? ” He said , “ I am not ! ” “ Are you the Prophet ? ” He answered , “ No ! ”
43001022	Then they said to him , “ Who are you ? Tell us so that we can give an answer to those who sent us . What do you say about yourself ? ”
43001023	John said , “ I am the voice of one shouting in the wilderness , ‘ Make straight the way for the Lord , ’ as Isaiah the prophet said . ”
43001024	( Now they had been sent from the Pharisees . )
43001025	So they asked John , “ Why then are you baptizing if you are not the Christ , nor Elijah , nor the Prophet ? ”
43001026	John answered them , “ I baptize with water . Among you stands one whom you do not recognize ,
43001027	who is coming after me . I am not worthy to untie the strap of his sandal ! ”
43001028	These things happened in Bethany across the Jordan River where John was baptizing .
43001029	On the next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said , “ Look , the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is the one about whom I said , ‘ After me comes a man who is greater than I am , because he existed before me . ’
43001031	I did not recognize him , but I came baptizing with water so that he could be revealed to Israel . ”
43001032	Then John testified , “ I saw the Spirit descending like a dove from heaven , and it remained on him .
43001033	And I did not recognize him , but the one who sent me to baptize with water said to me , ‘ The one on whom you see the Spirit descending and remaining – this is the one who baptizes with the Holy Spirit . ’
43001034	I have both seen and testified that this man is the Chosen One of God . ”
43001035	Again the next day John was standing there with two of his disciples .
43001036	Gazing at Jesus as he walked by , he said , “ Look , the Lamb of God ! ”
43001037	When John’s two disciples heard him say this , they followed Jesus .
43001038	Jesus turned around and saw them following and said to them , “ What do you want ? ” So they said to him , “ Rabbi ” ( which is translated Teacher ) , “ where are you staying ? ”
43001039	Jesus answered , “ Come and you will see . ” So they came and saw where he was staying , and they stayed with him that day . Now it was about four o’clock in the afternoon .
43001040	Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter , was one of the two disciples who heard what John said and followed Jesus .
43001041	He first found his own brother Simon and told him , “ We have found the Messiah ! ” ( which is translated Christ ) .
43001042	Andrew brought Simon to Jesus . Jesus looked at him and said , “ You are Simon , the son of John . You will be called Cephas ” ( which is translated Peter ) .
43001043	On the next day Jesus wanted to set out for Galilee . He found Philip and said to him , “ Follow me . ”
43001044	( Now Philip was from Bethsaida , the town of Andrew and Peter . )
43001045	Philip found Nathanael and told him , “ We have found the one Moses wrote about in the law , and the prophets also wrote about – Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph . ”
43001046	Nathanael replied , “ Can anything good come out of Nazareth ? ” Philip replied , “ Come and see . ”
43001047	Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him and exclaimed , “ Look , a true Israelite in whom there is no deceit ! ”
43001048	Nathanael asked him , “ How do you know me ? ” Jesus replied , “ Before Philip called you , when you were under the fig tree , I saw you . ”
43001049	Nathanael answered him , “ Rabbi , you are the Son of God ; you are the king of Israel ! ”
43001050	Jesus said to him , “ Because I told you that I saw you under the fig tree , do you believe ? You will see greater things than these . ”
43001051	He continued , “ I tell all of you the solemn truth – you will see heaven opened and the angels of God ascending and descending on the Son of Man . ”
43002001	Now on the third day there was a wedding at Cana in Galilee . Jesus’ mother was there ,
43002002	and Jesus and his disciples were also invited to the wedding .
43002003	When the wine ran out , Jesus’ mother said to him , “ They have no wine left . ”
43002004	Jesus replied , “ Woman , why are you saying this to me ? My time has not yet come . ”
43002005	His mother told the servants , “ Whatever he tells you , do it . ”
43002006	Now there were six stone water jars there for Jewish ceremonial washing , each holding twenty or thirty gallons .
43002007	Jesus told the servants , “ Fill the water jars with water . ” So they filled them up to the very top .
43002008	Then he told them , “ Now draw some out and take it to the head steward , ” and they did .
43002009	When the head steward tasted the water that had been turned to wine , not knowing where it came from ( though the servants who had drawn the water knew ) , he called the bridegroom
43002010	and said to him , “ Everyone serves the good wine first , and then the cheaper wine when the guests are drunk . You have kept the good wine until now ! ”
43002011	Jesus did this as the first of his miraculous signs , in Cana of Galilee . In this way he revealed his glory , and his disciples believed in him .
43002012	After this he went down to Capernaum with his mother and brothers and his disciples , and they stayed there a few days .
43002013	Now the Jewish feast of Passover was near , so Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43002014	He found in the temple courts those who were selling oxen and sheep and doves , and the money changers sitting at tables .
43002015	So he made a whip of cords and drove them all out of the temple courts , with the sheep and the oxen . He scattered the coins of the money changers and overturned their tables .
43002016	To those who sold the doves he said , “ Take these things away from here ! Do not make my Father’s house a marketplace ! ”
43002017	His disciples remembered that it was written , “ Zeal for your house will devour me . ”
43002018	So then the Jewish leaders responded , “ What sign can you show us , since you are doing these things ? ”
43002019	Jesus replied , “ Destroy this temple and in three days I will raise it up again . ”
43002020	Then the Jewish leaders said to him , “ This temple has been under construction for forty-six years , and are you going to raise it up in three days ? ”
43002021	But Jesus was speaking about the temple of his body .
43002022	So after he was raised from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this , and they believed the scripture and the saying that Jesus had spoken .
43002023	Now while Jesus was in Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover , many people believed in his name because they saw the miraculous signs he was doing .
43002024	But Jesus would not entrust himself to them , because he knew all people .
43002025	He did not need anyone to testify about man , for he knew what was in man .
43003001	Now a certain man , a Pharisee named Nicodemus , who was a member of the Jewish ruling council ,
43003002	came to Jesus at night and said to him , “ Rabbi , we know that you are a teacher who has come from God . For no one could perform the miraculous signs that you do unless God is with him . ”
43003003	Jesus replied , “ I tell you the solemn truth , unless a person is born from above , he cannot see the kingdom of God . ”
43003004	Nicodemus said to him , “ How can a man be born when he is old ? He cannot enter his mother’s womb and be born a second time , can he ? ”
43003005	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the solemn truth , unless a person is born of water and spirit , he cannot enter the kingdom of God .
43003006	What is born of the flesh is flesh , and what is born of the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	Do not be amazed that I said to you , ‘ You must all be born from above . ’
43003008	The wind blows wherever it will , and you hear the sound it makes , but do not know where it comes from and where it is going . So it is with everyone who is born of the Spirit . ”
43003009	Nicodemus replied , “ How can these things be ? ”
43003010	Jesus answered , “ Are you the teacher of Israel and yet you don’t understand these things ?
43003011	I tell you the solemn truth , we speak about what we know and testify about what we have seen , but you people do not accept our testimony .
43003012	If I have told you people about earthly things and you don’t believe , how will you believe if I tell you about heavenly things ?
43003013	No one has ascended into heaven except the one who descended from heaven – the Son of Man .
43003014	Just as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , so must the Son of Man be lifted up ,
43003015	so that everyone who believes in him may have eternal life . ”
43003016	For this is the way God loved the world : He gave his one and only Son , so that everyone who believes in him will not perish but have eternal life .
43003017	For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world , but that the world should be saved through him .
43003018	The one who believes in him is not condemned . The one who does not believe has been condemned already , because he has not believed in the name of the one and only Son of God .
43003019	Now this is the basis for judging : that the light has come into the world and people loved the darkness rather than the light , because their deeds were evil .
43003020	For everyone who does evil deeds hates the light and does not come to the light , so that their deeds will not be exposed .
43003021	But the one who practices the truth comes to the light , so that it may be plainly evident that his deeds have been done in God .
43003022	After this , Jesus and his disciples came into Judean territory , and there he spent time with them and was baptizing .
43003023	John was also baptizing at Aenon near Salim , because water was plentiful there , and people were coming to him and being baptized .
43003024	( For John had not yet been thrown into prison . )
43003025	Now a dispute came about between some of John’s disciples and a certain Jew concerning ceremonial washing .
43003026	So they came to John and said to him , “ Rabbi , the one who was with you on the other side of the Jordan River , about whom you testified – see , he is baptizing , and everyone is flocking to him ! ”
43003027	John replied , “ No one can receive anything unless it has been given to him from heaven .
43003028	You yourselves can testify that I said , ‘ I am not the Christ , ’ but rather , ‘ I have been sent before him . ’
43003029	The one who has the bride is the bridegroom . The friend of the bridegroom , who stands by and listens for him , rejoices greatly when he hears the bridegroom’s voice . This then is my joy , and it is complete .
43003030	He must become more important while I become less important . ”
43003031	The one who comes from above is superior to all . The one who is from the earth belongs to the earth and speaks about earthly things . The one who comes from heaven is superior to all .
43003032	He testifies about what he has seen and heard , but no one accepts his testimony .
43003033	The one who has accepted his testimony has confirmed clearly that God is truthful .
43003034	For the one whom God has sent speaks the words of God , for he does not give the Spirit sparingly .
43003035	The Father loves the Son and has placed all things under his authority .
43003036	The one who believes in the Son has eternal life . The one who rejects the Son will not see life , but God’s wrath remains on him .
43004001	Now when Jesus knew that the Pharisees had heard that he was winning and baptizing more disciples than John
43004002	( although Jesus himself was not baptizing , but his disciples were ) ,
43004003	he left Judea and set out once more for Galilee .
43004004	But he had to pass through Samaria .
43004005	Now he came to a Samaritan town called Sychar , near the plot of land that Jacob had given to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob’s well was there , so Jesus , since he was tired from the journey , sat right down beside the well . It was about noon .
43004007	A Samaritan woman came to draw water . Jesus said to her , “ Give me some water to drink . ”
43004008	( For his disciples had gone off into the town to buy supplies . )
43004009	So the Samaritan woman said to him , “ How can you – a Jew – ask me , a Samaritan woman , for water to drink ? ” ( For Jews use nothing in common with Samaritans . )
43004010	Jesus answered her , “ If you had known the gift of God and who it is who said to you , ‘ Give me some water to drink , ’ you would have asked him , and he would have given you living water . ”
43004011	“ Sir , ” the woman said to him , “ you have no bucket and the well is deep ; where then do you get this living water ?
43004012	Surely you’re not greater than our ancestor Jacob , are you ? For he gave us this well and drank from it himself , along with his sons and his livestock . ”
43004013	Jesus replied , “ Everyone who drinks some of this water will be thirsty again .
43004014	But whoever drinks some of the water that I will give him will never be thirsty again , but the water that I will give him will become in him a fountain of water springing up to eternal life . ”
43004015	The woman said to him , “ Sir , give me this water , so that I will not be thirsty or have to come here to draw water . ”
43004016	He said to her , “ Go call your husband and come back here . ”
43004017	The woman replied , “ I have no husband . ” Jesus said to her , “ Right you are when you said , ‘ I have no husband , ’
43004018	for you have had five husbands , and the man you are living with now is not your husband . This you said truthfully ! ”
43004019	The woman said to him , “ Sir , I see that you are a prophet .
43004020	Our fathers worshiped on this mountain , and you people say that the place where people must worship is in Jerusalem . ”
43004021	Jesus said to her , “ Believe me , woman , a time is coming when you will worship the Father neither on this mountain nor in Jerusalem .
43004022	You people worship what you do not know . We worship what we know , because salvation is from the Jews .
43004023	But a time is coming – and now is here – when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and truth , for the Father seeks such people to be his worshipers .
43004024	God is spirit , and the people who worship him must worship in spirit and truth . ”
43004025	The woman said to him , “ I know that Messiah is coming ” ( the one called Christ ) ; “ whenever he comes , he will tell us everything . ”
43004026	Jesus said to her , “ I , the one speaking to you , am he . ”
43004027	Now at that very moment his disciples came back . They were shocked because he was speaking with a woman . However , no one said , “ What do you want ? ” or “ Why are you speaking with her ? ”
43004028	Then the woman left her water jar , went off into the town and said to the people ,
43004029	“ Come , see a man who told me everything I ever did . Surely he can’t be the Messiah , can he ? ”
43004030	So they left the town and began coming to him .
43004031	Meanwhile the disciples were urging him , “ Rabbi , eat something . ”
43004032	But he said to them , “ I have food to eat that you know nothing about . ”
43004033	So the disciples began to say to one another , “ No one brought him anything to eat , did they ? ”
43004034	Jesus said to them , “ My food is to do the will of the one who sent me and to complete his work .
43004035	Don’t you say , ‘ There are four more months and then comes the harvest ? ’ I tell you , look up and see that the fields are already white for harvest !
43004036	The one who reaps receives pay and gathers fruit for eternal life , so that the one who sows and the one who reaps can rejoice together .
43004037	For in this instance the saying is true , ‘ One sows and another reaps . ’
43004038	I sent you to reap what you did not work for ; others have labored and you have entered into their labor . ”
43004039	Now many Samaritans from that town believed in him because of the report of the woman who testified , “ He told me everything I ever did . ”
43004040	So when the Samaritans came to him , they began asking him to stay with them . He stayed there two days ,
43004041	and because of his word many more believed .
43004042	They said to the woman , “ No longer do we believe because of your words , for we have heard for ourselves , and we know that this one really is the Savior of the world . ”
43004043	After the two days he departed from there to Galilee .
43004044	( For Jesus himself had testified that a prophet has no honor in his own country . )
43004045	So when he came to Galilee , the Galileans welcomed him because they had seen all the things he had done in Jerusalem at the feast ( for they themselves had gone to the feast ) .
43004046	Now he came again to Cana in Galilee where he had made the water wine . In Capernaum there was a certain royal official whose son was sick .
43004047	When he heard that Jesus had come back from Judea to Galilee , he went to him and begged him to come down and heal his son , who was about to die .
43004048	So Jesus said to him , “ Unless you people see signs and wonders you will never believe ! ”
43004049	“ Sir , ” the official said to him , “ come down before my child dies . ”
43004050	Jesus told him , “ Go home ; your son will live . ” The man believed the word that Jesus spoke to him , and set off for home .
43004051	While he was on his way down , his slaves met him and told him that his son was going to live .
43004052	So he asked them the time when his condition began to improve , and they told him , “ Yesterday at one o’clock in the afternoon the fever left him . ”
43004053	Then the father realized that it was the very time Jesus had said to him , “ Your son will live , ” and he himself believed along with his entire household .
43004054	Jesus did this as his second miraculous sign when he returned from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	After this there was a Jewish feast , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43005002	Now there is in Jerusalem by the Sheep Gate a pool called Bethzatha in Aramaic , which has five covered walkways .
43005003	A great number of sick , blind , lame , and paralyzed people were lying in these walkways .
43005005	Now a man was there who had been disabled for thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw him lying there and when he realized that the man had been disabled a long time already , he said to him , “ Do you want to become well ? ”
43005007	The sick man answered him , “ Sir , I have no one to put me into the pool when the water is stirred up . While I am trying to get into the water , someone else goes down there before me . ”
43005008	Jesus said to him , “ Stand up ! Pick up your mat and walk . ”
43005009	Immediately the man was healed , and he picked up his mat and started walking . ( Now that day was a Sabbath . )
43005010	So the Jewish leaders said to the man who had been healed , “ It is the Sabbath , and you are not permitted to carry your mat . ”
43005011	But he answered them , “ The man who made me well said to me , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk . ’ ”
43005012	They asked him , “ Who is the man who said to you , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk ’ ? ”
43005013	But the man who had been healed did not know who it was , for Jesus had slipped out , since there was a crowd in that place .
43005014	After this Jesus found him at the temple and said to him , “ Look , you have become well . Don’t sin any more , lest anything worse happen to you . ”
43005015	The man went away and informed the Jewish leaders that Jesus was the one who had made him well .
43005016	Now because Jesus was doing these things on the Sabbath , the Jewish leaders began persecuting him .
43005017	So he told them , “ My Father is working until now , and I too am working . ”
43005018	For this reason the Jewish leaders were trying even harder to kill him , because not only was he breaking the Sabbath , but he was also calling God his own Father , thus making himself equal with God .
43005019	So Jesus answered them , “ I tell you the solemn truth , the Son can do nothing on his own initiative , but only what he sees the Father doing . For whatever the Father does , the Son does likewise .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son and shows him everything he does , and will show him greater deeds than these , so that you will be amazed .
43005021	For just as the Father raises the dead and gives them life , so also the Son gives life to whomever he wishes .
43005022	Furthermore , the Father does not judge anyone , but has assigned all judgment to the Son ,
43005023	so that all people will honor the Son just as they honor the Father . The one who does not honor the Son does not honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	“ I tell you the solemn truth , the one who hears my message and believes the one who sent me has eternal life and will not be condemned , but has crossed over from death to life .
43005025	I tell you the solemn truth , a time is coming – and is now here – when the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God , and those who hear will live .
43005026	For just as the Father has life in himself , thus he has granted the Son to have life in himself ,
43005027	and he has granted the Son authority to execute judgment , because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	“ Do not be amazed at this , because a time is coming when all who are in the tombs will hear his voice
43005029	and will come out – the ones who have done what is good to the resurrection resulting in life , and the ones who have done what is evil to the resurrection resulting in condemnation .
43005030	I can do nothing on my own initiative . Just as I hear , I judge , and my judgment is just , because I do not seek my own will , but the will of the one who sent me .
43005031	“ If I testify about myself , my testimony is not true .
43005032	There is another who testifies about me , and I know the testimony he testifies about me is true .
43005033	You have sent to John , and he has testified to the truth .
43005034	( I do not accept human testimony , but I say this so that you may be saved . )
43005035	He was a lamp that was burning and shining , and you wanted to rejoice greatly for a short time in his light .
43005036	“ But I have a testimony greater than that from John . For the deeds that the Father has assigned me to complete – the deeds I am now doing – testify about me that the Father has sent me .
43005037	And the Father who sent me has himself testified about me . You people have never heard his voice nor seen his form at any time ,
43005038	nor do you have his word residing in you , because you do not believe the one whom he sent .
43005039	You study the scriptures thoroughly because you think in them you possess eternal life , and it is these same scriptures that testify about me ,
43005040	but you are not willing to come to me so that you may have life .
43005041	“ I do not accept praise from people ,
43005042	but I know you , that you do not have the love of God within you .
43005043	I have come in my Father’s name , and you do not accept me . If someone else comes in his own name , you will accept him .
43005044	How can you believe , if you accept praise from one another and don’t seek the praise that comes from the only God ?
43005045	“ Do not suppose that I will accuse you before the Father . The one who accuses you is Moses , in whom you have placed your hope .
43005046	If you believed Moses , you would believe me , because he wrote about me .
43005047	But if you do not believe what Moses wrote , how will you believe my words ? ”
43006001	After this Jesus went away to the other side of the Sea of Galilee ( also called the Sea of Tiberias ) .
43006002	A large crowd was following him because they were observing the miraculous signs he was performing on the sick .
43006003	So Jesus went on up the mountainside and sat down there with his disciples .
43006004	( Now the Jewish feast of the Passover was near . )
43006005	Then Jesus , when he looked up and saw that a large crowd was coming to him , said to Philip , “ Where can we buy bread so that these people may eat ? ”
43006006	( Now Jesus said this to test him , for he knew what he was going to do . )
43006007	Philip replied , “ Two hundred silver coins worth of bread would not be enough for them , for each one to get a little . ”
43006008	One of Jesus’ disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , said to him ,
43006009	“ Here is a boy who has five barley loaves and two fish , but what good are these for so many people ? ”
43006010	Jesus said , “ Have the people sit down . ” ( Now there was a lot of grass in that place . ) So the men sat down , about five thousand in number .
43006011	Then Jesus took the loaves , and when he had given thanks , he distributed the bread to those who were seated . He then did the same with the fish , as much as they wanted .
43006012	When they were all satisfied , Jesus said to his disciples , “ Gather up the broken pieces that are left over , so that nothing is wasted . ”
43006013	So they gathered them up and filled twelve baskets with broken pieces from the five barley loaves left over by the people who had eaten .
43006014	Now when the people saw the miraculous sign that Jesus performed , they began to say to one another , “ This is certainly the Prophet who is to come into the world . ”
43006015	Then Jesus , because he knew they were going to come and seize him by force to make him king , withdrew again up the mountainside alone .
43006016	Now when evening came , his disciples went down to the lake ,
43006017	got into a boat , and started to cross the lake to Capernaum . ( It had already become dark , and Jesus had not yet come to them . )
43006018	By now a strong wind was blowing and the sea was getting rough .
43006019	Then , when they had rowed about three or four miles , they caught sight of Jesus walking on the lake , approaching the boat , and they were frightened .
43006020	But he said to them , “ It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
43006021	Then they wanted to take him into the boat , and immediately the boat came to the land where they had been heading .
43006022	The next day the crowd that remained on the other side of the lake realized that only one small boat had been there , and that Jesus had not boarded it with his disciples , but that his disciples had gone away alone .
43006023	But some boats from Tiberias came to shore near the place where they had eaten the bread after the Lord had given thanks .
43006024	So when the crowd realized that neither Jesus nor his disciples were there , they got into the boats and came to Capernaum looking for Jesus .
43006025	When they found him on the other side of the lake , they said to him , “ Rabbi , when did you get here ? ”
43006026	Jesus replied , “ I tell you the solemn truth , you are looking for me not because you saw miraculous signs , but because you ate all the loaves of bread you wanted .
43006027	Do not work for the food that disappears , but for the food that remains to eternal life – the food which the Son of Man will give to you . For God the Father has put his seal of approval on him . ”
43006028	So then they said to him , “ What must we do to accomplish the deeds God requires ? ”
43006029	Jesus replied , “ This is the deed God requires – to believe in the one whom he sent . ”
43006030	So they said to him , “ Then what miraculous sign will you perform , so that we may see it and believe you ? What will you do ?
43006031	Our ancestors ate the manna in the wilderness , just as it is written , ‘ He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Then Jesus told them , “ I tell you the solemn truth , it is not Moses who has given you the bread from heaven , but my Father is giving you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	For the bread of God is the one who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	So they said to him , “ Sir , give us this bread all the time ! ”
43006035	Jesus said to them , “ I am the bread of life . The one who comes to me will never go hungry , and the one who believes in me will never be thirsty .
43006036	But I told you that you have seen me and still do not believe .
43006037	Everyone whom the Father gives me will come to me , and the one who comes to me I will never send away .
43006038	For I have come down from heaven not to do my own will but the will of the one who sent me .
43006039	Now this is the will of the one who sent me – that I should not lose one person of every one he has given me , but raise them all up at the last day .
43006040	For this is the will of my Father – for everyone who looks on the Son and believes in him to have eternal life , and I will raise him up at the last day . ”
43006041	Then the Jews who were hostile to Jesus began complaining about him because he said , “ I am the bread that came down from heaven , ”
43006042	and they said , “ Isn’t this Jesus the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? How can he now say , ‘ I have come down from heaven ’ ? ”
43006043	Jesus replied , “ Do not complain about me to one another .
43006044	No one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draws him , and I will raise him up at the last day .
43006045	It is written in the prophets , ‘ And they will all be taught by God . ’ Everyone who hears and learns from the Father comes to me .
43006046	( Not that anyone has seen the Father except the one who is from God – he has seen the Father . )
43006047	I tell you the solemn truth , the one who believes has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your ancestors ate the manna in the wilderness , and they died .
43006050	This is the bread that has come down from heaven , so that a person may eat from it and not die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came down from heaven . If anyone eats from this bread he will live forever . The bread that I will give for the life of the world is my flesh . ”
43006052	Then the Jews who were hostile to Jesus began to argue with one another , “ How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? ”
43006053	Jesus said to them , “ I tell you the solemn truth , unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood , you have no life in yourselves .
43006054	The one who eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life , and I will raise him up on the last day .
43006055	For my flesh is true food , and my blood is true drink .
43006056	The one who eats my flesh and drinks my blood resides in me , and I in him .
43006057	Just as the living Father sent me , and I live because of the Father , so the one who consumes me will live because of me .
43006058	This is the bread that came down from heaven ; it is not like the bread your ancestors ate , but then later died . The one who eats this bread will live forever . ”
43006059	Jesus said these things while he was teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	Then many of his disciples , when they heard these things , said , “ This is a difficult saying ! Who can understand it ? ”
43006061	When Jesus was aware that his disciples were complaining about this , he said to them , “ Does this cause you to be offended ?
43006062	Then what if you see the Son of Man ascending where he was before ?
43006063	The Spirit is the one who gives life ; human nature is of no help ! The words that I have spoken to you are spirit and are life .
43006064	But there are some of you who do not believe . ” ( For Jesus had already known from the beginning who those were who did not believe , and who it was who would betray him . )
43006065	So Jesus added , “ Because of this I told you that no one can come to me unless the Father has allowed him to come . ”
43006066	After this many of his disciples quit following him and did not accompany him any longer .
43006067	So Jesus said to the twelve , “ You don’t want to go away too , do you ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter answered him , “ Lord , to whom would we go ? You have the words of eternal life .
43006069	We have come to believe and to know that you are the Holy One of God ! ”
43006070	Jesus replied , “ Didn’t I choose you , the twelve , and yet one of you is the devil ? ”
43006071	( Now he said this about Judas son of Simon Iscariot , for Judas , one of the twelve , was going to betray him . )
43007001	After this Jesus traveled throughout Galilee . He stayed out of Judea because the Jewish leaders wanted to kill him .
43007002	Now the Jewish feast of Tabernacles was near .
43007003	So Jesus’ brothers advised him , “ Leave here and go to Judea so your disciples may see your miracles that you are performing .
43007004	For no one who seeks to make a reputation for himself does anything in secret . If you are doing these things , show yourself to the world . ”
43007005	( For not even his own brothers believed in him . )
43007006	So Jesus replied , “ My time has not yet arrived , but you are ready at any opportunity !
43007007	The world cannot hate you , but it hates me , because I am testifying about it that its deeds are evil .
43007008	You go up to the feast yourselves . I am not going up to this feast because my time has not yet fully arrived . ”
43007009	When he had said this , he remained in Galilee .
43007010	But when his brothers had gone up to the feast , then Jesus himself also went up , not openly but in secret .
43007011	So the Jewish leaders were looking for him at the feast , asking , “ Where is he ? ”
43007012	There was a lot of grumbling about him among the crowds . Some were saying , “ He is a good man , ” but others , “ He deceives the common people . ”
43007013	However , no one spoke openly about him for fear of the Jewish leaders .
43007014	When the feast was half over , Jesus went up to the temple courts and began to teach .
43007015	Then the Jewish leaders were astonished and said , “ How does this man know so much when he has never had formal instruction ? ”
43007016	So Jesus replied , “ My teaching is not from me , but from the one who sent me .
43007017	If anyone wants to do God’s will , he will know about my teaching , whether it is from God or whether I speak from my own authority .
43007018	The person who speaks on his own authority desires to receive honor for himself ; the one who desires the honor of the one who sent him is a man of integrity , and there is no unrighteousness in him .
43007019	Hasn’t Moses given you the law ? Yet not one of you keeps the law ! Why do you want to kill me ? ”
43007020	The crowd answered , “ You’re possessed by a demon ! Who is trying to kill you ? ”
43007021	Jesus replied , “ I performed one miracle and you are all amazed .
43007022	However , because Moses gave you the practice of circumcision ( not that it came from Moses , but from the forefathers ) , you circumcise a male child on the Sabbath .
43007023	But if a male child is circumcised on the Sabbath so that the law of Moses is not broken , why are you angry with me because I made a man completely well on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Do not judge according to external appearance , but judge with proper judgment . ”
43007025	Then some of the residents of Jerusalem began to say , “ Isn’t this the man they are trying to kill ?
43007026	Yet here he is , speaking publicly , and they are saying nothing to him . Do the rulers really know that this man is the Christ ?
43007027	But we know where this man comes from . Whenever the Christ comes , no one will know where he comes from . ”
43007028	Then Jesus , while teaching in the temple courts , cried out , “ You both know me and know where I come from ! And I have not come on my own initiative , but the one who sent me is true . You do not know him ,
43007029	but I know him , because I have come from him and he sent me . ”
43007030	So then they tried to seize Jesus , but no one laid a hand on him , because his time had not yet come .
43007031	Yet many of the crowd believed in him and said , “ Whenever the Christ comes , he won’t perform more miraculous signs than this man did , will he ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd murmuring these things about Jesus , so the chief priests and the Pharisees sent officers to arrest him .
43007033	Then Jesus said , “ I will be with you for only a little while longer , and then I am going to the one who sent me .
43007034	You will look for me but will not find me , and where I am you cannot come . ”
43007035	Then the Jewish leaders said to one another , “ Where is he going to go that we cannot find him ? He is not going to go to the Jewish people dispersed among the Greeks and teach the Greeks , is he ?
43007036	What did he mean by saying , ‘ You will look for me but will not find me , and where I am you cannot come ’ ? ”
43007037	On the last day of the feast , the greatest day , Jesus stood up and shouted out , “ If anyone is thirsty , let him come to me , and
43007038	let the one who believes in me drink . Just as the scripture says , ‘ From within him will flow rivers of living water . ’ ”
43007039	( Now he said this about the Spirit , whom those who believed in him were going to receive , for the Spirit had not yet been given , because Jesus was not yet glorified . )
43007040	When they heard these words , some of the crowd began to say , “ This really is the Prophet ! ”
43007041	Others said , “ This is the Christ ! ” But still others said , “ No , for the Christ doesn’t come from Galilee , does he ?
43007042	Don’t the scriptures say that the Christ is a descendant of David and comes from Bethlehem , the village where David lived ? ”
43007043	So there was a division in the crowd because of Jesus .
43007044	Some of them were wanting to seize him , but no one laid a hand on him .
43007045	Then the officers returned to the chief priests and Pharisees , who said to them , “ Why didn’t you bring him back with you ? ”
43007046	The officers replied , “ No one ever spoke like this man ! ”
43007047	Then the Pharisees answered , “ You haven’t been deceived too , have you ?
43007048	None of the rulers or the Pharisees have believed in him , have they ?
43007049	But this rabble who do not know the law are accursed ! ”
43007050	Nicodemus , who had gone to Jesus before and who was one of the rulers , said ,
43007051	“ Our law doesn’t condemn a man unless it first hears from him and learns what he is doing , does it ? ”
43007052	They replied , “ You aren’t from Galilee too , are you ? Investigate carefully and you will see that no prophet comes from Galilee ! ” [ [
43007053	And each one departed to his own house .
43008001	But Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	Early in the morning he came to the temple courts again . All the people came to him , and he sat down and began to teach them .
43008003	The experts in the law and the Pharisees brought a woman who had been caught committing adultery . They made her stand in front of them
43008004	and said to Jesus , “ Teacher , this woman was caught in the very act of adultery .
43008005	In the law Moses commanded us to stone to death such women . What then do you say ? ”
43008006	( Now they were asking this in an attempt to trap him , so that they could bring charges against him . ) Jesus bent down and wrote on the ground with his finger .
43008007	When they persisted in asking him , he stood up straight and replied , “ Whoever among you is guiltless may be the first to throw a stone at her . ”
43008008	Then he bent over again and wrote on the ground .
43008009	Now when they heard this , they began to drift away one at a time , starting with the older ones , until Jesus was left alone with the woman standing before him .
43008010	Jesus stood up straight and said to her , “ Woman , where are they ? Did no one condemn you ? ”
43008011	She replied , “ No one , Lord . ” And Jesus said , “ I do not condemn you either . Go , and from now on do not sin any more . ” ] ]
43008012	Then Jesus spoke out again , “ I am the light of the world . The one who follows me will never walk in darkness , but will have the light of life . ”
43008013	So the Pharisees objected , “ You testify about yourself ; your testimony is not true ! ”
43008014	Jesus answered , “ Even if I testify about myself , my testimony is true , because I know where I came from and where I am going . But you people do not know where I came from or where I am going .
43008015	You people judge by outward appearances ; I do not judge anyone .
43008016	But if I judge , my evaluation is accurate , because I am not alone when I judge , but I and the Father who sent me do so together .
43008017	It is written in your law that the testimony of two men is true .
43008018	I testify about myself and the Father who sent me testifies about me . ”
43008019	Then they began asking him , “ Who is your father ? ” Jesus answered , “ You do not know either me or my Father . If you knew me you would know my Father too . ”
43008020	( Jesus spoke these words near the offering box while he was teaching in the temple courts . No one seized him because his time had not yet come . )
43008021	Then Jesus said to them again , “ I am going away , and you will look for me but will die in your sin . Where I am going you cannot come . ”
43008022	So the Jewish leaders began to say , “ Perhaps he is going to kill himself , because he says , ‘ Where I am going you cannot come . ’ ”
43008023	Jesus replied , “ You people are from below ; I am from above . You people are from this world ; I am not from this world .
43008024	Thus I told you that you will die in your sins . For unless you believe that I am he , you will die in your sins . ”
43008025	So they said to him , “ Who are you ? ” Jesus replied , “ What I have told you from the beginning .
43008026	I have many things to say and to judge about you , but the Father who sent me is truthful , and the things I have heard from him I speak to the world . ”
43008027	( They did not understand that he was telling them about his Father . )
43008028	Then Jesus said , “ When you lift up the Son of Man , then you will know that I am he , and I do nothing on my own initiative , but I speak just what the Father taught me .
43008029	And the one who sent me is with me . He has not left me alone , because I always do those things that please him . ”
43008030	While he was saying these things , many people believed in him .
43008031	Then Jesus said to those Judeans who had believed him , “ If you continue to follow my teaching , you are really my disciples
43008032	and you will know the truth , and the truth will set you free . ”
43008033	“ We are descendants of Abraham , ” they replied , “ and have never been anyone’s slaves ! How can you say , ‘ You will become free ’ ? ”
43008034	Jesus answered them , “ I tell you the solemn truth , everyone who practices sin is a slave of sin .
43008035	The slave does not remain in the family forever , but the son remains forever .
43008036	So if the son sets you free , you will be really free .
43008037	I know that you are Abraham’s descendants . But you want to kill me , because my teaching makes no progress among you .
43008038	I am telling you the things I have seen while with the Father ; as for you , practice the things you have heard from the Father ! ”
43008039	They answered him , “ Abraham is our father ! ” Jesus replied , “ If you are Abraham’s children , you would be doing the deeds of Abraham .
43008040	But now you are trying to kill me , a man who has told you the truth I heard from God . Abraham did not do this !
43008041	You people are doing the deeds of your father . ” Then they said to Jesus , “ We were not born as a result of immorality ! We have only one Father , God himself . ”
43008042	Jesus replied , “ If God were your Father , you would love me , for I have come from God and am now here . I have not come on my own initiative , but he sent me .
43008043	Why don’t you understand what I am saying ? It is because you cannot accept my teaching .
43008044	You people are from your father the devil , and you want to do what your father desires . He was a murderer from the beginning , and does not uphold the truth , because there is no truth in him . Whenever he lies , he speaks according to his own nature , because he is a liar and the father of lies .
43008045	But because I am telling you the truth , you do not believe me .
43008046	Who among you can prove me guilty of any sin ? If I am telling you the truth , why don’t you believe me ?
43008047	The one who belongs to God listens and responds to God’s words . You don’t listen and respond , because you don’t belong to God . ”
43008048	The Judeans replied , “ Aren’t we correct in saying that you are a Samaritan and are possessed by a demon ? ”
43008049	Jesus answered , “ I am not possessed by a demon , but I honor my Father – and yet you dishonor me .
43008050	I am not trying to get praise for myself . There is one who demands it , and he also judges .
43008051	I tell you the solemn truth , if anyone obeys my teaching , he will never see death . ”
43008052	Then the Judeans responded , “ Now we know you’re possessed by a demon ! Both Abraham and the prophets died , and yet you say , ‘ If anyone obeys my teaching , he will never experience death . ’
43008053	You aren’t greater than our father Abraham who died , are you ? And the prophets died too ! Who do you claim to be ? ”
43008054	Jesus replied , “ If I glorify myself , my glory is worthless . The one who glorifies me is my Father , about whom you people say , ‘ He is our God . ’
43008055	Yet you do not know him , but I know him . If I were to say that I do not know him , I would be a liar like you . But I do know him , and I obey his teaching .
43008056	Your father Abraham was overjoyed to see my day , and he saw it and was glad . ”
43008057	Then the Judeans replied , “ You are not yet fifty years old ! Have you seen Abraham ? ”
43008058	Jesus said to them , “ I tell you the solemn truth , before Abraham came into existence , I am ! ”
43008059	Then they picked up stones to throw at him , but Jesus hid himself and went out from the temple area .
43009001	Now as Jesus was passing by , he saw a man who had been blind from birth .
43009002	His disciples asked him , “ Rabbi , who committed the sin that caused him to be born blind , this man or his parents ? ”
43009003	Jesus answered , “ Neither this man nor his parents sinned , but he was born blind so that the acts of God may be revealed through what happens to him .
43009004	We must perform the deeds of the one who sent me as long as it is daytime . Night is coming when no one can work .
43009005	As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	Having said this , he spat on the ground and made some mud with the saliva . He smeared the mud on the blind man’s eyes
43009007	and said to him , “ Go wash in the pool of Siloam ” ( which is translated “ sent ” ) . So the blind man went away and washed , and came back seeing .
43009008	Then the neighbors and the people who had seen him previously as a beggar began saying , “ Is this not the man who used to sit and beg ? ”
43009009	Some people said , “ This is the man ! ” while others said , “ No , but he looks like him . ” The man himself kept insisting , “ I am the one ! ”
43009010	So they asked him , “ How then were you made to see ? ”
43009011	He replied , “ The man called Jesus made mud , smeared it on my eyes and told me , ‘ Go to Siloam and wash . ’ So I went and washed , and was able to see . ”
43009012	They said to him , “ Where is that man ? ” He replied , “ I don’t know . ”
43009013	They brought the man who used to be blind to the Pharisees .
43009014	( Now the day on which Jesus made the mud and caused him to see was a Sabbath . )
43009015	So the Pharisees asked him again how he had gained his sight . He replied , “ He put mud on my eyes and I washed , and now I am able to see . ”
43009016	Then some of the Pharisees began to say , “ This man is not from God , because he does not observe the Sabbath . ” But others said , “ How can a man who is a sinner perform such miraculous signs ? ” Thus there was a division among them .
43009017	So again they asked the man who used to be blind , “ What do you say about him , since he caused you to see ? ” “ He is a prophet , ” the man replied .
43009018	Now the Jewish religious leaders refused to believe that he had really been blind and had gained his sight until at last they summoned the parents of the man who had become able to see .
43009019	They asked the parents , “ Is this your son , whom you say was born blind ? Then how does he now see ? ”
43009020	So his parents replied , “ We know that this is our son and that he was born blind .
43009021	But we do not know how he is now able to see , nor do we know who caused him to see . Ask him , he is a mature adult . He will speak for himself . ”
43009022	( His parents said these things because they were afraid of the Jewish religious leaders . For the Jewish leaders had already agreed that anyone who confessed Jesus to be the Christ would be put out of the synagogue .
43009023	For this reason his parents said , “ He is a mature adult , ask him . ” )
43009024	Then they summoned the man who used to be blind a second time and said to him , “ Promise before God to tell the truth . We know that this man is a sinner . ”
43009025	He replied , “ I do not know whether he is a sinner . I do know one thing – that although I was blind , now I can see . ”
43009026	Then they said to him , “ What did he do to you ? How did he cause you to see ? ”
43009027	He answered , “ I told you already and you didn’t listen . Why do you want to hear it again ? You people don’t want to become his disciples too , do you ? ”
43009028	They heaped insults on him , saying , “ You are his disciple ! We are disciples of Moses !
43009029	We know that God has spoken to Moses ! We do not know where this man comes from ! ”
43009030	The man replied , “ This is a remarkable thing , that you don’t know where he comes from , and yet he caused me to see !
43009031	We know that God doesn’t listen to sinners , but if anyone is devout and does his will , God listens to him .
43009032	Never before has anyone heard of someone causing a man born blind to see .
43009033	If this man were not from God , he could do nothing . ”
43009034	They replied , “ You were born completely in sinfulness , and yet you presume to teach us ? ” So they threw him out .
43009035	Jesus heard that they had thrown him out , so he found the man and said to him , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	The man replied , “ And who is he , sir , that I may believe in him ? ”
43009037	Jesus told him , “ You have seen him ; he is the one speaking with you . ” [
43009038	He said , “ Lord , I believe , ” and he worshiped him .
43009039	Jesus said , ] “ For judgment I have come into this world , so that those who do not see may gain their sight , and the ones who see may become blind . ”
43009040	Some of the Pharisees who were with him heard this and asked him , “ We are not blind too , are we ? ”
43009041	Jesus replied , “ If you were blind , you would not be guilty of sin , but now because you claim that you can see , your guilt remains . ”
43010001	“ I tell you the solemn truth , the one who does not enter the sheepfold by the door , but climbs in some other way , is a thief and a robber .
43010002	The one who enters by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	The doorkeeper opens the door for him , and the sheep hear his voice . He calls his own sheep by name and leads them out .
43010004	When he has brought all his own sheep out , he goes ahead of them , and the sheep follow him because they recognize his voice .
43010005	They will never follow a stranger , but will run away from him , because they do not recognize the stranger’s voice . ”
43010006	Jesus told them this parable , but they did not understand what he was saying to them .
43010007	So Jesus said to them again , “ I tell you the solemn truth , I am the door for the sheep .
43010008	All who came before me were thieves and robbers , but the sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	I am the door . If anyone enters through me , he will be saved , and will come in and go out , and find pasture .
43010010	The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy ; I have come so that they may have life , and may have it abundantly .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep .
43010012	The hired hand , who is not a shepherd and does not own sheep , sees the wolf coming and abandons the sheep and runs away . So the wolf attacks the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	Because he is a hired hand and is not concerned about the sheep , he runs away .
43010014	“ I am the good shepherd . I know my own and my own know me –
43010015	just as the Father knows me and I know the Father – and I lay down my life for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep that do not come from this sheepfold . I must bring them too , and they will listen to my voice , so that there will be one flock and one shepherd .
43010017	This is why the Father loves me – because I lay down my life , so that I may take it back again .
43010018	No one takes it away from me , but I lay it down of my own free will . I have the authority to lay it down , and I have the authority to take it back again . This commandment I received from my Father . ”
43010019	Another sharp division took place among the Jewish people because of these words .
43010020	Many of them were saying , “ He is possessed by a demon and has lost his mind ! Why do you listen to him ? ”
43010021	Others said , “ These are not the words of someone possessed by a demon . A demon cannot cause the blind to see , can it ? ”
43010022	Then came the feast of the Dedication in Jerusalem .
43010023	It was winter , and Jesus was walking in the temple area in Solomon’s Portico .
43010024	The Jewish leaders surrounded him and asked , “ How long will you keep us in suspense ? If you are the Christ , tell us plainly . ”
43010025	Jesus replied , “ I told you and you do not believe . The deeds I do in my Father’s name testify about me .
43010026	But you refuse to believe because you are not my sheep .
43010027	My sheep listen to my voice , and I know them , and they follow me .
43010028	I give them eternal life , and they will never perish ; no one will snatch them from my hand .
43010029	My Father , who has given them to me , is greater than all , and no one can snatch them from my Father’s hand .
43010030	The Father and I are one . ”
43010031	The Jewish leaders picked up rocks again to stone him to death .
43010032	Jesus said to them , “ I have shown you many good deeds from the Father . For which one of them are you going to stone me ? ”
43010033	The Jewish leaders replied , “ We are not going to stone you for a good deed but for blasphemy , because you , a man , are claiming to be God . ”
43010034	Jesus answered , “ Is it not written in your law , ‘ I said , you are gods ’ ?
43010035	If those people to whom the word of God came were called ‘ gods’ ( and the scripture cannot be broken ) ,
43010036	do you say about the one whom the Father set apart and sent into the world , ‘ You are blaspheming , ’ because I said , ‘ I am the Son of God ’ ?
43010037	If I do not perform the deeds of my Father , do not believe me .
43010038	But if I do them , even if you do not believe me , believe the deeds , so that you may come to know and understand that I am in the Father and the Father is in me . ”
43010039	Then they attempted again to seize him , but he escaped their clutches .
43010040	Jesus went back across the Jordan River again to the place where John had been baptizing at an earlier time , and he stayed there .
43010041	Many came to him and began to say , “ John performed no miraculous sign , but everything John said about this man was true ! ”
43010042	And many believed in Jesus there .
43011001	Now a certain man named Lazarus was sick . He was from Bethany , the village where Mary and her sister Martha lived .
43011002	( Now it was Mary who anointed the Lord with perfumed oil and wiped his feet dry with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
43011003	So the sisters sent a message to Jesus , “ Lord , look , the one you love is sick . ”
43011004	When Jesus heard this , he said , “ This sickness will not lead to death , but to God’s glory , so that the Son of God may be glorified through it . ”
43011005	( Now Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus . )
43011006	So when he heard that Lazarus was sick , he remained in the place where he was for two more days .
43011007	Then after this , he said to his disciples , “ Let us go to Judea again . ”
43011008	The disciples replied , “ Rabbi , the Jewish leaders were just now trying to stone you to death ! Are you going there again ? ”
43011009	Jesus replied , “ Are there not twelve hours in a day ? If anyone walks around in the daytime , he does not stumble , because he sees the light of this world .
43011010	But if anyone walks around at night , he stumbles , because the light is not in him . ”
43011011	After he said this , he added , “ Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep . But I am going there to awaken him . ”
43011012	Then the disciples replied , “ Lord , if he has fallen asleep , he will recover . ”
43011013	( Now Jesus had been talking about his death , but they thought he had been talking about real sleep . )
43011014	Then Jesus told them plainly , “ Lazarus has died ,
43011015	and I am glad for your sake that I was not there , so that you may believe . But let us go to him . ”
43011016	So Thomas ( called Didymus ) said to his fellow disciples , “ Let us go too , so that we may die with him . ”
43011017	When Jesus arrived , he found that Lazarus had been in the tomb four days already .
43011018	( Now Bethany was less than two miles from Jerusalem ,
43011019	so many of the Jewish people of the region had come to Martha and Mary to console them over the loss of their brother . )
43011020	So when Martha heard that Jesus was coming , she went out to meet him , but Mary was sitting in the house .
43011021	Martha said to Jesus , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died .
43011022	But even now I know that whatever you ask from God , God will grant you . ”
43011023	Jesus replied , “ Your brother will come back to life again . ”
43011024	Martha said , “ I know that he will come back to life again in the resurrection at the last day . ”
43011025	Jesus said to her , “ I am the resurrection and the life . The one who believes in me will live even if he dies ,
43011026	and the one who lives and believes in me will never die . Do you believe this ? ”
43011027	She replied , “ Yes , Lord , I believe that you are the Christ , the Son of God who comes into the world . ”
43011028	And when she had said this , Martha went and called her sister Mary , saying privately , “ The Teacher is here and is asking for you . ”
43011029	So when Mary heard this , she got up quickly and went to him .
43011030	( Now Jesus had not yet entered the village , but was still in the place where Martha had come out to meet him . )
43011031	Then the people who were with Mary in the house consoling her saw her get up quickly and go out . They followed her , because they thought she was going to the tomb to weep there .
43011032	Now when Mary came to the place where Jesus was and saw him , she fell at his feet and said to him , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died . ”
43011033	When Jesus saw her weeping , and the people who had come with her weeping , he was intensely moved in spirit and greatly distressed .
43011034	He asked , “ Where have you laid him ? ” They replied , “ Lord , come and see . ”
43011035	Jesus wept .
43011036	Thus the people who had come to mourn said , “ Look how much he loved him ! ”
43011037	But some of them said , “ This is the man who caused the blind man to see ! Couldn’t he have done something to keep Lazarus from dying ? ”
43011038	Jesus , intensely moved again , came to the tomb . ( Now it was a cave , and a stone was placed across it . )
43011039	Jesus said , “ Take away the stone . ” Martha , the sister of the deceased , replied , “ Lord , by this time the body will have a bad smell , because he has been buried four days . ”
43011040	Jesus responded , “ Didn’t I tell you that if you believe , you would see the glory of God ? ”
43011041	So they took away the stone . Jesus looked upward and said , “ Father , I thank you that you have listened to me .
43011042	I knew that you always listen to me , but I said this for the sake of the crowd standing around here , that they may believe that you sent me . ”
43011043	When he had said this , he shouted in a loud voice , “ Lazarus , come out ! ”
43011044	The one who had died came out , his feet and hands tied up with strips of cloth , and a cloth wrapped around his face . Jesus said to them , “ Unwrap him and let him go . ”
43011045	Then many of the people , who had come with Mary and had seen the things Jesus did , believed in him .
43011046	But some of them went to the Pharisees and reported to them what Jesus had done .
43011047	So the chief priests and the Pharisees called the council together and said , “ What are we doing ? For this man is performing many miraculous signs .
43011048	If we allow him to go on in this way , everyone will believe in him , and the Romans will come and take away our sanctuary and our nation . ”
43011049	Then one of them , Caiaphas , who was high priest that year , said , “ You know nothing at all !
