43011050	You do not realize that it is more to your advantage to have one man die for the people than for the whole nation to perish . ”
43011051	( Now he did not say this on his own , but because he was high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus was going to die for the Jewish nation ,
43011052	and not for the Jewish nation only , but to gather together into one the children of God who are scattered . )
43011053	So from that day they planned together to kill him .
43011054	Thus Jesus no longer went around publicly among the Judeans , but went away from there to the region near the wilderness , to a town called Ephraim , and stayed there with his disciples .
43011055	Now the Jewish feast of Passover was near , and many people went up to Jerusalem from the rural areas before the Passover to cleanse themselves ritually .
43011056	Thus they were looking for Jesus , and saying to one another as they stood in the temple courts , “ What do you think ? That he won’t come to the feast ? ”
43011057	( Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that anyone who knew where Jesus was should report it , so that they could arrest him . )
43012001	Then , six days before the Passover , Jesus came to Bethany , where Lazarus lived , whom he had raised from the dead .
43012002	So they prepared a dinner for Jesus there . Martha was serving , and Lazarus was among those present at the table with him .
43012003	Then Mary took three quarters of a pound of expensive aromatic oil from pure nard and anointed the feet of Jesus . She then wiped his feet dry with her hair . ( Now the house was filled with the fragrance of the perfumed oil . )
43012004	But Judas Iscariot , one of his disciples ( the one who was going to betray him ) said ,
43012005	“ Why wasn’t this oil sold for three hundred silver coins and the money given to the poor ? ”
43012006	( Now Judas said this not because he was concerned about the poor , but because he was a thief . As keeper of the money box , he used to steal what was put into it . )
43012007	So Jesus said , “ Leave her alone . She has kept it for the day of my burial .
43012008	For you will always have the poor with you , but you will not always have me ! ”
43012009	Now a large crowd of Judeans learned that Jesus was there , and so they came not only because of him but also to see Lazarus whom he had raised from the dead .
43012010	So the chief priests planned to kill Lazarus too ,
43012011	for on account of him many of the Jewish people from Jerusalem were going away and believing in Jesus .
43012012	The next day the large crowd that had come to the feast heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem .
43012013	So they took branches of palm trees and went out to meet him . They began to shout , “ Hosanna ! Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord ! Blessed is the king of Israel ! ”
43012014	Jesus found a young donkey and sat on it , just as it is written ,
43012015	“ Do not be afraid , people of Zion ; look , your king is coming , seated on a donkey ’ s colt ! ”
43012016	( His disciples did not understand these things when they first happened , but when Jesus was glorified , then they remembered that these things were written about him and that these things had happened to him . )
43012017	So the crowd who had been with him when he called Lazarus out of the tomb and raised him from the dead were continuing to testify about it .
43012018	Because they had heard that Jesus had performed this miraculous sign , the crowd went out to meet him .
43012019	Thus the Pharisees said to one another , “ You see that you can do nothing . Look , the world has run off after him ! ”
43012020	Now some Greeks were among those who had gone up to worship at the feast .
43012021	So these approached Philip , who was from Bethsaida in Galilee , and requested , “ Sir , we would like to see Jesus . ”
43012022	Philip went and told Andrew , and they both went and told Jesus .
43012023	Jesus replied , “ The time has come for the Son of Man to be glorified .
43012024	I tell you the solemn truth , unless a kernel of wheat falls into the ground and dies , it remains by itself alone . But if it dies , it produces much grain .
43012025	The one who loves his life destroys it , and the one who hates his life in this world guards it for eternal life .
43012026	If anyone wants to serve me , he must follow me , and where I am , my servant will be too . If anyone serves me , the Father will honor him .
43012027	“ Now my soul is greatly distressed . And what should I say ? ‘ Father , deliver me from this hour ’ ? No , but for this very reason I have come to this hour .
43012028	Father , glorify your name . ” Then a voice came from heaven , “ I have glorified it , and I will glorify it again . ”
43012029	The crowd that stood there and heard the voice said that it had thundered . Others said that an angel had spoken to him .
43012030	Jesus said , “ This voice has not come for my benefit but for yours .
43012031	Now is the judgment of this world ; now the ruler of this world will be driven out .
43012032	And I , when I am lifted up from the earth , will draw all people to myself . ”
43012033	( Now he said this to indicate clearly what kind of death he was going to die . )
43012034	Then the crowd responded , “ We have heard from the law that the Christ will remain forever . How can you say , ‘ The Son of Man must be lifted up ’ ? Who is this Son of Man ? ”
43012035	Jesus replied , “ The light is with you for a little while longer . Walk while you have the light , so that the darkness may not overtake you . The one who walks in the darkness does not know where he is going .
43012036	While you have the light , believe in the light , so that you may become sons of light . ” When Jesus had said these things , he went away and hid himself from them .
43012037	Although Jesus had performed so many miraculous signs before them , they still refused to believe in him ,
43012038	so that the word of Isaiah the prophet would be fulfilled . He said , “ Lord , who has believed our message , and to whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed ? ”
43012039	For this reason they could not believe , because again Isaiah said ,
43012040	“ He has blinded their eyes and hardened their heart , so that they would not see with their eyes and understand with their heart , and turn to me , and I would heal them . ”
43012041	Isaiah said these things because he saw Christ’s glory , and spoke about him .
43012042	Nevertheless , even among the rulers many believed in him , but because of the Pharisees they would not confess Jesus to be the Christ , so that they would not be put out of the synagogue .
43012043	For they loved praise from men more than praise from God .
43012044	But Jesus shouted out , “ The one who believes in me does not believe in me , but in the one who sent me ,
43012045	and the one who sees me sees the one who sent me .
43012046	I have come as a light into the world , so that everyone who believes in me should not remain in darkness .
43012047	If anyone hears my words and does not obey them , I do not judge him . For I have not come to judge the world , but to save the world .
43012048	The one who rejects me and does not accept my words has a judge ; the word I have spoken will judge him at the last day .
43012049	For I have not spoken from my own authority , but the Father himself who sent me has commanded me what I should say and what I should speak .
43012050	And I know that his commandment is eternal life . Thus the things I say , I say just as the Father has told me . ”
43013001	Just before the Passover feast , Jesus knew that his time had come to depart from this world to the Father . Having loved his own who were in the world , he now loved them to the very end .
43013002	The evening meal was in progress , and the devil had already put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon’s son , that he should betray Jesus .
43013003	Because Jesus knew that the Father had handed all things over to him , and that he had come from God and was going back to God ,
43013004	he got up from the meal , removed his outer clothes , took a towel and tied it around himself .
43013005	He poured water into the washbasin and began to wash the disciples’ feet and to dry them with the towel he had wrapped around himself .
43013006	Then he came to Simon Peter . Peter said to him , “ Lord , are you going to wash my feet ? ”
43013007	Jesus replied , “ You do not understand what I am doing now , but you will understand after these things . ”
43013008	Peter said to him , “ You will never wash my feet ! ” Jesus replied , “ If I do not wash you , you have no share with me . ”
43013009	Simon Peter said to him , “ Lord , wash not only my feet , but also my hands and my head ! ”
43013010	Jesus replied , “ The one who has bathed needs only to wash his feet , but is completely clean . And you disciples are clean , but not every one of you . ”
43013011	( For Jesus knew the one who was going to betray him . For this reason he said , “ Not every one of you is clean . ” )
43013012	So when Jesus had washed their feet and put his outer clothing back on , he took his place at the table again and said to them , “ Do you understand what I have done for you ?
43013013	You call me ‘ Teacher ’ and ‘ Lord , ’ and do so correctly , for that is what I am .
43013014	If I then , your Lord and Teacher , have washed your feet , you too ought to wash one another’s feet .
43013015	For I have given you an example – you should do just as I have done for you .
43013016	I tell you the solemn truth , the slave is not greater than his master , nor is the one who is sent as a messenger greater than the one who sent him .
43013017	If you understand these things , you will be blessed if you do them .
43013018	“ What I am saying does not refer to all of you . I know the ones I have chosen . But this is to fulfill the scripture , ‘ The one who eats my bread has turned against me . ’
43013019	I am telling you this now , before it happens , so that when it happens you may believe that I am he .
43013020	I tell you the solemn truth , whoever accepts the one I send accepts me , and whoever accepts me accepts the one who sent me . ”
43013021	When he had said these things , Jesus was greatly distressed in spirit , and testified , “ I tell you the solemn truth , one of you will betray me . ”
43013022	The disciples began to look at one another , worried and perplexed to know which of them he was talking about .
43013023	One of his disciples , the one Jesus loved , was at the table to the right of Jesus in a place of honor .
43013024	So Simon Peter gestured to this disciple to ask Jesus who it was he was referring to .
43013025	Then the disciple whom Jesus loved leaned back against Jesus’ chest and asked him , “ Lord , who is it ? ”
43013026	Jesus replied , “ It is the one to whom I will give this piece of bread after I have dipped it in the dish . ” Then he dipped the piece of bread in the dish and gave it to Judas Iscariot , Simon’s son .
43013027	And after Judas took the piece of bread , Satan entered into him . Jesus said to him , “ What you are about to do , do quickly . ”
43013028	( Now none of those present at the table understood why Jesus said this to Judas .
43013029	Some thought that , because Judas had the money box , Jesus was telling him to buy whatever they needed for the feast , or to give something to the poor . )
43013030	Judas took the piece of bread and went out immediately . ( Now it was night . )
43013031	When Judas had gone out , Jesus said , “ Now the Son of Man is glorified , and God is glorified in him .
43013032	If God is glorified in him , God will also glorify him in himself , and he will glorify him right away .
43013033	Children , I am still with you for a little while . You will look for me , and just as I said to the Jewish religious leaders , ‘ Where I am going you cannot come , ’ now I tell you the same .
43013034	“ I give you a new commandment – to love one another . Just as I have loved you , you also are to love one another .
43013035	Everyone will know by this that you are my disciples – if you have love for one another . ”
43013036	Simon Peter said to him , “ Lord , where are you going ? ” Jesus replied , “ Where I am going , you cannot follow me now , but you will follow later . ”
43013037	Peter said to him , “ Lord , why can’t I follow you now ? I will lay down my life for you ! ”
43013038	Jesus answered , “ Will you lay down your life for me ? I tell you the solemn truth , the rooster will not crow until you have denied me three times !
43014001	“ Do not let your hearts be distressed . You believe in God ; believe also in me .
43014002	There are many dwelling places in my Father’s house . Otherwise , I would have told you , because I am going away to make ready a place for you .
43014003	And if I go and make ready a place for you , I will come again and take you to be with me , so that where I am you may be too .
43014004	And you know the way where I am going . ”
43014005	Thomas said , “ Lord , we don’t know where you are going . How can we know the way ? ”
43014006	Jesus replied , “ I am the way , and the truth , and the life . No one comes to the Father except through me .
43014007	If you have known me , you will know my Father too . And from now on you do know him and have seen him . ”
43014008	Philip said , “ Lord , show us the Father , and we will be content . ”
43014009	Jesus replied , “ Have I been with you for so long , and you have not known me , Philip ? The person who has seen me has seen the Father ! How can you say , ‘ Show us the Father ’ ?
43014010	Do you not believe that I am in the Father , and the Father is in me ? The words that I say to you , I do not speak on my own initiative , but the Father residing in me performs his miraculous deeds .
43014011	Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father is in me , but if you do not believe me , believe because of the miraculous deeds themselves .
43014012	I tell you the solemn truth , the person who believes in me will perform the miraculous deeds that I am doing , and will perform greater deeds than these , because I am going to the Father .
43014013	And I will do whatever you ask in my name , so that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
43014014	If you ask me anything in my name , I will do it .
43014015	“ If you love me , you will obey my commandments .
43014016	Then I will ask the Father , and he will give you another Advocate to be with you forever –
43014017	the Spirit of truth , whom the world cannot accept , because it does not see him or know him . But you know him , because he resides with you and will be in you .
43014018	“ I will not abandon you as orphans , I will come to you .
43014019	In a little while the world will not see me any longer , but you will see me ; because I live , you will live too .
43014020	You will know at that time that I am in my Father and you are in me and I am in you .
43014021	The person who has my commandments and obeys them is the one who loves me . The one who loves me will be loved by my Father , and I will love him and will reveal myself to him . ”
43014022	“ Lord , ” Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) said , “ what has happened that you are going to reveal yourself to us and not to the world ? ”
43014023	Jesus replied , “ If anyone loves me , he will obey my word , and my Father will love him , and we will come to him and take up residence with him .
43014024	The person who does not love me does not obey my words . And the word you hear is not mine , but the Father’s who sent me .
43014025	“ I have spoken these things while staying with you .
43014026	But the Advocate , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will teach you everything , and will cause you to remember everything I said to you .
43014027	“ Peace I leave with you ; my peace I give to you ; I do not give it to you as the world does . Do not let your hearts be distressed or lacking in courage .
43014028	You heard me say to you , ‘ I am going away and I am coming back to you . ’ If you loved me , you would be glad that I am going to the Father , because the Father is greater than I am .
43014029	I have told you now before it happens , so that when it happens you may believe .
43014030	I will not speak with you much longer , for the ruler of this world is coming . He has no power over me ,
43014031	but I am doing just what the Father commanded me , so that the world may know that I love the Father . Get up , let us go from here . ”
43015001	“ I am the true vine and my Father is the gardener .
43015002	He takes away every branch that does not bear fruit in me . He prunes every branch that bears fruit so that it will bear more fruit .
43015003	You are clean already because of the word that I have spoken to you .
43015004	Remain in me , and I will remain in you . Just as the branch cannot bear fruit by itself , unless it remains in the vine , so neither can you unless you remain in me .
43015005	“ I am the vine ; you are the branches . The one who remains in me – and I in him – bears much fruit , because apart from me you can accomplish nothing .
43015006	If anyone does not remain in me , he is thrown out like a branch , and dries up ; and such branches are gathered up and thrown into the fire , and are burned up .
43015007	If you remain in me and my words remain in you , ask whatever you want , and it will be done for you .
43015008	My Father is honored by this , that you bear much fruit and show that you are my disciples .
43015009	“ Just as the Father has loved me , I have also loved you ; remain in my love .
43015010	If you obey my commandments , you will remain in my love , just as I have obeyed my Father’s commandments and remain in his love .
43015011	I have told you these things so that my joy may be in you , and your joy may be complete .
43015012	My commandment is this – to love one another just as I have loved you .
43015013	No one has greater love than this – that one lays down his life for his friends .
43015014	You are my friends if you do what I command you .
43015015	I no longer call you slaves , because the slave does not understand what his master is doing . But I have called you friends , because I have revealed to you everything I heard from my Father .
43015016	You did not choose me , but I chose you and appointed you to go and bear fruit , fruit that remains , so that whatever you ask the Father in my name he will give you .
43015017	This I command you – to love one another .
43015018	“ If the world hates you , be aware that it hated me first .
43015019	If you belonged to the world , the world would love you as its own . However , because you do not belong to the world , but I chose you out of the world , for this reason the world hates you .
43015020	Remember what I told you , ‘ A slave is not greater than his master . ’ If they persecuted me , they will also persecute you . If they obeyed my word , they will obey yours too .
43015021	But they will do all these things to you on account of my name , because they do not know the one who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and spoken to them , they would not be guilty of sin . But they no longer have any excuse for their sin .
43015023	The one who hates me hates my Father too .
43015024	If I had not performed among them the miraculous deeds that no one else did , they would not be guilty of sin . But now they have seen the deeds and have hated both me and my Father .
43015025	Now this happened to fulfill the word that is written in their law , ‘ They hated me without reason . ’
43015026	When the Advocate comes , whom I will send you from the Father – the Spirit of truth who goes out from the Father – he will testify about me ,
43015027	and you also will testify , because you have been with me from the beginning .
43016001	“ I have told you all these things so that you will not fall away .
43016002	They will put you out of the synagogue , yet a time is coming when the one who kills you will think he is offering service to God .
43016003	They will do these things because they have not known the Father or me .
43016004	But I have told you these things so that when their time comes , you will remember that I told you about them . “ I did not tell you these things from the beginning because I was with you .
43016005	But now I am going to the one who sent me , and not one of you is asking me , ‘ Where are you going ? ’
43016006	Instead your hearts are filled with sadness because I have said these things to you .
43016007	But I tell you the truth , it is to your advantage that I am going away . For if I do not go away , the Advocate will not come to you , but if I go , I will send him to you .
43016008	And when he comes , he will prove the world wrong concerning sin and righteousness and judgment –
43016009	concerning sin , because they do not believe in me ;
43016010	concerning righteousness , because I am going to the Father and you will see me no longer ;
43016011	and concerning judgment , because the ruler of this world has been condemned .
43016012	“ I have many more things to say to you , but you cannot bear them now .
43016013	But when he , the Spirit of truth , comes , he will guide you into all truth . For he will not speak on his own authority , but will speak whatever he hears , and will tell you what is to come .
43016014	He will glorify me , because he will receive from me what is mine and will tell it to you .
43016015	Everything that the Father has is mine ; that is why I said the Spirit will receive from me what is mine and will tell it to you .
43016016	In a little while you will see me no longer ; again after a little while , you will see me . ”
43016017	Then some of his disciples said to one another , “ What is the meaning of what he is saying , ‘ In a little while you will not see me ; again after a little while , you will see me , ’ and , ‘ because I am going to the Father ’ ? ”
43016018	So they kept on repeating , “ What is the meaning of what he says , ‘ In a little while ’ ? We do not understand what he is talking about . ”
43016019	Jesus could see that they wanted to ask him about these things , so he said to them , “ Are you asking each other about this – that I said , ‘ In a little while you will not see me ; again after a little while , you will see me ’ ?
43016020	I tell you the solemn truth , you will weep and wail , but the world will rejoice ; you will be sad , but your sadness will turn into joy .
43016021	When a woman gives birth , she has distress because her time has come , but when her child is born , she no longer remembers the suffering because of her joy that a human being has been born into the world .
43016022	So also you have sorrow now , but I will see you again , and your hearts will rejoice , and no one will take your joy away from you .
43016023	At that time you will ask me nothing . I tell you the solemn truth , whatever you ask the Father in my name he will give you .
43016024	Until now you have not asked for anything in my name . Ask and you will receive it , so that your joy may be complete .
43016025	“ I have told you these things in obscure figures of speech ; a time is coming when I will no longer speak to you in obscure figures , but will tell you plainly about the Father .
43016026	At that time you will ask in my name , and I do not say that I will ask the Father on your behalf .
43016027	For the Father himself loves you , because you have loved me and have believed that I came from God .
43016028	I came from the Father and entered into the world , but in turn , I am leaving the world and going back to the Father . ”
43016029	His disciples said , “ Look , now you are speaking plainly and not in obscure figures of speech !
43016030	Now we know that you know everything and do not need anyone to ask you anything . Because of this we believe that you have come from God . ”
43016031	Jesus replied , “ Do you now believe ?
43016032	Look , a time is coming – and has come – when you will be scattered , each one to his own home , and I will be left alone . Yet I am not alone , because my Father is with me .
43016033	I have told you these things so that in me you may have peace . In the world you have trouble and suffering , but take courage – I have conquered the world . ”
43017001	When Jesus had finished saying these things , he looked upward to heaven and said , “ Father , the time has come . Glorify your Son , so that your Son may glorify you –
43017002	just as you have given him authority over all humanity , so that he may give eternal life to everyone you have given him .
43017003	Now this is eternal life – that they know you , the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom you sent .
43017004	I glorified you on earth by completing the work you gave me to do .
43017005	And now , Father , glorify me at your side with the glory I had with you before the world was created .
43017006	“ I have revealed your name to the men you gave me out of the world . They belonged to you , and you gave them to me , and they have obeyed your word .
43017007	Now they understand that everything you have given me comes from you ,
43017008	because I have given them the words you have given me . They accepted them and really understand that I came from you , and they believed that you sent me .
43017009	I am praying on behalf of them . I am not praying on behalf of the world , but on behalf of those you have given me , because they belong to you .
43017010	Everything I have belongs to you , and everything you have belongs to me , and I have been glorified by them .
43017011	I am no longer in the world , but they are in the world , and I am coming to you . Holy Father , keep them safe in your name that you have given me , so that they may be one just as we are one .
43017012	When I was with them I kept them safe and watched over them in your name that you have given me . Not one of them was lost except the one destined for destruction , so that the scripture could be fulfilled .
43017013	But now I am coming to you , and I am saying these things in the world , so they may experience my joy completed in themselves .
43017014	I have given them your word , and the world has hated them , because they do not belong to the world , just as I do not belong to the world .
43017015	I am not asking you to take them out of the world , but that you keep them safe from the evil one .
43017016	They do not belong to the world just as I do not belong to the world .
43017017	Set them apart in the truth ; your word is truth .
43017018	Just as you sent me into the world , so I sent them into the world .
43017019	And I set myself apart on their behalf , so that they too may be truly set apart .
43017020	“ I am not praying only on their behalf , but also on behalf of those who believe in me through their testimony ,
43017021	that they will all be one , just as you , Father , are in me and I am in you . I pray that they will be in us , so that the world will believe that you sent me .
43017022	The glory you gave to me I have given to them , that they may be one just as we are one –
43017023	I in them and you in me – that they may be completely one , so that the world will know that you sent me , and you have loved them just as you have loved me .
43017024	“ Father , I want those you have given me to be with me where I am , so that they can see my glory that you gave me because you loved me before the creation of the world .
43017025	Righteous Father , even if the world does not know you , I know you , and these men know that you sent me .
43017026	I made known your name to them , and I will continue to make it known , so that the love you have loved me with may be in them , and I may be in them . ”
43018001	When he had said these things , Jesus went out with his disciples across the Kidron Valley . There was an orchard there , and he and his disciples went into it .
43018002	( Now Judas , the one who betrayed him , knew the place too , because Jesus had met there many times with his disciples . )
43018003	So Judas obtained a squad of soldiers and some officers of the chief priests and Pharisees . They came to the orchard with lanterns and torches and weapons .
43018004	Then Jesus , because he knew everything that was going to happen to him , came and asked them , “ Who are you looking for ? ”
43018005	They replied , “ Jesus the Nazarene . ” He told them , “ I am he . ” ( Now Judas , the one who betrayed him , was standing there with them . )
43018006	So when Jesus said to them , “ I am he , ” they retreated and fell to the ground .
43018007	Then Jesus asked them again , “ Who are you looking for ? ” And they said , “ Jesus the Nazarene . ”
43018008	Jesus replied , “ I told you that I am he . If you are looking for me , let these men go . ”
43018009	He said this to fulfill the word he had spoken , “ I have not lost a single one of those whom you gave me . ”
43018010	Then Simon Peter , who had a sword , pulled it out and struck the high priest’s slave , cutting off his right ear . ( Now the slave’s name was Malchus . )
43018011	But Jesus said to Peter , “ Put your sword back into its sheath ! Am I not to drink the cup that the Father has given me ? ”
43018012	Then the squad of soldiers with their commanding officer and the officers of the Jewish leaders arrested Jesus and tied him up .
43018013	They brought him first to Annas , for he was the father-in-law of Caiaphas , who was high priest that year .
43018014	( Now it was Caiaphas who had advised the Jewish leaders that it was to their advantage that one man die for the people . )
43018015	Simon Peter and another disciple followed them as they brought Jesus to Annas . ( Now the other disciple was acquainted with the high priest , and he went with Jesus into the high priest’s courtyard . )
43018016	But Simon Peter was left standing outside by the door . So the other disciple who was acquainted with the high priest came out and spoke to the slave girl who watched the door , and brought Peter inside .
43018017	The girl who was the doorkeeper said to Peter , “ You’re not one of this man’s disciples too , are you ? ” He replied , “ I am not . ”
43018018	( Now the slaves and the guards were standing around a charcoal fire they had made , warming themselves because it was cold . Peter also was standing with them , warming himself . )
43018019	While this was happening , the high priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and about his teaching .
43018020	Jesus replied , “ I have spoken publicly to the world . I always taught in the synagogues and in the temple courts , where all the Jewish people assemble together . I have said nothing in secret .
43018021	Why do you ask me ? Ask those who heard what I said . They know what I said . ”
43018022	When Jesus had said this , one of the high priest’s officers who stood nearby struck him on the face and said , “ Is that the way you answer the high priest ? ”
43018023	Jesus replied , “ If I have said something wrong , confirm what is wrong . But if I spoke correctly , why strike me ? ”
43018024	Then Annas sent him , still tied up , to Caiaphas the high priest .
43018025	Meanwhile Simon Peter was standing in the courtyard warming himself . They said to him , “ You aren’t one of his disciples too , are you ? ” Peter denied it : “ I am not ! ”
43018026	One of the high priest’s slaves , a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off , said , “ Did I not see you in the orchard with him ? ”
43018027	Then Peter denied it again , and immediately a rooster crowed .
43018028	Then they brought Jesus from Caiaphas to the Roman governor’s residence . ( Now it was very early morning . ) They did not go into the governor’s residence so they would not be ceremonially defiled , but could eat the Passover meal .
43018029	So Pilate came outside to them and said , “ What accusation do you bring against this man ? ”
43018030	They replied , “ If this man were not a criminal , we would not have handed him over to you . ”
43018031	Pilate told them , “ Take him yourselves and pass judgment on him according to your own law ! ” The Jewish leaders replied , “ We cannot legally put anyone to death . ”
43018032	( This happened to fulfill the word Jesus had spoken when he indicated what kind of death he was going to die . )
43018033	So Pilate went back into the governor’s residence , summoned Jesus , and asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018034	Jesus replied , “ Are you saying this on your own initiative , or have others told you about me ? ”
43018035	Pilate answered , “ I am not a Jew , am I ? Your own people and your chief priests handed you over to me . What have you done ? ”
43018036	Jesus replied , “ My kingdom is not from this world . If my kingdom were from this world , my servants would be fighting to keep me from being handed over to the Jewish authorities . But as it is , my kingdom is not from here . ”
43018037	Then Pilate said , “ So you are a king ! ” Jesus replied , “ You say that I am a king . For this reason I was born , and for this reason I came into the world – to testify to the truth . Everyone who belongs to the truth listens to my voice . ”
43018038	Pilate asked , “ What is truth ? ” When he had said this he went back outside to the Jewish leaders and announced , “ I find no basis for an accusation against him .
43018039	But it is your custom that I release one prisoner for you at the Passover . So do you want me to release for you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018040	Then they shouted back , “ Not this man , but Barabbas ! ” ( Now Barabbas was a revolutionary . )
43019001	Then Pilate took Jesus and had him flogged severely .
43019002	The soldiers braided a crown of thorns and put it on his head , and they clothed him in a purple robe .
43019003	They came up to him again and again and said , “ Hail , king of the Jews ! ” And they struck him repeatedly in the face .
43019004	Again Pilate went out and said to the Jewish leaders , “ Look , I am bringing him out to you , so that you may know that I find no reason for an accusation against him . ”
43019005	So Jesus came outside , wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . Pilate said to them , “ Look , here is the man ! ”
43019006	When the chief priests and their officers saw him , they shouted out , “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate said , “ You take him and crucify him ! Certainly I find no reason for an accusation against him ! ”
43019007	The Jewish leaders replied , “ We have a law , and according to our law he ought to die , because he claimed to be the Son of God ! ”
43019008	When Pilate heard what they said , he was more afraid than ever ,
43019009	and he went back into the governor’s residence and said to Jesus , “ Where do you come from ? ” But Jesus gave him no answer .
43019010	So Pilate said , “ Do you refuse to speak to me ? Don’t you know I have the authority to release you , and to crucify you ? ”
43019011	Jesus replied , “ You would have no authority over me at all , unless it was given to you from above . Therefore the one who handed me over to you is guilty of greater sin . ”
43019012	From this point on , Pilate tried to release him . But the Jewish leaders shouted out , “ If you release this man , you are no friend of Caesar ! Everyone who claims to be a king opposes Caesar ! ”
43019013	When Pilate heard these words he brought Jesus outside and sat down on the judgment seat in the place called “ The Stone Pavement ” ( Gabbatha in Aramaic ) .
43019014	( Now it was the day of preparation for the Passover , about noon . ) Pilate said to the Jewish leaders , “ Look , here is your king ! ”
43019015	Then they shouted out , “ Away with him ! Away with him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate asked , “ Shall I crucify your king ? ” The high priests replied , “ We have no king except Caesar ! ”
43019016	Then Pilate handed him over to them to be crucified . So they took Jesus ,
43019017	and carrying his own cross he went out to the place called “ The Place of the Skull ” ( called in Aramaic Golgotha ) .
43019018	There they crucified him along with two others , one on each side , with Jesus in the middle .
43019019	Pilate also had a notice written and fastened to the cross , which read : “ Jesus the Nazarene , the king of the Jews . ”
43019020	Thus many of the Jewish residents of Jerusalem read this notice , because the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city , and the notice was written in Aramaic , Latin , and Greek .
43019021	Then the chief priests of the Jews said to Pilate , “ Do not write , ‘ The king of the Jews , ’ but rather , ‘ This man said , I am king of the Jews . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate answered , “ What I have written , I have written . ”
43019023	Now when the soldiers crucified Jesus , they took his clothes and made four shares , one for each soldier , and the tunic remained . ( Now the tunic was seamless , woven from top to bottom as a single piece . )
43019024	So the soldiers said to one another , “ Let’s not tear it , but throw dice to see who will get it . ” This took place to fulfill the scripture that says , “ They divided my garments among them , and for my clothing they threw dice . ” So the soldiers did these things .
43019025	Now standing beside Jesus’ cross were his mother , his mother’s sister , Mary the wife of Clopas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	So when Jesus saw his mother and the disciple whom he loved standing there , he said to his mother , “ Woman , look , here is your son ! ”
43019027	He then said to his disciple , “ Look , here is your mother ! ” From that very time the disciple took her into his own home .
43019028	After this Jesus , realizing that by this time everything was completed , said ( in order to fulfill the scripture ) , “ I am thirsty ! ”
43019029	A jar full of sour wine was there , so they put a sponge soaked in sour wine on a branch of hyssop and lifted it to his mouth .
43019030	When he had received the sour wine , Jesus said , “ It is completed ! ” Then he bowed his head and gave up his spirit .
43019031	Then , because it was the day of preparation , so that the bodies should not stay on the crosses on the Sabbath ( for that Sabbath was an especially important one ) , the Jewish leaders asked Pilate to have the victims’ legs broken and the bodies taken down .
43019032	So the soldiers came and broke the legs of the two men who had been crucified with Jesus , first the one and then the other .
43019033	But when they came to Jesus and saw that he was already dead , they did not break his legs .
43019034	But one of the soldiers pierced his side with a spear , and blood and water flowed out immediately .
43019035	And the person who saw it has testified ( and his testimony is true , and he knows that he is telling the truth ) , so that you also may believe .
43019036	For these things happened so that the scripture would be fulfilled , “ Not a bone of his will be broken . ”
43019037	And again another scripture says , “ They will look on the one whom they have pierced . ”
43019038	After this , Joseph of Arimathea , a disciple of Jesus ( but secretly , because he feared the Jewish leaders ) , asked Pilate if he could remove the body of Jesus . Pilate gave him permission , so he went and took the body away .
43019039	Nicodemus , the man who had previously come to Jesus at night , accompanied Joseph , carrying a mixture of myrrh and aloes weighing about seventy-five pounds .
43019040	Then they took Jesus’ body and wrapped it , with the aromatic spices , in strips of linen cloth according to Jewish burial customs .
43019041	Now at the place where Jesus was crucified there was a garden , and in the garden was a new tomb where no one had yet been buried .
43019042	And so , because it was the Jewish day of preparation and the tomb was nearby , they placed Jesus’ body there .
43020001	Now very early on the first day of the week , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene came to the tomb and saw that the stone had been moved away from the entrance .
43020002	So she went running to Simon Peter and the other disciple whom Jesus loved and told them , “ They have taken the Lord from the tomb , and we don’t know where they have put him ! ”
43020003	Then Peter and the other disciple set out to go to the tomb .
43020004	The two were running together , but the other disciple ran faster than Peter and reached the tomb first .
43020005	He bent down and saw the strips of linen cloth lying there , but he did not go in .
43020006	Then Simon Peter , who had been following him , arrived and went right into the tomb . He saw the strips of linen cloth lying there ,
43020007	and the face cloth , which had been around Jesus’ head , not lying with the strips of linen cloth but rolled up in a place by itself .
43020008	Then the other disciple , who had reached the tomb first , came in , and he saw and believed .
43020009	( For they did not yet understand the scripture that Jesus must rise from the dead . )
43020010	So the disciples went back to their homes .
43020011	But Mary stood outside the tomb weeping . As she wept , she bent down and looked into the tomb .
43020012	And she saw two angels in white sitting where Jesus’ body had been lying , one at the head and one at the feet .
43020013	They said to her , “ Woman , why are you weeping ? ” Mary replied , “ They have taken my Lord away , and I do not know where they have put him ! ”
43020014	When she had said this , she turned around and saw Jesus standing there , but she did not know that it was Jesus .
43020015	Jesus said to her , “ Woman , why are you weeping ? Who are you looking for ? ” Because she thought he was the gardener , she said to him , “ Sir , if you have carried him away , tell me where you have put him , and I will take him . ”
43020016	Jesus said to her , “ Mary . ” She turned and said to him in Aramaic , “ Rabboni ” ( which means Teacher ) .
43020017	Jesus replied , “ Do not touch me , for I have not yet ascended to my Father . Go to my brothers and tell them , ‘ I am ascending to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God . ’ ”
43020018	Mary Magdalene came and informed the disciples , “ I have seen the Lord ! ” And she told them what Jesus had said to her .
43020019	On the evening of that day , the first day of the week , the disciples had gathered together and locked the doors of the place because they were afraid of the Jewish leaders . Jesus came and stood among them and said to them , “ Peace be with you . ”
43020020	When he had said this , he showed them his hands and his side . Then the disciples rejoiced when they saw the Lord .
43020021	So Jesus said to them again , “ Peace be with you . Just as the Father has sent me , I also send you . ”
43020022	And after he said this , he breathed on them and said , “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive anyone’s sins , they are forgiven ; if you retain anyone’s sins , they are retained . ”
43020024	Now Thomas ( called Didymus ) , one of the twelve , was not with them when Jesus came .
43020025	The other disciples told him , “ We have seen the Lord ! ” But he replied , “ Unless I see the wounds from the nails in his hands , and put my finger into the wounds from the nails , and put my hand into his side , I will never believe it ! ”
43020026	Eight days later the disciples were again together in the house , and Thomas was with them . Although the doors were locked , Jesus came and stood among them and said , “ Peace be with you ! ”
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here , and examine my hands . Extend your hand and put it into my side . Do not continue in your unbelief , but believe . ”
43020028	Thomas replied to him , “ My Lord and my God ! ”
43020029	Jesus said to him , “ Have you believed because you have seen me ? Blessed are the people who have not seen and yet have believed . ”
43020030	Now Jesus performed many other miraculous signs in the presence of the disciples , which are not recorded in this book .
43020031	But these are recorded so that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God , and that by believing you may have life in his name .
43021001	After this Jesus revealed himself again to the disciples by the Sea of Tiberias . Now this is how he did so .
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( called Didymus ) , Nathanael ( who was from Cana in Galilee ) , the sons of Zebedee , and two other disciples of his were together .
43021003	Simon Peter told them , “ I am going fishing . ” “ We will go with you , ” they replied . They went out and got into the boat , but that night they caught nothing .
43021004	When it was already very early morning , Jesus stood on the beach , but the disciples did not know that it was Jesus .
43021005	So Jesus said to them , “ Children , you don’t have any fish , do you ? ” They replied , “ No . ”
43021006	He told them , “ Throw your net on the right side of the boat , and you will find some . ” So they threw the net , and were not able to pull it in because of the large number of fish .
43021007	Then the disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter , “ It is the Lord ! ” So Simon Peter , when he heard that it was the Lord , tucked in his outer garment ( for he had nothing on underneath it ) , and plunged into the sea .
43021008	Meanwhile the other disciples came with the boat , dragging the net full of fish , for they were not far from land , only about a hundred yards .
43021009	When they got out on the beach , they saw a charcoal fire ready with a fish placed on it , and bread .
43021010	Jesus said , “ Bring some of the fish you have just now caught . ”
43021011	So Simon Peter went aboard and pulled the net to shore . It was full of large fish , one hundred fifty-three , but although there were so many , the net was not torn .
43021012	“ Come , have breakfast , ” Jesus said . But none of the disciples dared to ask him , “ Who are you ? ” because they knew it was the Lord .
43021013	Jesus came and took the bread and gave it to them , and did the same with the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time Jesus was revealed to the disciples after he was raised from the dead .
43021015	Then when they had finished breakfast , Jesus said to Simon Peter , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me more than these do ? ” He replied , “ Yes , Lord , you know I love you . ” Jesus told him , “ Feed my lambs . ”
43021016	Jesus said a second time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” He replied , “ Yes , Lord , you know I love you . ” Jesus told him , “ Shepherd my sheep . ”
43021017	Jesus said a third time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter was distressed that Jesus asked him a third time , “ Do you love me ? ” and said , “ Lord , you know everything . You know that I love you . ” Jesus replied , “ Feed my sheep .
43021018	I tell you the solemn truth , when you were young , you tied your clothes around you and went wherever you wanted , but when you are old , you will stretch out your hands , and others will tie you up and bring you where you do not want to go . ”
43021019	( Now Jesus said this to indicate clearly by what kind of death Peter was going to glorify God . ) After he said this , Jesus told Peter , “ Follow me . ”
43021020	Peter turned around and saw the disciple whom Jesus loved following them . ( This was the disciple who had leaned back against Jesus’ chest at the meal and asked , “ Lord , who is the one who is going to betray you ? ” )
43021021	So when Peter saw him , he asked Jesus , “ Lord , what about him ? ”
43021022	Jesus replied , “ If I want him to live until I come back , what concern is that of yours ? You follow me ! ”
43021023	So the saying circulated among the brothers and sisters that this disciple was not going to die . But Jesus did not say to him that he was not going to die , but rather , “ If I want him to live until I come back , what concern is that of yours ? ”
43021024	This is the disciple who testifies about these things and has written these things , and we know that his testimony is true .
43021025	There are many other things that Jesus did . If every one of them were written down , I suppose the whole world would not have room for the books that would be written .
44001001	I wrote the former account , Theophilus , about all that Jesus began to do and teach
44001002	until the day he was taken up to heaven , after he had given orders by the Holy Spirit to the apostles he had chosen .
44001003	To the same apostles also , after his suffering , he presented himself alive with many convincing proofs . He was seen by them over a forty-day period and spoke about matters concerning the kingdom of God .
44001004	While he was with them , he declared , “ Do not leave Jerusalem , but wait there for what my Father promised , which you heard about from me .
44001005	For John baptized with water , but you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit not many days from now . ”
44001006	So when they had gathered together , they began to ask him , “ Lord , is this the time when you are restoring the kingdom to Israel ? ”
44001007	He told them , “ You are not permitted to know the times or periods that the Father has set by his own authority .
44001008	But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you , and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem , and in all Judea and Samaria , and to the farthest parts of the earth . ”
44001009	After he had said this , while they were watching , he was lifted up and a cloud hid him from their sight .
44001010	As they were still staring into the sky while he was going , suddenly two men in white clothing stood near them
44001011	and said , “ Men of Galilee , why do you stand here looking up into the sky ? This same Jesus who has been taken up from you into heaven will come back in the same way you saw him go into heaven . ”
44001012	Then they returned to Jerusalem from the mountain called the Mount of Olives ( which is near Jerusalem , a Sabbath day’s journey away ) .
44001013	When they had entered Jerusalem , they went to the upstairs room where they were staying . Peter and John , and James , and Andrew , Philip and Thomas , Bartholomew and Matthew , James son of Alphaeus and Simon the Zealot , and Judas son of James were there .
44001014	All these continued together in prayer with one mind , together with the women , along with Mary the mother of Jesus , and his brothers .
44001015	In those days Peter stood up among the believers ( a gathering of about one hundred and twenty people ) and said ,
44001016	“ Brothers , the scripture had to be fulfilled that the Holy Spirit foretold through David concerning Judas – who became the guide for those who arrested Jesus –
44001017	for he was counted as one of us and received a share in this ministry . ”
44001018	( Now this man Judas acquired a field with the reward of his unjust deed , and falling headfirst he burst open in the middle and all his intestines gushed out .
44001019	This became known to all who lived in Jerusalem , so that in their own language they called that field Hakeldama , that is , “ Field of Blood . ” )
44001020	“ For it is written in the book of Psalms , ‘ Let his house become deserted , and let there be no one to live in it , ’ and ‘ Let another take his position of responsibility . ’
44001021	Thus one of the men who have accompanied us during all the time the Lord Jesus associated with us ,
44001022	beginning from his baptism by John until the day he was taken up from us – one of these must become a witness of his resurrection together with us . ”
44001023	So they proposed two candidates : Joseph called Barsabbas ( also called Justus ) and Matthias .
44001024	Then they prayed , “ Lord , you know the hearts of all . Show us which one of these two you have chosen
44001025	to assume the task of this service and apostleship from which Judas turned aside to go to his own place . ”
44001026	Then they cast lots for them , and the one chosen was Matthias ; so he was counted with the eleven apostles .
44002001	Now when the day of Pentecost had come , they were all together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly a sound like a violent wind blowing came from heaven and filled the entire house where they were sitting .
44002003	And tongues spreading out like a fire appeared to them and came to rest on each one of them .
44002004	All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit , and they began to speak in other languages as the Spirit enabled them .
44002005	Now there were devout Jews from every nation under heaven residing in Jerusalem .
44002006	When this sound occurred , a crowd gathered and was in confusion , because each one heard them speaking in his own language .
44002007	Completely baffled , they said , “ Aren’t all these who are speaking Galileans ?
44002008	And how is it that each one of us hears them in our own native language ?
44002009	Parthians , Medes , Elamites , and residents of Mesopotamia , Judea and Cappadocia , Pontus and the province of Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia and Pamphylia , Egypt and the parts of Libya near Cyrene , and visitors from Rome ,
44002011	both Jews and proselytes , Cretans and Arabs – we hear them speaking in our own languages about the great deeds God has done ! ”
44002012	All were astounded and greatly confused , saying to one another , “ What does this mean ? ”
44002013	But others jeered at the speakers , saying , “ They are drunk on new wine ! ”
44002014	But Peter stood up with the eleven , raised his voice , and addressed them : “ You men of Judea and all you who live in Jerusalem , know this and listen carefully to what I say .
44002015	In spite of what you think , these men are not drunk , for it is only nine o’clock in the morning .
44002016	But this is what was spoken about through the prophet Joel :
44002017	‘ And in the last days it will be , ’ God says , ‘ that I will pour out my Spirit on all people , and your sons and your daughters will prophesy , and your young men will see visions , and your old men will dream dreams .
44002018	Even on my servants , both men and women , I will pour out my Spirit in those days , and they will prophesy .
44002019	And I will perform wonders in the sky above and miraculous signs on the earth below , blood and fire and clouds of smoke .
44002020	The sun will be changed to darkness and the moon to blood before the great and glorious day of the Lord comes .
44002021	And then everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved . ’
44002022	“ Men of Israel , listen to these words : Jesus the Nazarene , a man clearly attested to you by God with powerful deeds , wonders , and miraculous signs that God performed among you through him , just as you yourselves know –
44002023	this man , who was handed over by the predetermined plan and foreknowledge of God , you executed by nailing him to a cross at the hands of Gentiles .
44002024	But God raised him up , having released him from the pains of death , because it was not possible for him to be held in its power .
44002025	For David says about him , ‘ I saw the Lord always in front of me , for he is at my right hand so that I will not be shaken .
44002026	Therefore my heart was glad and my tongue rejoiced ; my body also will live in hope ,
44002027	because you will not leave my soul in Hades , nor permit your Holy One to experience decay .
44002028	You have made known to me the paths of life ; you will make me full of joy with your presence . ’
44002029	“ Brothers , I can speak confidently to you about our forefather David , that he both died and was buried , and his tomb is with us to this day .
44002030	So then , because he was a prophet and knew that God had sworn to him with an oath to seat one of his descendants on his throne ,
44002031	David by foreseeing this spoke about the resurrection of the Christ , that he was neither abandoned to Hades , nor did his body experience decay .
44002032	This Jesus God raised up , and we are all witnesses of it .
44002033	So then , exalted to the right hand of God , and having received the promise of the Holy Spirit from the Father , he has poured out what you both see and hear .
44002034	For David did not ascend into heaven , but he himself says , ‘ The Lord said to my lord , “ Sit at my right hand
44002035	until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet . ” ’
44002036	Therefore let all the house of Israel know beyond a doubt that God has made this Jesus whom you crucified both Lord and Christ . ”
44002037	Now when they heard this , they were acutely distressed and said to Peter and the rest of the apostles , “ What should we do , brothers ? ”
44002038	Peter said to them , “ Repent , and each one of you be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins , and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	For the promise is for you and your children , and for all who are far away , as many as the Lord our God will call to himself . ”
44002040	With many other words he testified and exhorted them saying , “ Save yourselves from this perverse generation ! ”
44002041	So those who accepted his message were baptized , and that day about three thousand people were added .
44002042	They were devoting themselves to the apostles’ teaching and to fellowship , to the breaking of bread and to prayer .
44002043	Reverential awe came over everyone , and many wonders and miraculous signs came about by the apostles .
44002044	All who believed were together and held everything in common ,
44002045	and they began selling their property and possessions and distributing the proceeds to everyone , as anyone had need .
44002046	Every day they continued to gather together by common consent in the temple courts , breaking bread from house to house , sharing their food with glad and humble hearts ,
44002047	praising God and having the good will of all the people . And the Lord was adding to their number every day those who were being saved .
44003001	Now Peter and John were going up to the temple at the time for prayer , at three o’clock in the afternoon .
44003002	And a man lame from birth was being carried up , who was placed at the temple gate called “ the Beautiful Gate ” every day so he could beg for money from those going into the temple courts .
44003003	When he saw Peter and John about to go into the temple courts , he asked them for money .
44003004	Peter looked directly at him ( as did John ) and said , “ Look at us ! ”
44003005	So the lame man paid attention to them , expecting to receive something from them .
44003006	But Peter said , “ I have no silver or gold , but what I do have I give you . In the name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene , stand up and walk ! ”
44003007	Then Peter took hold of him by the right hand and raised him up , and at once the man’s feet and ankles were made strong .
44003008	He jumped up , stood and began walking around , and he entered the temple courts with them , walking and leaping and praising God .
44003009	All the people saw him walking and praising God ,
44003010	and they recognized him as the man who used to sit and ask for donations at the Beautiful Gate of the temple , and they were filled with astonishment and amazement at what had happened to him .
44003011	While the man was hanging on to Peter and John , all the people , completely astounded , ran together to them in the covered walkway called Solomon’s Portico .
44003012	When Peter saw this , he declared to the people , “ Men of Israel , why are you amazed at this ? Why do you stare at us as if we had made this man walk by our own power or piety ?
44003013	The God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob , the God of our forefathers , has glorified his servant Jesus , whom you handed over and rejected in the presence of Pilate after he had decided to release him .
44003014	But you rejected the Holy and Righteous One and asked that a man who was a murderer be released to you .
44003015	You killed the Originator of life , whom God raised from the dead . To this fact we are witnesses !
44003016	And on the basis of faith in Jesus’ name , his very name has made this man – whom you see and know – strong . The faith that is through Jesus has given him this complete health in the presence of you all .
44003017	And now , brothers , I know you acted in ignorance , as your rulers did too .
44003018	But the things God foretold long ago through all the prophets – that his Christ would suffer – he has fulfilled in this way .
44003019	Therefore repent and turn back so that your sins may be wiped out ,
44003020	so that times of refreshing may come from the presence of the Lord , and so that he may send the Messiah appointed for you – that is , Jesus .
44003021	This one heaven must receive until the time all things are restored , which God declared from times long ago through his holy prophets .
44003022	Moses said , ‘ The Lord your God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your brothers . You must obey him in everything he tells you .
44003023	Every person who does not obey that prophet will be destroyed and thus removed from the people . ’
44003024	And all the prophets , from Samuel and those who followed him , have spoken about and announced these days .
44003025	You are the sons of the prophets and of the covenant that God made with your ancestors , saying to Abraham , ‘ And in your descendants all the nations of the earth will be blessed . ’
44003026	God raised up his servant and sent him first to you , to bless you by turning each one of you from your iniquities . ”
44004001	While Peter and John were speaking to the people , the priests and the commander of the temple guard and the Sadducees came up to them ,
44004002	angry because they were teaching the people and announcing in Jesus the resurrection of the dead .
44004003	So they seized them and put them in jail until the next day ( for it was already evening ) .
44004004	But many of those who had listened to the message believed , and the number of the men came to about five thousand .
44004005	On the next day , their rulers , elders , and experts in the law came together in Jerusalem .
44004006	Annas the high priest was there , and Caiaphas , John , Alexander , and others who were members of the high priest’s family .
44004007	After making Peter and John stand in their midst , they began to inquire , “ By what power or by what name did you do this ? ”
44004008	Then Peter , filled with the Holy Spirit , replied , “ Rulers of the people and elders ,
44004009	if we are being examined today for a good deed done to a sick man – by what means this man was healed –
44004010	let it be known to all of you and to all the people of Israel that by the name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene whom you crucified , whom God raised from the dead , this man stands before you healthy .
44004011	This Jesus is the stone that was rejected by you , the builders , that has become the cornerstone .
44004012	And there is salvation in no one else , for there is no other name under heaven given among people by which we must be saved . ”
44004013	When they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and discovered that they were uneducated and ordinary men , they were amazed and recognized these men had been with Jesus .
44004014	And because they saw the man who had been healed standing with them , they had nothing to say against this .
44004015	But when they had ordered them to go outside the council , they began to confer with one another ,
44004016	saying , “ What should we do with these men ? For it is plain to all who live in Jerusalem that a notable miraculous sign has come about through them , and we cannot deny it .
44004017	But to keep this matter from spreading any further among the people , let us warn them to speak no more to anyone in this name . ”
44004018	And they called them in and ordered them not to speak or teach at all in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John replied , “ Whether it is right before God to obey you rather than God , you decide ,
44004020	for it is impossible for us not to speak about what we have seen and heard . ”
44004021	After threatening them further , they released them , for they could not find how to punish them on account of the people , because they were all praising God for what had happened .
44004022	For the man , on whom this miraculous sign of healing had been performed , was over forty years old .
44004023	When they were released , Peter and John went to their fellow believers and reported everything the high priests and the elders had said to them .
44004024	When they heard this , they raised their voices to God with one mind and said , “ Master of all , you who made the heaven , the earth , the sea , and everything that is in them ,
44004025	who said by the Holy Spirit through your servant David our forefather , ‘ Why do the nations rage , and the peoples plot foolish things ?
44004026	The kings of the earth stood together , and the rulers assembled together , against the Lord and against his Christ . ’
44004027	“ For indeed both Herod and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles and the people of Israel , assembled together in this city against your holy servant Jesus , whom you anointed ,
44004028	to do as much as your power and your plan had decided beforehand would happen .
44004029	And now , Lord , pay attention to their threats , and grant to your servants to speak your message with great courage ,
44004030	while you extend your hand to heal , and to bring about miraculous signs and wonders through the name of your holy servant Jesus . ”
44004031	When they had prayed , the place where they were assembled together was shaken , and they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak the word of God courageously .
44004032	The group of those who believed were of one heart and mind , and no one said that any of his possessions was his own , but everything was held in common .
44004033	With great power the apostles were giving testimony to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus , and great grace was on them all .
44004034	For there was no one needy among them , because those who were owners of land or houses were selling them and bringing the proceeds from the sales
44004035	and placing them at the apostles’ feet . The proceeds were distributed to each , as anyone had need .
44004036	So Joseph , a Levite who was a native of Cyprus , called by the apostles Barnabas ( which is translated “ son of encouragement ” ) ,
44004037	sold a field that belonged to him and brought the money and placed it at the apostles’ feet .
44005001	Now a man named Ananias , together with Sapphira his wife , sold a piece of property .
44005002	He kept back for himself part of the proceeds with his wife’s knowledge ; he brought only part of it and placed it at the apostles’ feet .
44005003	But Peter said , “ Ananias , why has Satan filled your heart to lie to the Holy Spirit and keep back for yourself part of the proceeds from the sale of the land ?
44005004	Before it was sold , did it not belong to you ? And when it was sold , was the money not at your disposal ? How have you thought up this deed in your heart ? You have not lied to people but to God ! ”
44005005	When Ananias heard these words he collapsed and died , and great fear gripped all who heard about it .
44005006	So the young men came , wrapped him up , carried him out , and buried him .
44005007	After an interval of about three hours , his wife came in , but she did not know what had happened .
44005008	Peter said to her , “ Tell me , were the two of you paid this amount for the land ? ” Sapphira said , “ Yes , that much . ”
44005009	Peter then told her , “ Why have you agreed together to test the Spirit of the Lord ? Look ! The feet of those who have buried your husband are at the door , and they will carry you out ! ”
44005010	At once she collapsed at his feet and died . So when the young men came in , they found her dead , and they carried her out and buried her beside her husband .
44005011	Great fear gripped the whole church and all who heard about these things .
44005012	Now many miraculous signs and wonders came about among the people through the hands of the apostles . By common consent they were all meeting together in Solomon’s Portico .
44005013	None of the rest dared to join them , but the people held them in high honor .
44005014	More and more believers in the Lord were added to their number , crowds of both men and women .
44005015	Thus they even carried the sick out into the streets , and put them on cots and pallets , so that when Peter came by at least his shadow would fall on some of them .
44005016	A crowd of people from the towns around Jerusalem also came together , bringing the sick and those troubled by unclean spirits . They were all being healed .
44005017	Now the high priest rose up , and all those with him ( that is , the religious party of the Sadducees ) , and they were filled with jealousy .
44005018	They laid hands on the apostles and put them in a public jail .
44005019	But during the night an angel of the Lord opened the doors of the prison , led them out , and said ,
44005020	“ Go and stand in the temple courts and proclaim to the people all the words of this life . ”
44005021	When they heard this , they entered the temple courts at daybreak and began teaching . Now when the high priest and those who were with him arrived , they summoned the Sanhedrin – that is , the whole high council of the Israelites – and sent to the jail to have the apostles brought before them .
44005022	But the officers who came for them did not find them in the prison , so they returned and reported ,
44005023	“ We found the jail locked securely and the guards standing at the doors , but when we opened them , we found no one inside . ”
44005024	Now when the commander of the temple guard and the chief priests heard this report , they were greatly puzzled concerning it , wondering what this could be .
44005025	But someone came and reported to them , “ Look ! The men you put in prison are standing in the temple courts and teaching the people ! ”
44005026	Then the commander of the temple guard went with the officers and brought the apostles without the use of force ( for they were afraid of being stoned by the people ) .
44005027	When they had brought them , they stood them before the council , and the high priest questioned them ,
44005028	saying , “ We gave you strict orders not to teach in this name . Look , you have filled Jerusalem with your teaching , and you intend to bring this man’s blood on us ! ”
44005029	But Peter and the apostles replied , “ We must obey God rather than people .
44005030	The God of our forefathers raised up Jesus , whom you seized and killed by hanging him on a tree .
44005031	God exalted him to his right hand as Leader and Savior , to give repentance to Israel and forgiveness of sins .
44005032	And we are witnesses of these events , and so is the Holy Spirit whom God has given to those who obey him . ”
44005033	Now when they heard this , they became furious and wanted to execute them .
44005034	But a Pharisee whose name was Gamaliel , a teacher of the law who was respected by all the people , stood up in the council and ordered the men to be put outside for a short time .
44005035	Then he said to the council , “ Men of Israel , pay close attention to what you are about to do to these men .
44005036	For some time ago Theudas rose up , claiming to be somebody , and about four hundred men joined him . He was killed , and all who followed him were dispersed and nothing came of it .
44005037	After him Judas the Galilean arose in the days of the census , and incited people to follow him in revolt . He too was killed , and all who followed him were scattered .
44005038	So in this case I say to you , stay away from these men and leave them alone , because if this plan or this undertaking originates with people , it will come to nothing ,
44005039	but if it is from God , you will not be able to stop them , or you may even be found fighting against God . ” He convinced them ,
44005040	and they summoned the apostles and had them beaten . Then they ordered them not to speak in the name of Jesus and released them .
44005041	So they left the council rejoicing because they had been considered worthy to suffer dishonor for the sake of the name .
44005042	And every day both in the temple courts and from house to house , they did not stop teaching and proclaiming the good news that Jesus was the Christ .
44006001	Now in those days , when the disciples were growing in number , a complaint arose on the part of the Greek-speaking Jews against the native Hebraic Jews , because their widows were being overlooked in the daily distribution of food .
44006002	So the twelve called the whole group of the disciples together and said , “ It is not right for us to neglect the word of God to wait on tables .
44006003	But carefully select from among you , brothers , seven men who are well-attested , full of the Spirit and of wisdom , whom we may put in charge of this necessary task .
44006004	But we will devote ourselves to prayer and to the ministry of the word . ”
44006005	The proposal pleased the entire group , so they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Spirit , with Philip , Prochorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolas , a Gentile convert to Judaism from Antioch .
44006006	They stood these men before the apostles , who prayed and placed their hands on them .
44006007	The word of God continued to spread , the number of disciples in Jerusalem increased greatly , and a large group of priests became obedient to the faith .
44006008	Now Stephen , full of grace and power , was performing great wonders and miraculous signs among the people .
44006009	But some men from the Synagogue of the Freedmen ( as it was called ) , both Cyrenians and Alexandrians , as well as some from Cilicia and the province of Asia , stood up and argued with Stephen .
44006010	Yet they were not able to resist the wisdom and the Spirit with which he spoke .
44006011	Then they secretly instigated some men to say , “ We have heard this man speaking blasphemous words against Moses and God . ”
44006012	They incited the people , the elders , and the experts in the law ; then they approached Stephen , seized him , and brought him before the council .
44006013	They brought forward false witnesses who said , “ This man does not stop saying things against this holy place and the law .
44006014	For we have heard him saying that Jesus the Nazarene will destroy this place and change the customs that Moses handed down to us . ”
44006015	All who were sitting in the council looked intently at Stephen and saw his face was like the face of an angel .
44007001	Then the high priest said , “ Are these things true ? ”
44007002	So he replied , “ Brothers and fathers , listen to me . The God of glory appeared to our forefather Abraham when he was in Mesopotamia , before he settled in Haran ,
44007003	and said to him , ‘ Go out from your country and from your relatives , and come to the land I will show you . ’
44007004	Then he went out from the country of the Chaldeans and settled in Haran . After his father died , God made him move to this country where you now live .
44007005	He did not give any of it to him for an inheritance , not even a foot of ground , yet God promised to give it to him as his possession , and to his descendants after him , even though Abraham as yet had no child .
44007006	But God spoke as follows : ‘ Your descendants will be foreigners in a foreign country , whose citizens will enslave them and mistreat them for four hundred years .
44007007	But I will punish the nation they serve as slaves , ’ said God , ‘ and after these things they will come out of there and worship me in this place . ’
44007008	Then God gave Abraham the covenant of circumcision , and so he became the father of Isaac and circumcised him when he was eight days old , and Isaac became the father of Jacob , and Jacob of the twelve patriarchs .
44007009	The patriarchs , because they were jealous of Joseph , sold him into Egypt . But God was with him ,
44007010	and rescued him from all his troubles , and granted him favor and wisdom in the presence of Pharaoh , king of Egypt , who made him ruler over Egypt and over all his household .
44007011	Then a famine occurred throughout Egypt and Canaan , causing great suffering , and our ancestors could not find food .
44007012	So when Jacob heard that there was grain in Egypt , he sent our ancestors there the first time .
44007013	On their second visit Joseph made himself known to his brothers again , and Joseph’s family became known to Pharaoh .
44007014	So Joseph sent a message and invited his father Jacob and all his relatives to come , seventy-five people in all .
44007015	So Jacob went down to Egypt and died there , along with our ancestors ,
44007016	and their bones were later moved to Shechem and placed in the tomb that Abraham had bought for a certain sum of money from the sons of Hamor in Shechem .
44007017	“ But as the time drew near for God to fulfill the promise he had declared to Abraham , the people increased greatly in number in Egypt ,
44007018	until another king who did not know about Joseph ruled over Egypt .
44007019	This was the one who exploited our people and was cruel to our ancestors , forcing them to abandon their infants so they would die .
44007020	At that time Moses was born , and he was beautiful to God . For three months he was brought up in his father’s house ,
44007021	and when he had been abandoned , Pharaoh’s daughter adopted him and brought him up as her own son .
44007022	So Moses was trained in all the wisdom of the Egyptians and was powerful in his words and deeds .
44007023	But when he was about forty years old , it entered his mind to visit his fellow countrymen the Israelites .
44007024	When he saw one of them being hurt unfairly , Moses came to his defense and avenged the person who was mistreated by striking down the Egyptian .
44007025	He thought his own people would understand that God was delivering them through him , but they did not understand .
44007026	The next day Moses saw two men fighting , and tried to make peace between them , saying , ‘ Men , you are brothers ; why are you hurting one another ? ’
44007027	But the man who was unfairly hurting his neighbor pushed Moses aside , saying , ‘ Who made you a ruler and judge over us ?
44007028	You don’t want to kill me the way you killed the Egyptian yesterday , do you ? ’
44007029	When the man said this , Moses fled and became a foreigner in the land of Midian , where he became the father of two sons .
44007030	“ After forty years had passed , an angel appeared to him in the desert of Mount Sinai , in the flame of a burning bush .
44007031	When Moses saw it , he was amazed at the sight , and when he approached to investigate , there came the voice of the Lord ,
44007032	‘ I am the God of your forefathers , the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob . ’ Moses began to tremble and did not dare to look more closely .
44007033	But the Lord said to him , ‘ Take the sandals off your feet , for the place where you are standing is holy ground .
44007034	I have certainly seen the suffering of my people who are in Egypt and have heard their groaning , and I have come down to rescue them . Now come , I will send you to Egypt . ’
44007035	This same Moses they had rejected , saying , ‘ Who made you a ruler and judge ? ’ God sent as both ruler and deliverer through the hand of the angel who appeared to him in the bush .
44007036	This man led them out , performing wonders and miraculous signs in the land of Egypt , at the Red Sea , and in the wilderness for forty years .
44007037	This is the Moses who said to the Israelites , ‘ God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your brothers . ’
