45015021	but as it is written : “ Those who were not told about him will see , and those who have not heard will understand . ”
45015022	This is the reason I was often hindered from coming to you .
45015023	But now there is nothing more to keep me in these regions , and I have for many years desired to come to you
45015024	when I go to Spain . For I hope to visit you when I pass through and that you will help me on my journey there , after I have enjoyed your company for a while .
45015025	But now I go to Jerusalem to minister to the saints .
45015026	For Macedonia and Achaia are pleased to make some contribution for the poor among the saints in Jerusalem .
45015027	For they were pleased to do this , and indeed they are indebted to the Jerusalem saints . For if the Gentiles have shared in their spiritual things , they are obligated also to minister to them in material things .
45015028	Therefore after I have completed this and have safely delivered this bounty to them , I will set out for Spain by way of you ,
45015029	and I know that when I come to you I will come in the fullness of Christ’s blessing .
45015030	Now I urge you , brothers and sisters , through our Lord Jesus Christ and through the love of the Spirit , to join fervently with me in prayer to God on my behalf .
45015031	Pray that I may be rescued from those who are disobedient in Judea and that my ministry in Jerusalem may be acceptable to the saints ,
45015032	so that by God’s will I may come to you with joy and be refreshed in your company .
45015033	Now may the God of peace be with all of you . Amen .
45016001	Now I commend to you our sister Phoebe , who is a servant of the church in Cenchrea ,
45016002	so that you may welcome her in the Lord in a way worthy of the saints and provide her with whatever help she may need from you , for she has been a great help to many , including me .
45016003	Greet Prisca and Aquila , my fellow workers in Christ Jesus ,
45016004	who risked their own necks for my life . Not only I , but all the churches of the Gentiles are grateful to them .
45016005	Also greet the church in their house . Greet my dear friend Epenetus , who was the first convert to Christ in the province of Asia .
45016006	Greet Mary , who has worked very hard for you .
45016007	Greet Andronicus and Junia , my compatriots and my fellow prisoners . They are well known to the apostles , and they were in Christ before me .
45016008	Greet Ampliatus , my dear friend in the Lord .
45016009	Greet Urbanus , our fellow worker in Christ , and my good friend Stachys .
45016010	Greet Apelles , who is approved in Christ . Greet those who belong to the household of Aristobulus .
45016011	Greet Herodion , my compatriot . Greet those in the household of Narcissus who are in the Lord .
45016012	Greet Tryphena and Tryphosa , laborers in the Lord . Greet my dear friend Persis , who has worked hard in the Lord .
45016013	Greet Rufus , chosen in the Lord , and his mother who was also a mother to me .
45016014	Greet Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermes , Patrobas , Hermas , and the brothers and sisters with them .
45016015	Greet Philologus and Julia , Nereus and his sister , and Olympas , and all the believers who are with them .
45016016	Greet one another with a holy kiss . All the churches of Christ greet you .
45016017	Now I urge you , brothers and sisters , to watch out for those who create dissensions and obstacles contrary to the teaching that you learned . Avoid them !
45016018	For these are the kind who do not serve our Lord Christ , but their own appetites . By their smooth talk and flattery they deceive the minds of the naive .
45016019	Your obedience is known to all and thus I rejoice over you . But I want you to be wise in what is good and innocent in what is evil .
45016020	The God of peace will quickly crush Satan under your feet . The grace of our Lord Jesus be with you .
45016021	Timothy , my fellow worker , greets you ; so do Lucius , Jason , and Sosipater , my compatriots .
45016022	I , Tertius , who am writing this letter , greet you in the Lord .
45016023	Gaius , who is host to me and to the whole church , greets you . Erastus the city treasurer and our brother Quartus greet you .
45016025	Now to him who is able to strengthen you according to my gospel and the proclamation of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery that had been kept secret for long ages ,
45016026	but now is disclosed , and through the prophetic scriptures has been made known to all the nations , according to the command of the eternal God , to bring about the obedience of faith –
45016027	to the only wise God , through Jesus Christ , be glory forever ! Amen .
46001001	From Paul , called to be an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , and Sosthenes , our brother ,
46001002	to the church of God that is in Corinth , to those who are sanctified in Christ Jesus , and called to be saints , with all those in every place who call on the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , their Lord and ours .
46001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
46001004	I always thank my God for you because of the grace of God that was given to you in Christ Jesus .
46001005	For you were made rich in every way in him , in all your speech and in every kind of knowledge –
46001006	just as the testimony about Christ has been confirmed among you –
46001007	so that you do not lack any spiritual gift as you wait for the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001008	He will also strengthen you to the end , so that you will be blameless on the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001009	God is faithful , by whom you were called into fellowship with his son , Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	I urge you , brothers and sisters , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , to agree together , to end your divisions , and to be united by the same mind and purpose .
46001011	For members of Chloe’s household have made it clear to me , my brothers and sisters , that there are quarrels among you .
46001012	Now I mean this , that each of you is saying , “ I am with Paul , ” or “ I am with Apollos , ” or “ I am with Cephas , ” or “ I am with Christ . ”
46001013	Is Christ divided ? Paul wasn’t crucified for you , was he ? Or were you in fact baptized in the name of Paul ?
46001014	I thank God that I did not baptize any of you except Crispus and Gaius ,
46001015	so that no one can say that you were baptized in my name !
46001016	( I also baptized the household of Stephanus . Otherwise , I do not remember whether I baptized anyone else . )
46001017	For Christ did not send me to baptize , but to preach the gospel – and not with clever speech , so that the cross of Christ would not become useless .
46001018	For the message about the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing , but to us who are being saved it is the power of God .
46001019	For it is written , “ I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and I will thwart the cleverness of the intelligent . ”
46001020	Where is the wise man ? Where is the expert in the Mosaic law ? Where is the debater of this age ? Has God not made the wisdom of the world foolish ?
46001021	For since in the wisdom of God the world by its wisdom did not know God , God was pleased to save those who believe by the foolishness of preaching .
46001022	For Jews demand miraculous signs and Greeks ask for wisdom ,
46001023	but we preach about a crucified Christ , a stumbling block to Jews and foolishness to Gentiles .
46001024	But to those who are called , both Jews and Greeks , Christ is the power of God and the wisdom of God .
46001025	For the foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom , and the weakness of God is stronger than human strength .
46001026	Think about the circumstances of your call , brothers and sisters . Not many were wise by human standards , not many were powerful , not many were born to a privileged position .
46001027	But God chose what the world thinks foolish to shame the wise , and God chose what the world thinks weak to shame the strong .
46001028	God chose what is low and despised in the world , what is regarded as nothing , to set aside what is regarded as something ,
46001029	so that no one can boast in his presence .
46001030	He is the reason you have a relationship with Christ Jesus , who became for us wisdom from God , and righteousness and sanctification and redemption ,
46001031	so that , as it is written , “ Let the one who boasts , boast in the Lord . ”
46002001	When I came to you , brothers and sisters , I did not come with superior eloquence or wisdom as I proclaimed the testimony of God .
46002002	For I decided to be concerned about nothing among you except Jesus Christ , and him crucified .
46002003	And I was with you in weakness and in fear and with much trembling .
46002004	My conversation and my preaching were not with persuasive words of wisdom , but with a demonstration of the Spirit and of power ,
46002005	so that your faith would not be based on human wisdom but on the power of God .
46002006	Now we do speak wisdom among the mature , but not a wisdom of this age or of the rulers of this age , who are perishing .
46002007	Instead we speak the wisdom of God , hidden in a mystery , that God determined before the ages for our glory .
46002008	None of the rulers of this age understood it . If they had known it , they would not have crucified the Lord of glory .
46002009	But just as it is written , “ Things that no eye has seen , or ear heard , or mind imagined , are the things God has prepared for those who love him . ”
46002010	God has revealed these to us by the Spirit . For the Spirit searches all things , even the deep things of God .
46002011	For who among men knows the things of a man except the man’s spirit within him ? So too , no one knows the things of God except the Spirit of God .
46002012	Now we have not received the spirit of the world , but the Spirit who is from God , so that we may know the things that are freely given to us by God .
46002013	And we speak about these things , not with words taught us by human wisdom , but with those taught by the Spirit , explaining spiritual things to spiritual people .
46002014	The unbeliever does not receive the things of the Spirit of God , for they are foolishness to him . And he cannot understand them , because they are spiritually discerned .
46002015	The one who is spiritual discerns all things , yet he himself is understood by no one .
46002016	For who has known the mind of the Lord , so as to advise him ? But we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	So , brothers and sisters , I could not speak to you as spiritual people , but instead as people of the flesh , as infants in Christ .
46003002	I fed you milk , not solid food , for you were not yet ready . In fact , you are still not ready ,
46003003	for you are still influenced by the flesh . For since there is still jealousy and dissension among you , are you not influenced by the flesh and behaving like unregenerate people ?
46003004	For whenever someone says , “ I am with Paul , ” or “ I am with Apollos , ” are you not merely human ?
46003005	What is Apollos , really ? Or what is Paul ? Servants through whom you came to believe , and each of us in the ministry the Lord gave us .
46003006	I planted , Apollos watered , but God caused it to grow .
46003007	So neither the one who plants counts for anything , nor the one who waters , but God who causes the growth .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters work as one , but each will receive his reward according to his work .
46003009	We are coworkers belonging to God . You are God’s field , God’s building .
46003010	According to the grace of God given to me , like a skilled master-builder I laid a foundation , but someone else builds on it . And each one must be careful how he builds .
46003011	For no one can lay any foundation other than what is being laid , which is Jesus Christ .
46003012	If anyone builds on the foundation with gold , silver , precious stones , wood , hay , or straw ,
46003013	each builder’s work will be plainly seen , for the Day will make it clear , because it will be revealed by fire . And the fire will test what kind of work each has done .
46003014	If what someone has built survives , he will receive a reward .
46003015	If someone’s work is burned up , he will suffer loss . He himself will be saved , but only as through fire .
46003016	Do you not know that you are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit lives in you ?
46003017	If someone destroys God’s temple , God will destroy him . For God’s temple is holy , which is what you are .
46003018	Guard against self-deception , each of you . If someone among you thinks he is wise in this age , let him become foolish so that he can become wise .
46003019	For the wisdom of this age is foolishness with God . As it is written , “ He catches the wise in their craftiness . ”
46003020	And again , “ The Lord knows that the thoughts of the wise are futile . ”
46003021	So then , no more boasting about mere mortals ! For everything belongs to you ,
46003022	whether Paul or Apollos or Cephas or the world or life or death or the present or the future . Everything belongs to you ,
46003023	and you belong to Christ , and Christ belongs to God .
46004001	One should think about us this way – as servants of Christ and stewards of the mysteries of God .
46004002	Now what is sought in stewards is that one be found faithful .
46004003	So for me , it is a minor matter that I am judged by you or by any human court . In fact , I do not even judge myself .
46004004	For I am not aware of anything against myself , but I am not acquitted because of this . The one who judges me is the Lord .
46004005	So then , do not judge anything before the time . Wait until the Lord comes . He will bring to light the hidden things of darkness and reveal the motives of hearts . Then each will receive recognition from God .
46004006	I have applied these things to myself and Apollos because of you , brothers and sisters , so that through us you may learn “ not to go beyond what is written , ” so that none of you will be puffed up in favor of the one against the other .
46004007	For who concedes you any superiority ? What do you have that you did not receive ? And if you received it , why do you boast as though you did not ?
46004008	Already you are satisfied ! Already you are rich ! You have become kings without us ! I wish you had become kings so that we could reign with you !
46004009	For , I think , God has exhibited us apostles last of all , as men condemned to die , because we have become a spectacle to the world , both to angels and to people .
46004010	We are fools for Christ , but you are wise in Christ ! We are weak , but you are strong ! You are distinguished , we are dishonored !
46004011	To the present hour we are hungry and thirsty , poorly clothed , brutally treated , and without a roof over our heads .
46004012	We do hard work , toiling with our own hands . When we are verbally abused , we respond with a blessing , when persecuted , we endure ,
46004013	when people lie about us , we answer in a friendly manner . We are the world’s dirt and scum , even now .
46004014	I am not writing these things to shame you , but to correct you as my dear children .
46004015	For though you may have ten thousand guardians in Christ , you do not have many fathers , because I became your father in Christ Jesus through the gospel .
46004016	I encourage you , then , be imitators of me .
46004017	For this reason , I have sent Timothy to you , who is my dear and faithful son in the Lord . He will remind you of my ways in Christ , as I teach them everywhere in every church .
46004018	Some have become arrogant , as if I were not coming to you .
46004019	But I will come to you soon , if the Lord is willing , and I will find out not only the talk of these arrogant people , but also their power .
46004020	For the kingdom of God is demonstrated not in idle talk but with power .
46004021	What do you want ? Shall I come to you with a rod of discipline or with love and a spirit of gentleness ?
46005001	It is actually reported that sexual immorality exists among you , the kind of immorality that is not permitted even among the Gentiles , so that someone is cohabiting with his father’s wife .
46005002	And you are proud ! Shouldn’t you have been deeply sorrowful instead and removed the one who did this from among you ?
46005003	For even though I am absent physically , I am present in spirit . And I have already judged the one who did this , just as though I were present .
46005004	When you gather together in the name of our Lord Jesus , and I am with you in spirit , along with the power of our Lord Jesus ,
46005005	turn this man over to Satan for the destruction of the flesh , so that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord .
46005006	Your boasting is not good . Don’t you know that a little yeast affects the whole batch of dough ?
46005007	Clean out the old yeast so that you may be a new batch of dough – you are , in fact , without yeast . For Christ , our Passover lamb , has been sacrificed .
46005008	So then , let us celebrate the festival , not with the old yeast , the yeast of vice and evil , but with the bread without yeast , the bread of sincerity and truth .
46005009	I wrote you in my letter not to associate with sexually immoral people .
46005010	In no way did I mean the immoral people of this world , or the greedy and swindlers and idolaters , since you would then have to go out of the world .
46005011	But now I am writing to you not to associate with anyone who calls himself a Christian who is sexually immoral , or greedy , or an idolater , or verbally abusive , or a drunkard , or a swindler . Do not even eat with such a person .
46005012	For what do I have to do with judging those outside ? Are you not to judge those inside ?
46005013	But God will judge those outside . Remove the evil person from among you .
46006001	When any of you has a legal dispute with another , does he dare go to court before the unrighteous rather than before the saints ?
46006002	Or do you not know that the saints will judge the world ? And if the world is to be judged by you , are you not competent to settle trivial suits ?
46006003	Do you not know that we will judge angels ? Why not ordinary matters !
46006004	So if you have ordinary lawsuits , do you appoint as judges those who have no standing in the church ?
46006005	I say this to your shame ! Is there no one among you wise enough to settle disputes between fellow Christians ?
46006006	Instead , does a Christian sue a Christian , and do this before unbelievers ?
46006007	The fact that you have lawsuits among yourselves demonstrates that you have already been defeated . Why not rather be wronged ? Why not rather be cheated ?
46006008	But you yourselves wrong and cheat , and you do this to your brothers and sisters !
46006009	Do you not know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God ? Do not be deceived ! The sexually immoral , idolaters , adulterers , passive homosexual partners , practicing homosexuals ,
46006010	thieves , the greedy , drunkards , the verbally abusive , and swindlers will not inherit the kingdom of God .
46006011	Some of you once lived this way . But you were washed , you were sanctified , you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God .
46006012	“ All things are lawful for me ” – but not everything is beneficial . “ All things are lawful for me ” – but I will not be controlled by anything .
46006013	“ Food is for the stomach and the stomach is for food , but God will do away with both . ” The body is not for sexual immorality , but for the Lord , and the Lord for the body .
46006014	Now God indeed raised the Lord and he will raise us by his power .
46006015	Do you not know that your bodies are members of Christ ? Should I take the members of Christ and make them members of a prostitute ? Never !
46006016	Or do you not know that anyone who is united with a prostitute is one body with her ? For it is said , “ The two will become one flesh . ”
46006017	But the one united with the Lord is one spirit with him .
46006018	Flee sexual immorality ! “ Every sin a person commits is outside of the body ” – but the immoral person sins against his own body .
46006019	Or do you not know that your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit who is in you , whom you have from God , and you are not your own ?
46006020	For you were bought at a price . Therefore glorify God with your body .
46007001	Now with regard to the issues you wrote about : “ It is good for a man not to have sexual relations with a woman . ”
46007002	But because of immoralities , each man should have relations with his own wife and each woman with her own husband .
46007003	A husband should give to his wife her sexual rights , and likewise a wife to her husband .
46007004	It is not the wife who has the rights to her own body , but the husband . In the same way , it is not the husband who has the rights to his own body , but the wife .
46007005	Do not deprive each other , except by mutual agreement for a specified time , so that you may devote yourselves to prayer . Then resume your relationship , so that Satan may not tempt you because of your lack of self-control .
46007006	I say this as a concession , not as a command .
46007007	I wish that everyone was as I am . But each has his own gift from God , one this way , another that .
46007008	To the unmarried and widows I say that it is best for them to remain as I am .
46007009	But if they do not have self-control , let them get married . For it is better to marry than to burn with sexual desire .
46007010	To the married I give this command – not I , but the Lord – a wife should not divorce a husband
46007011	( but if she does , let her remain unmarried , or be reconciled to her husband ) , and a husband should not divorce his wife .
46007012	To the rest I say – I , not the Lord – if a brother has a wife who is not a believer and she is happy to live with him , he should not divorce her .
46007013	And if a woman has a husband who is not a believer and he is happy to live with her , she should not divorce him .
46007014	For the unbelieving husband is sanctified because of the wife , and the unbelieving wife because of her husband . Otherwise your children are unclean , but now they are holy .
46007015	But if the unbeliever wants a divorce , let it take place . In these circumstances the brother or sister is not bound . God has called you in peace .
46007016	For how do you know , wife , whether you will bring your husband to salvation ? Or how do you know , husband , whether you will bring your wife to salvation ?
46007017	Nevertheless , as the Lord has assigned to each one , as God has called each person , so must he live . I give this sort of direction in all the churches .
46007018	Was anyone called after he had been circumcised ? He should not try to undo his circumcision . Was anyone called who is uncircumcised ? He should not get circumcised .
46007019	Circumcision is nothing and uncircumcision is nothing . Instead , keeping God’s commandments is what counts .
46007020	Let each one remain in that situation in life in which he was called .
46007021	Were you called as a slave ? Do not worry about it . But if indeed you are able to be free , make the most of the opportunity .
46007022	For the one who was called in the Lord as a slave is the Lord’s freedman . In the same way , the one who was called as a free person is Christ’s slave .
46007023	You were bought with a price . Do not become slaves of men .
46007024	In whatever situation someone was called , brothers and sisters , let him remain in it with God .
46007025	With regard to the question about people who have never married , I have no command from the Lord , but I give my opinion as one shown mercy by the Lord to be trustworthy .
46007026	Because of the impending crisis I think it best for you to remain as you are .
46007027	The one bound to a wife should not seek divorce . The one released from a wife should not seek marriage .
46007028	But if you marry , you have not sinned . And if a virgin marries , she has not sinned . But those who marry will face difficult circumstances , and I am trying to spare you such problems .
46007029	And I say this , brothers and sisters : The time is short . So then those who have wives should be as those who have none ,
46007030	those with tears like those not weeping , those who rejoice like those not rejoicing , those who buy like those without possessions ,
46007031	those who use the world as though they were not using it to the full . For the present shape of this world is passing away .
46007032	And I want you to be free from concern . An unmarried man is concerned about the things of the Lord , how to please the Lord .
46007033	But a married man is concerned about the things of the world , how to please his wife ,
46007034	and he is divided . An unmarried woman or a virgin is concerned about the things of the Lord , to be holy both in body and spirit . But a married woman is concerned about the things of the world , how to please her husband .
46007035	I am saying this for your benefit , not to place a limitation on you , but so that without distraction you may give notable and constant service to the Lord .
46007036	If anyone thinks he is acting inappropriately toward his virgin , if she is past the bloom of youth and it seems necessary , he should do what he wishes ; he does not sin . Let them marry .
46007037	But the man who is firm in his commitment , and is under no necessity but has control over his will , and has decided in his own mind to keep his own virgin , does well .
46007038	So then , the one who marries his own virgin does well , but the one who does not , does better .
46007039	A wife is bound as long as her husband is living . But if her husband dies , she is free to marry anyone she wishes ( only someone in the Lord ) .
46007040	But in my opinion , she will be happier if she remains as she is – and I think that I too have the Spirit of God !
46008001	With regard to food sacrificed to idols , we know that “ we all have knowledge . ” Knowledge puffs up , but love builds up .
46008002	If someone thinks he knows something , he does not yet know to the degree that he needs to know .
46008003	But if someone loves God , he is known by God .
46008004	With regard then to eating food sacrificed to idols , we know that “ an idol in this world is nothing , ” and that “ there is no God but one . ”
46008005	If after all there are so-called gods , whether in heaven or on earth ( as there are many gods and many lords ) ,
46008006	yet for us there is one God , the Father , from whom are all things and for whom we live , and one Lord , Jesus Christ , through whom are all things and through whom we live .
46008007	But this knowledge is not shared by all . And some , by being accustomed to idols in former times , eat this food as an idol sacrifice , and their conscience , because it is weak , is defiled .
46008008	Now food will not bring us close to God . We are no worse if we do not eat and no better if we do .
46008009	But be careful that this liberty of yours does not become a hindrance to the weak .
46008010	For if someone weak sees you who possess knowledge dining in an idol’s temple , will not his conscience be “ strengthened ” to eat food offered to idols ?
46008011	So by your knowledge the weak brother or sister , for whom Christ died , is destroyed .
46008012	If you sin against your brothers or sisters in this way and wound their weak conscience , you sin against Christ .
46008013	For this reason , if food causes my brother or sister to sin , I will never eat meat again , so that I may not cause one of them to sin .
46009001	Am I not free ? Am I not an apostle ? Have I not seen Jesus our Lord ? Are you not my work in the Lord ?
46009002	If I am not an apostle to others , at least I am to you , for you are the confirming sign of my apostleship in the Lord .
46009003	This is my defense to those who examine me .
46009004	Do we not have the right to financial support ?
46009005	Do we not have the right to the company of a believing wife , like the other apostles and the Lord’s brothers and Cephas ?
46009006	Or do only Barnabas and I lack the right not to work ?
46009007	Who ever serves in the army at his own expense ? Who plants a vineyard and does not eat its fruit ? Who tends a flock and does not consume its milk ?
46009008	Am I saying these things only on the basis of common sense , or does the law not say this as well ?
46009009	For it is written in the law of Moses , “ Do not muzzle an ox while it is treading out the grain . ” God is not concerned here about oxen , is he ?
46009010	Or is he not surely speaking for our benefit ? It was written for us , because the one plowing and threshing ought to work in hope of enjoying the harvest .
46009011	If we sowed spiritual blessings among you , is it too much to reap material things from you ?
46009012	If others receive this right from you , are we not more deserving ? But we have not made use of this right . Instead we endure everything so that we may not be a hindrance to the gospel of Christ .
46009013	Don’t you know that those who serve in the temple eat food from the temple , and those who serve at the altar receive a part of the offerings ?
46009014	In the same way the Lord commanded those who proclaim the gospel to receive their living by the gospel .
46009015	But I have not used any of these rights . And I am not writing these things so that something will be done for me . In fact , it would be better for me to die than – no one will deprive me of my reason for boasting !
46009016	For if I preach the gospel , I have no reason for boasting , because I am compelled to do this . Woe to me if I do not preach the gospel !
46009017	For if I do this voluntarily , I have a reward . But if I do it unwillingly , I am entrusted with a responsibility .
46009018	What then is my reward ? That when I preach the gospel I may offer the gospel free of charge , and so not make full use of my rights in the gospel .
46009019	For since I am free from all I can make myself a slave to all , in order to gain even more people .
46009020	To the Jews I became like a Jew to gain the Jews . To those under the law I became like one under the law ( though I myself am not under the law ) to gain those under the law .
46009021	To those free from the law I became like one free from the law ( though I am not free from God’s law but under the law of Christ ) to gain those free from the law .
46009022	To the weak I became weak in order to gain the weak . I have become all things to all people , so that by all means I may save some .
46009023	I do all these things because of the gospel , so that I can be a participant in it .
46009024	Do you not know that all the runners in a stadium compete , but only one receives the prize ? So run to win .
46009025	Each competitor must exercise self-control in everything . They do it to receive a perishable crown , but we an imperishable one .
46009026	So I do not run uncertainly or box like one who hits only air .
46009027	Instead I subdue my body and make it my slave , so that after preaching to others I myself will not be disqualified .
46010001	For I do not want you to be unaware , brothers and sisters , that our fathers were all under the cloud and all passed through the sea ,
46010002	and all were baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea ,
46010003	and all ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all drank the same spiritual drink . For they were all drinking from the spiritual rock that followed them , and the rock was Christ .
46010005	But God was not pleased with most of them , for they were cut down in the wilderness .
46010006	These things happened as examples for us , so that we will not crave evil things as they did .
46010007	So do not be idolaters , as some of them were . As it is written , “ The people sat down to eat and drink and rose up to play . ”
46010008	And let us not be immoral , as some of them were , and twenty-three thousand died in a single day .
46010009	And let us not put Christ to the test , as some of them did , and were destroyed by snakes .
46010010	And do not complain , as some of them did , and were killed by the destroying angel .
46010011	These things happened to them as examples and were written for our instruction , on whom the ends of the ages have come .
46010012	So let the one who thinks he is standing be careful that he does not fall .
46010013	No trial has overtaken you that is not faced by others . And God is faithful : He will not let you be tried beyond what you are able to bear , but with the trial will also provide a way out so that you may be able to endure it .
46010014	So then , my dear friends , flee from idolatry .
46010015	I am speaking to thoughtful people . Consider what I say .
46010016	Is not the cup of blessing that we bless a sharing in the blood of Christ ? Is not the bread that we break a sharing in the body of Christ ?
46010017	Because there is one bread , we who are many are one body , for we all share the one bread .
46010018	Look at the people of Israel . Are not those who eat the sacrifices partners in the altar ?
46010019	Am I saying that idols or food sacrificed to them amount to anything ?
46010020	No , I mean that what the pagans sacrifice is to demons and not to God . I do not want you to be partners with demons .
46010021	You cannot drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons . You cannot take part in the table of the Lord and the table of demons .
46010022	Or are we trying to provoke the Lord to jealousy ? Are we really stronger than he is ?
46010023	“ Everything is lawful , ” but not everything is beneficial . “ Everything is lawful , ” but not everything builds others up .
46010024	Do not seek your own good , but the good of the other person .
46010025	Eat anything that is sold in the marketplace without questions of conscience ,
46010026	for the earth and its abundance are the Lord’s .
46010027	If an unbeliever invites you to dinner and you want to go , eat whatever is served without asking questions of conscience .
46010028	But if someone says to you , “ This is from a sacrifice , ” do not eat , because of the one who told you and because of conscience –
46010029	I do not mean yours but the other person’s . For why is my freedom being judged by another’s conscience ?
46010030	If I partake with thankfulness , why am I blamed for the food that I give thanks for ?
46010031	So whether you eat or drink , or whatever you do , do everything for the glory of God .
46010032	Do not give offense to Jews or Greeks or to the church of God ,
46010033	just as I also try to please everyone in all things . I do not seek my own benefit , but the benefit of many , so that they may be saved .
46011001	Be imitators of me , just as I also am of Christ .
46011002	I praise you because you remember me in everything and maintain the traditions just as I passed them on to you .
46011003	But I want you to know that Christ is the head of every man , and the man is the head of a woman , and God is the head of Christ .
46011004	Any man who prays or prophesies with his head covered disgraces his head .
46011005	But any woman who prays or prophesies with her head uncovered disgraces her head , for it is one and the same thing as having a shaved head .
46011006	For if a woman will not cover her head , she should cut off her hair . But if it is disgraceful for a woman to have her hair cut off or her head shaved , she should cover her head .
46011007	For a man should not have his head covered , since he is the image and glory of God . But the woman is the glory of the man .
46011008	For man did not come from woman , but woman from man .
46011009	Neither was man created for the sake of woman , but woman for man .
46011010	For this reason a woman should have a symbol of authority on her head , because of the angels .
46011011	In any case , in the Lord woman is not independent of man , nor is man independent of woman .
46011012	For just as woman came from man , so man comes through woman . But all things come from God .
46011013	Judge for yourselves : Is it proper for a woman to pray to God with her head uncovered ?
46011014	Does not nature itself teach you that if a man has long hair , it is a disgrace for him ,
46011015	but if a woman has long hair , it is her glory ? For her hair is given to her for a covering .
46011016	If anyone intends to quarrel about this , we have no other practice , nor do the churches of God .
46011017	Now in giving the following instruction I do not praise you , because you come together not for the better but for the worse .
46011018	For in the first place , when you come together as a church I hear there are divisions among you , and in part I believe it .
46011019	For there must in fact be divisions among you , so that those of you who are approved may be evident .
46011020	Now when you come together at the same place , you are not really eating the Lord’s Supper .
46011021	For when it is time to eat , everyone proceeds with his own supper . One is hungry and another becomes drunk .
46011022	Do you not have houses so that you can eat and drink ? Or are you trying to show contempt for the church of God by shaming those who have nothing ? What should I say to you ? Should I praise you ? I will not praise you for this !
46011023	For I received from the Lord what I also passed on to you , that the Lord Jesus on the night in which he was betrayed took bread ,
46011024	and after he had given thanks he broke it and said , “ This is my body , which is for you . Do this in remembrance of me . ”
46011025	In the same way , he also took the cup after supper , saying , “ This cup is the new covenant in my blood . Do this , every time you drink it , in remembrance of me . ”
46011026	For every time you eat this bread and drink the cup , you proclaim the Lord’s death until he comes .
46011027	For this reason , whoever eats the bread or drinks the cup of the Lord in an unworthy manner will be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
46011028	A person should examine himself first , and in this way let him eat the bread and drink of the cup .
46011029	For the one who eats and drinks without careful regard for the body eats and drinks judgment against himself .
46011030	That is why many of you are weak and sick , and quite a few are dead .
46011031	But if we examined ourselves , we would not be judged .
46011032	But when we are judged by the Lord , we are disciplined so that we may not be condemned with the world .
46011033	So then , my brothers and sisters , when you come together to eat , wait for one another .
46011034	If anyone is hungry , let him eat at home , so that when you assemble it does not lead to judgment . I will give directions about other matters when I come .
46012001	With regard to spiritual gifts , brothers and sisters , I do not want you to be uninformed .
46012002	You know that when you were pagans you were often led astray by speechless idols , however you were led .
46012003	So I want you to understand that no one speaking by the Spirit of God says , “ Jesus is cursed , ” and no one can say , “ Jesus is Lord , ” except by the Holy Spirit .
46012004	Now there are different gifts , but the same Spirit .
46012005	And there are different ministries , but the same Lord .
46012006	And there are different results , but the same God who produces all of them in everyone .
46012007	To each person the manifestation of the Spirit is given for the benefit of all .
46012008	For one person is given through the Spirit the message of wisdom , and another the message of knowledge according to the same Spirit ,
46012009	to another faith by the same Spirit , and to another gifts of healing by the one Spirit ,
46012010	to another performance of miracles , to another prophecy , and to another discernment of spirits , to another different kinds of tongues , and to another the interpretation of tongues .
46012011	It is one and the same Spirit , distributing as he decides to each person , who produces all these things .
46012012	For just as the body is one and yet has many members , and all the members of the body – though many – are one body , so too is Christ .
46012013	For in one Spirit we were all baptized into one body . Whether Jews or Greeks or slaves or free , we were all made to drink of the one Spirit .
46012014	For in fact the body is not a single member , but many .
46012015	If the foot says , “ Since I am not a hand , I am not part of the body , ” it does not lose its membership in the body because of that .
46012016	And if the ear says , “ Since I am not an eye , I am not part of the body , ” it does not lose its membership in the body because of that .
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , what part would do the hearing ? If the whole were an ear , what part would exercise the sense of smell ?
46012018	But as a matter of fact , God has placed each of the members in the body just as he decided .
46012019	If they were all the same member , where would the body be ?
46012020	So now there are many members , but one body .
46012021	The eye cannot say to the hand , “ I do not need you , ” nor in turn can the head say to the foot , “ I do not need you . ”
46012022	On the contrary , those members that seem to be weaker are essential ,
46012023	and those members we consider less honorable we clothe with greater honor , and our unpresentable members are clothed with dignity ,
46012024	but our presentable members do not need this . Instead , God has blended together the body , giving greater honor to the lesser member ,
46012025	so that there may be no division in the body , but the members may have mutual concern for one another .
46012026	If one member suffers , everyone suffers with it . If a member is honored , all rejoice with it .
46012027	Now you are Christ’s body , and each of you is a member of it .
46012028	And God has placed in the church first apostles , second prophets , third teachers , then miracles , gifts of healing , helps , gifts of leadership , different kinds of tongues .
46012029	Not all are apostles , are they ? Not all are prophets , are they ? Not all are teachers , are they ? Not all perform miracles , do they ?
46012030	Not all have gifts of healing , do they ? Not all speak in tongues , do they ? Not all interpret , do they ?
46012031	But you should be eager for the greater gifts . And now I will show you a way that is beyond comparison .
46013001	If I speak in the tongues of men and of angels , but I do not have love , I am a noisy gong or a clanging cymbal .
46013002	And if I have prophecy , and know all mysteries and all knowledge , and if I have all faith so that I can remove mountains , but do not have love , I am nothing .
46013003	If I give away everything I own , and if I give over my body in order to boast , but do not have love , I receive no benefit .
46013004	Love is patient , love is kind , it is not envious . Love does not brag , it is not puffed up .
46013005	It is not rude , it is not self-serving , it is not easily angered or resentful .
46013006	It is not glad about injustice , but rejoices in the truth .
46013007	It bears all things , believes all things , hopes all things , endures all things .
46013008	Love never ends . But if there are prophecies , they will be set aside ; if there are tongues , they will cease ; if there is knowledge , it will be set aside .
46013009	For we know in part , and we prophesy in part ,
46013010	but when what is perfect comes , the partial will be set aside .
46013011	When I was a child , I talked like a child , I thought like a child , I reasoned like a child . But when I became an adult , I set aside childish ways .
46013012	For now we see in a mirror indirectly , but then we will see face to face . Now I know in part , but then I will know fully , just as I have been fully known .
46013013	And now these three remain : faith , hope , and love . But the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Pursue love and be eager for the spiritual gifts , especially that you may prophesy .
46014002	For the one speaking in a tongue does not speak to people but to God , for no one understands ; he is speaking mysteries by the Spirit .
46014003	But the one who prophesies speaks to people for their strengthening , encouragement , and consolation .
46014004	The one who speaks in a tongue builds himself up , but the one who prophesies builds up the church .
46014005	I wish you all spoke in tongues , but even more that you would prophesy . The one who prophesies is greater than the one who speaks in tongues , unless he interprets so that the church may be strengthened .
46014006	Now , brothers and sisters , if I come to you speaking in tongues , how will I help you unless I speak to you with a revelation or with knowledge or prophecy or teaching ?
46014007	It is similar for lifeless things that make a sound , like a flute or harp . Unless they make a distinction in the notes , how can what is played on the flute or harp be understood ?
46014008	If , for example , the trumpet makes an unclear sound , who will get ready for battle ?
46014009	It is the same for you . If you do not speak clearly with your tongue , how will anyone know what is being said ? For you will be speaking into the air .
46014010	There are probably many kinds of languages in the world , and none is without meaning .
46014011	If then I do not know the meaning of a language , I will be a foreigner to the speaker and the speaker a foreigner to me .
46014012	It is the same with you . Since you are eager for manifestations of the Spirit , seek to abound in order to strengthen the church .
46014013	So then , one who speaks in a tongue should pray that he may interpret .
46014014	If I pray in a tongue , my spirit prays , but my mind is unproductive .
46014015	What should I do ? I will pray with my spirit , but I will also pray with my mind . I will sing praises with my spirit , but I will also sing praises with my mind .
46014016	Otherwise , if you are praising God with your spirit , how can someone without the gift say “ Amen ” to your thanksgiving , since he does not know what you are saying ?
46014017	For you are certainly giving thanks well , but the other person is not strengthened .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in tongues more than all of you ,
46014019	but in the church I want to speak five words with my mind to instruct others , rather than ten thousand words in a tongue .
46014020	Brothers and sisters , do not be children in your thinking . Instead , be infants in evil , but in your thinking be mature .
46014021	It is written in the law : “ By people with strange tongues and by the lips of strangers I will speak to this people , yet not even in this way will they listen to me , ” says the Lord .
46014022	So then , tongues are a sign not for believers but for unbelievers . Prophecy , however , is not for unbelievers but for believers .
46014023	So if the whole church comes together and all speak in tongues , and unbelievers or uninformed people enter , will they not say that you have lost your minds ?
46014024	But if all prophesy , and an unbeliever or uninformed person enters , he will be convicted by all , he will be called to account by all .
46014025	The secrets of his heart are disclosed , and in this way he will fall down with his face to the ground and worship God , declaring , “ God is really among you . ”
46014026	What should you do then , brothers and sisters ? When you come together , each one has a song , has a lesson , has a revelation , has a tongue , has an interpretation . Let all these things be done for the strengthening of the church .
46014027	If someone speaks in a tongue , it should be two , or at the most three , one after the other , and someone must interpret .
46014028	But if there is no interpreter , he should be silent in the church . Let him speak to himself and to God .
46014029	Two or three prophets should speak and the others should evaluate what is said .
46014030	And if someone sitting down receives a revelation , the person who is speaking should conclude .
46014031	For you can all prophesy one after another , so all can learn and be encouraged .
46014032	Indeed , the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets ,
46014033	for God is not characterized by disorder but by peace . As in all the churches of the saints ,
46014034	the women should be silent in the churches , for they are not permitted to speak . Rather , let them be in submission , as in fact the law says .
46014035	If they want to find out about something , they should ask their husbands at home , because it is disgraceful for a woman to speak in church .
46014036	Did the word of God begin with you , or did it come to you alone ?
46014037	If anyone considers himself a prophet or spiritual person , he should acknowledge that what I write to you is the Lord’s command .
46014038	If someone does not recognize this , he is not recognized .
46014039	So then , brothers and sisters , be eager to prophesy , and do not forbid anyone from speaking in tongues .
46014040	And do everything in a decent and orderly manner .
46015001	Now I want to make clear for you , brothers and sisters , the gospel that I preached to you , that you received and on which you stand ,
46015002	and by which you are being saved , if you hold firmly to the message I preached to you – unless you believed in vain .
46015003	For I passed on to you as of first importance what I also received – that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ,
46015004	and that he was buried , and that he was raised on the third day according to the scriptures ,
46015005	and that he appeared to Cephas , then to the twelve .
46015006	Then he appeared to more than five hundred of the brothers and sisters at one time , most of whom are still alive , though some have fallen asleep .
46015007	Then he appeared to James , then to all the apostles .
46015008	Last of all , as though to one born at the wrong time , he appeared to me also .
46015009	For I am the least of the apostles , unworthy to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
46015010	But by the grace of God I am what I am , and his grace to me has not been in vain . In fact , I worked harder than all of them – yet not I , but the grace of God with me .
46015011	Whether then it was I or they , this is the way we preach and this is the way you believed .
46015012	Now if Christ is being preached as raised from the dead , how can some of you say there is no resurrection of the dead ?
46015013	But if there is no resurrection of the dead , then not even Christ has been raised .
46015014	And if Christ has not been raised , then our preaching is futile and your faith is empty .
46015015	Also , we are found to be false witnesses about God , because we have testified against God that he raised Christ from the dead , when in reality he did not raise him , if indeed the dead are not raised .
46015016	For if the dead are not raised , then not even Christ has been raised .
46015017	And if Christ has not been raised , your faith is useless ; you are still in your sins .
46015018	Furthermore , those who have fallen asleep in Christ have also perished .
46015019	For if only in this life we have hope in Christ , we should be pitied more than anyone .
46015020	But now Christ has been raised from the dead , the firstfruits of those who have fallen asleep .
46015021	For since death came through a man , the resurrection of the dead also came through a man .
46015022	For just as in Adam all die , so also in Christ all will be made alive .
46015023	But each in his own order : Christ , the firstfruits ; then when Christ comes , those who belong to him .
46015024	Then comes the end , when he hands over the kingdom to God the Father , when he has brought to an end all rule and all authority and power .
46015025	For he must reign until he has put all his enemies under his feet .
46015026	The last enemy to be eliminated is death .
46015027	For he has put everything in subjection under his feet . But when it says “ everything ” has been put in subjection , it is clear that this does not include the one who put everything in subjection to him .
46015028	And when all things are subjected to him , then the Son himself will be subjected to the one who subjected everything to him , so that God may be all in all .
46015029	Otherwise , what will those do who are baptized for the dead ? If the dead are not raised at all , then why are they baptized for them ?
46015030	Why too are we in danger every hour ?
46015031	Every day I am in danger of death ! This is as sure as my boasting in you , which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord .
46015032	If from a human point of view I fought with wild beasts at Ephesus , what did it benefit me ? If the dead are not raised , let us eat and drink , for tomorrow we die .
46015033	Do not be deceived : “ Bad company corrupts good morals . ”
46015034	Sober up as you should , and stop sinning ! For some have no knowledge of God – I say this to your shame !
46015035	But someone will say , “ How are the dead raised ? With what kind of body will they come ? ”
46015036	Fool ! What you sow will not come to life unless it dies .
46015037	And what you sow is not the body that is to be , but a bare seed – perhaps of wheat or something else .
46015038	But God gives it a body just as he planned , and to each of the seeds a body of its own .
46015039	All flesh is not the same : People have one flesh , animals have another , birds and fish another .
46015040	And there are heavenly bodies and earthly bodies . The glory of the heavenly body is one sort and the earthly another .
46015041	There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon and another glory of the stars , for star differs from star in glory .
46015042	It is the same with the resurrection of the dead . What is sown is perishable , what is raised is imperishable .
46015043	It is sown in dishonor , it is raised in glory ; it is sown in weakness , it is raised in power ;
46015044	it is sown a natural body , it is raised a spiritual body . If there is a natural body , there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	So also it is written , “ The first man , Adam , became a living person ” ; the last Adam became a life-giving spirit .
46015046	However , the spiritual did not come first , but the natural , and then the spiritual .
46015047	The first man is from the earth , made of dust ; the second man is from heaven .
46015048	Like the one made of dust , so too are those made of dust , and like the one from heaven , so too those who are heavenly .
46015049	And just as we have borne the image of the man of dust , let us also bear the image of the man of heaven .
46015050	Now this is what I am saying , brothers and sisters : Flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God , nor does the perishable inherit the imperishable .
46015051	Listen , I will tell you a mystery : We will not all sleep , but we will all be changed –
46015052	in a moment , in the blinking of an eye , at the last trumpet . For the trumpet will sound , and the dead will be raised imperishable , and we will be changed .
46015053	For this perishable body must put on the imperishable , and this mortal body must put on immortality .
46015054	Now when this perishable puts on the imperishable , and this mortal puts on immortality , then the saying that is written will happen , “ Death has been swallowed up in victory . ”
46015055	“ Where , O death , is your victory ? Where , O death , is your sting ? ”
46015056	The sting of death is sin , and the power of sin is the law .
46015057	But thanks be to God , who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ !
46015058	So then , dear brothers and sisters , be firm . Do not be moved ! Always be outstanding in the work of the Lord , knowing that your labor is not in vain in the Lord .
46016001	With regard to the collection for the saints , please follow the directions that I gave to the churches of Galatia :
46016002	On the first day of the week , each of you should set aside some income and save it to the extent that God has blessed you , so that a collection will not have to be made when I come .
46016003	Then , when I arrive , I will send those whom you approve with letters of explanation to carry your gift to Jerusalem .
46016004	And if it seems advisable that I should go also , they will go with me .
46016005	But I will come to you after I have gone through Macedonia – for I will be going through Macedonia –
46016006	and perhaps I will stay with you , or even spend the winter , so that you can send me on my journey , wherever I go .
46016007	For I do not want to see you now in passing , since I hope to spend some time with you , if the Lord allows .
46016008	But I will stay in Ephesus until Pentecost ,
46016009	because a door of great opportunity stands wide open for me , but there are many opponents .
46016010	Now if Timothy comes , see that he has nothing to fear among you , for he is doing the Lord’s work , as I am too .
46016011	So then , let no one treat him with contempt . But send him on his way in peace so that he may come to me . For I am expecting him with the brothers .
46016012	With regard to our brother Apollos : I strongly encouraged him to visit you with the other brothers , but it was simply not his intention to come now . He will come when he has the opportunity .
46016013	Stay alert , stand firm in the faith , show courage , be strong .
46016014	Everything you do should be done in love .
46016015	Now , brothers and sisters , you know about the household of Stephanus , that as the first converts of Achaia , they devoted themselves to ministry for the saints . I urge you
46016016	also to submit to people like this , and to everyone who cooperates in the work and labors hard .
46016017	I was glad about the arrival of Stephanus , Fortunatus , and Achaicus because they have supplied the fellowship with you that I lacked .
46016018	For they refreshed my spirit and yours . So then , recognize people like this .
46016019	The churches in the province of Asia send greetings to you . Aquila and Prisca greet you warmly in the Lord , with the church that meets in their house .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters send greetings . Greet one another with a holy kiss .
46016021	I , Paul , send this greeting with my own hand .
46016022	Let anyone who has no love for the Lord be accursed . Our Lord , come !
46016023	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you .
46016024	My love be with all of you in Christ Jesus .
47001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , to the church of God that is in Corinth , with all the saints who are in all Achaia .
47001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
47001003	Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies and God of all comfort ,
47001004	who comforts us in all our troubles so that we may be able to comfort those experiencing any trouble with the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by God .
47001005	For just as the sufferings of Christ overflow toward us , so also our comfort through Christ overflows to you .
47001006	But if we are afflicted , it is for your comfort and salvation ; if we are comforted , it is for your comfort that you experience in your patient endurance of the same sufferings that we also suffer .
47001007	And our hope for you is steadfast because we know that as you share in our sufferings , so also you will share in our comfort .
47001008	For we do not want you to be unaware , brothers and sisters , regarding the affliction that happened to us in the province of Asia , that we were burdened excessively , beyond our strength , so that we despaired even of living .
47001009	Indeed we felt as if the sentence of death had been passed against us , so that we would not trust in ourselves but in God who raises the dead .
47001010	He delivered us from so great a risk of death , and he will deliver us . We have set our hope on him that he will deliver us yet again ,
47001011	as you also join in helping us by prayer , so that many people may give thanks to God on our behalf for the gracious gift given to us through the help of many .
47001012	For our reason for confidence is this : the testimony of our conscience , that with pure motives and sincerity which are from God – not by human wisdom but by the grace of God – we conducted ourselves in the world , and all the more toward you .
47001013	For we do not write you anything other than what you can read and also understand . But I hope that you will understand completely
47001014	just as also you have partly understood us , that we are your source of pride just as you also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
47001015	And with this confidence I intended to come to you first so that you would get a second opportunity to see us ,
47001016	and through your help to go on into Macedonia and then from Macedonia to come back to you and be helped on our way into Judea by you .
47001017	Therefore when I was planning to do this , I did not do so without thinking about what I was doing , did I ? Or do I make my plans according to mere human standards so that I would be saying both “ Yes , yes ” and “ No , no ” at the same time ?
47001018	But as God is faithful , our message to you is not “ Yes ” and “ No . ”
47001019	For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , the one who was proclaimed among you by us – by me and Silvanus and Timothy – was not “ Yes ” and “ No , ” but it has always been “ Yes ” in him .
47001020	For every one of God’s promises are “ Yes ” in him ; therefore also through him the “ Amen ” is spoken , to the glory we give to God .
47001021	But it is God who establishes us together with you in Christ and who anointed us ,
47001022	who also sealed us and gave us the Spirit in our hearts as a down payment .
47001023	Now I appeal to God as my witness , that to spare you I did not come again to Corinth .
47001024	I do not mean that we rule over your faith , but we are workers with you for your joy , because by faith you stand firm .
47002001	So I made up my own mind not to pay you another painful visit .
47002002	For if I make you sad , who would be left to make me glad but the one I caused to be sad ?
47002003	And I wrote this very thing to you , so that when I came I would not have sadness from those who ought to make me rejoice , since I am confident in you all that my joy would be yours .
47002004	For out of great distress and anguish of heart I wrote to you with many tears , not to make you sad , but to let you know the love that I have especially for you .
47002005	But if anyone has caused sadness , he has not saddened me alone , but to some extent ( not to exaggerate ) he has saddened all of you as well .
47002006	This punishment on such an individual by the majority is enough for him ,
47002007	so that now instead you should rather forgive and comfort him . This will keep him from being overwhelmed by excessive grief to the point of despair .
47002008	Therefore I urge you to reaffirm your love for him .
47002009	For this reason also I wrote you : to test you to see if you are obedient in everything .
47002010	If you forgive anyone for anything , I also forgive him – for indeed what I have forgiven ( if I have forgiven anything ) I did so for you in the presence of Christ ,
47002011	so that we may not be exploited by Satan ( for we are not ignorant of his schemes ) .
47002012	Now when I arrived in Troas to proclaim the gospel of Christ , even though the Lord had opened a door of opportunity for me ,
47002013	I had no relief in my spirit , because I did not find my brother Titus there . So I said good-bye to them and set out for Macedonia .
47002014	But thanks be to God who always leads us in triumphal procession in Christ and who makes known through us the fragrance that consists of the knowledge of him in every place .
47002015	For we are a sweet aroma of Christ to God among those who are being saved and among those who are perishing –
47002016	to the latter an odor from death to death , but to the former a fragrance from life to life . And who is adequate for these things ?
47002017	For we are not like so many others , hucksters who peddle the word of God for profit , but we are speaking in Christ before God as persons of sincerity , as persons sent from God .
47003001	Are we beginning to commend ourselves again ? We don’t need letters of recommendation to you or from you as some other people do , do we ?
47003002	You yourselves are our letter , written on our hearts , known and read by everyone ,
47003003	revealing that you are a letter of Christ , delivered by us , written not with ink but by the Spirit of the living God , not on stone tablets but on tablets of human hearts .
47003004	Now we have such confidence in God through Christ .
47003005	Not that we are adequate in ourselves to consider anything as if it were coming from ourselves , but our adequacy is from God ,
47003006	who made us adequate to be servants of a new covenant not based on the letter but on the Spirit , for the letter kills , but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	But if the ministry that produced death – carved in letters on stone tablets – came with glory , so that the Israelites could not keep their eyes fixed on the face of Moses because of the glory of his face ( a glory which was made ineffective ) ,
47003008	how much more glorious will the ministry of the Spirit be ?
47003009	For if there was glory in the ministry that produced condemnation , how much more does the ministry that produces righteousness excel in glory !
47003010	For indeed , what had been glorious now has no glory because of the tremendously greater glory of what replaced it .
47003011	For if what was made ineffective came with glory , how much more has what remains come in glory !
47003012	Therefore , since we have such a hope , we behave with great boldness ,
47003013	and not like Moses who used to put a veil over his face to keep the Israelites from staring at the result of the glory that was made ineffective .
47003014	But their minds were closed . For to this very day , the same veil remains when they hear the old covenant read . It has not been removed because only in Christ is it taken away .
47003015	But until this very day whenever Moses is read , a veil lies over their minds ,
47003016	but when one turns to the Lord , the veil is removed .
47003017	Now the Lord is the Spirit , and where the Spirit of the Lord is present , there is freedom .
47003018	And we all , with unveiled faces reflecting the glory of the Lord , are being transformed into the same image from one degree of glory to another , which is from the Lord , who is the Spirit .
47004001	Therefore , since we have this ministry , just as God has shown us mercy , we do not become discouraged .
47004002	But we have rejected shameful hidden deeds , not behaving with deceptiveness or distorting the word of God , but by open proclamation of the truth we commend ourselves to everyone’s conscience before God .
47004003	But even if our gospel is veiled , it is veiled only to those who are perishing ,
47004004	among whom the god of this age has blinded the minds of those who do not believe so they would not see the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God .
47004005	For we do not proclaim ourselves , but Jesus Christ as Lord , and ourselves as your slaves for Jesus’ sake .
47004006	For God , who said “ Let light shine out of darkness , ” is the one who shined in our hearts to give us the light of the glorious knowledge of God in the face of Christ .
47004007	But we have this treasure in clay jars , so that the extraordinary power belongs to God and does not come from us .
47004008	We are experiencing trouble on every side , but are not crushed ; we are perplexed , but not driven to despair ;
47004009	we are persecuted , but not abandoned ; we are knocked down , but not destroyed ,
47004010	always carrying around in our body the death of Jesus , so that the life of Jesus may also be made visible in our body .
47004011	For we who are alive are constantly being handed over to death for Jesus’ sake , so that the life of Jesus may also be made visible in our mortal body .
47004012	As a result , death is at work in us , but life is at work in you .
47004013	But since we have the same spirit of faith as that shown in what has been written , “ I believed ; therefore I spoke , ” we also believe , therefore we also speak .
47004014	We do so because we know that the one who raised up Jesus will also raise us up with Jesus and will bring us with you into his presence .
47004015	For all these things are for your sake , so that the grace that is including more and more people may cause thanksgiving to increase to the glory of God .
47004016	Therefore we do not despair , but even if our physical body is wearing away , our inner person is being renewed day by day .
47004017	For our momentary , light suffering is producing for us an eternal weight of glory far beyond all comparison
47004018	because we are not looking at what can be seen but at what cannot be seen . For what can be seen is temporary , but what cannot be seen is eternal .
47005001	For we know that if our earthly house , the tent we live in , is dismantled , we have a building from God , a house not built by human hands , that is eternal in the heavens .
47005002	For in this earthly house we groan , because we desire to put on our heavenly dwelling ,
47005003	if indeed , after we have put on our heavenly house , we will not be found naked .
47005004	For we groan while we are in this tent , since we are weighed down , because we do not want to be unclothed , but clothed , so that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life .
47005005	Now the one who prepared us for this very purpose is God , who gave us the Spirit as a down payment .
47005006	Therefore we are always full of courage , and we know that as long as we are alive here on earth we are absent from the Lord –
47005007	for we live by faith , not by sight .
47005008	Thus we are full of courage and would prefer to be away from the body and at home with the Lord .
47005009	So then whether we are alive or away , we make it our ambition to please him .
47005010	For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ , so that each one may be paid back according to what he has done while in the body , whether good or evil .
47005011	Therefore , because we know the fear of the Lord , we try to persuade people , but we are well known to God , and I hope we are well known to your consciences too .
47005012	We are not trying to commend ourselves to you again , but are giving you an opportunity to be proud of us , so that you may be able to answer those who take pride in outward appearance and not in what is in the heart .
47005013	For if we are out of our minds , it is for God ; if we are of sound mind , it is for you .
47005014	For the love of Christ controls us , since we have concluded this , that Christ died for all ; therefore all have died .
47005015	And he died for all so that those who live should no longer live for themselves but for him who died for them and was raised .
47005016	So then from now on we acknowledge no one from an outward human point of view . Even though we have known Christ from such a human point of view , now we do not know him in that way any longer .
47005017	So then , if anyone is in Christ , he is a new creation ; what is old has passed away – look , what is new has come !
47005018	And all these things are from God who reconciled us to himself through Christ , and who has given us the ministry of reconciliation .
47005019	In other words , in Christ God was reconciling the world to himself , not counting people’s trespasses against them , and he has given us the message of reconciliation .
47005020	Therefore we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God were making His plea through us . We plead with you on Christ’s behalf , “ Be reconciled to God ! ”
47005021	God made the one who did not know sin to be sin for us , so that in him we would become the righteousness of God .
47006001	Now because we are fellow workers , we also urge you not to receive the grace of God in vain .
47006002	For he says , “ I heard you at the acceptable time , and in the day of salvation I helped you . ” Look , now is the acceptable time ; look , now is the day of salvation !
47006003	We do not give anyone an occasion for taking an offense in anything , so that no fault may be found with our ministry .
47006004	But as God’s servants , we have commended ourselves in every way , with great endurance , in persecutions , in difficulties , in distresses ,
47006005	in beatings , in imprisonments , in riots , in troubles , in sleepless nights , in hunger ,
47006006	by purity , by knowledge , by patience , by benevolence , by the Holy Spirit , by genuine love ,
47006007	by truthful teaching , by the power of God , with weapons of righteousness both for the right hand and for the left ,
47006008	through glory and dishonor , through slander and praise ; regarded as impostors , and yet true ;
47006009	as unknown , and yet well-known ; as dying and yet – see ! – we continue to live ; as those who are scourged and yet not executed ;
47006010	as sorrowful , but always rejoicing , as poor , but making many rich , as having nothing , and yet possessing everything .
47006011	We have spoken freely to you , Corinthians ; our heart has been opened wide to you .
47006012	Our affection for you is not restricted , but you are restricted in your affections for us .
47006013	Now as a fair exchange – I speak as to my children – open wide your hearts to us also .
47006014	Do not become partners with those who do not believe , for what partnership is there between righteousness and lawlessness , or what fellowship does light have with darkness ?
47006015	And what agreement does Christ have with Beliar ? Or what does a believer share in common with an unbeliever ?
47006016	And what mutual agreement does the temple of God have with idols ? For we are the temple of the living God , just as God said , “ I will live in them and will walk among them , and I will be their God , and they will be my people . ”
47006017	Therefore “ come out from their midst , and be separate , ” says the Lord , “ and touch no unclean thing , and I will welcome you ,
47006018	and I will be a father to you , and you will be my sons and daughters , ” says the All-Powerful Lord .
47007001	Therefore , since we have these promises , dear friends , let us cleanse ourselves from everything that could defile the body and the spirit , and thus accomplish holiness out of reverence for God .
47007002	Make room for us in your hearts ; we have wronged no one , we have ruined no one , we have exploited no one .
47007003	I do not say this to condemn you , for I told you before that you are in our hearts so that we die together and live together with you .
47007004	I have great confidence in you ; I take great pride on your behalf . I am filled with encouragement ; I am overflowing with joy in the midst of all our suffering .
47007005	For even when we came into Macedonia , our body had no rest at all , but we were troubled in every way – struggles from the outside , fears from within .
47007006	But God , who encourages the downhearted , encouraged us by the arrival of Titus .
47007007	We were encouraged not only by his arrival , but also by the encouragement you gave him , as he reported to us your longing , your mourning , your deep concern for me , so that I rejoiced more than ever .
47007008	For even if I made you sad by my letter , I do not regret having written it ( even though I did regret it , for I see that my letter made you sad , though only for a short time ) .
47007009	Now I rejoice , not because you were made sad , but because you were made sad to the point of repentance . For you were made sad as God intended , so that you were not harmed in any way by us .
47007010	For sadness as intended by God produces a repentance that leads to salvation , leaving no regret , but worldly sadness brings about death .
47007011	For see what this very thing , this sadness as God intended , has produced in you : what eagerness , what defense of yourselves , what indignation , what alarm , what longing , what deep concern , what punishment ! In everything you have proved yourselves to be innocent in this matter .
47007012	So then , even though I wrote to you , it was not on account of the one who did wrong , or on account of the one who was wronged , but to reveal to you your eagerness on our behalf before God .
47007013	Therefore we have been encouraged . And in addition to our own encouragement , we rejoiced even more at the joy of Titus , because all of you have refreshed his spirit .
47007014	For if I have boasted to him about anything concerning you , I have not been embarrassed by you , but just as everything we said to you was true , so our boasting to Titus about you has proved true as well .
47007015	And his affection for you is much greater when he remembers the obedience of you all , how you welcomed him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I rejoice because in everything I am fully confident in you .
47008001	Now we make known to you , brothers and sisters , the grace of God given to the churches of Macedonia ,
47008002	that during a severe ordeal of suffering , their abundant joy and their extreme poverty have overflowed in the wealth of their generosity .
47008003	For I testify , they gave according to their means and beyond their means . They did so voluntarily ,
47008004	begging us with great earnestness for the blessing and fellowship of helping the saints .
47008005	And they did this not just as we had hoped , but they gave themselves first to the Lord and to us by the will of God .
47008006	Thus we urged Titus that , just as he had previously begun this work , so also he should complete this act of kindness for you .
47008007	But as you excel in everything – in faith , in speech , in knowledge , and in all eagerness and in the love from us that is in you – make sure that you excel in this act of kindness too .
47008008	I am not saying this as a command , but I am testing the genuineness of your love by comparison with the eagerness of others .
47008009	For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that although he was rich , he became poor for your sakes , so that you by his poverty could become rich .
47008010	So here is my opinion on this matter : It is to your advantage , since you made a good start last year both in your giving and your desire to give ,
47008011	to finish what you started , so that just as you wanted to do it eagerly , you can also complete it according to your means .
47008012	For if the eagerness is present , the gift itself is acceptable according to whatever one has , not according to what he does not have .
47008013	For I do not say this so there would be relief for others and suffering for you , but as a matter of equality .
47008014	At the present time , your abundance will meet their need , so that one day their abundance may also meet your need , and thus there may be equality ,
47008015	as it is written : “ The one who gathered much did not have too much , and the one who gathered little did not have too little . ”
47008016	But thanks be to God who put in the heart of Titus the same devotion I have for you ,
