47008017	because he not only accepted our request , but since he was very eager , he is coming to you of his own accord .
47008018	And we are sending along with him the brother who is praised by all the churches for his work in spreading the gospel .
47008019	In addition , this brother has also been chosen by the churches as our traveling companion as we administer this generous gift to the glory of the Lord himself and to show our readiness to help .
47008020	We did this as a precaution so that no one should blame us in regard to this generous gift we are administering .
47008021	For we are concerned about what is right not only before the Lord but also before men .
47008022	And we are sending with them our brother whom we have tested many times and found eager in many matters , but who now is much more eager than ever because of the great confidence he has in you .
47008023	If there is any question about Titus , he is my partner and fellow worker among you ; if there is any question about our brothers , they are messengers of the churches , a glory to Christ .
47008024	Therefore show them openly before the churches the proof of your love and of our pride in you .
47009001	For it is not necessary for me to write you about this service to the saints ,
47009002	because I know your eagerness to help . I keep boasting to the Macedonians about this eagerness of yours , that Achaia has been ready to give since last year , and your zeal to participate has stirred up most of them .
47009003	But I am sending these brothers so that our boasting about you may not be empty in this case , so that you may be ready just as I kept telling them .
47009004	For if any of the Macedonians should come with me and find that you are not ready to give , we would be humiliated ( not to mention you ) by this confidence we had in you .
47009005	Therefore I thought it necessary to urge these brothers to go to you in advance and to arrange ahead of time the generous contribution you had promised , so this may be ready as a generous gift and not as something you feel forced to do .
47009006	My point is this : The person who sows sparingly will also reap sparingly , and the person who sows generously will also reap generously .
47009007	Each one of you should give just as he has decided in his heart , not reluctantly or under compulsion , because God loves a cheerful giver .
47009008	And God is able to make all grace overflow to you so that because you have enough of everything in every way at all times , you will overflow in every good work .
47009009	Just as it is written , “ He has scattered widely , he has given to the poor ; his righteousness remains forever . ”
47009010	Now God who provides seed for the sower and bread for food will provide and multiply your supply of seed and will cause the harvest of your righteousness to grow .
47009011	You will be enriched in every way so that you may be generous on every occasion , which is producing through us thanksgiving to God ,
47009012	because the service of this ministry is not only providing for the needs of the saints but is also overflowing with many thanks to God .
47009013	Through the evidence of this service they will glorify God because of your obedience to your confession in the gospel of Christ and the generosity of your sharing with them and with everyone .
47009014	And in their prayers on your behalf they long for you because of the extraordinary grace God has shown to you .
47009015	Thanks be to God for his indescribable gift !
47010001	Now I , Paul , appeal to you personally by the meekness and gentleness of Christ ( I who am meek when present among you , but am full of courage toward you when away ! ) –
47010002	now I ask that when I am present I may not have to be bold with the confidence that ( I expect ) I will dare to use against some who consider us to be behaving according to human standards .
47010003	For though we live as human beings , we do not wage war according to human standards ,
47010004	for the weapons of our warfare are not human weapons , but are made powerful by God for tearing down strongholds . We tear down arguments
47010005	and every arrogant obstacle that is raised up against the knowledge of God , and we take every thought captive to make it obey Christ .
47010006	We are also ready to punish every act of disobedience , whenever your obedience is complete .
47010007	You are looking at outward appearances . If anyone is confident that he belongs to Christ , he should reflect on this again : Just as he himself belongs to Christ , so too do we .
47010008	For if I boast somewhat more about our authority that the Lord gave us for building you up and not for tearing you down , I will not be ashamed of doing so .
47010009	I do not want to seem as though I am trying to terrify you with my letters ,
47010010	because some say , “ His letters are weighty and forceful , but his physical presence is weak and his speech is of no account . ”
47010011	Let such a person consider this : What we say by letters when we are absent , we also are in actions when we are present .
47010012	For we would not dare to classify or compare ourselves with some of those who recommend themselves . But when they measure themselves by themselves and compare themselves with themselves , they are without understanding .
47010013	But we will not boast beyond certain limits , but will confine our boasting according to the limits of the work to which God has appointed us , that reaches even as far as you .
47010014	For we were not overextending ourselves , as though we did not reach as far as you , because we were the first to reach as far as you with the gospel about Christ .
47010015	Nor do we boast beyond certain limits in the work done by others , but we hope that as your faith continues to grow , our work may be greatly expanded among you according to our limits ,
47010016	so that we may preach the gospel in the regions that lie beyond you , and not boast of work already done in another person’s area .
47010017	But the one who boasts must boast in the Lord .
47010018	For it is not the person who commends himself who is approved , but the person the Lord commends .
47011001	I wish that you would be patient with me in a little foolishness , but indeed you are being patient with me !
47011002	For I am jealous for you with godly jealousy , because I promised you in marriage to one husband , to present you as a pure virgin to Christ .
47011003	But I am afraid that just as the serpent deceived Eve by his treachery , your minds may be led astray from a sincere and pure devotion to Christ .
47011004	For if someone comes and proclaims another Jesus different from the one we proclaimed , or if you receive a different spirit than the one you received , or a different gospel than the one you accepted , you put up with it well enough !
47011005	For I consider myself not at all inferior to those “ super-apostles . ”
47011006	And even if I am unskilled in speaking , yet I am certainly not so in knowledge . Indeed , we have made this plain to you in everything in every way .
47011007	Or did I commit a sin by humbling myself so that you could be exalted , because I proclaimed the gospel of God to you free of charge ?
47011008	I robbed other churches by receiving support from them so that I could serve you !
47011009	When I was with you and was in need , I was not a burden to anyone , for the brothers who came from Macedonia fully supplied my needs . I kept myself from being a burden to you in any way , and will continue to do so .
47011010	As the truth of Christ is in me , this boasting of mine will not be stopped in the regions of Achaia .
47011011	Why ? Because I do not love you ? God knows I do !
47011012	And what I am doing I will continue to do , so that I may eliminate any opportunity for those who want a chance to be regarded as our equals in the things they boast about .
47011013	For such people are false apostles , deceitful workers , disguising themselves as apostles of Christ .
47011014	And no wonder , for even Satan disguises himself as an angel of light .
47011015	Therefore it is not surprising his servants also disguise themselves as servants of righteousness , whose end will correspond to their actions .
47011016	I say again , let no one think that I am a fool . But if you do , then at least accept me as a fool , so that I too may boast a little .
47011017	What I am saying with this boastful confidence I do not say the way the Lord would . Instead it is , as it were , foolishness .
47011018	Since many are boasting according to human standards , I too will boast .
47011019	For since you are so wise , you put up with fools gladly .
47011020	For you put up with it if someone makes slaves of you , if someone exploits you , if someone takes advantage of you , if someone behaves arrogantly toward you , if someone strikes you in the face .
47011021	( To my disgrace I must say that we were too weak for that ! ) But whatever anyone else dares to boast about ( I am speaking foolishly ) , I also dare to boast about the same thing .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they descendants of Abraham ? So am I .
47011023	Are they servants of Christ ? ( I am talking like I am out of my mind ! ) I am even more so : with much greater labors , with far more imprisonments , with more severe beatings , facing death many times .
47011024	Five times I received from the Jews forty lashes less one .
47011025	Three times I was beaten with a rod . Once I received a stoning . Three times I suffered shipwreck . A night and a day I spent adrift in the open sea .
47011026	I have been on journeys many times , in dangers from rivers , in dangers from robbers , in dangers from my own countrymen , in dangers from Gentiles , in dangers in the city , in dangers in the wilderness , in dangers at sea , in dangers from false brothers ,
47011027	in hard work and toil , through many sleepless nights , in hunger and thirst , many times without food , in cold and without enough clothing .
47011028	Apart from other things , there is the daily pressure on me of my anxious concern for all the churches .
47011029	Who is weak , and I am not weak ? Who is led into sin , and I do not burn with indignation ?
47011030	If I must boast , I will boast about the things that show my weakness .
47011031	The God and Father of the Lord Jesus , who is blessed forever , knows I am not lying .
47011032	In Damascus , the governor under King Aretas was guarding the city of Damascus in order to arrest me ,
47011033	but I was let down in a rope-basket through a window in the city wall , and escaped his hands .
47012001	It is necessary to go on boasting . Though it is not profitable , I will go on to visions and revelations from the Lord .
47012002	I know a man in Christ who fourteen years ago ( whether in the body or out of the body I do not know , God knows ) was caught up to the third heaven .
47012003	And I know that this man ( whether in the body or apart from the body I do not know , God knows )
47012004	was caught up into paradise and heard things too sacred to be put into words , things that a person is not permitted to speak .
47012005	On behalf of such an individual I will boast , but on my own behalf I will not boast , except about my weaknesses .
47012006	For even if I wish to boast , I will not be a fool , for I would be telling the truth , but I refrain from this so that no one may regard me beyond what he sees in me or what he hears from me ,
47012007	even because of the extraordinary character of the revelations . Therefore , so that I would not become arrogant , a thorn in the flesh was given to me , a messenger of Satan to trouble me – so that I would not become arrogant .
47012008	I asked the Lord three times about this , that it would depart from me .
47012009	But he said to me , “ My grace is enough for you , for my power is made perfect in weakness . ” So then , I will boast most gladly about my weaknesses , so that the power of Christ may reside in me .
47012010	Therefore I am content with weaknesses , with insults , with troubles , with persecutions and difficulties for the sake of Christ , for whenever I am weak , then I am strong .
47012011	I have become a fool . You yourselves forced me to do it , for I should have been commended by you . For I lack nothing in comparison to those “ super-apostles , ” even though I am nothing .
47012012	Indeed , the signs of an apostle were performed among you with great perseverance by signs and wonders and powerful deeds .
47012013	For how were you treated worse than the other churches , except that I myself was not a burden to you ? Forgive me this injustice !
47012014	Look , for the third time I am ready to come to you , and I will not be a burden to you , because I do not want your possessions , but you . For children should not have to save up for their parents , but parents for their children .
47012015	Now I will most gladly spend and be spent for your lives ! If I love you more , am I to be loved less ?
47012016	But be that as it may , I have not burdened you . Yet because I was a crafty person , I took you in by deceit !
47012017	I have not taken advantage of you through anyone I have sent to you , have I ?
47012018	I urged Titus to visit you and I sent our brother along with him . Titus did not take advantage of you , did he ? Did we not conduct ourselves in the same spirit ? Did we not behave in the same way ?
47012019	Have you been thinking all this time that we have been defending ourselves to you ? We are speaking in Christ before God , and everything we do , dear friends , is to build you up .
47012020	For I am afraid that somehow when I come I will not find you what I wish , and you will find me not what you wish . I am afraid that somehow there may be quarreling , jealousy , intense anger , selfish ambition , slander , gossip , arrogance , and disorder .
47012021	I am afraid that when I come again , my God may humiliate me before you , and I will grieve for many of those who previously sinned and have not repented of the impurity , sexual immorality , and licentiousness that they have practiced .
47013001	This is the third time I am coming to visit you . By the testimony of two or three witnesses every matter will be established .
47013002	I said before when I was present the second time and now , though absent , I say again to those who sinned previously and to all the rest , that if I come again , I will not spare anyone ,
47013003	since you are demanding proof that Christ is speaking through me . He is not weak toward you but is powerful among you .
47013004	For indeed he was crucified by reason of weakness , but he lives because of God’s power . For we also are weak in him , but we will live together with him , because of God’s power toward you .
47013005	Put yourselves to the test to see if you are in the faith ; examine yourselves ! Or do you not recognize regarding yourselves that Jesus Christ is in you – unless , indeed , you fail the test !
47013006	And I hope that you will realize that we have not failed the test !
47013007	Now we pray to God that you may not do anything wrong , not so that we may appear to have passed the test , but so that you may do what is right even if we may appear to have failed the test .
47013008	For we cannot do anything against the truth , but only for the sake of the truth .
47013009	For we rejoice whenever we are weak , but you are strong . And we pray for this : that you may become fully qualified .
47013010	Because of this I am writing these things while absent , so that when I arrive I may not have to deal harshly with you by using my authority – the Lord gave it to me for building up , not for tearing down !
47013011	Finally , brothers and sisters , rejoice , set things right , be encouraged , agree with one another , live in peace , and the God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Greet one another with a holy kiss . All the saints greet you .
47013013	
47013014	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ and the love of God and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all .
48001001	From Paul , an apostle ( not from men , nor by human agency , but by Jesus Christ and God the Father who raised him from the dead )
48001002	and all the brothers with me , to the churches of Galatia .
48001003	Grace and peace to you from God the Father and our Lord Jesus Christ ,
48001004	who gave himself for our sins to rescue us from this present evil age according to the will of our God and Father ,
48001005	to whom be glory forever and ever ! Amen .
48001006	I am astonished that you are so quickly deserting the one who called you by the grace of Christ and are following a different gospel –
48001007	not that there really is another gospel , but there are some who are disturbing you and wanting to distort the gospel of Christ .
48001008	But even if we ( or an angel from heaven ) should preach a gospel contrary to the one we preached to you , let him be condemned to hell !
48001009	As we have said before , and now I say again , if any one is preaching to you a gospel contrary to what you received , let him be condemned to hell !
48001010	Am I now trying to gain the approval of people , or of God ? Or am I trying to please people ? If I were still trying to please people , I would not be a slave of Christ !
48001011	Now I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that the gospel I preached is not of human origin .
48001012	For I did not receive it or learn it from any human source ; instead I received it by a revelation of Jesus Christ .
48001013	For you have heard of my former way of life in Judaism , how I was savagely persecuting the church of God and trying to destroy it .
48001014	I was advancing in Judaism beyond many of my contemporaries in my nation , and was extremely zealous for the traditions of my ancestors .
48001015	But when the one who set me apart from birth and called me by his grace was pleased
48001016	to reveal his Son in me so that I could preach him among the Gentiles , I did not go to ask advice from any human being ,
48001017	nor did I go up to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before me , but right away I departed to Arabia , and then returned to Damascus .
48001018	Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to visit Cephas and get information from him , and I stayed with him fifteen days .
48001019	But I saw none of the other apostles except James the Lord’s brother .
48001020	I assure you that , before God , I am not lying about what I am writing to you !
48001021	Afterward I went to the regions of Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	But I was personally unknown to the churches of Judea that are in Christ .
48001023	They were only hearing , “ The one who once persecuted us is now proclaiming the good news of the faith he once tried to destroy . ”
48001024	So they glorified God because of me .
48002001	Then after fourteen years I went up to Jerusalem again with Barnabas , taking Titus along too .
48002002	I went there because of a revelation and presented to them the gospel that I preach among the Gentiles . But I did so only in a private meeting with the influential people , to make sure that I was not running – or had not run – in vain .
48002003	Yet not even Titus , who was with me , was compelled to be circumcised , although he was a Greek .
48002004	Now this matter arose because of the false brothers with false pretenses who slipped in unnoticed to spy on our freedom that we have in Christ Jesus , to make us slaves .
48002005	But we did not surrender to them even for a moment , in order that the truth of the gospel would remain with you .
48002006	But from those who were influential ( whatever they were makes no difference to me ; God shows no favoritism between people ) – those influential leaders added nothing to my message .
48002007	On the contrary , when they saw that I was entrusted with the gospel to the uncircumcised just as Peter was to the circumcised
48002008	( for he who empowered Peter for his apostleship to the circumcised also empowered me for my apostleship to the Gentiles )
48002009	and when James , Cephas , and John , who had a reputation as pillars , recognized the grace that had been given to me , they gave to Barnabas and me the right hand of fellowship , agreeing that we would go to the Gentiles and they to the circumcised .
48002010	They requested only that we remember the poor , the very thing I also was eager to do .
48002011	But when Cephas came to Antioch , I opposed him to his face , because he had clearly done wrong .
48002012	Until certain people came from James , he had been eating with the Gentiles . But when they arrived , he stopped doing this and separated himself because he was afraid of those who were pro-circumcision .
48002013	And the rest of the Jews also joined with him in this hypocrisy , so that even Barnabas was led astray with them by their hypocrisy .
48002014	But when I saw that they were not behaving consistently with the truth of the gospel , I said to Cephas in front of them all , “ If you , although you are a Jew , live like a Gentile and not like a Jew , how can you try to force the Gentiles to live like Jews ? ”
48002015	We are Jews by birth and not Gentile sinners ,
48002016	yet we know that no one is justified by the works of the law but by the faithfulness of Jesus Christ . And we have come to believe in Christ Jesus , so that we may be justified by the faithfulness of Christ and not by the works of the law , because by the works of the law no one will be justified .
48002017	But if while seeking to be justified in Christ we ourselves have also been found to be sinners , is Christ then one who encourages sin ? Absolutely not !
48002018	But if I build up again those things I once destroyed , I demonstrate that I am one who breaks God’s law .
48002019	For through the law I died to the law so that I may live to God .
48002020	I have been crucified with Christ , and it is no longer I who live , but Christ lives in me . So the life I now live in the body , I live because of the faithfulness of the Son of God , who loved me and gave himself for me .
48002021	I do not set aside God’s grace , because if righteousness could come through the law , then Christ died for nothing !
48003001	You foolish Galatians ! Who has cast a spell on you ? Before your eyes Jesus Christ was vividly portrayed as crucified !
48003002	The only thing I want to learn from you is this : Did you receive the Spirit by doing the works of the law or by believing what you heard ?
48003003	Are you so foolish ? Although you began with the Spirit , are you now trying to finish by human effort ?
48003004	Have you suffered so many things for nothing ? – if indeed it was for nothing .
48003005	Does God then give you the Spirit and work miracles among you by your doing the works of the law or by your believing what you heard ?
48003006	Just as Abraham believed God , and it was credited to him as righteousness ,
48003007	so then , understand that those who believe are the sons of Abraham .
48003008	And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith , proclaimed the gospel to Abraham ahead of time , saying , “ All the nations will be blessed in you . ”
48003009	So then those who believe are blessed along with Abraham the believer .
48003010	For all who rely on doing the works of the law are under a curse , because it is written , “ Cursed is everyone who does not keep on doing everything written in the book of the law . ”
48003011	Now it is clear no one is justified before God by the law , because the righteous one will live by faith .
48003012	But the law is not based on faith , but the one who does the works of the law will live by them .
48003013	Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us ( because it is written , “ Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree ” )
48003014	in order that in Christ Jesus the blessing of Abraham would come to the Gentiles , so that we could receive the promise of the Spirit by faith .
48003015	Brothers and sisters , I offer an example from everyday life : When a covenant has been ratified , even though it is only a human contract , no one can set it aside or add anything to it .
48003016	Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his descendant . Scripture does not say , “ and to the descendants , ” referring to many , but “ and to your descendant , ” referring to one , who is Christ .
48003017	What I am saying is this : The law that came four hundred thirty years later does not cancel a covenant previously ratified by God , so as to invalidate the promise .
48003018	For if the inheritance is based on the law , it is no longer based on the promise , but God graciously gave it to Abraham through the promise .
48003019	Why then was the law given ? It was added because of transgressions , until the arrival of the descendant to whom the promise had been made . It was administered through angels by an intermediary .
48003020	Now an intermediary is not for one party alone , but God is one .
48003021	Is the law therefore opposed to the promises of God ? Absolutely not ! For if a law had been given that was able to give life , then righteousness would certainly have come by the law .
48003022	But the scripture imprisoned everything and everyone under sin so that the promise could be given – because of the faithfulness of Jesus Christ – to those who believe .
48003023	Now before faith came we were held in custody under the law , being kept as prisoners until the coming faith would be revealed .
48003024	Thus the law had become our guardian until Christ , so that we could be declared righteous by faith .
48003025	But now that faith has come , we are no longer under a guardian .
48003026	For in Christ Jesus you are all sons of God through faith .
48003027	For all of you who were baptized into Christ have clothed yourselves with Christ .
48003028	There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither slave nor free , there is neither male nor female – for all of you are one in Christ Jesus .
48003029	And if you belong to Christ , then you are Abraham’s descendants , heirs according to the promise .
48004001	Now I mean that the heir , as long as he is a minor , is no different from a slave , though he is the owner of everything .
48004002	But he is under guardians and managers until the date set by his father .
48004003	So also we , when we were minors , were enslaved under the basic forces of the world .
48004004	But when the appropriate time had come , God sent out his Son , born of a woman , born under the law ,
48004005	to redeem those who were under the law , so that we may be adopted as sons with full rights .
48004006	And because you are sons , God sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts , who calls “ Abba ! Father ! ”
48004007	So you are no longer a slave but a son , and if you are a son , then you are also an heir through God .
48004008	Formerly when you did not know God , you were enslaved to beings that by nature are not gods at all .
48004009	But now that you have come to know God ( or rather to be known by God ) , how can you turn back again to the weak and worthless basic forces ? Do you want to be enslaved to them all over again ?
48004010	You are observing religious days and months and seasons and years .
48004011	I fear for you that my work for you may have been in vain .
48004012	I beg you , brothers and sisters , become like me , because I have become like you . You have done me no wrong !
48004013	But you know it was because of a physical illness that I first proclaimed the gospel to you ,
48004014	and though my physical condition put you to the test , you did not despise or reject me . Instead , you welcomed me as though I were an angel of God , as though I were Christ Jesus himself !
48004015	Where then is your sense of happiness now ? For I testify about you that if it were possible , you would have pulled out your eyes and given them to me !
48004016	So then , have I become your enemy by telling you the truth ?
48004017	They court you eagerly , but for no good purpose ; they want to exclude you , so that you would seek them eagerly .
48004018	However , it is good to be sought eagerly for a good purpose at all times , and not only when I am present with you .
48004019	My children – I am again undergoing birth pains until Christ is formed in you !
48004020	I wish I could be with you now and change my tone of voice , because I am perplexed about you .
48004021	Tell me , you who want to be under the law , do you not understand the law ?
48004022	For it is written that Abraham had two sons , one by the slave woman and the other by the free woman .
48004023	But one , the son by the slave woman , was born by natural descent , while the other , the son by the free woman , was born through the promise .
48004024	These things may be treated as an allegory , for these women represent two covenants . One is from Mount Sinai bearing children for slavery ; this is Hagar .
48004025	Now Hagar represents Mount Sinai in Arabia and corresponds to the present Jerusalem , for she is in slavery with her children .
48004026	But the Jerusalem above is free , and she is our mother .
48004027	For it is written : “ Rejoice , O barren woman who does not bear children ; break forth and shout , you who have no birth pains , because the children of the desolate woman are more numerous than those of the woman who has a husband . ”
48004028	But you , brothers and sisters , are children of the promise like Isaac .
48004029	But just as at that time the one born by natural descent persecuted the one born according to the Spirit , so it is now .
48004030	But what does the scripture say ? “ Throw out the slave woman and her son , for the son of the slave woman will not share the inheritance with the son ” of the free woman .
48004031	Therefore , brothers and sisters , we are not children of the slave woman but of the free woman .
48005001	For freedom Christ has set us free . Stand firm , then , and do not be subject again to the yoke of slavery .
48005002	Listen ! I , Paul , tell you that if you let yourselves be circumcised , Christ will be of no benefit to you at all !
48005003	And I testify again to every man who lets himself be circumcised that he is obligated to obey the whole law .
48005004	You who are trying to be declared righteous by the law have been alienated from Christ ; you have fallen away from grace !
48005005	For through the Spirit , by faith , we wait expectantly for the hope of righteousness .
48005006	For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision carries any weight – the only thing that matters is faith working through love .
48005007	You were running well ; who prevented you from obeying the truth ?
48005008	This persuasion does not come from the one who calls you !
48005009	A little yeast makes the whole batch of dough rise !
48005010	I am confident in the Lord that you will accept no other view . But the one who is confusing you will pay the penalty , whoever he may be .
48005011	Now , brothers and sisters , if I am still preaching circumcision , why am I still being persecuted ? In that case the offense of the cross has been removed .
48005012	I wish those agitators would go so far as to castrate themselves !
48005013	For you were called to freedom , brothers and sisters ; only do not use your freedom as an opportunity to indulge your flesh , but through love serve one another .
48005014	For the whole law can be summed up in a single commandment , namely , “ You must love your neighbor as yourself . ”
48005015	However , if you continually bite and devour one another , beware that you are not consumed by one another .
48005016	But I say , live by the Spirit and you will not carry out the desires of the flesh .
48005017	For the flesh has desires that are opposed to the Spirit , and the Spirit has desires that are opposed to the flesh , for these are in opposition to each other , so that you cannot do what you want .
48005018	But if you are led by the Spirit , you are not under the law .
48005019	Now the works of the flesh are obvious : sexual immorality , impurity , depravity ,
48005020	idolatry , sorcery , hostilities , strife , jealousy , outbursts of anger , selfish rivalries , dissensions , factions ,
48005021	envying , murder , drunkenness , carousing , and similar things . I am warning you , as I had warned you before : Those who practice such things will not inherit the kingdom of God !
48005022	But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , and self-control . Against such things there is no law .
48005024	Now those who belong to Christ have crucified the flesh with its passions and desires .
48005025	If we live by the Spirit , let us also behave in accordance with the Spirit .
48005026	Let us not become conceited , provoking one another , being jealous of one another .
48006001	Brothers and sisters , if a person is discovered in some sin , you who are spiritual restore such a person in a spirit of gentleness . Pay close attention to yourselves , so that you are not tempted too .
48006002	Carry one another’s burdens , and in this way you will fulfill the law of Christ .
48006003	For if anyone thinks he is something when he is nothing , he deceives himself .
48006004	Let each one examine his own work . Then he can take pride in himself and not compare himself with someone else .
48006005	For each one will carry his own load .
48006006	Now the one who receives instruction in the word must share all good things with the one who teaches it .
48006007	Do not be deceived . God will not be made a fool . For a person will reap what he sows ,
48006008	because the person who sows to his own flesh will reap corruption from the flesh , but the one who sows to the Spirit will reap eternal life from the Spirit .
48006009	So we must not grow weary in doing good , for in due time we will reap , if we do not give up .
48006010	So then , whenever we have an opportunity , let us do good to all people , and especially to those who belong to the family of faith .
48006011	See what big letters I make as I write to you with my own hand !
48006012	Those who want to make a good showing in external matters are trying to force you to be circumcised . They do so only to avoid being persecuted for the cross of Christ .
48006013	For those who are circumcised do not obey the law themselves , but they want you to be circumcised so that they can boast about your flesh .
48006014	But may I never boast except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , through which the world has been crucified to me , and I to the world .
48006015	For neither circumcision nor uncircumcision counts for anything ; the only thing that matters is a new creation !
48006016	And all who will behave in accordance with this rule , peace and mercy be on them , and on the Israel of God .
48006017	From now on let no one cause me trouble , for I bear the marks of Jesus on my body .
48006018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit , brothers and sisters . Amen .
49001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , to the saints [ in Ephesus ] , the faithful in Christ Jesus .
49001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
49001003	Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly realms in Christ .
49001004	For he chose us in Christ before the foundation of the world that we may be holy and unblemished in his sight in love .
49001005	He did this by predestining us to adoption as his sons through Jesus Christ , according to the pleasure of his will –
49001006	to the praise of the glory of his grace that he has freely bestowed on us in his dearly loved Son .
49001007	In him we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of our trespasses , according to the riches of his grace
49001008	that he lavished on us in all wisdom and insight .
49001009	He did this when he revealed to us the secret of his will , according to his good pleasure that he set forth in Christ ,
49001010	toward the administration of the fullness of the times , to head up all things in Christ – the things in heaven and the things on earth .
49001011	In Christ we too have been claimed as God’s own possession , since we were predestined according to the one purpose of him who accomplishes all things according to the counsel of his will
49001012	so that we , who were the first to set our hope on Christ , would be to the praise of his glory .
49001013	And when you heard the word of truth ( the gospel of your salvation ) – when you believed in Christ – you were marked with the seal of the promised Holy Spirit ,
49001014	who is the down payment of our inheritance , until the redemption of God’s own possession , to the praise of his glory .
49001015	For this reason , because I have heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints ,
49001016	I do not cease to give thanks for you when I remember you in my prayers .
49001017	I pray that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give you spiritual wisdom and revelation in your growing knowledge of him ,
49001018	– since the eyes of your heart have been enlightened – so that you may know what is the hope of his calling , what is the wealth of his glorious inheritance in the saints ,
49001019	and what is the incomparable greatness of his power toward us who believe , as displayed in the exercise of his immense strength .
49001020	This power he exercised in Christ when he raised him from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms
49001021	far above every rule and authority and power and dominion and every name that is named , not only in this age but also in the one to come .
49001022	And God put all things under Christ’s feet , and he gave him to the church as head over all things .
49001023	Now the church is his body , the fullness of him who fills all in all .
49002001	And although you were dead in your transgressions and sins ,
49002002	in which you formerly lived according to this world’s present path , according to the ruler of the kingdom of the air , the ruler of the spirit that is now energizing the sons of disobedience ,
49002003	among whom all of us also formerly lived out our lives in the cravings of our flesh , indulging the desires of the flesh and the mind , and were by nature children of wrath even as the rest …
49002004	But God , being rich in mercy , because of his great love with which he loved us ,
49002005	even though we were dead in transgressions , made us alive together with Christ – by grace you are saved ! –
49002006	and he raised us up with him and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus ,
49002007	to demonstrate in the coming ages the surpassing wealth of his grace in kindness toward us in Christ Jesus .
49002008	For by grace you are saved through faith , and this is not from yourselves , it is the gift of God ;
49002009	it is not from works , so that no one can boast .
49002010	For we are his workmanship , having been created in Christ Jesus for good works that God prepared beforehand so we may do them .
49002011	Therefore remember that formerly you , the Gentiles in the flesh – who are called “ uncircumcision ” by the so-called “ circumcision ” that is performed on the body by human hands –
49002012	that you were at that time without the Messiah , alienated from the citizenship of Israel and strangers to the covenants of promise , having no hope and without God in the world .
49002013	But now in Christ Jesus you who used to be far away have been brought near by the blood of Christ .
49002014	For he is our peace , the one who made both groups into one and who destroyed the middle wall of partition , the hostility ,
49002015	when he nullified in his flesh the law of commandments in decrees . He did this to create in himself one new man out of two , thus making peace ,
49002016	and to reconcile them both in one body to God through the cross , by which the hostility has been killed .
49002017	And he came and preached peace to you who were far off and peace to those who were near ,
49002018	so that through him we both have access in one Spirit to the Father .
49002019	So then you are no longer foreigners and noncitizens , but you are fellow citizens with the saints and members of God’s household ,
49002020	because you have been built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets , with Christ Jesus himself as the cornerstone .
49002021	In him the whole building , being joined together , grows into a holy temple in the Lord ,
49002022	in whom you also are being built together into a dwelling place of God in the Spirit .
49003001	For this reason I , Paul , the prisoner of Christ Jesus for the sake of you Gentiles –
49003002	if indeed you have heard of the stewardship of God’s grace that was given to me for you ,
49003003	that by revelation the divine secret was made known to me , as I wrote before briefly .
49003004	When reading this , you will be able to understand my insight into this secret of Christ .
49003005	Now this secret was not disclosed to people in former generations as it has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ,
49003006	namely , that through the gospel the Gentiles are fellow heirs , fellow members of the body , and fellow partakers of the promise in Christ Jesus .
49003007	I became a servant of this gospel according to the gift of God’s grace that was given to me by the exercise of his power .
49003008	To me – less than the least of all the saints – this grace was given , to proclaim to the Gentiles the unfathomable riches of Christ
49003009	and to enlighten everyone about God’s secret plan – a secret that has been hidden for ages in God who has created all things .
49003010	The purpose of this enlightenment is that through the church the multifaceted wisdom of God should now be disclosed to the rulers and the authorities in the heavenly realms .
49003011	This was according to the eternal purpose that he accomplished in Christ Jesus our Lord ,
49003012	in whom we have boldness and confident access to God because of Christ’s faithfulness .
49003013	For this reason I ask you not to lose heart because of what I am suffering for you , which is your glory .
49003014	For this reason I kneel before the Father ,
49003015	from whom every family in heaven and on the earth is named .
49003016	I pray that according to the wealth of his glory he may grant you to be strengthened with power through his Spirit in the inner person ,
49003017	that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith , so that , because you have been rooted and grounded in love ,
49003018	you may be able to comprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and height and depth ,
49003019	and thus to know the love of Christ that surpasses knowledge , so that you may be filled up to all the fullness of God .
49003020	Now to him who by the power that is working within us is able to do far beyond all that we ask or think ,
49003021	to him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations , forever and ever . Amen .
49004001	I , therefore , the prisoner for the Lord , urge you to live worthily of the calling with which you have been called ,
49004002	with all humility and gentleness , with patience , bearing with one another in love ,
49004003	making every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
49004004	There is one body and one Spirit , just as you too were called to the one hope of your calling ,
49004005	one Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
49004006	one God and Father of all , who is over all and through all and in all .
49004007	But to each one of us grace was given according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
49004008	Therefore it says , “ When he ascended on high he captured captives ; he gave gifts to men . ”
49004009	Now what is the meaning of “ he ascended , ” except that he also descended to the lower regions , namely , the earth ?
49004010	He , the very one who descended , is also the one who ascended above all the heavens , in order to fill all things .
49004011	It was he who gave some as apostles , some as prophets , some as evangelists , and some as pastors and teachers ,
49004012	to equip the saints for the work of ministry , that is , to build up the body of Christ ,
49004013	until we all attain to the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Son of God – a mature person , attaining to the measure of Christ’s full stature .
49004014	So we are no longer to be children , tossed back and forth by waves and carried about by every wind of teaching by the trickery of people who craftily carry out their deceitful schemes .
49004015	But practicing the truth in love , we will in all things grow up into Christ , who is the head .
49004016	From him the whole body grows , fitted and held together through every supporting ligament . As each one does its part , the body grows in love .
49004017	So I say this , and insist in the Lord , that you no longer live as the Gentiles do , in the futility of their thinking .
49004018	They are darkened in their understanding , being alienated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them due to the hardness of their hearts .
49004019	Because they are callous , they have given themselves over to indecency for the practice of every kind of impurity with greediness .
49004020	But you did not learn about Christ like this ,
49004021	if indeed you heard about him and were taught in him , just as the truth is in Jesus .
49004022	You were taught with reference to your former way of life to lay aside the old man who is being corrupted in accordance with deceitful desires ,
49004023	to be renewed in the spirit of your mind ,
49004024	and to put on the new man who has been created in God’s image – in righteousness and holiness that comes from truth .
49004025	Therefore , having laid aside falsehood , each one of you speak the truth with his neighbor , for we are members of one another .
49004026	Be angry and do not sin ; do not let the sun go down on the cause of your anger .
49004027	Do not give the devil an opportunity .
49004028	The one who steals must steal no longer ; rather he must labor , doing good with his own hands , so that he may have something to share with the one who has need .
49004029	You must let no unwholesome word come out of your mouth , but only what is beneficial for the building up of the one in need , that it may give grace to those who hear .
49004030	And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God , by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption .
49004031	You must put away every kind of bitterness , anger , wrath , quarreling , and evil , slanderous talk .
49004032	Instead , be kind to one another , compassionate , forgiving one another , just as God in Christ also forgave you .
49005001	Therefore , be imitators of God as dearly loved children
49005002	and live in love , just as Christ also loved us and gave himself for us , a sacrificial and fragrant offering to God .
49005003	But among you there must not be either sexual immorality , impurity of any kind , or greed , as these are not fitting for the saints .
49005004	Neither should there be vulgar speech , foolish talk , or coarse jesting – all of which are out of character – but rather thanksgiving .
49005005	For you can be confident of this one thing : that no person who is immoral , impure , or greedy ( such a person is an idolater ) has any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and God .
49005006	Let nobody deceive you with empty words , for because of these things God’s wrath comes on the sons of disobedience .
49005007	Therefore do not be partakers with them ,
49005008	for you were at one time darkness , but now you are light in the Lord . Walk as children of the light –
49005009	for the fruit of the light consists in all goodness , righteousness , and truth –
49005010	trying to learn what is pleasing to the Lord .
49005011	Do not participate in the unfruitful deeds of darkness , but rather expose them .
49005012	For the things they do in secret are shameful even to mention .
49005013	But all things being exposed by the light are made evident .
49005014	For everything made evident is light , and for this reason it says : “ Awake , O sleeper ! Rise from the dead , and Christ will shine on you ! ”
49005015	Therefore be very careful how you live – not as unwise but as wise ,
49005016	taking advantage of every opportunity , because the days are evil .
49005017	For this reason do not be foolish , but be wise by understanding what the Lord’s will is .
49005018	And do not get drunk with wine , which is debauchery , but be filled by the Spirit ,
49005019	speaking to one another in psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs , singing and making music in your hearts to the Lord ,
49005020	always giving thanks to God the Father for each other in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
49005021	and submitting to one another out of reverence for Christ .
49005022	Wives , submit to your husbands as to the Lord ,
49005023	because the husband is the head of the wife as also Christ is the head of the church – he himself being the savior of the body .
49005024	But as the church submits to Christ , so also wives should submit to their husbands in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives just as Christ loved the church and gave himself for her
49005026	to sanctify her by cleansing her with the washing of the water by the word ,
49005027	so that he may present the church to himself as glorious – not having a stain or wrinkle , or any such blemish , but holy and blameless .
49005028	In the same way husbands ought to love their wives as their own bodies . He who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	For no one has ever hated his own body but he feeds it and takes care of it , just as Christ also does the church ,
49005030	for we are members of his body .
49005031	For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and will be joined to his wife , and the two will become one flesh .
49005032	This mystery is great – but I am actually speaking with reference to Christ and the church .
49005033	Nevertheless , each one of you must also love his own wife as he loves himself , and the wife must respect her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents in the Lord for this is right .
49006002	“ Honor your father and mother , ” which is the first commandment accompanied by a promise , namely ,
49006003	“ that it may go well with you and that you will live a long time on the earth . ”
49006004	Fathers , do not provoke your children to anger , but raise them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord .
49006005	Slaves , obey your human masters with fear and trembling , in the sincerity of your heart as to Christ ,
49006006	not like those who do their work only when someone is watching – as people-pleasers – but as slaves of Christ doing the will of God from the heart .
49006007	Obey with enthusiasm , as though serving the Lord and not people ,
49006008	because you know that each person , whether slave or free , if he does something good , this will be rewarded by the Lord .
49006009	Masters , treat your slaves the same way , giving up the use of threats , because you know that both you and they have the same master in heaven , and there is no favoritism with him .
49006010	Finally , be strengthened in the Lord and in the strength of his power .
49006011	Clothe yourselves with the full armor of God so that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil .
49006012	For our struggle is not against flesh and blood , but against the rulers , against the powers , against the world rulers of this darkness , against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavens .
49006013	For this reason , take up the full armor of God so that you may be able to stand your ground on the evil day , and having done everything , to stand .
49006014	Stand firm therefore , by fastening the belt of truth around your waist , by putting on the breastplate of righteousness ,
49006015	by fitting your feet with the preparation that comes from the good news of peace ,
49006016	and in all of this , by taking up the shield of faith with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one .
49006017	And take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God .
49006018	With every prayer and petition , pray at all times in the Spirit , and to this end be alert , with all perseverance and requests for all the saints .
49006019	Pray for me also , that I may be given the message when I begin to speak – that I may confidently make known the mystery of the gospel ,
49006020	for which I am an ambassador in chains . Pray that I may be able to speak boldly as I ought to speak .
49006021	Tychicus , my dear brother and faithful servant in the Lord , will make everything known to you , so that you too may know about my circumstances , how I am doing .
49006022	I have sent him to you for this very purpose , that you may know our circumstances and that he may encourage your hearts .
49006023	Peace to the brothers and sisters , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
49006024	Grace be with all of those who love our Lord Jesus Christ with an undying love .
50001001	From Paul and Timothy , slaves of Christ Jesus , to all the saints in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi , with the overseers and deacons .
50001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
50001003	I thank my God every time I remember you .
50001004	I always pray with joy in my every prayer for all of you
50001005	because of your participation in the gospel from the first day until now .
50001006	For I am sure of this very thing , that the one who began a good work in you will perfect it until the day of Christ Jesus .
50001007	For it is right for me to think this about all of you , because I have you in my heart , since both in my imprisonment and in the defense and confirmation of the gospel all of you became partners in God’s grace together with me .
50001008	For God is my witness that I long for all of you with the affection of Christ Jesus .
50001009	And I pray this , that your love may abound even more and more in knowledge and every kind of insight
50001010	so that you can decide what is best , and thus be sincere and blameless for the day of Christ ,
50001011	filled with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus Christ to the glory and praise of God .
50001012	I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that my situation has actually turned out to advance the gospel :
50001013	The whole imperial guard and everyone else knows that I am in prison for the sake of Christ ,
50001014	and most of the brothers and sisters , having confidence in the Lord because of my imprisonment , now more than ever dare to speak the word fearlessly .
50001015	Some , to be sure , are preaching Christ from envy and rivalry , but others from goodwill .
50001016	The latter do so from love because they know that I am placed here for the defense of the gospel .
50001017	The former proclaim Christ from selfish ambition , not sincerely , because they think they can cause trouble for me in my imprisonment .
50001018	What is the result ? Only that in every way , whether in pretense or in truth , Christ is being proclaimed , and in this I rejoice . Yes , and I will continue to rejoice ,
50001019	for I know that this will turn out for my deliverance through your prayers and the help of the Spirit of Jesus Christ .
50001020	My confident hope is that I will in no way be ashamed but that with complete boldness , even now as always , Christ will be exalted in my body , whether I live or die .
50001021	For to me , living is Christ and dying is gain .
50001022	Now if I am to go on living in the body , this will mean productive work for me , yet I don’t know which I prefer :
50001023	I feel torn between the two , because I have a desire to depart and be with Christ , which is better by far ,
50001024	but it is more vital for your sake that I remain in the body .
50001025	And since I am sure of this , I know that I will remain and continue with all of you for the sake of your progress and joy in the faith ,
50001026	so that what you can be proud of may increase because of me in Christ Jesus , when I come back to you .
50001027	Only conduct yourselves in a manner worthy of the gospel of Christ so that – whether I come and see you or whether I remain absent – I should hear that you are standing firm in one spirit , with one mind , by contending side by side for the faith of the gospel ,
50001028	and by not being intimidated in any way by your opponents . This is a sign of their destruction , but of your salvation – a sign which is from God .
50001029	For it has been granted to you not only to believe in Christ but also to suffer for him ,
50001030	since you are encountering the same conflict that you saw me face and now hear that I am facing .
50002001	Therefore , if there is any encouragement in Christ , any comfort provided by love , any fellowship in the Spirit , any affection or mercy ,
50002002	complete my joy and be of the same mind , by having the same love , being united in spirit , and having one purpose .
50002003	Instead of being motivated by selfish ambition or vanity , each of you should , in humility , be moved to treat one another as more important than yourself .
50002004	Each of you should be concerned not only about your own interests , but about the interests of others as well .
50002005	You should have the same attitude toward one another that Christ Jesus had ,
50002006	who though he existed in the form of God did not regard equality with God as something to be grasped ,
50002007	but emptied himself by taking on the form of a slave , by looking like other men , and by sharing in human nature .
50002008	He humbled himself , by becoming obedient to the point of death – even death on a cross !
50002009	As a result God exalted him and gave him the name that is above every name ,
50002010	so that at the name of Jesus every knee will bow – in heaven and on earth and under the earth –
50002011	and every tongue confess that Jesus Christ is Lord to the glory of God the Father .
50002012	So then , my dear friends , just as you have always obeyed , not only in my presence but even more in my absence , continue working out your salvation with awe and reverence ,
50002013	for the one bringing forth in you both the desire and the effort – for the sake of his good pleasure – is God .
50002014	Do everything without grumbling or arguing ,
50002015	so that you may be blameless and pure , children of God without blemish though you live in a crooked and perverse society , in which you shine as lights in the world
50002016	by holding on to the word of life so that on the day of Christ I will have a reason to boast that I did not run in vain nor labor in vain .
50002017	But even if I am being poured out like a drink offering on the sacrifice and service of your faith , I am glad and rejoice together with all of you .
50002018	And in the same way you also should be glad and rejoice together with me .
50002019	Now I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon , so that I too may be encouraged by hearing news about you .
50002020	For there is no one here like him who will readily demonstrate his deep concern for you .
50002021	Others are busy with their own concerns , not those of Jesus Christ .
50002022	But you know his qualifications , that like a son working with his father , he served with me in advancing the gospel .
50002023	So I hope to send him as soon as I know more about my situation ,
50002024	though I am confident in the Lord that I too will be coming to see you soon .
50002025	But for now I have considered it necessary to send Epaphroditus to you . For he is my brother , coworker and fellow soldier , and your messenger and minister to me in my need .
50002026	Indeed , he greatly missed all of you and was distressed because you heard that he had been ill .
50002027	In fact he became so ill that he nearly died . But God showed mercy to him – and not to him only , but also to me – so that I would not have grief on top of grief .
50002028	Therefore I am all the more eager to send him , so that when you see him again you can rejoice and I can be free from anxiety .
50002029	So welcome him in the Lord with great joy , and honor people like him ,
50002030	since it was because of the work of Christ that he almost died . He risked his life so that he could make up for your inability to serve me .
50003001	Finally , my brothers and sisters , rejoice in the Lord ! To write this again is no trouble to me , and it is a safeguard for you .
50003002	Beware of the dogs , beware of the evil workers , beware of those who mutilate the flesh !
50003003	For we are the circumcision , the ones who worship by the Spirit of God , exult in Christ Jesus , and do not rely on human credentials
50003004	– though mine too are significant . If someone thinks he has good reasons to put confidence in human credentials , I have more :
50003005	I was circumcised on the eighth day , from the people of Israel and the tribe of Benjamin , a Hebrew of Hebrews . I lived according to the law as a Pharisee .
50003006	In my zeal for God I persecuted the church . According to the righteousness stipulated in the law I was blameless .
50003007	But these assets I have come to regard as liabilities because of Christ .
50003008	More than that , I now regard all things as liabilities compared to the far greater value of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord , for whom I have suffered the loss of all things – indeed , I regard them as dung ! – that I may gain Christ ,
50003009	and be found in him , not because I have my own righteousness derived from the law , but because I have the righteousness that comes by way of Christ’s faithfulness – a righteousness from God that is in fact based on Christ’s faithfulness .
50003010	My aim is to know him , to experience the power of his resurrection , to share in his sufferings , and to be like him in his death ,
50003011	and so , somehow , to attain to the resurrection from the dead .
50003012	Not that I have already attained this – that is , I have not already been perfected – but I strive to lay hold of that for which Christ Jesus also laid hold of me .
50003013	Brothers and sisters , I do not consider myself to have attained this . Instead I am single-minded : Forgetting the things that are behind and reaching out for the things that are ahead ,
50003014	with this goal in mind , I strive toward the prize of the upward call of God in Christ Jesus .
50003015	Therefore let those of us who are “ perfect ” embrace this point of view . If you think otherwise , God will reveal to you the error of your ways .
50003016	Nevertheless , let us live up to the standard that we have already attained .
50003017	Be imitators of me , brothers and sisters , and watch carefully those who are living this way , just as you have us as an example .
50003018	For many live , about whom I have often told you , and now , with tears , I tell you that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ .
50003019	Their end is destruction , their god is the belly , they exult in their shame , and they think about earthly things .
50003020	But our citizenship is in heaven – and we also await a savior from there , the Lord Jesus Christ ,
50003021	who will transform these humble bodies of ours into the likeness of his glorious body by means of that power by which he is able to subject all things to himself .
50004001	So then , my brothers and sisters , dear friends whom I long to see , my joy and crown , stand in the Lord in this way , my dear friends !
50004002	I appeal to Euodia and to Syntyche to agree in the Lord .
50004003	Yes , I say also to you , true companion , help them . They have struggled together in the gospel ministry along with me and Clement and my other coworkers , whose names are in the book of life .
50004004	Rejoice in the Lord always . Again I say , rejoice !
50004005	Let everyone see your gentleness . The Lord is near !
50004006	Do not be anxious about anything . Instead , in every situation , through prayer and petition with thanksgiving , tell your requests to God .
50004007	And the peace of God that surpasses all understanding will guard your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus .
50004008	Finally , brothers and sisters , whatever is true , whatever is worthy of respect , whatever is just , whatever is pure , whatever is lovely , whatever is commendable , if something is excellent or praiseworthy , think about these things .
50004009	And what you learned and received and heard and saw in me , do these things . And the God of peace will be with you .
50004010	I have great joy in the Lord because now at last you have again expressed your concern for me . ( Now I know you were concerned before but had no opportunity to do anything . )
50004011	I am not saying this because I am in need , for I have learned to be content in any circumstance .
50004012	I have experienced times of need and times of abundance . In any and every circumstance I have learned the secret of contentment , whether I go satisfied or hungry , have plenty or nothing .
50004013	I am able to do all things through the one who strengthens me .
50004014	Nevertheless , you did well to share with me in my trouble .
50004015	And as you Philippians know , at the beginning of my gospel ministry , when I left Macedonia , no church shared with me in this matter of giving and receiving except you alone .
50004016	For even in Thessalonica on more than one occasion you sent something for my need .
50004017	I do not say this because I am seeking a gift . Rather , I seek the credit that abounds to your account .
50004018	For I have received everything , and I have plenty . I have all I need because I received from Epaphroditus what you sent – a fragrant offering , an acceptable sacrifice , very pleasing to God .
50004019	And my God will supply your every need according to his glorious riches in Christ Jesus .
50004020	May glory be given to God our Father forever and ever . Amen .
50004021	Give greetings to all the saints in Christ Jesus . The brothers with me here send greetings .
50004022	All the saints greet you , especially those who belong to Caesar’s household .
50004023	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
51001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , and Timothy our brother ,
51001002	to the saints , the faithful brothers and sisters in Christ , at Colossae . Grace and peace to you from God our Father !
51001003	We always give thanks to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , when we pray for you ,
51001004	since we heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and the love that you have for all the saints .
51001005	Your faith and love have arisen from the hope laid up for you in heaven , which you have heard about in the message of truth , the gospel
51001006	that has come to you . Just as in the entire world this gospel is bearing fruit and growing , so it has also been bearing fruit and growing among you from the first day you heard it and understood the grace of God in truth .
51001007	You learned the gospel from Epaphras , our dear fellow slave – a faithful minister of Christ on our behalf –
51001008	who also told us of your love in the Spirit .
51001009	For this reason we also , from the day we heard about you , have not ceased praying for you and asking God to fill you with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding ,
51001010	so that you may live worthily of the Lord and please him in all respects – bearing fruit in every good deed , growing in the knowledge of God ,
51001011	being strengthened with all power according to his glorious might for the display of all patience and steadfastness , joyfully
51001012	giving thanks to the Father who has qualified you to share in the saints’ inheritance in the light .
51001013	He delivered us from the power of darkness and transferred us to the kingdom of the Son he loves ,
51001014	in whom we have redemption , the forgiveness of sins .
51001015	He is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn over all creation ,
51001016	for all things in heaven and on earth were created by him – all things , whether visible or invisible , whether thrones or dominions , whether principalities or powers – all things were created through him and for him .
51001017	He himself is before all things and all things are held together in him .
51001018	He is the head of the body , the church , as well as the beginning , the firstborn from among the dead , so that he himself may become first in all things .
51001019	For God was pleased to have all his fullness dwell in the Son
51001020	and through him to reconcile all things to himself by making peace through the blood of his cross – through him , whether things on earth or things in heaven .
51001021	And you were at one time strangers and enemies in your minds as expressed through your evil deeds ,
51001022	but now he has reconciled you by his physical body through death to present you holy , without blemish , and blameless before him –
51001023	if indeed you remain in the faith , established and firm , without shifting from the hope of the gospel that you heard . This gospel has also been preached in all creation under heaven , and I , Paul , have become its servant .
51001024	Now I rejoice in my sufferings for you , and I fill up in my physical body – for the sake of his body , the church – what is lacking in the sufferings of Christ .
51001025	I became a servant of the church according to the stewardship from God – given to me for you – in order to complete the word of God ,
51001026	that is , the mystery that has been kept hidden from ages and generations , but has now been revealed to his saints .
51001027	God wanted to make known to them the glorious riches of this mystery among the Gentiles , which is Christ in you , the hope of glory .
51001028	We proclaim him by instructing and teaching all people with all wisdom so that we may present every person mature in Christ .
51001029	Toward this goal I also labor , struggling according to his power that powerfully works in me .
51002001	For I want you to know how great a struggle I have for you , and for those in Laodicea , and for those who have not met me face to face .
51002002	My goal is that their hearts , having been knit together in love , may be encouraged , and that they may have all the riches that assurance brings in their understanding of the knowledge of the mystery of God , namely , Christ ,
51002003	in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
51002004	I say this so that no one will deceive you through arguments that sound reasonable .
51002005	For though I am absent from you in body , I am present with you in spirit , rejoicing to see your morale and the firmness of your faith in Christ .
51002006	Therefore , just as you received Christ Jesus as Lord , continue to live your lives in him ,
51002007	rooted and built up in him and firm in your faith just as you were taught , and overflowing with thankfulness .
51002008	Be careful not to allow anyone to captivate you through an empty , deceitful philosophy that is according to human traditions and the elemental spirits of the world , and not according to Christ .
51002009	For in him all the fullness of deity lives in bodily form ,
51002010	and you have been filled in him , who is the head over every ruler and authority .
51002011	In him you also were circumcised – not , however , with a circumcision performed by human hands , but by the removal of the fleshly body , that is , through the circumcision done by Christ .
51002012	Having been buried with him in baptism , you also have been raised with him through your faith in the power of God who raised him from the dead .
51002013	And even though you were dead in your transgressions and in the uncircumcision of your flesh , he nevertheless made you alive with him , having forgiven all your transgressions .
51002014	He has destroyed what was against us , a certificate of indebtedness expressed in decrees opposed to us . He has taken it away by nailing it to the cross .
51002015	Disarming the rulers and authorities , he has made a public disgrace of them , triumphing over them by the cross .
51002016	Therefore do not let anyone judge you with respect to food or drink , or in the matter of a feast , new moon , or Sabbath days –
51002017	these are only the shadow of the things to come , but the reality is Christ !
51002018	Let no one who delights in humility and the worship of angels pass judgment on you . That person goes on at great lengths about what he has supposedly seen , but he is puffed up with empty notions by his fleshly mind .
51002019	He has not held fast to the head from whom the whole body , supported and knit together through its ligaments and sinews , grows with a growth that is from God .
51002020	If you have died with Christ to the elemental spirits of the world , why do you submit to them as though you lived in the world ?
51002021	“ Do not handle ! Do not taste ! Do not touch ! ”
51002022	These are all destined to perish with use , founded as they are on human commands and teachings .
51002023	Even though they have the appearance of wisdom with their self-imposed worship and false humility achieved by an unsparing treatment of the body – a wisdom with no true value – they in reality result in fleshly indulgence .
51003001	Therefore , if you have been raised with Christ , keep seeking the things above , where Christ is , seated at the right hand of God .
51003002	Keep thinking about things above , not things on the earth ,
51003003	for you have died and your life is hidden with Christ in God .
51003004	When Christ ( who is your life ) appears , then you too will be revealed in glory with him .
51003005	So put to death whatever in your nature belongs to the earth : sexual immorality , impurity , shameful passion , evil desire , and greed which is idolatry .
51003006	Because of these things the wrath of God is coming on the sons of disobedience .
51003007	You also lived your lives in this way at one time , when you used to live among them .
51003008	But now , put off all such things as anger , rage , malice , slander , abusive language from your mouth .
51003009	Do not lie to one another since you have put off the old man with its practices
51003010	and have been clothed with the new man that is being renewed in knowledge according to the image of the one who created it .
51003011	Here there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcised or uncircumcised , barbarian , Scythian , slave or free , but Christ is all and in all .
51003012	Therefore , as the elect of God , holy and dearly loved , clothe yourselves with a heart of mercy , kindness , humility , gentleness , and patience ,
51003013	bearing with one another and forgiving one another , if someone happens to have a complaint against anyone else . Just as the Lord has forgiven you , so you also forgive others .
51003014	And to all these virtues add love , which is the perfect bond .
51003015	Let the peace of Christ be in control in your heart ( for you were in fact called as one body to this peace ) , and be thankful .
51003016	Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly , teaching and exhorting one another with all wisdom , singing psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs , all with grace in your hearts to God .
51003017	And whatever you do in word or deed , do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God the Father through him .
51003018	Wives , submit to your husbands , as is fitting in the Lord .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives and do not be embittered against them .
51003020	Children , obey your parents in everything , for this is pleasing in the Lord .
51003021	Fathers , do not provoke your children , so they will not become disheartened .
51003022	Slaves , obey your earthly masters in every respect , not only when they are watching – like those who are strictly people-pleasers – but with a sincere heart , fearing the Lord .
51003023	Whatever you are doing , work at it with enthusiasm , as to the Lord and not for people ,
51003024	because you know that you will receive your inheritance from the Lord as the reward . Serve the Lord Christ .
51003025	For the one who does wrong will be repaid for his wrong , and there are no exceptions .
51004001	Masters , treat your slaves with justice and fairness , because you know that you also have a master in heaven .
51004002	Be devoted to prayer , keeping alert in it with thanksgiving .
51004003	At the same time pray for us too , that God may open a door for the message so that we may proclaim the mystery of Christ , for which I am in chains .
51004004	Pray that I may make it known as I should .
51004005	Conduct yourselves with wisdom toward outsiders , making the most of the opportunities .
51004006	Let your speech always be gracious , seasoned with salt , so that you may know how you should answer everyone .
51004007	Tychicus , a dear brother , faithful minister , and fellow slave in the Lord , will tell you all the news about me .
51004008	I sent him to you for this very purpose , that you may know how we are doing and that he may encourage your hearts .
51004009	I sent him with Onesimus , the faithful and dear brother , who is one of you . They will tell you about everything here .
51004010	Aristarchus , my fellow prisoner , sends you greetings , as does Mark , the cousin of Barnabas ( about whom you received instructions ; if he comes to you , welcome him ) .
51004011	And Jesus who is called Justus also sends greetings . In terms of Jewish converts , these are the only fellow workers for the kingdom of God , and they have been a comfort to me .
51004012	Epaphras , who is one of you and a slave of Christ , greets you . He is always struggling in prayer on your behalf , so that you may stand mature and fully assured in all the will of God .
51004013	For I can testify that he has worked hard for you and for those in Laodicea and Hierapolis .
51004014	Our dear friend Luke the physician and Demas greet you .
51004015	Give my greetings to the brothers and sisters who are in Laodicea and to Nympha and the church that meets in her house .
51004016	And after you have read this letter , have it read to the church of Laodicea . In turn , read the letter from Laodicea as well .
51004017	And tell Archippus , “ See to it that you complete the ministry you received in the Lord . ”
51004018	I , Paul , write this greeting by my own hand . Remember my chains . Grace be with you .
52001001	From Paul and Silvanus and Timothy , to the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ . Grace and peace to you !
52001002	We thank God always for all of you as we mention you constantly in our prayers ,
52001003	because we recall in the presence of our God and Father your work of faith and labor of love and endurance of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ .
52001004	We know , brothers and sisters loved by God , that he has chosen you ,
52001005	in that our gospel did not come to you merely in words , but in power and in the Holy Spirit and with deep conviction ( surely you recall the character we displayed when we came among you to help you ) .
