52001006	And you became imitators of us and of the Lord , when you received the message with joy that comes from the Holy Spirit , despite great affliction .
52001007	As a result you became an example to all the believers in Macedonia and in Achaia .
52001008	For from you the message of the Lord has echoed forth not just in Macedonia and Achaia , but in every place reports of your faith in God have spread , so that we do not need to say anything .
52001009	For people everywhere report how you welcomed us and how you turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God
52001010	and to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , Jesus our deliverer from the coming wrath .
52002001	For you yourselves know , brothers and sisters , about our coming to you – it has not proven to be purposeless .
52002002	But although we suffered earlier and were mistreated in Philippi , as you know , we had the courage in our God to declare to you the gospel of God in spite of much opposition .
52002003	For the appeal we make does not come from error or impurity or with deceit ,
52002004	but just as we have been approved by God to be entrusted with the gospel , so we declare it , not to please people but God , who examines our hearts .
52002005	For we never appeared with flattering speech , as you know , nor with a pretext for greed – God is our witness –
52002006	nor to seek glory from people , either from you or from others ,
52002007	although we could have imposed our weight as apostles of Christ ; instead we became little children among you . Like a nursing mother caring for her own children ,
52002008	with such affection for you we were happy to share with you not only the gospel of God but also our own lives , because you had become dear to us .
52002009	For you recall , brothers and sisters , our toil and drudgery : By working night and day so as not to impose a burden on any of you , we preached to you the gospel of God .
52002010	You are witnesses , and so is God , as to how holy and righteous and blameless our conduct was toward you who believe .
52002011	As you know , we treated each one of you as a father treats his own children ,
52002012	exhorting and encouraging you and insisting that you live in a way worthy of God who calls you to his own kingdom and his glory .
52002013	And so we too constantly thank God that when you received God’s message that you heard from us , you accepted it not as a human message , but as it truly is , God’s message , which is at work among you who believe .
52002014	For you became imitators , brothers and sisters , of God’s churches in Christ Jesus that are in Judea , because you too suffered the same things from your own countrymen as they in fact did from the Jews ,
52002015	who killed both the Lord Jesus and the prophets and persecuted us severely . They are displeasing to God and are opposed to all people ,
52002016	because they hinder us from speaking to the Gentiles so that they may be saved . Thus they constantly fill up their measure of sins , but wrath has come upon them completely .
52002017	But when we were separated from you , brothers and sisters , for a short time ( in presence , not in affection ) we became all the more fervent in our great desire to see you in person .
52002018	For we wanted to come to you ( I , Paul , in fact tried again and again ) but Satan thwarted us .
52002019	For who is our hope or joy or crown to boast of before our Lord Jesus at his coming ? Is it not of course you ?
52002020	For you are our glory and joy !
52003001	So when we could bear it no longer , we decided to stay on in Athens alone .
52003002	We sent Timothy , our brother and fellow worker for God in the gospel of Christ , to strengthen you and encourage you about your faith ,
52003003	so that no one would be shaken by these afflictions . For you yourselves know that we are destined for this .
52003004	For in fact when we were with you , we were telling you in advance that we would suffer affliction , and so it has happened , as you well know .
52003005	So when I could bear it no longer , I sent to find out about your faith , for fear that the tempter somehow tempted you and our toil had proven useless .
52003006	But now Timothy has come to us from you and given us the good news of your faith and love and that you always think of us with affection and long to see us just as we also long to see you !
52003007	So in all our distress and affliction , we were reassured about you , brothers and sisters , through your faith .
52003008	For now we are alive again , if you stand firm in the Lord .
52003009	For how can we thank God enough for you , for all the joy we feel because of you before our God ?
52003010	We pray earnestly night and day to see you in person and make up what may be lacking in your faith .
52003011	Now may God our Father himself and our Lord Jesus direct our way to you .
52003012	And may the Lord cause you to increase and abound in love for one another and for all , just as we do for you ,
52003013	so that your hearts are strengthened in holiness to be blameless before our God and Father at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints .
52004001	Finally then , brothers and sisters , we ask you and urge you in the Lord Jesus , that as you received instruction from us about how you must live and please God ( as you are in fact living ) that you do so more and more .
52004002	For you know what commands we gave you through the Lord Jesus .
52004003	For this is God’s will : that you become holy , that you keep away from sexual immorality ,
52004004	that each of you know how to possess his own body in holiness and honor ,
52004005	not in lustful passion like the Gentiles who do not know God .
52004006	In this matter no one should violate the rights of his brother or take advantage of him , because the Lord is the avenger in all these cases , as we also told you earlier and warned you solemnly .
52004007	For God did not call us to impurity but in holiness .
52004008	Consequently the one who rejects this is not rejecting human authority but God , who gives his Holy Spirit to you .
52004009	Now on the topic of brotherly love you have no need for anyone to write you , for you yourselves are taught by God to love one another .
52004010	And indeed you are practicing it toward all the brothers and sisters in all of Macedonia . But we urge you , brothers and sisters , to do so more and more ,
52004011	to aspire to lead a quiet life , to attend to your own business , and to work with your hands , as we commanded you .
52004012	In this way you will live a decent life before outsiders and not be in need .
52004013	Now we do not want you to be uninformed , brothers and sisters , about those who are asleep , so that you will not grieve like the rest who have no hope .
52004014	For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , so also we believe that God will bring with him those who have fallen asleep as Christians .
52004015	For we tell you this by the word of the Lord , that we who are alive , who are left until the coming of the Lord , will surely not go ahead of those who have fallen asleep .
52004016	For the Lord himself will come down from heaven with a shout of command , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trumpet of God , and the dead in Christ will rise first .
52004017	Then we who are alive , who are left , will be suddenly caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air . And so we will always be with the Lord .
52004018	Therefore encourage one another with these words .
52005001	Now on the topic of times and seasons , brothers and sisters , you have no need for anything to be written to you .
52005002	For you know quite well that the day of the Lord will come in the same way as a thief in the night .
52005003	Now when they are saying , “ There is peace and security , ” then sudden destruction comes on them , like labor pains on a pregnant woman , and they will surely not escape .
52005004	But you , brothers and sisters , are not in the darkness for the day to overtake you like a thief would .
52005005	For you all are sons of the light and sons of the day . We are not of the night nor of the darkness .
52005006	So then we must not sleep as the rest , but must stay alert and sober .
52005007	For those who sleep , sleep at night and those who get drunk are drunk at night .
52005008	But since we are of the day , we must stay sober by putting on the breastplate of faith and love and as a helmet our hope for salvation .
52005009	For God did not destine us for wrath but for gaining salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005010	He died for us so that whether we are alert or asleep we will come to life together with him .
52005011	Therefore encourage one another and build up each other , just as you are in fact doing .
52005012	Now we ask you , brothers and sisters , to acknowledge those who labor among you and preside over you in the Lord and admonish you ,
52005013	and to esteem them most highly in love because of their work . Be at peace among yourselves .
52005014	And we urge you , brothers and sisters , admonish the undisciplined , comfort the discouraged , help the weak , be patient toward all .
52005015	See that no one pays back evil for evil to anyone , but always pursue what is good for one another and for all .
52005016	Always rejoice ,
52005017	constantly pray ,
52005018	in everything give thanks . For this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus .
52005019	Do not extinguish the Spirit .
52005020	Do not treat prophecies with contempt .
52005021	But examine all things ; hold fast to what is good .
52005022	Stay away from every form of evil .
52005023	Now may the God of peace himself make you completely holy and may your spirit and soul and body be kept entirely blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005024	He who calls you is trustworthy , and he will in fact do this .
52005025	Brothers and sisters , pray for us too .
52005026	Greet all the brothers and sisters with a holy kiss .
52005027	I call on you solemnly in the Lord to have this letter read to all the brothers and sisters .
52005028	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	From Paul and Silvanus and Timothy , to the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001002	Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
53001003	We ought to thank God always for you , brothers and sisters , and rightly so , because your faith flourishes more and more and the love of each one of you all for one another is ever greater .
53001004	As a result we ourselves boast about you in the churches of God for your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and afflictions you are enduring .
53001005	This is evidence of God’s righteous judgment , to make you worthy of the kingdom of God , for which in fact you are suffering .
53001006	For it is right for God to repay with affliction those who afflict you ,
53001007	and to you who are being afflicted to give rest together with us when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels .
53001008	With flaming fire he will mete out punishment on those who do not know God and do not obey the gospel of our Lord Jesus .
53001009	They will undergo the penalty of eternal destruction , away from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his strength ,
53001010	when he comes to be glorified among his saints and admired on that day among all who have believed – and you did in fact believe our testimony .
53001011	And in this regard we pray for you always , that our God will make you worthy of his calling and fulfill by his power your every desire for goodness and every work of faith ,
53001012	that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you , and you in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53002001	Now regarding the arrival of our Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered to be with him , we ask you , brothers and sisters ,
53002002	not to be easily shaken from your composure or disturbed by any kind of spirit or message or letter allegedly from us , to the effect that the day of the Lord is already here .
53002003	Let no one deceive you in any way . For that day will not arrive until the rebellion comes and the man of lawlessness is revealed , the son of destruction .
53002004	He opposes and exalts himself above every so-called god or object of worship , and as a result he takes his seat in God’s temple , displaying himself as God .
53002005	Surely you recall that I used to tell you these things while I was still with you .
53002006	And so you know what holds him back , so that he will be revealed in his own time .
53002007	For the hidden power of lawlessness is already at work . However , the one who holds him back will do so until he is taken out of the way ,
53002008	and then the lawless one will be revealed , whom the Lord will destroy by the breath of his mouth and wipe out by the manifestation of his arrival .
53002009	The arrival of the lawless one will be by Satan’s working with all kinds of miracles and signs and false wonders ,
53002010	and with every kind of evil deception directed against those who are perishing , because they found no place in their hearts for the truth so as to be saved .
53002011	Consequently God sends on them a deluding influence so that they will believe what is false .
53002012	And so all of them who have not believed the truth but have delighted in evil will be condemned .
53002013	But we ought to thank God always for you , brothers and sisters loved by the Lord , because God chose you from the beginning for salvation through sanctification by the Spirit and faith in the truth .
53002014	He called you to this salvation through our gospel , so that you may possess the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	Therefore , brothers and sisters , stand firm and hold on to the traditions that we taught you , whether by speech or by letter .
53002016	Now may our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father , who loved us and by grace gave us eternal comfort and good hope ,
53002017	encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good thing you do or say .
53003001	Finally , pray for us , brothers and sisters , that the Lord’s message may spread quickly and be honored as in fact it was among you ,
53003002	and that we may be delivered from perverse and evil people . For not all have faith .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful , and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one .
53003004	And we are confident about you in the Lord that you are both doing – and will do – what we are commanding .
53003005	Now may the Lord direct your hearts toward the love of God and the endurance of Christ .
53003006	But we command you , brothers and sisters , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , to keep away from any brother who lives an undisciplined life and not according to the tradition they received from us .
53003007	For you know yourselves how you must imitate us , because we did not behave without discipline among you ,
53003008	and we did not eat anyone’s food without paying . Instead , in toil and drudgery we worked night and day in order not to burden any of you .
53003009	It was not because we do not have that right , but to give ourselves as an example for you to imitate .
53003010	For even when we were with you , we used to give you this command : “ If anyone is not willing to work , neither should he eat . ”
53003011	For we hear that some among you are living an undisciplined life , not doing their own work but meddling in the work of others .
53003012	Now such people we command and urge in the Lord Jesus Christ to work quietly and so provide their own food to eat .
53003013	But you , brothers and sisters , do not grow weary in doing what is right .
53003014	But if anyone does not obey our message through this letter , take note of him and do not associate closely with him , so that he may be ashamed .
53003015	Yet do not regard him as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
53003016	Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way . The Lord be with you all .
53003017	I , Paul , write this greeting with my own hand , which is how I write in every letter .
53003018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
54001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the command of God our Savior and of Christ Jesus our hope ,
54001002	to Timothy , my genuine child in the faith . Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord !
54001003	As I urged you when I was leaving for Macedonia , stay on in Ephesus to instruct certain people not to spread false teachings ,
54001004	nor to occupy themselves with myths and interminable genealogies . Such things promote useless speculations rather than God’s redemptive plan that operates by faith .
54001005	But the aim of our instruction is love that comes from a pure heart , a good conscience , and a sincere faith .
54001006	Some have strayed from these and turned away to empty discussion .
54001007	They want to be teachers of the law , but they do not understand what they are saying or the things they insist on so confidently .
54001008	But we know that the law is good if someone uses it legitimately ,
54001009	realizing that law is not intended for a righteous person , but for lawless and rebellious people , for the ungodly and sinners , for the unholy and profane , for those who kill their fathers or mothers , for murderers ,
54001010	sexually immoral people , practicing homosexuals , kidnappers , liars , perjurers – in fact , for any who live contrary to sound teaching .
54001011	This accords with the glorious gospel of the blessed God that was entrusted to me .
54001012	I am grateful to the one who has strengthened me , Christ Jesus our Lord , because he considered me faithful in putting me into ministry ,
54001013	even though I was formerly a blasphemer and a persecutor , and an arrogant man . But I was treated with mercy because I acted ignorantly in unbelief ,
54001014	and our Lord’s grace was abundant , bringing faith and love in Christ Jesus .
54001015	This saying is trustworthy and deserves full acceptance : “ Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ” – and I am the worst of them !
54001016	But here is why I was treated with mercy : so that in me as the worst , Christ Jesus could demonstrate his utmost patience , as an example for those who are going to believe in him for eternal life .
54001017	Now to the eternal king , immortal , invisible , the only God , be honor and glory forever and ever ! Amen .
54001018	I put this charge before you , Timothy my child , in keeping with the prophecies once spoken about you , in order that with such encouragement you may fight the good fight .
54001019	To do this you must hold firmly to faith and a good conscience , which some have rejected and so have suffered shipwreck in regard to the faith .
54001020	Among these are Hymenaeus and Alexander , whom I handed over to Satan to be taught not to blaspheme .
54002001	First of all , then , I urge that requests , prayers , intercessions , and thanks be offered on behalf of all people ,
54002002	even for kings and all who are in authority , that we may lead a peaceful and quiet life in all godliness and dignity .
54002003	Such prayer for all is good and welcomed before God our Savior ,
54002004	since he wants all people to be saved and to come to a knowledge of the truth .
54002005	For there is one God and one intermediary between God and humanity , Christ Jesus , himself human ,
54002006	who gave himself as a ransom for all , revealing God’s purpose at his appointed time .
54002007	For this I was appointed a preacher and apostle – I am telling the truth ; I am not lying – and a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth .
54002008	So I want the men to pray in every place , lifting up holy hands without anger or dispute .
54002009	Likewise the women are to dress in suitable apparel , with modesty and self-control . Their adornment must not be with braided hair and gold or pearls or expensive clothing ,
54002010	but with good deeds , as is proper for women who profess reverence for God .
54002011	A woman must learn quietly with all submissiveness .
54002012	But I do not allow a woman to teach or exercise authority over a man . She must remain quiet .
54002013	For Adam was formed first and then Eve .
54002014	And Adam was not deceived , but the woman , because she was fully deceived , fell into transgression .
54002015	But she will be delivered through childbearing , if she continues in faith and love and holiness with self-control .
54003001	This saying is trustworthy : “ If someone aspires to the office of overseer , he desires a good work . ”
54003002	The overseer then must be above reproach , the husband of one wife , temperate , self-controlled , respectable , hospitable , an able teacher ,
54003003	not a drunkard , not violent , but gentle , not contentious , free from the love of money .
54003004	He must manage his own household well and keep his children in control without losing his dignity .
54003005	But if someone does not know how to manage his own household , how will he care for the church of God ?
54003006	He must not be a recent convert or he may become arrogant and fall into the punishment that the devil will exact .
54003007	And he must be well thought of by those outside the faith , so that he may not fall into disgrace and be caught by the devil’s trap .
54003008	Deacons likewise must be dignified , not two-faced , not given to excessive drinking , not greedy for gain ,
54003009	holding to the mystery of the faith with a clear conscience .
54003010	And these also must be tested first and then let them serve as deacons if they are found blameless .
54003011	Likewise also their wives must be dignified , not slanderous , temperate , faithful in every respect .
54003012	Deacons must be husbands of one wife and good managers of their children and their own households .
54003013	For those who have served well as deacons gain a good standing for themselves and great boldness in the faith that is in Christ Jesus .
54003014	I hope to come to you soon , but I am writing these instructions to you
54003015	in case I am delayed , to let you know how people ought to conduct themselves in the household of God , because it is the church of the living God , the support and bulwark of the truth .
54003016	And we all agree , our religion contains amazing revelation : He was revealed in the flesh , vindicated by the Spirit , seen by angels , proclaimed among Gentiles , believed on in the world , taken up in glory .
54004001	Now the Spirit explicitly says that in the later times some will desert the faith and occupy themselves with deceiving spirits and demonic teachings ,
54004002	influenced by the hypocrisy of liars whose consciences are seared .
54004003	They will prohibit marriage and require abstinence from foods that God created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and know the truth .
54004004	For every creation of God is good and no food is to be rejected if it is received with thanksgiving .
54004005	For it is sanctified by God’s word and by prayer .
54004006	By pointing out such things to the brothers and sisters , you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus , having nourished yourself on the words of the faith and of the good teaching that you have followed .
54004007	But reject those myths fit only for the godless and gullible , and train yourself for godliness .
54004008	For “ physical exercise has some value , but godliness is valuable in every way . It holds promise for the present life and for the life to come . ”
54004009	This saying is trustworthy and deserves full acceptance .
54004010	In fact this is why we work hard and struggle , because we have set our hope on the living God , who is the Savior of all people , especially of believers .
54004011	Command and teach these things .
54004012	Let no one look down on you because you are young , but set an example for the believers in your speech , conduct , love , faithfulness , and purity .
54004013	Until I come , give attention to the public reading of scripture , to exhortation , to teaching .
54004014	Do not neglect the spiritual gift you have , given to you and confirmed by prophetic words when the elders laid hands on you .
54004015	Take pains with these things ; be absorbed in them , so that everyone will see your progress .
54004016	Be conscientious about how you live and what you teach . Persevere in this , because by doing so you will save both yourself and those who listen to you .
54005001	Do not address an older man harshly but appeal to him as a father . Speak to younger men as brothers ,
54005002	older women as mothers , and younger women as sisters – with complete purity .
54005003	Honor widows who are truly in need .
54005004	But if a widow has children or grandchildren , they should first learn to fulfill their duty toward their own household and so repay their parents what is owed them . For this is what pleases God .
54005005	But the widow who is truly in need , and completely on her own , has set her hope on God and continues in her pleas and prayers night and day .
54005006	But the one who lives for pleasure is dead even while she lives .
54005007	Reinforce these commands , so that they will be beyond reproach .
54005008	But if someone does not provide for his own , especially his own family , he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever .
54005009	No widow should be put on the list unless she is at least sixty years old , was the wife of one husband ,
54005010	and has a reputation for good works : as one who has raised children , practiced hospitality , washed the feet of the saints , helped those in distress – as one who has exhibited all kinds of good works .
54005011	But do not accept younger widows on the list , because their passions may lead them away from Christ and they will desire to marry ,
54005012	and so incur judgment for breaking their former pledge .
54005013	And besides that , going around from house to house they learn to be lazy , and they are not only lazy , but also gossips and busybodies , talking about things they should not .
54005014	So I want younger women to marry , raise children , and manage a household , in order to give the adversary no opportunity to vilify us .
54005015	For some have already wandered away to follow Satan .
54005016	If a believing woman has widows in her family , let her help them . The church should not be burdened , so that it may help the widows who are truly in need .
54005017	Elders who provide effective leadership must be counted worthy of double honor , especially those who work hard in speaking and teaching .
54005018	For the scripture says , “ Do not muzzle an ox while it is treading out the grain , ” and , “ The worker deserves his pay . ”
54005019	Do not accept an accusation against an elder unless it can be confirmed by two or three witnesses .
54005020	Those guilty of sin must be rebuked before all , as a warning to the rest .
54005021	Before God and Christ Jesus and the elect angels , I solemnly charge you to carry out these commands without prejudice or favoritism of any kind .
54005022	Do not lay hands on anyone hastily and so identify with the sins of others . Keep yourself pure .
54005023	( Stop drinking just water , but use a little wine for your digestion and your frequent illnesses . )
54005024	The sins of some people are obvious , going before them into judgment , but for others , they show up later .
54005025	Similarly good works are also obvious , and the ones that are not cannot remain hidden .
54006001	Those who are under the yoke as slaves must regard their own masters as deserving of full respect . This will prevent the name of God and Christian teaching from being discredited .
54006002	But those who have believing masters must not show them less respect because they are brothers . Instead they are to serve all the more , because those who benefit from their service are believers and dearly loved . Teach them and exhort them about these things .
54006003	If someone spreads false teachings and does not agree with sound words ( that is , those of our Lord Jesus Christ ) and with the teaching that accords with godliness ,
54006004	he is conceited and understands nothing , but has an unhealthy interest in controversies and verbal disputes . This gives rise to envy , dissension , slanders , evil suspicions ,
54006005	and constant bickering by people corrupted in their minds and deprived of the truth , who suppose that godliness is a way of making a profit .
54006006	Now godliness combined with contentment brings great profit .
54006007	For we have brought nothing into this world and so we cannot take a single thing out either .
54006008	But if we have food and shelter , we will be satisfied with that .
54006009	Those who long to be rich , however , stumble into temptation and a trap and many senseless and harmful desires that plunge people into ruin and destruction .
54006010	For the love of money is the root of all evils . Some people in reaching for it have strayed from the faith and stabbed themselves with many pains .
54006011	But you , as a person dedicated to God , keep away from all that . Instead pursue righteousness , godliness , faithfulness , love , endurance , and gentleness .
54006012	Compete well for the faith and lay hold of that eternal life you were called for and made your good confession for in the presence of many witnesses .
54006013	I charge you before God who gives life to all things and Christ Jesus who made his good confession before Pontius Pilate ,
54006014	to obey this command without fault or failure until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ
54006015	– whose appearing the blessed and only Sovereign , the King of kings and Lord of lords , will reveal at the right time .
54006016	He alone possesses immortality and lives in unapproachable light , whom no human has ever seen or is able to see . To him be honor and eternal power ! Amen .
54006017	Command those who are rich in this world’s goods not to be haughty or to set their hope on riches , which are uncertain , but on God who richly provides us with all things for our enjoyment .
54006018	Tell them to do good , to be rich in good deeds , to be generous givers , sharing with others .
54006019	In this way they will save up a treasure for themselves as a firm foundation for the future and so lay hold of what is truly life .
54006020	O Timothy , protect what has been entrusted to you . Avoid the profane chatter and absurdities of so-called “ knowledge . ”
54006021	By professing it , some have strayed from the faith . Grace be with you all .
55001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , to further the promise of life in Christ Jesus ,
55001002	to Timothy , my dear child . Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord !
55001003	I am thankful to God , whom I have served with a clear conscience as my ancestors did , when I remember you in my prayers as I do constantly night and day .
55001004	As I remember your tears , I long to see you , so that I may be filled with joy .
55001005	I recall your sincere faith that was alive first in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice , and I am sure is in you .
55001006	Because of this I remind you to rekindle God’s gift that you possess through the laying on of my hands .
55001007	For God did not give us a Spirit of fear but of power and love and self-control .
55001008	So do not be ashamed of the testimony about our Lord or of me , a prisoner for his sake , but by God’s power accept your share of suffering for the gospel .
55001009	He is the one who saved us and called us with a holy calling , not based on our works but on his own purpose and grace , granted to us in Christ Jesus before time began ,
55001010	but now made visible through the appearing of our Savior Christ Jesus . He has broken the power of death and brought life and immortality to light through the gospel !
55001011	For this gospel I was appointed a preacher and apostle and teacher .
55001012	Because of this , in fact , I suffer as I do . But I am not ashamed , because I know the one in whom my faith is set and I am convinced that he is able to protect what has been entrusted to me until that day .
55001013	Hold to the standard of sound words that you heard from me and do so with the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus .
55001014	Protect that good thing entrusted to you , through the Holy Spirit who lives within us .
55001015	You know that everyone in the province of Asia deserted me , including Phygelus and Hermogenes .
55001016	May the Lord grant mercy to the family of Onesiphorus , because he often refreshed me and was not ashamed of my imprisonment .
55001017	But when he arrived in Rome , he eagerly searched for me and found me .
55001018	May the Lord grant him to find mercy from the Lord on that day ! And you know very well all the ways he served me in Ephesus .
55002001	So you , my child , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
55002002	And entrust what you heard me say in the presence of many others as witnesses to faithful people who will be competent to teach others as well .
55002003	Take your share of suffering as a good soldier of Christ Jesus .
55002004	No one in military service gets entangled in matters of everyday life ; otherwise he will not please the one who recruited him .
55002005	Also , if anyone competes as an athlete , he will not be crowned as the winner unless he competes according to the rules .
55002006	The farmer who works hard ought to have the first share of the crops .
55002007	Think about what I am saying and the Lord will give you understanding of all this .
55002008	Remember Jesus Christ , raised from the dead , a descendant of David ; such is my gospel ,
55002009	for which I suffer hardship to the point of imprisonment as a criminal , but God’s message is not imprisoned !
55002010	So I endure all things for the sake of those chosen by God , that they too may obtain salvation in Christ Jesus and its eternal glory .
55002011	This saying is trustworthy : If we died with him , we will also live with him .
55002012	If we endure , we will also reign with him . If we deny him , he will also deny us .
55002013	If we are unfaithful , he remains faithful , since he cannot deny himself .
55002014	Remind people of these things and solemnly charge them before the Lord not to wrangle over words . This is of no benefit ; it just brings ruin on those who listen .
55002015	Make every effort to present yourself before God as a proven worker who does not need to be ashamed , teaching the message of truth accurately .
55002016	But avoid profane chatter , because those occupied with it will stray further and further into ungodliness ,
55002017	and their message will spread its infection like gangrene . Hymenaeus and Philetus are in this group .
55002018	They have strayed from the truth by saying that the resurrection has already occurred , and they are undermining some people’s faith .
55002019	However , God’s solid foundation remains standing , bearing this seal : “ The Lord knows those who are his , ” and “ Everyone who confesses the name of the Lord must turn away from evil . ”
55002020	Now in a wealthy home there are not only gold and silver vessels , but also ones made of wood and of clay , and some are for honorable use , but others for ignoble use .
55002021	So if someone cleanses himself of such behavior , he will be a vessel for honorable use , set apart , useful for the Master , prepared for every good work .
55002022	But keep away from youthful passions , and pursue righteousness , faithfulness , love , and peace , in company with others who call on the Lord from a pure heart .
55002023	But reject foolish and ignorant controversies , because you know they breed infighting .
55002024	And the Lord’s slave must not engage in heated disputes but be kind toward all , an apt teacher , patient ,
55002025	correcting opponents with gentleness . Perhaps God will grant them repentance and then knowledge of the truth
55002026	and they will come to their senses and escape the devil’s trap where they are held captive to do his will .
55003001	But understand this , that in the last days difficult times will come .
55003002	For people will be lovers of themselves , lovers of money , boastful , arrogant , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , ungrateful , unholy ,
55003003	unloving , irreconcilable , slanderers , without self-control , savage , opposed to what is good ,
55003004	treacherous , reckless , conceited , loving pleasure rather than loving God .
55003005	They will maintain the outward appearance of religion but will have repudiated its power . So avoid people like these .
55003006	For some of these insinuate themselves into households and captivate weak women who are overwhelmed with sins and led along by various passions .
55003007	Such women are always seeking instruction , yet never able to arrive at a knowledge of the truth .
55003008	And just as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses , so these people – who have warped minds and are disqualified in the faith – also oppose the truth .
55003009	But they will not go much further , for their foolishness will be obvious to everyone , just like it was with Jannes and Jambres .
55003010	You , however , have followed my teaching , my way of life , my purpose , my faith , my patience , my love , my endurance ,
55003011	as well as the persecutions and sufferings that happened to me in Antioch , in Iconium , and in Lystra . I endured these persecutions and the Lord delivered me from them all .
55003012	Now in fact all who want to live godly lives in Christ Jesus will be persecuted .
55003013	But evil people and charlatans will go from bad to worse , deceiving others and being deceived themselves .
55003014	You , however , must continue in the things you have learned and are confident about . You know who taught you
55003015	and how from infancy you have known the holy writings , which are able to give you wisdom for salvation through faith in Christ Jesus .
55003016	Every scripture is inspired by God and useful for teaching , for reproof , for correction , and for training in righteousness ,
55003017	that the person dedicated to God may be capable and equipped for every good work .
55004001	I solemnly charge you before God and Christ Jesus , who is going to judge the living and the dead , and by his appearing and his kingdom :
55004002	Preach the message , be ready whether it is convenient or not , reprove , rebuke , exhort with complete patience and instruction .
55004003	For there will be a time when people will not tolerate sound teaching . Instead , following their own desires , they will accumulate teachers for themselves , because they have an insatiable curiosity to hear new things .
55004004	And they will turn away from hearing the truth , but on the other hand they will turn aside to myths .
55004005	You , however , be self-controlled in all things , endure hardship , do an evangelist’s work , fulfill your ministry .
55004006	For I am already being poured out as an offering , and the time for me to depart is at hand .
55004007	I have competed well ; I have finished the race ; I have kept the faith !
55004008	Finally the crown of righteousness is reserved for me . The Lord , the righteous Judge , will award it to me in that day – and not to me only , but also to all who have set their affection on his appearing .
55004009	Make every effort to come to me soon .
55004010	For Demas deserted me , since he loved the present age , and he went to Thessalonica . Crescens went to Galatia and Titus to Dalmatia .
55004011	Only Luke is with me . Get Mark and bring him with you , because he is a great help to me in ministry .
55004012	Now I have sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When you come , bring with you the cloak I left in Troas with Carpas and the scrolls , especially the parchments .
55004014	Alexander the coppersmith did me a great deal of harm . The Lord will repay him in keeping with his deeds .
55004015	You be on guard against him too , because he vehemently opposed our words .
55004016	At my first defense no one appeared in my support ; instead they all deserted me – may they not be held accountable for it .
55004017	But the Lord stood by me and strengthened me , so that through me the message would be fully proclaimed for all the Gentiles to hear . And so I was delivered from the lion’s mouth !
55004018	The Lord will deliver me from every evil deed and will bring me safely into his heavenly kingdom . To him be glory for ever and ever ! Amen .
55004019	Greetings to Prisca and Aquila and the family of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in Corinth . Trophimus I left ill in Miletus .
55004021	Make every effort to come before winter . Greetings to you from Eubulus , Pudens , Linus , Claudia , and all the brothers and sisters .
55004022	The Lord be with your spirit . Grace be with you .
56001001	From Paul , a slave of God and apostle of Jesus Christ , to further the faith of God’s chosen ones and the knowledge of the truth that is in keeping with godliness ,
56001002	in hope of eternal life , which God , who does not lie , promised before the ages began .
56001003	But now in his own time he has made his message evident through the preaching I was entrusted with according to the command of God our Savior .
56001004	To Titus , my genuine son in a common faith . Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior !
56001005	The reason I left you in Crete was to set in order the remaining matters and to appoint elders in every town , as I directed you .
56001006	An elder must be blameless , the husband of one wife , with faithful children who cannot be charged with dissipation or rebellion .
56001007	For the overseer must be blameless as one entrusted with God’s work , not arrogant , not prone to anger , not a drunkard , not violent , not greedy for gain .
56001008	Instead he must be hospitable , devoted to what is good , sensible , upright , devout , and self-controlled .
56001009	He must hold firmly to the faithful message as it has been taught , so that he will be able to give exhortation in such healthy teaching and correct those who speak against it .
56001010	For there are many rebellious people , idle talkers , and deceivers , especially those with Jewish connections ,
56001011	who must be silenced because they mislead whole families by teaching for dishonest gain what ought not to be taught .
56001012	A certain one of them , in fact , one of their own prophets , said , “ Cretans are always liars , evil beasts , lazy gluttons . ”
56001013	Such testimony is true . For this reason rebuke them sharply that they may be healthy in the faith
56001014	and not pay attention to Jewish myths and commands of people who reject the truth .
56001015	All is pure to those who are pure . But to those who are corrupt and unbelieving , nothing is pure , but both their minds and consciences are corrupted .
56001016	They profess to know God but with their deeds they deny him , since they are detestable , disobedient , and unfit for any good deed .
56002001	But as for you , communicate the behavior that goes with sound teaching .
56002002	Older men are to be temperate , dignified , self-controlled , sound in faith , in love , and in endurance .
56002003	Older women likewise are to exhibit behavior fitting for those who are holy , not slandering , not slaves to excessive drinking , but teaching what is good .
56002004	In this way they will train the younger women to love their husbands , to love their children ,
56002005	to be self-controlled , pure , fulfilling their duties at home , kind , being subject to their own husbands , so that the message of God may not be discredited .
56002006	Encourage younger men likewise to be self-controlled ,
56002007	showing yourself to be an example of good works in every way . In your teaching show integrity , dignity ,
56002008	and a sound message that cannot be criticized , so that any opponent will be at a loss , because he has nothing evil to say about us .
56002009	Slaves are to be subject to their own masters in everything , to do what is wanted and not talk back ,
56002010	not pilfering , but showing all good faith , in order to bring credit to the teaching of God our Savior in everything .
56002011	For the grace of God has appeared , bringing salvation to all people .
56002012	It trains us to reject godless ways and worldly desires and to live self-controlled , upright , and godly lives in the present age ,
56002013	as we wait for the happy fulfillment of our hope in the glorious appearing of our great God and Savior , Jesus Christ .
56002014	He gave himself for us to set us free from every kind of lawlessness and to purify for himself a people who are truly his , who are eager to do good .
56002015	So communicate these things with the sort of exhortation or rebuke that carries full authority . Don’t let anyone look down on you .
56003001	Remind them to be subject to rulers and authorities , to be obedient , to be ready for every good work .
56003002	They must not slander anyone , but be peaceable , gentle , showing complete courtesy to all people .
56003003	For we too were once foolish , disobedient , misled , enslaved to various passions and desires , spending our lives in evil and envy , hateful and hating one another .
56003004	But “ when the kindness of God our Savior and his love for mankind appeared ,
56003005	he saved us not by works of righteousness that we have done but on the basis of his mercy , through the washing of the new birth and the renewing of the Holy Spirit ,
56003006	whom he poured out on us in full measure through Jesus Christ our Savior .
56003007	And so , since we have been justified by his grace , we become heirs with the confident expectation of eternal life . ”
56003008	This saying is trustworthy , and I want you to insist on such truths , so that those who have placed their faith in God may be intent on engaging in good works . These things are good and beneficial for all people .
56003009	But avoid foolish controversies , genealogies , quarrels , and fights about the law , because they are useless and empty .
56003010	Reject a divisive person after one or two warnings .
56003011	You know that such a person is twisted by sin and is conscious of it himself .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , do your best to come to me at Nicopolis , for I have decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Make every effort to help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their way ; make sure they have what they need .
56003014	Here is another way that our people can learn to engage in good works to meet pressing needs and so not be unfruitful .
56003015	Everyone with me greets you . Greet those who love us in the faith . Grace be with you all .
57001001	From Paul , a prisoner of Christ Jesus , and Timothy our brother , to Philemon , our dear friend and colaborer ,
57001002	to Apphia our sister , to Archippus our fellow soldier , and to the church that meets in your house .
57001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
57001004	I always thank my God as I remember you in my prayers ,
57001005	because I hear of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints .
57001006	I pray that the faith you share with us may deepen your understanding of every blessing that belongs to you in Christ .
57001007	I have had great joy and encouragement because of your love , for the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through you , brother .
57001008	So , although I have quite a lot of confidence in Christ and could command you to do what is proper ,
57001009	I would rather appeal to you on the basis of love – I , Paul , an old man and even now a prisoner for the sake of Christ Jesus –
57001010	I am appealing to you concerning my child , whose spiritual father I have become during my imprisonment , that is , Onesimus ,
57001011	who was formerly useless to you , but is now useful to you and me .
57001012	I have sent him ( who is my very heart ) back to you .
57001013	I wanted to keep him so that he could serve me in your place during my imprisonment for the sake of the gospel .
57001014	However , without your consent I did not want to do anything , so that your good deed would not be out of compulsion , but from your own willingness .
57001015	For perhaps it was for this reason that he was separated from you for a little while , so that you would have him back eternally ,
57001016	no longer as a slave , but more than a slave , as a dear brother . He is especially so to me , and even more so to you now , both humanly speaking and in the Lord .
57001017	Therefore if you regard me as a partner , accept him as you would me .
57001018	Now if he has defrauded you of anything or owes you anything , charge what he owes to me .
57001019	I , Paul , have written this letter with my own hand : I will repay it . I could also mention that you owe me your very self .
57001020	Yes , brother , let me have some benefit from you in the Lord . Refresh my heart in Christ .
57001021	Since I was confident that you would obey , I wrote to you , because I knew that you would do even more than what I am asking you to do .
57001022	At the same time also , prepare a place for me to stay , for I hope that through your prayers I will be given back to you .
57001023	Epaphras , my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus , greets you .
57001024	Mark , Aristarchus , Demas and Luke , my colaborers , greet you too .
57001025	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	After God spoke long ago in various portions and in various ways to our ancestors through the prophets ,
58001002	in these last days he has spoken to us in a son , whom he appointed heir of all things , and through whom he created the world .
58001003	The Son is the radiance of his glory and the representation of his essence , and he sustains all things by his powerful word , and so when he had accomplished cleansing for sins , he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high .
58001004	Thus he became so far better than the angels as he has inherited a name superior to theirs .
58001005	For to which of the angels did God ever say , “ You are my son ! Today I have fathered you ” ? And in another place he says , “ I will be his father and he will be my son . ”
58001006	But when he again brings his firstborn into the world , he says , “ Let all the angels of God worship him ! ”
58001007	And he says of the angels , “ He makes his angels spirits and his ministers a flame of fire , ”
58001008	but of the Son he says , “ Your throne , O God , is forever and ever , and a righteous scepter is the scepter of your kingdom .
58001009	You have loved righteousness and hated lawlessness . So God , your God , has anointed you over your companions with the oil of rejoicing . ”
58001010	And , “ You founded the earth in the beginning , Lord , and the heavens are the works of your hands .
58001011	They will perish , but you continue . And they will all grow old like a garment ,
58001012	and like a robe you will fold them up and like a garment they will be changed , but you are the same and your years will never run out . ”
58001013	But to which of the angels has he ever said , “ Sit at my right hand until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet ” ?
58001014	Are they not all ministering spirits , sent out to serve those who will inherit salvation ?
58002001	Therefore we must pay closer attention to what we have heard , so that we do not drift away .
58002002	For if the message spoken through angels proved to be so firm that every violation or disobedience received its just penalty ,
58002003	how will we escape if we neglect such a great salvation ? It was first communicated through the Lord and was confirmed to us by those who heard him ,
58002004	while God confirmed their witness with signs and wonders and various miracles and gifts of the Holy Spirit distributed according to his will .
58002005	For he did not put the world to come , about which we are speaking , under the control of angels .
58002006	Instead someone testified somewhere : “ What is man that you think of him or the son of man that you care for him ?
58002007	You made him lower than the angels for a little while . You crowned him with glory and honor .
58002008	You put all things under his control . ” For when he put all things under his control , he left nothing outside of his control . At present we do not yet see all things under his control ,
58002009	but we see Jesus , who was made lower than the angels for a little while , now crowned with glory and honor because he suffered death , so that by God’s grace he would experience death on behalf of everyone .
58002010	For it was fitting for him , for whom and through whom all things exist , in bringing many sons to glory , to make the pioneer of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
58002011	For indeed he who makes holy and those being made holy all have the same origin , and so he is not ashamed to call them brothers and sisters ,
58002012	saying , “ I will proclaim your name to my brothers ; in the midst of the assembly I will praise you . ”
58002013	Again he says , “ I will be confident in him , ” and again , “ Here I am , with the children God has given me . ”
58002014	Therefore , since the children share in flesh and blood , he likewise shared in their humanity , so that through death he could destroy the one who holds the power of death ( that is , the devil ) ,
58002015	and set free those who were held in slavery all their lives by their fear of death .
58002016	For surely his concern is not for angels , but he is concerned for Abraham’s descendants .
58002017	Therefore he had to be made like his brothers and sisters in every respect , so that he could become a merciful and faithful high priest in things relating to God , to make atonement for the sins of the people .
58002018	For since he himself suffered when he was tempted , he is able to help those who are tempted .
58003001	Therefore , holy brothers and sisters , partners in a heavenly calling , take note of Jesus , the apostle and high priest whom we confess ,
58003002	who is faithful to the one who appointed him , as Moses was also in God’s house .
58003003	For he has come to deserve greater glory than Moses , just as the builder of a house deserves greater honor than the house itself !
58003004	For every house is built by someone , but the builder of all things is God .
58003005	Now Moses was faithful in all God’s house as a servant , to testify to the things that would be spoken .
58003006	But Christ is faithful as a son over God’s house . We are of his house , if in fact we hold firmly to our confidence and the hope we take pride in .
58003007	Therefore , as the Holy Spirit says , “ Oh , that today you would listen as he speaks !
58003008	“ Do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion , in the day of testing in the wilderness .
58003009	“ There your fathers tested me and tried me , and they saw my works for forty years .
58003010	“ Therefore , I became provoked at that generation and said , ‘ Their hearts are always wandering and they have not known my ways . ’
58003011	“ As I swore in my anger , ‘ They will never enter my rest ! ’ ”
58003012	See to it , brothers and sisters , that none of you has an evil , unbelieving heart that forsakes the living God .
58003013	But exhort one another each day , as long as it is called “ Today , ” that none of you may become hardened by sin’s deception .
58003014	For we have become partners with Christ , if in fact we hold our initial confidence firm until the end .
58003015	As it says , “ Oh , that today you would listen as he speaks ! Do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion . ”
58003016	For which ones heard and rebelled ? Was it not all who came out of Egypt under Moses’ leadership ?
58003017	And against whom was God provoked for forty years ? Was it not those who sinned , whose dead bodies fell in the wilderness ?
58003018	And to whom did he swear they would never enter into his rest , except those who were disobedient ?
58003019	So we see that they could not enter because of unbelief .
58004001	Therefore we must be wary that , while the promise of entering his rest remains open , none of you may seem to have come short of it .
58004002	For we had good news proclaimed to us just as they did . But the message they heard did them no good , since they did not join in with those who heard it in faith .
58004003	For we who have believed enter that rest , as he has said , “ As I swore in my anger , ‘ They will never enter my rest ! ’ ” And yet God’s works were accomplished from the foundation of the world .
58004004	For he has spoken somewhere about the seventh day in this way : “ And God rested on the seventh day from all his works , ”
58004005	but to repeat the text cited earlier : “ They will never enter my rest ! ”
58004006	Therefore it remains for some to enter it , yet those to whom it was previously proclaimed did not enter because of disobedience .
58004007	So God again ordains a certain day , “ Today , ” speaking through David after so long a time , as in the words quoted before , “ O , that today you would listen as he speaks ! Do not harden your hearts . ”
58004008	For if Joshua had given them rest , God would not have spoken afterward about another day .
58004009	Consequently a Sabbath rest remains for the people of God .
58004010	For the one who enters God’s rest has also rested from his works , just as God did from his own works .
58004011	Thus we must make every effort to enter that rest , so that no one may fall by following the same pattern of disobedience .
58004012	For the word of God is living and active and sharper than any double-edged sword , piercing even to the point of dividing soul from spirit , and joints from marrow ; it is able to judge the desires and thoughts of the heart .
58004013	And no creature is hidden from God , but everything is naked and exposed to the eyes of him to whom we must render an account .
58004014	Therefore since we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast to our confession .
58004015	For we do not have a high priest incapable of sympathizing with our weaknesses , but one who has been tempted in every way just as we are , yet without sin .
58004016	Therefore let us confidently approach the throne of grace to receive mercy and find grace whenever we need help .
58005001	For every high priest is taken from among the people and appointed to represent them before God , to offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins .
58005002	He is able to deal compassionately with those who are ignorant and erring , since he also is subject to weakness ,
58005003	and for this reason he is obligated to make sin offerings for himself as well as for the people .
58005004	And no one assumes this honor on his own initiative , but only when called to it by God , as in fact Aaron was .
58005005	So also Christ did not glorify himself in becoming high priest , but the one who glorified him was God , who said to him , “ You are my Son ! Today I have fathered you , ”
58005006	as also in another place God says , “ You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek . ”
58005007	During his earthly life Christ offered both requests and supplications , with loud cries and tears , to the one who was able to save him from death and he was heard because of his devotion .
58005008	Although he was a son , he learned obedience through the things he suffered .
58005009	And by being perfected in this way , he became the source of eternal salvation to all who obey him ,
58005010	and he was designated by God as high priest in the order of Melchizedek .
58005011	On this topic we have much to say and it is difficult to explain , since you have become sluggish in hearing .
58005012	For though you should in fact be teachers by this time , you need someone to teach you the beginning elements of God’s utterances . You have gone back to needing milk , not solid food .
58005013	For everyone who lives on milk is inexperienced in the message of righteousness , because he is an infant .
58005014	But solid food is for the mature , whose perceptions are trained by practice to discern both good and evil .
58006001	Therefore we must progress beyond the elementary instructions about Christ and move on to maturity , not laying this foundation again : repentance from dead works and faith in God ,
58006002	teaching about baptisms , laying on of hands , resurrection of the dead , and eternal judgment .
58006003	And this is what we intend to do , if God permits .
58006004	For it is impossible in the case of those who have once been enlightened , tasted the heavenly gift , become partakers of the Holy Spirit ,
58006005	tasted the good word of God and the miracles of the coming age ,
58006006	and then have committed apostasy , to renew them again to repentance , since they are crucifying the Son of God for themselves all over again and holding him up to contempt .
58006007	For the ground that has soaked up the rain that frequently falls on it and yields useful vegetation for those who tend it receives a blessing from God .
58006008	But if it produces thorns and thistles , it is useless and about to be cursed ; its fate is to be burned .
58006009	But in your case , dear friends , even though we speak like this , we are convinced of better things relating to salvation .
58006010	For God is not unjust so as to forget your work and the love you have demonstrated for his name , in having served and continuing to serve the saints .
58006011	But we passionately want each of you to demonstrate the same eagerness for the fulfillment of your hope until the end ,
58006012	so that you may not be sluggish , but imitators of those who through faith and perseverance inherit the promises .
58006013	Now when God made his promise to Abraham , since he could swear by no one greater , he swore by himself ,
58006014	saying , “ Surely I will bless you greatly and multiply your descendants abundantly . ”
58006015	And so by persevering , Abraham inherited the promise .
58006016	For people swear by something greater than themselves , and the oath serves as a confirmation to end all dispute .
58006017	In the same way God wanted to demonstrate more clearly to the heirs of the promise that his purpose was unchangeable , and so he intervened with an oath ,
58006018	so that we who have found refuge in him may find strong encouragement to hold fast to the hope set before us through two unchangeable things , since it is impossible for God to lie .
58006019	We have this hope as an anchor for the soul , sure and steadfast , which reaches inside behind the curtain ,
58006020	where Jesus our forerunner entered on our behalf , since he became a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek .
58007001	Now this Melchizedek , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , met Abraham as he was returning from defeating the kings and blessed him .
58007002	To him also Abraham apportioned a tithe of everything . His name first means king of righteousness , then king of Salem , that is , king of peace .
58007003	Without father , without mother , without genealogy , he has neither beginning of days nor end of life but is like the son of God , and he remains a priest for all time .
58007004	But see how great he must be , if Abraham the patriarch gave him a tithe of his plunder .
58007005	And those of the sons of Levi who receive the priestly office have authorization according to the law to collect a tithe from the people , that is , from their fellow countrymen , although they too are descendants of Abraham .
58007006	But Melchizedek who does not share their ancestry collected a tithe from Abraham and blessed the one who possessed the promise .
58007007	Now without dispute the inferior is blessed by the superior ,
58007008	and in one case tithes are received by mortal men , while in the other by him who is affirmed to be alive .
58007009	And it could be said that Levi himself , who receives tithes , paid a tithe through Abraham .
58007010	For he was still in his ancestor Abraham’s loins when Melchizedek met him .
58007011	So if perfection had in fact been possible through the Levitical priesthood – for on that basis the people received the law – what further need would there have been for another priest to arise , said to be in the order of Melchizedek and not in Aaron’s order ?
58007012	For when the priesthood changes , a change in the law must come as well .
58007013	Yet the one these things are spoken about belongs to a different tribe , and no one from that tribe has ever officiated at the altar .
58007014	For it is clear that our Lord is descended from Judah , yet Moses said nothing about priests in connection with that tribe .
58007015	And this is even clearer if another priest arises in the likeness of Melchizedek ,
58007016	who has become a priest not by a legal regulation about physical descent but by the power of an indestructible life .
58007017	For here is the testimony about him : “ You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek . ”
58007018	On the one hand a former command is set aside because it is weak and useless ,
58007019	for the law made nothing perfect . On the other hand a better hope is introduced , through which we draw near to God .
58007020	And since this was not done without a sworn affirmation – for the others have become priests without a sworn affirmation ,
58007021	but Jesus did so with a sworn affirmation by the one who said to him , “ The Lord has sworn and will not change his mind , ‘ You are a priest forever ’ ” –
58007022	accordingly Jesus has become the guarantee of a better covenant .
58007023	And the others who became priests were numerous , because death prevented them from continuing in office ,
58007024	but he holds his priesthood permanently since he lives forever .
58007025	So he is able to save completely those who come to God through him , because he always lives to intercede for them .
58007026	For it is indeed fitting for us to have such a high priest : holy , innocent , undefiled , separate from sinners , and exalted above the heavens .
58007027	He has no need to do every day what those priests do , to offer sacrifices first for their own sins and then for the sins of the people , since he did this in offering himself once for all .
58007028	For the law appoints as high priests men subject to weakness , but the word of solemn affirmation that came after the law appoints a son made perfect forever .
58008001	Now the main point of what we are saying is this : We have such a high priest , one who sat down at the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in heaven ,
58008002	a minister in the sanctuary and the true tabernacle that the Lord , not man , set up .
58008003	For every high priest is appointed to offer both gifts and sacrifices . So this one too had to have something to offer .
58008004	Now if he were on earth , he would not be a priest , since there are already priests who offer the gifts prescribed by the law .
58008005	The place where they serve is a sketch and shadow of the heavenly sanctuary , just as Moses was warned by God as he was about to complete the tabernacle . For he says , “ See that you make everything according to the design shown to you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now Jesus has obtained a superior ministry , since the covenant that he mediates is also better and is enacted on better promises .
58008007	For if that first covenant had been faultless , no one would have looked for a second one .
58008008	But showing its fault , God says to them , “ Look , the days are coming , says the Lord , when I will complete a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah .
58008009	“ It will not be like the covenant that I made with their fathers , on the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of Egypt , because they did not continue in my covenant and I had no regard for them , says the Lord .
58008010	“ For this is the covenant that I will establish with the house of Israel after those days , says the Lord . I will put my laws in their minds and I will inscribe them on their hearts . And I will be their God and they will be my people .
58008011	“ And there will be no need at all for each one to teach his countryman or each one to teach his brother saying , ‘ Know the Lord , ’ since they will all know me , from the least to the greatest .
58008012	“ For I will be merciful toward their evil deeds , and their sins I will remember no longer . ”
58008013	When he speaks of a new covenant , he makes the first obsolete . Now what is growing obsolete and aging is about to disappear .
58009001	Now the first covenant , in fact , had regulations for worship and its earthly sanctuary .
58009002	For a tent was prepared , the outer one , which contained the lampstand , the table , and the presentation of the loaves ; this is called the holy place .
58009003	And after the second curtain there was a tent called the holy of holies .
58009004	It contained the golden altar of incense and the ark of the covenant covered entirely with gold . In this ark were the golden urn containing the manna , Aaron’s rod that budded , and the stone tablets of the covenant .
58009005	And above the ark were the cherubim of glory overshadowing the mercy seat . Now is not the time to speak of these things in detail .
58009006	So with these things prepared like this , the priests enter continually into the outer tent as they perform their duties .
58009007	But only the high priest enters once a year into the inner tent , and not without blood that he offers for himself and for the sins of the people committed in ignorance .
58009008	The Holy Spirit is making clear that the way into the holy place had not yet appeared as long as the old tabernacle was standing .
58009009	This was a symbol for the time then present , when gifts and sacrifices were offered that could not perfect the conscience of the worshiper .
58009010	They served only for matters of food and drink and various washings ; they are external regulations imposed until the new order came .
58009011	But now Christ has come as the high priest of the good things to come . He passed through the greater and more perfect tent not made with hands , that is , not of this creation ,
58009012	and he entered once for all into the most holy place not by the blood of goats and calves but by his own blood , and so he himself secured eternal redemption .
58009013	For if the blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a young cow sprinkled on those who are defiled consecrated them and provided ritual purity ,
58009014	how much more will the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without blemish to God , purify our consciences from dead works to worship the living God .
58009015	And so he is the mediator of a new covenant , so that those who are called may receive the eternal inheritance he has promised , since he died to set them free from the violations committed under the first covenant .
58009016	For where there is a will , the death of the one who made it must be proven .
58009017	For a will takes effect only at death , since it carries no force while the one who made it is alive .
58009018	So even the first covenant was inaugurated with blood .
58009019	For when Moses had spoken every command to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and goats with water and scarlet wool and hyssop and sprinkled both the book itself and all the people ,
58009020	and said , “ This is the blood of the covenant that God has commanded you to keep . ”
58009021	And both the tabernacle and all the utensils of worship he likewise sprinkled with blood .
58009022	Indeed according to the law almost everything was purified with blood , and without the shedding of blood there is no forgiveness .
58009023	So it was necessary for the sketches of the things in heaven to be purified with these sacrifices , but the heavenly things themselves required better sacrifices than these .
58009024	For Christ did not enter a sanctuary made with hands – the representation of the true sanctuary – but into heaven itself , and he appears now in God’s presence for us .
58009025	And he did not enter to offer himself again and again , the way the high priest enters the sanctuary year after year with blood that is not his own ,
58009026	for then he would have had to suffer again and again since the foundation of the world . But now he has appeared once for all at the consummation of the ages to put away sin by his sacrifice .
58009027	And just as people are appointed to die once , and then to face judgment ,
58009028	so also , after Christ was offered once to bear the sins of many , to those who eagerly await him he will appear a second time , not to bear sin but to bring salvation .
58010001	For the law possesses a shadow of the good things to come but not the reality itself , and is therefore completely unable , by the same sacrifices offered continually , year after year , to perfect those who come to worship .
58010002	For otherwise would they not have ceased to be offered , since the worshipers would have been purified once for all and so have no further consciousness of sin ?
58010003	But in those sacrifices there is a reminder of sins year after year .
58010004	For the blood of bulls and goats cannot take away sins .
58010005	So when he came into the world , he said , “ Sacrifice and offering you did not desire , but a body you prepared for me .
58010006	“ Whole burnt offerings and sin-offerings you took no delight in .
58010007	“ Then I said , ‘ Here I am : I have come – it is written of me in the scroll of the book – to do your will , O God . ’ ”
58010008	When he says above , “ Sacrifices and offerings and whole burnt offerings and sin-offerings you did not desire nor did you take delight in them ” ( which are offered according to the law ) ,
58010009	then he says , “ Here I am : I have come to do your will . ” He does away with the first to establish the second .
58010010	By his will we have been made holy through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
58010011	And every priest stands day after day serving and offering the same sacrifices again and again – sacrifices that can never take away sins .
58010012	But when this priest had offered one sacrifice for sins for all time , he sat down at the right hand of God ,
58010013	where he is now waiting until his enemies are made a footstool for his feet .
58010014	For by one offering he has perfected for all time those who are made holy .
58010015	And the Holy Spirit also witnesses to us , for after saying ,
58010016	“ This is the covenant that I will establish with them after those days , says the Lord . I will put my laws on their hearts and I will inscribe them on their minds , ”
58010017	then he says , “ Their sins and their lawless deeds I will remember no longer . ”
58010018	Now where there is forgiveness of these , there is no longer any offering for sin .
58010019	Therefore , brothers and sisters , since we have confidence to enter the sanctuary by the blood of Jesus ,
58010020	by the fresh and living way that he inaugurated for us through the curtain , that is , through his flesh ,
58010021	and since we have a great priest over the house of God ,
58010022	let us draw near with a sincere heart in the assurance that faith brings , because we have had our hearts sprinkled clean from an evil conscience and our bodies washed in pure water .
58010023	And let us hold unwaveringly to the hope that we confess , for the one who made the promise is trustworthy .
58010024	And let us take thought of how to spur one another on to love and good works ,
58010025	not abandoning our own meetings , as some are in the habit of doing , but encouraging each other , and even more so because you see the day drawing near .
58010026	For if we deliberately keep on sinning after receiving the knowledge of the truth , no further sacrifice for sins is left for us ,
58010027	but only a certain fearful expectation of judgment and a fury of fire that will consume God’s enemies .
58010028	Someone who rejected the law of Moses was put to death without mercy on the testimony of two or three witnesses .
58010029	How much greater punishment do you think that person deserves who has contempt for the Son of God , and profanes the blood of the covenant that made him holy , and insults the Spirit of grace ?
58010030	For we know the one who said , “ Vengeance is mine , I will repay , ” and again , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	It is a terrifying thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
58010032	But remember the former days when you endured a harsh conflict of suffering after you were enlightened .
58010033	At times you were publicly exposed to abuse and afflictions , and at other times you came to share with others who were treated in that way .
58010034	For in fact you shared the sufferings of those in prison , and you accepted the confiscation of your belongings with joy , because you knew that you certainly had a better and lasting possession .
58010035	So do not throw away your confidence , because it has great reward .
58010036	For you need endurance in order to do God’s will and so receive what is promised .
58010037	For just a little longer and he who is coming will arrive and not delay .
58010038	But my righteous one will live by faith , and if he shrinks back , I take no pleasure in him .
58010039	But we are not among those who shrink back and thus perish , but are among those who have faith and preserve their souls .
58011001	Now faith is being sure of what we hope for , being convinced of what we do not see .
58011002	For by it the people of old received God’s commendation .
58011003	By faith we understand that the worlds were set in order at God’s command , so that the visible has its origin in the invisible .
58011004	By faith Abel offered God a greater sacrifice than Cain , and through his faith he was commended as righteous , because God commended him for his offerings . And through his faith he still speaks , though he is dead .
58011005	By faith Enoch was taken up so that he did not see death , and he was not to be found because God took him up . For before his removal he had been commended as having pleased God .
58011006	Now without faith it is impossible to please him , for the one who approaches God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him .
58011007	By faith Noah , when he was warned about things not yet seen , with reverent regard constructed an ark for the deliverance of his family . Through faith he condemned the world and became an heir of the righteousness that comes by faith .
58011008	By faith Abraham obeyed when he was called to go out to a place he would later receive as an inheritance , and he went out without understanding where he was going .
58011009	By faith he lived as a foreigner in the promised land as though it were a foreign country , living in tents with Isaac and Jacob , who were fellow heirs of the same promise .
58011010	For he was looking forward to the city with firm foundations , whose architect and builder is God .
