58011011	By faith , even though Sarah herself was barren and he was too old , he received the ability to procreate , because he regarded the one who had given the promise to be trustworthy .
58011012	So in fact children were fathered by one man – and this one as good as dead – like the number of stars in the sky and like the innumerable grains of sand on the seashore .
58011013	These all died in faith without receiving the things promised , but they saw them in the distance and welcomed them and acknowledged that they were strangers and foreigners on the earth .
58011014	For those who speak in such a way make it clear that they are seeking a homeland .
58011015	In fact , if they had been thinking of the land that they had left , they would have had opportunity to return .
58011016	But as it is , they aspire to a better land , that is , a heavenly one . Therefore , God is not ashamed to be called their God , for he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By faith Abraham , when he was tested , offered up Isaac . He had received the promises , yet he was ready to offer up his only son .
58011018	God had told him , “ Through Isaac descendants will carry on your name , ”
58011019	and he reasoned that God could even raise him from the dead , and in a sense he received him back from there .
58011020	By faith also Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning the future .
58011021	By faith Jacob , as he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Joseph and worshiped as he leaned on his staff .
58011022	By faith Joseph , at the end of his life , mentioned the exodus of the sons of Israel and gave instructions about his burial .
58011023	By faith , when Moses was born , his parents hid him for three months , because they saw the child was beautiful and they were not afraid of the king’s edict .
58011024	By faith , when he grew up , Moses refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter ,
58011025	choosing rather to be ill-treated with the people of God than to enjoy sin’s fleeting pleasure .
58011026	He regarded abuse suffered for Christ to be greater wealth than the treasures of Egypt , for his eyes were fixed on the reward .
58011027	By faith he left Egypt without fearing the king’s anger , for he persevered as though he could see the one who is invisible .
58011028	By faith he kept the Passover and the sprinkling of the blood , so that the one who destroyed the firstborn would not touch them .
58011029	By faith they crossed the Red Sea as if on dry ground , but when the Egyptians tried it , they were swallowed up .
58011030	By faith the walls of Jericho fell after the people marched around them for seven days .
58011031	By faith Rahab the prostitute escaped the destruction of the disobedient , because she welcomed the spies in peace .
58011032	And what more shall I say ? For time will fail me if I tell of Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , of David and Samuel and the prophets .
58011033	Through faith they conquered kingdoms , administered justice , gained what was promised , shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	quenched raging fire , escaped the edge of the sword , gained strength in weakness , became mighty in battle , put foreign armies to flight ,
58011035	and women received back their dead raised to life . But others were tortured , not accepting release , to obtain resurrection to a better life .
58011036	And others experienced mocking and flogging , and even chains and imprisonment .
58011037	They were stoned , sawed apart , murdered with the sword ; they went about in sheepskins and goatskins ; they were destitute , afflicted , ill-treated
58011038	( the world was not worthy of them ) ; they wandered in deserts and mountains and caves and openings in the earth .
58011039	And these all were commended for their faith , yet they did not receive what was promised .
58011040	For God had provided something better for us , so that they would be made perfect together with us .
58012001	Therefore , since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses , we must get rid of every weight and the sin that clings so closely , and run with endurance the race set out for us ,
58012002	keeping our eyes fixed on Jesus , the pioneer and perfecter of our faith . For the joy set out for him he endured the cross , disregarding its shame , and has taken his seat at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	Think of him who endured such opposition against himself by sinners , so that you may not grow weary in your souls and give up .
58012004	You have not yet resisted to the point of bloodshed in your struggle against sin .
58012005	And have you forgotten the exhortation addressed to you as sons ? “ My son , do not scorn the Lord’s discipline or give up when he corrects you .
58012006	“ For the Lord disciplines the one he loves and chastises every son he accepts . ”
58012007	Endure your suffering as discipline ; God is treating you as sons . For what son is there that a father does not discipline ?
58012008	But if you do not experience discipline , something all sons have shared in , then you are illegitimate and are not sons .
58012009	Besides , we have experienced discipline from our earthly fathers and we respected them ; shall we not submit ourselves all the more to the Father of spirits and receive life ?
58012010	For they disciplined us for a little while as seemed good to them , but he does so for our benefit , that we may share his holiness .
58012011	Now all discipline seems painful at the time , not joyful . But later it produces the fruit of peace and righteousness for those trained by it .
58012012	Therefore , strengthen your listless hands and your weak knees ,
58012013	and make straight paths for your feet , so that what is lame may not be put out of joint but be healed .
58012014	Pursue peace with everyone , and holiness , for without it no one will see the Lord .
58012015	See to it that no one comes short of the grace of God , that no one be like a bitter root springing up and causing trouble , and through him many become defiled .
58012016	And see to it that no one becomes an immoral or godless person like Esau , who sold his own birthright for a single meal .
58012017	For you know that later when he wanted to inherit the blessing , he was rejected , for he found no opportunity for repentance , although he sought the blessing with tears .
58012018	For you have not come to something that can be touched , to a burning fire and darkness and gloom and a whirlwind
58012019	and the blast of a trumpet and a voice uttering words such that those who heard begged to hear no more .
58012020	For they could not bear what was commanded : “ If even an animal touches the mountain , it must be stoned . ”
58012021	In fact , the scene was so terrifying that Moses said , “ I shudder with fear . ”
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion , the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to myriads of angels , to the assembly
58012023	and congregation of the firstborn , who are enrolled in heaven , and to God , the judge of all , and to the spirits of the righteous , who have been made perfect ,
58012024	and to Jesus , the mediator of a new covenant , and to the sprinkled blood that speaks of something better than Abel’s does .
58012025	Take care not to refuse the one who is speaking ! For if they did not escape when they refused the one who warned them on earth , how much less shall we , if we reject the one who warns from heaven ?
58012026	Then his voice shook the earth , but now he has promised , “ I will once more shake not only the earth but heaven too . ”
58012027	Now this phrase “ once more ” indicates the removal of what is shaken , that is , of created things , so that what is unshaken may remain .
58012028	So since we are receiving an unshakable kingdom , let us give thanks , and through this let us offer worship pleasing to God in devotion and awe .
58012029	For our God is indeed a devouring fire .
58013001	Brotherly love must continue .
58013002	Do not neglect hospitality , because through it some have entertained angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember those in prison as though you were in prison with them , and those ill-treated as though you too felt their torment .
58013004	Marriage must be honored among all and the marriage bed kept undefiled , for God will judge sexually immoral people and adulterers .
58013005	Your conduct must be free from the love of money and you must be content with what you have , for he has said , “ I will never leave you and I will never abandon you . ”
58013006	So we can say with confidence , “ The Lord is my helper , and I will not be afraid . What can man do to me ? ”
58013007	Remember your leaders , who spoke God’s message to you ; reflect on the outcome of their lives and imitate their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever !
58013009	Do not be carried away by all sorts of strange teachings . For it is good for the heart to be strengthened by grace , not ritual meals , which have never benefited those who participated in them .
58013010	We have an altar that those who serve in the tabernacle have no right to eat from .
58013011	For the bodies of those animals whose blood the high priest brings into the sanctuary as an offering for sin are burned outside the camp .
58013012	Therefore , to sanctify the people by his own blood , Jesus also suffered outside the camp .
58013013	We must go out to him , then , outside the camp , bearing the abuse he experienced .
58013014	For here we have no lasting city , but we seek the city that is to come .
58013015	Through him then let us continually offer up a sacrifice of praise to God , that is , the fruit of our lips , acknowledging his name .
58013016	And do not neglect to do good and to share what you have , for God is pleased with such sacrifices .
58013017	Obey your leaders and submit to them , for they keep watch over your souls and will give an account for their work . Let them do this with joy and not with complaints , for this would be no advantage for you .
58013018	Pray for us , for we are sure that we have a clear conscience and desire to conduct ourselves rightly in every respect .
58013019	I especially ask you to pray that I may be restored to you very soon .
58013020	Now may the God of peace who by the blood of the eternal covenant brought back from the dead the great shepherd of the sheep , our Lord Jesus Christ ,
58013021	equip you with every good thing to do his will , working in us what is pleasing before him through Jesus Christ , to whom be glory forever . Amen .
58013022	Now I urge you , brothers and sisters , bear with my message of exhortation , for in fact I have written to you briefly .
58013023	You should know that our brother Timothy has been released . If he comes soon , he will be with me when I see you .
58013024	Greetings to all your leaders and all the saints . Those from Italy send you greetings .
58013025	Grace be with you all .
59001001	From James , a slave of God and the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes dispersed abroad . Greetings !
59001002	My brothers and sisters , consider it nothing but joy when you fall into all sorts of trials ,
59001003	because you know that the testing of your faith produces endurance .
59001004	And let endurance have its perfect effect , so that you will be perfect and complete , not deficient in anything .
59001005	But if anyone is deficient in wisdom , he should ask God , who gives to all generously and without reprimand , and it will be given to him .
59001006	But he must ask in faith without doubting , for the one who doubts is like a wave of the sea , blown and tossed around by the wind .
59001007	For that person must not suppose that he will receive anything from the Lord ,
59001008	since he is a double-minded individual , unstable in all his ways .
59001009	Now the believer of humble means should take pride in his high position .
59001010	But the rich person’s pride should be in his humiliation , because he will pass away like a wildflower in the meadow .
59001011	For the sun rises with its heat and dries up the meadow ; the petal of the flower falls off and its beauty is lost forever . So also the rich person in the midst of his pursuits will wither away .
59001012	Happy is the one who endures testing , because when he has proven to be genuine , he will receive the crown of life that God promised to those who love him .
59001013	Let no one say when he is tempted , “ I am tempted by God , ” for God cannot be tempted by evil , and he himself tempts no one .
59001014	But each one is tempted when he is lured and enticed by his own desires .
59001015	Then when desire conceives , it gives birth to sin , and when sin is full grown , it gives birth to death .
59001016	Do not be led astray , my dear brothers and sisters .
59001017	All generous giving and every perfect gift is from above , coming down from the Father of lights , with whom there is no variation or the slightest hint of change .
59001018	By his sovereign plan he gave us birth through the message of truth , that we would be a kind of firstfruits of all he created .
59001019	Understand this , my dear brothers and sisters ! Let every person be quick to listen , slow to speak , slow to anger .
59001020	For human anger does not accomplish God’s righteousness .
59001021	So put away all filth and evil excess and humbly welcome the message implanted within you , which is able to save your souls .
59001022	But be sure you live out the message and do not merely listen to it and so deceive yourselves .
59001023	For if someone merely listens to the message and does not live it out , he is like someone who gazes at his own face in a mirror .
59001024	For he gazes at himself and then goes out and immediately forgets what sort of person he was .
59001025	But the one who peers into the perfect law of liberty and fixes his attention there , and does not become a forgetful listener but one who lives it out – he will be blessed in what he does .
59001026	If someone thinks he is religious yet does not bridle his tongue , and so deceives his heart , his religion is futile .
59001027	Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this : to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world .
59002001	My brothers and sisters , do not show prejudice if you possess faith in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ .
59002002	For if someone comes into your assembly wearing a gold ring and fine clothing , and a poor person enters in filthy clothes ,
59002003	do you pay attention to the one who is finely dressed and say , “ You sit here in a good place , ” and to the poor person , “ You stand over there , ” or “ Sit on the floor ” ?
59002004	If so , have you not made distinctions among yourselves and become judges with evil motives ?
59002005	Listen , my dear brothers and sisters ! Did not God choose the poor in the world to be rich in faith and heirs of the kingdom that he promised to those who love him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor ! Are not the rich oppressing you and dragging you into the courts ?
59002007	Do they not blaspheme the good name of the one you belong to ?
59002008	But if you fulfill the royal law as expressed in this scripture , “ You shall love your neighbor as yourself , ” you are doing well .
59002009	But if you show prejudice , you are committing sin and are convicted by the law as violators .
59002010	For the one who obeys the whole law but fails in one point has become guilty of all of it .
59002011	For he who said , “ Do not commit adultery , ” also said , “ Do not murder . ” Now if you do not commit adultery but do commit murder , you have become a violator of the law .
59002012	Speak and act as those who will be judged by a law that gives freedom .
59002013	For judgment is merciless for the one who has shown no mercy . But mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	What good is it , my brothers and sisters , if someone claims to have faith but does not have works ? Can this kind of faith save him ?
59002015	If a brother or sister is poorly clothed and lacks daily food ,
59002016	and one of you says to them , “ Go in peace , keep warm and eat well , ” but you do not give them what the body needs , what good is it ?
59002017	So also faith , if it does not have works , is dead being by itself .
59002018	But someone will say , “ You have faith and I have works . ” Show me your faith without works and I will show you faith by my works .
59002019	You believe that God is one ; well and good . Even the demons believe that – and tremble with fear .
59002020	But would you like evidence , you empty fellow , that faith without works is useless ?
59002021	Was not Abraham our father justified by works when he offered Isaac his son on the altar ?
59002022	You see that his faith was working together with his works and his faith was perfected by works .
59002023	And the scripture was fulfilled that says , “ Now Abraham believed God and it was counted to him for righteousness , ” and he was called God’s friend .
59002024	You see that a person is justified by works and not by faith alone .
59002025	And similarly , was not Rahab the prostitute also justified by works when she welcomed the messengers and sent them out by another way ?
59002026	For just as the body without the spirit is dead , so also faith without works is dead .
59003001	Not many of you should become teachers , my brothers and sisters , because you know that we will be judged more strictly .
59003002	For we all stumble in many ways . If someone does not stumble in what he says , he is a perfect individual , able to control the entire body as well .
59003003	And if we put bits into the mouths of horses to get them to obey us , then we guide their entire bodies .
59003004	Look at ships too : Though they are so large and driven by harsh winds , they are steered by a tiny rudder wherever the pilot’s inclination directs .
59003005	So too the tongue is a small part of the body , yet it has great pretensions . Think how small a flame sets a huge forest ablaze .
59003006	And the tongue is a fire ! The tongue represents the world of wrongdoing among the parts of our bodies . It pollutes the entire body and sets fire to the course of human existence – and is set on fire by hell .
59003007	For every kind of animal , bird , reptile , and sea creature is subdued and has been subdued by humankind .
59003008	But no human being can subdue the tongue ; it is a restless evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	With it we bless the Lord and Father , and with it we curse people made in God’s image .
59003010	From the same mouth come blessing and cursing . These things should not be so , my brothers and sisters .
59003011	A spring does not pour out fresh water and bitter water from the same opening , does it ?
59003012	Can a fig tree produce olives , my brothers and sisters , or a vine produce figs ? Neither can a salt water spring produce fresh water .
59003013	Who is wise and understanding among you ? By his good conduct he should show his works done in the gentleness that wisdom brings .
59003014	But if you have bitter jealousy and selfishness in your hearts , do not boast and tell lies against the truth .
59003015	Such wisdom does not come from above but is earthly , natural , demonic .
59003016	For where there is jealousy and selfishness , there is disorder and every evil practice .
59003017	But the wisdom from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , accommodating , full of mercy and good fruit , impartial , and not hypocritical .
59003018	And the fruit that consists of righteousness is planted in peace among those who make peace .
59004001	Where do the conflicts and where do the quarrels among you come from ? Is it not from this , from your passions that battle inside you ?
59004002	You desire and you do not have ; you murder and envy and you cannot obtain ; you quarrel and fight . You do not have because you do not ask ;
59004003	you ask and do not receive because you ask wrongly , so you can spend it on your passions .
59004004	Adulterers , do you not know that friendship with the world means hostility toward God ? So whoever decides to be the world’s friend makes himself God’s enemy .
59004005	Or do you think the scripture means nothing when it says , “ The spirit that God caused to live within us has an envious yearning ” ?
59004006	But he gives greater grace . Therefore it says , “ God opposes the proud , but he gives grace to the humble . ”
59004007	So submit to God . But resist the devil and he will flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to God and he will draw near to you . Cleanse your hands , you sinners , and make your hearts pure , you double-minded .
59004009	Grieve , mourn , and weep . Turn your laughter into mourning and your joy into despair .
59004010	Humble yourselves before the Lord and he will exalt you .
59004011	Do not speak against one another , brothers and sisters . He who speaks against a fellow believer or judges a fellow believer speaks against the law and judges the law . But if you judge the law , you are not a doer of the law but its judge .
59004012	But there is only one who is lawgiver and judge – the one who is able to save and destroy . On the other hand , who are you to judge your neighbor ?
59004013	Come now , you who say , “ Today or tomorrow we will go into this or that town and spend a year there and do business and make a profit . ”
59004014	You do not know about tomorrow . What is your life like ? For you are a puff of smoke that appears for a short time and then vanishes .
59004015	You ought to say instead , “ If the Lord is willing , then we will live and do this or that . ”
59004016	But as it is , you boast in your arrogance . All such boasting is evil .
59004017	So whoever knows what is good to do and does not do it is guilty of sin .
59005001	Come now , you rich ! Weep and cry aloud over the miseries that are coming on you .
59005002	Your riches have rotted and your clothing has become moth-eaten .
59005003	Your gold and silver have rusted and their rust will be a witness against you . It will consume your flesh like fire . It is in the last days that you have hoarded treasure !
59005004	Look , the pay you have held back from the workers who mowed your fields cries out against you , and the cries of the reapers have reached the ears of the Lord of hosts .
59005005	You have lived indulgently and luxuriously on the earth . You have fattened your hearts in a day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned and murdered the righteous person , although he does not resist you .
59005007	So be patient , brothers and sisters , until the Lord’s return . Think of how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the ground and is patient for it until it receives the early and late rains .
59005008	You also be patient and strengthen your hearts , for the Lord’s return is near .
59005009	Do not grumble against one another , brothers and sisters , so that you may not be judged . See , the judge stands before the gates !
59005010	As an example of suffering and patience , brothers and sisters , take the prophets who spoke in the Lord’s name .
59005011	Think of how we regard as blessed those who have endured . You have heard of Job’s endurance and you have seen the Lord’s purpose , that the Lord is full of compassion and mercy .
59005012	And above all , my brothers and sisters , do not swear , either by heaven or by earth or by any other oath . But let your “ Yes ” be yes and your “ No ” be no , so that you may not fall into judgment .
59005013	Is anyone among you suffering ? He should pray . Is anyone in good spirits ? He should sing praises .
59005014	Is anyone among you ill ? He should summon the elders of the church , and they should pray for him and anoint him with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	And the prayer of faith will save the one who is sick and the Lord will raise him up – and if he has committed sins , he will be forgiven .
59005016	So confess your sins to one another and pray for one another so that you may be healed . The prayer of a righteous person has great effectiveness .
59005017	Elijah was a human being like us , and he prayed earnestly that it would not rain and there was no rain on the land for three years and six months !
59005018	Then he prayed again , and the sky gave rain and the land sprouted with a harvest .
59005019	My brothers and sisters , if anyone among you wanders from the truth and someone turns him back ,
59005020	he should know that the one who turns a sinner back from his wandering path will save that person’s soul from death and will cover a multitude of sins .
60001001	From Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to those temporarily residing abroad ( in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , the province of Asia , and Bithynia ) who are chosen
60001002	according to the foreknowledge of God the Father by being set apart by the Spirit for obedience and for sprinkling with Jesus Christ’s blood . May grace and peace be yours in full measure !
60001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! By his great mercy he gave us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
60001004	that is , into an inheritance imperishable , undefiled , and unfading . It is reserved in heaven for you ,
60001005	who by God’s power are protected through faith for a salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
60001006	This brings you great joy , although you may have to suffer for a short time in various trials .
60001007	Such trials show the proven character of your faith , which is much more valuable than gold – gold that is tested by fire , even though it is passing away – and will bring praise and glory and honor when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60001008	You have not seen him , but you love him . You do not see him now but you believe in him , and so you rejoice with an indescribable and glorious joy ,
60001009	because you are attaining the goal of your faith – the salvation of your souls .
60001010	Concerning this salvation , the prophets who predicted the grace that would come to you searched and investigated carefully .
60001011	They probed into what person or time the Spirit of Christ within them was indicating when he testified beforehand about the sufferings appointed for Christ and his subsequent glory .
60001012	They were shown that they were serving not themselves but you , in regard to the things now announced to you through those who proclaimed the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven – things angels long to catch a glimpse of .
60001013	Therefore , get your minds ready for action by being fully sober , and set your hope completely on the grace that will be brought to you when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60001014	Like obedient children , do not comply with the evil urges you used to follow in your ignorance ,
60001015	but , like the Holy One who called you , become holy yourselves in all of your conduct ,
60001016	for it is written , “ You shall be holy , because I am holy . ”
60001017	And if you address as Father the one who impartially judges according to each one’s work , live out the time of your temporary residence here in reverence .
60001018	You know that from your empty way of life inherited from your ancestors you were ransomed – not by perishable things like silver or gold ,
60001019	but by precious blood like that of an unblemished and spotless lamb , namely Christ .
60001020	He was foreknown before the foundation of the world but was manifested in these last times for your sake .
60001021	Through him you now trust in God , who raised him from the dead and gave him glory , so that your faith and hope are in God .
60001022	You have purified your souls by obeying the truth in order to show sincere mutual love . So love one another earnestly from a pure heart .
60001023	You have been born anew , not from perishable but from imperishable seed , through the living and enduring word of God .
60001024	For all flesh is like grass and all its glory like the flower of the grass ; the grass withers and the flower falls off ,
60001025	but the word of the Lord endures forever . And this is the word that was proclaimed to you .
60002001	So get rid of all evil and all deceit and hypocrisy and envy and all slander .
60002002	And yearn like newborn infants for pure , spiritual milk , so that by it you may grow up to salvation ,
60002003	if you have experienced the Lord’s kindness .
60002004	So as you come to him , a living stone rejected by men but chosen and priceless in God’s sight ,
60002005	you yourselves , as living stones , are built up as a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood and to offer spiritual sacrifices that are acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	For it says in scripture , “ Look , I lay in Zion a stone , a chosen and priceless cornerstone , and whoever believes in him will never be put to shame . ”
60002007	So you who believe see his value , but for those who do not believe , the stone that the builders rejected has become the cornerstone ,
60002008	and a stumbling-stone and a rock to trip over . They stumble because they disobey the word , as they were destined to do .
60002009	But you are a chosen race , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , a people of his own , so that you may proclaim the virtues of the one who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light .
60002010	You once were not a people , but now you are God’s people . You were shown no mercy , but now you have received mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , I urge you as foreigners and exiles to keep away from fleshly desires that do battle against the soul ,
60002012	and maintain good conduct among the non-Christians , so that though they now malign you as wrongdoers , they may see your good deeds and glorify God when he appears .
60002013	Be subject to every human institution for the Lord’s sake , whether to a king as supreme
60002014	or to governors as those he commissions to punish wrongdoers and praise those who do good .
60002015	For God wants you to silence the ignorance of foolish people by doing good .
60002016	Live as free people , not using your freedom as a pretext for evil , but as God’s slaves .
60002017	Honor all people , love the family of believers , fear God , honor the king .
60002018	Slaves , be subject to your masters with all reverence , not only to those who are good and gentle , but also to those who are perverse .
60002019	For this finds God’s favor , if because of conscience toward God someone endures hardships in suffering unjustly .
60002020	For what credit is it if you sin and are mistreated and endure it ? But if you do good and suffer and so endure , this finds favor with God .
60002021	For to this you were called , since Christ also suffered for you , leaving an example for you to follow in his steps .
60002022	He committed no sin nor was deceit found in his mouth .
60002023	When he was maligned , he did not answer back ; when he suffered , he threatened no retaliation , but committed himself to God who judges justly .
60002024	He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree , that we may cease from sinning and live for righteousness . By his wounds you were healed .
60002025	For you were going astray like sheep but now you have turned back to the shepherd and guardian of your souls .
60003001	In the same way , wives , be subject to your own husbands . Then , even if some are disobedient to the word , they will be won over without a word by the way you live ,
60003002	when they see your pure and reverent conduct .
60003003	Let your beauty not be external – the braiding of hair and wearing of gold jewelry or fine clothes –
60003004	but the inner person of the heart , the lasting beauty of a gentle and tranquil spirit , which is precious in God’s sight .
60003005	For in the same way the holy women who hoped in God long ago adorned themselves by being subject to their husbands ,
60003006	like Sarah who obeyed Abraham , calling him lord . You become her children when you do what is good and have no fear in doing so .
60003007	Husbands , in the same way , treat your wives with consideration as the weaker partners and show them honor as fellow heirs of the grace of life . In this way nothing will hinder your prayers .
60003008	Finally , all of you be harmonious , sympathetic , affectionate , compassionate , and humble .
60003009	Do not return evil for evil or insult for insult , but instead bless others because you were called to inherit a blessing .
60003010	For the one who wants to love life and see good days must keep his tongue from evil and his lips from uttering deceit .
60003011	And he must turn away from evil and do good ; he must seek peace and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous and his ears are open to their prayer . But the Lord’s face is against those who do evil .
60003013	For who is going to harm you if you are devoted to what is good ?
60003014	But in fact , if you happen to suffer for doing what is right , you are blessed . But do not be terrified of them or be shaken .
60003015	But set Christ apart as Lord in your hearts and always be ready to give an answer to anyone who asks about the hope you possess .
60003016	Yet do it with courtesy and respect , keeping a good conscience , so that those who slander your good conduct in Christ may be put to shame when they accuse you .
60003017	For it is better to suffer for doing good , if God wills it , than for doing evil .
60003018	Because Christ also suffered once for sins , the just for the unjust , to bring you to God , by being put to death in the flesh but by being made alive in the spirit .
60003019	In it he went and preached to the spirits in prison ,
60003020	after they were disobedient long ago when God patiently waited in the days of Noah as an ark was being constructed . In the ark a few , that is eight souls , were delivered through water .
60003021	And this prefigured baptism , which now saves you – not the washing off of physical dirt but the pledge of a good conscience to God – through the resurrection of Jesus Christ ,
60003022	who went into heaven and is at the right hand of God with angels and authorities and powers subject to him .
60004001	So , since Christ suffered in the flesh , you also arm yourselves with the same attitude , because the one who has suffered in the flesh has finished with sin ,
60004002	in that he spends the rest of his time on earth concerned about the will of God and not human desires .
60004003	For the time that has passed was sufficient for you to do what the non-Christians desire . You lived then in debauchery , evil desires , drunkenness , carousing , drinking bouts , and wanton idolatries .
60004004	So they are astonished when you do not rush with them into the same flood of wickedness , and they vilify you .
60004005	They will face a reckoning before Jesus Christ who stands ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	Now it was for this very purpose that the gospel was preached to those who are now dead , so that though they were judged in the flesh by human standards they may live spiritually by God’s standards .
60004007	For the culmination of all things is near . So be self-controlled and sober-minded for the sake of prayer .
60004008	Above all keep your love for one another fervent , because love covers a multitude of sins .
60004009	Show hospitality to one another without complaining .
60004010	Just as each one has received a gift , use it to serve one another as good stewards of the varied grace of God .
60004011	Whoever speaks , let it be with God’s words . Whoever serves , do so with the strength that God supplies , so that in everything God will be glorified through Jesus Christ . To him belong the glory and the power forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	Dear friends , do not be astonished that a trial by fire is occurring among you , as though something strange were happening to you .
60004013	But rejoice in the degree that you have shared in the sufferings of Christ , so that when his glory is revealed you may also rejoice and be glad .
60004014	If you are insulted for the name of Christ , you are blessed , because the Spirit of glory , who is the Spirit of God , rests on you .
60004015	But let none of you suffer as a murderer or thief or criminal or as a troublemaker .
60004016	But if you suffer as a Christian , do not be ashamed , but glorify God that you bear such a name .
60004017	For it is time for judgment to begin , starting with the house of God . And if it starts with us , what will be the fate of those who are disobedient to the gospel of God ?
60004018	And if the righteous are barely saved , what will become of the ungodly and sinners ?
60004019	So then let those who suffer according to the will of God entrust their souls to a faithful Creator as they do good .
60005001	So as your fellow elder and a witness of Christ’s sufferings and as one who shares in the glory that will be revealed , I urge the elders among you :
60005002	Give a shepherd’s care to God’s flock among you , exercising oversight not merely as a duty but willingly under God’s direction , not for shameful profit but eagerly .
60005003	And do not lord it over those entrusted to you , but be examples to the flock .
60005004	Then when the Chief Shepherd appears , you will receive the crown of glory that never fades away .
60005005	In the same way , you who are younger , be subject to the elders . And all of you , clothe yourselves with humility toward one another , because God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble .
60005006	And God will exalt you in due time , if you humble yourselves under his mighty hand
60005007	by casting all your cares on him because he cares for you .
60005008	Be sober and alert . Your enemy the devil , like a roaring lion , is on the prowl looking for someone to devour .
60005009	Resist him , strong in your faith , because you know that your brothers and sisters throughout the world are enduring the same kinds of suffering .
60005010	And , after you have suffered for a little while , the God of all grace who called you to his eternal glory in Christ will himself restore , confirm , strengthen , and establish you .
60005011	To him belongs the power forever . Amen .
60005012	Through Silvanus , whom I know to be a faithful brother , I have written to you briefly , in order to encourage you and testify that this is the true grace of God . Stand fast in it .
60005013	The church in Babylon , chosen together with you , greets you , and so does Mark , my son .
60005014	Greet one another with a loving kiss . Peace to all of you who are in Christ .
61001001	From Simeon Peter , a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who through the righteousness of our God and Savior , Jesus Christ , have been granted a faith just as precious as ours .
61001002	May grace and peace be lavished on you as you grow in the rich knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord !
61001003	I can pray this because his divine power has bestowed on us everything necessary for life and godliness through the rich knowledge of the one who called us by his own glory and excellence .
61001004	Through these things he has bestowed on us his precious and most magnificent promises , so that by means of what was promised you may become partakers of the divine nature , after escaping the worldly corruption that is produced by evil desire .
61001005	For this very reason , make every effort to add to your faith excellence , to excellence , knowledge ;
61001006	to knowledge , self-control ; to self-control , perseverance ; to perseverance , godliness ;
61001007	to godliness , brotherly affection ; to brotherly affection , unselfish love .
61001008	For if these things are really yours and are continually increasing , they will keep you from becoming ineffective and unproductive in your pursuit of knowing our Lord Jesus Christ more intimately .
61001009	But concerning the one who lacks such things – he is blind . That is to say , he is nearsighted , since he has forgotten about the cleansing of his past sins .
61001010	Therefore , brothers and sisters , make every effort to be sure of your calling and election . For by doing this you will never stumble into sin .
61001011	For thus an entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior , Jesus Christ , will be richly provided for you .
61001012	Therefore , I intend to remind you constantly of these things even though you know them and are well established in the truth that you now have .
61001013	Indeed , as long as I am in this tabernacle , I consider it right to stir you up by way of a reminder ,
61001014	since I know that my tabernacle will soon be removed , because our Lord Jesus Christ revealed this to me .
61001015	Indeed , I will also make every effort that , after my departure , you have a testimony of these things .
61001016	For we did not follow cleverly concocted fables when we made known to you the power and return of our Lord Jesus Christ ; no , we were eyewitnesses of his grandeur .
61001017	For he received honor and glory from God the Father , when that voice was conveyed to him by the Majestic Glory : “ This is my dear Son , in whom I am delighted . ”
61001018	When this voice was conveyed from heaven , we ourselves heard it , for we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	Moreover , we possess the prophetic word as an altogether reliable thing . You do well if you pay attention to this as you would to a light shining in a murky place , until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts .
61001020	Above all , you do well if you recognize this : No prophecy of scripture ever comes about by the prophet’s own imagination ,
61001021	for no prophecy was ever borne of human impulse ; rather , men carried along by the Holy Spirit spoke from God .
61002001	But false prophets arose among the people , just as there will be false teachers among you . These false teachers will infiltrate your midst with destructive heresies , even to the point of denying the Master who bought them . As a result , they will bring swift destruction on themselves .
61002002	And many will follow their debauched lifestyles . Because of these false teachers , the way of truth will be slandered .
61002003	And in their greed they will exploit you with deceptive words . Their condemnation pronounced long ago is not sitting idly by ; their destruction is not asleep .
61002004	For if God did not spare the angels who sinned , but threw them into hell and locked them up in chains in utter darkness , to be kept until the judgment ,
61002005	and if he did not spare the ancient world , but did protect Noah , a herald of righteousness , along with seven others , when God brought a flood on an ungodly world ,
61002006	and if he turned to ashes the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah when he condemned them to destruction , having appointed them to serve as an example to future generations of the ungodly ,
61002007	and if he rescued Lot , a righteous man in anguish over the debauched lifestyle of lawless men ,
61002008	( for while he lived among them day after day , that righteous man was tormented in his righteous soul by the lawless deeds he saw and heard )
61002009	– if so , then the Lord knows how to rescue the godly from their trials , and to reserve the unrighteous for punishment at the day of judgment ,
61002010	especially those who indulge their fleshly desires and who despise authority . Brazen and insolent , they are not afraid to insult the glorious ones ,
61002011	yet even angels , who are much more powerful , do not bring a slanderous judgment against them before the Lord .
61002012	But these men , like irrational animals – creatures of instinct , born to be caught and destroyed – do not understand whom they are insulting , and consequently in their destruction they will be destroyed ,
61002013	suffering harm as the wages for their harmful ways . By considering it a pleasure to carouse in broad daylight , they are stains and blemishes , indulging in their deceitful pleasures when they feast together with you .
61002014	Their eyes , full of adultery , never stop sinning ; they entice unstable people . They have trained their hearts for greed , these cursed children !
61002015	By forsaking the right path they have gone astray , because they followed the way of Balaam son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ,
61002016	yet was rebuked for his own transgression ( a dumb donkey , speaking with a human voice , restrained the prophet’s madness ) .
61002017	These men are waterless springs and mists driven by a storm , for whom the utter depths of darkness have been reserved .
61002018	For by speaking high-sounding but empty words they are able to entice , with fleshly desires and with debauchery , people who have just escaped from those who reside in error .
61002019	Although these false teachers promise such people freedom , they themselves are enslaved to immorality . For whatever a person succumbs to , to that he is enslaved .
61002020	For if after they have escaped the filthy things of the world through the rich knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , they again get entangled in them and succumb to them , their last state has become worse for them than their first .
61002021	For it would have been better for them never to have known the way of righteousness than , having known it , to turn back from the holy commandment that had been delivered to them .
61002022	They are illustrations of this true proverb : “ A dog returns to its own vomit , ” and “ A sow , after washing herself , wallows in the mire . ”
61003001	Dear friends , this is already the second letter I have written you , in which I am trying to stir up your pure mind by way of reminder :
61003002	I want you to recall both the predictions foretold by the holy prophets and the commandment of the Lord and Savior through your apostles .
61003003	Above all , understand this : In the last days blatant scoffers will come , being propelled by their own evil urges
61003004	and saying , “ Where is his promised return ? For ever since our ancestors died , all things have continued as they were from the beginning of creation . ”
61003005	For they deliberately suppress this fact , that by the word of God heavens existed long ago and an earth was formed out of water and by means of water .
61003006	Through these things the world existing at that time was destroyed when it was deluged with water .
61003007	But by the same word the present heavens and earth have been reserved for fire , by being kept for the day of judgment and destruction of the ungodly .
61003008	Now , dear friends , do not let this one thing escape your notice , that a single day is like a thousand years with the Lord and a thousand years are like a single day .
61003009	The Lord is not slow concerning his promise , as some regard slowness , but is being patient toward you , because he does not wish for any to perish but for all to come to repentance .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief ; when it comes , the heavens will disappear with a horrific noise , and the celestial bodies will melt away in a blaze , and the earth and every deed done on it will be laid bare .
61003011	Since all these things are to melt away in this manner , what sort of people must we be , conducting our lives in holiness and godliness ,
61003012	while waiting for and hastening the coming of the day of God ? Because of this day , the heavens will be burned up and dissolve , and the celestial bodies will melt away in a blaze !
61003013	But , according to his promise , we are waiting for new heavens and a new earth , in which righteousness truly resides .
61003014	Therefore , dear friends , since you are waiting for these things , strive to be found at peace , without spot or blemish , when you come into his presence .
61003015	And regard the patience of our Lord as salvation , just as also our dear brother Paul wrote to you , according to the wisdom given to him ,
61003016	speaking of these things in all his letters . Some things in these letters are hard to understand , things the ignorant and unstable twist to their own destruction , as they also do to the rest of the scriptures .
61003017	Therefore , dear friends , since you have been forewarned , be on your guard that you do not get led astray by the error of these unprincipled men and fall from your firm grasp on the truth .
61003018	But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To him be the honor both now and on that eternal day .
62001001	This is what we proclaim to you : what was from the beginning , what we have heard , what we have seen with our eyes , what we have looked at and our hands have touched ( concerning the word of life –
62001002	and the life was revealed , and we have seen and testify and announce to you the eternal life that was with the Father and was revealed to us ) .
62001003	What we have seen and heard we announce to you too , so that you may have fellowship with us ( and indeed our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ ) .
62001004	Thus we are writing these things so that our joy may be complete .
62001005	Now this is the gospel message we have heard from him and announce to you : God is light , and in him there is no darkness at all .
62001006	If we say we have fellowship with him and yet keep on walking in the darkness , we are lying and not practicing the truth .
62001007	But if we walk in the light as he himself is in the light , we have fellowship with one another and the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we say we do not bear the guilt of sin , we are deceiving ourselves and the truth is not in us .
62001009	But if we confess our sins , he is faithful and righteous , forgiving us our sins and cleansing us from all unrighteousness .
62001010	If we say we have not sinned , we make him a liar and his word is not in us .
62002001	( My little children , I am writing these things to you so that you may not sin . ) But if anyone does sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous One ,
62002002	and he himself is the atoning sacrifice for our sins , and not only for our sins but also for the whole world .
62002003	Now by this we know that we have come to know God : if we keep his commandments .
62002004	The one who says “ I have come to know God ” and yet does not keep his commandments is a liar , and the truth is not in such a person .
62002005	But whoever obeys his word , truly in this person the love of God has been perfected . By this we know that we are in him .
62002006	The one who says he resides in God ought himself to walk just as Jesus walked .
62002007	Dear friends , I am not writing a new commandment to you , but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word that you have already heard .
62002008	On the other hand , I am writing a new commandment to you which is true in him and in you , because the darkness is passing away and the true light is already shining .
62002009	The one who says he is in the light but still hates his fellow Christian is still in the darkness .
62002010	The one who loves his fellow Christian resides in the light , and there is no cause for stumbling in him .
62002011	But the one who hates his fellow Christian is in the darkness , walks in the darkness , and does not know where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I am writing to you , little children , that your sins have been forgiven because of his name .
62002013	I am writing to you , fathers , that you have known him who has been from the beginning . I am writing to you , young people , that you have conquered the evil one .
62002014	I have written to you , children , that you have known the Father . I have written to you , fathers , that you have known him who has been from the beginning . I have written to you , young people , that you are strong , and the word of God resides in you , and you have conquered the evil one .
62002015	Do not love the world or the things in the world . If anyone loves the world , the love of the Father is not in him ,
62002016	because all that is in the world ( the desire of the flesh and the desire of the eyes and the arrogance produced by material possessions ) is not from the Father , but is from the world .
62002017	And the world is passing away with all its desires , but the person who does the will of God remains forever .
62002018	Children , it is the last hour , and just as you heard that the antichrist is coming , so now many antichrists have appeared . We know from this that it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from us , but they did not really belong to us , because if they had belonged to us , they would have remained with us . But they went out from us to demonstrate that all of them do not belong to us .
62002020	Nevertheless you have an anointing from the Holy One , and you all know .
62002021	I have not written to you that you do not know the truth , but that you do know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar but the person who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This one is the antichrist : the person who denies the Father and the Son .
62002023	Everyone who denies the Son does not have the Father either . The person who confesses the Son has the Father also .
62002024	As for you , what you have heard from the beginning must remain in you . If what you heard from the beginning remains in you , you also will remain in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	Now this is the promise that he himself made to us : eternal life .
62002026	These things I have written to you about those who are trying to deceive you .
62002027	Now as for you , the anointing that you received from him resides in you , and you have no need for anyone to teach you . But as his anointing teaches you about all things , it is true and is not a lie . Just as it has taught you , you reside in him .
62002028	And now , little children , remain in him , so that when he appears we may have confidence and not shrink away from him in shame when he comes back .
62002029	If you know that he is righteous , you also know that everyone who practices righteousness has been fathered by him .
62003001	( See what sort of love the Father has given to us : that we should be called God’s children – and indeed we are ! For this reason the world does not know us : because it did not know him .
62003002	Dear friends , we are God’s children now , and what we will be has not yet been revealed . We know that whenever it is revealed we will be like him , because we will see him just as he is .
62003003	And everyone who has this hope focused on him purifies himself , just as Jesus is pure ) .
62003004	Everyone who practices sin also practices lawlessness ; indeed , sin is lawlessness .
62003005	And you know that Jesus was revealed to take away sins , and in him there is no sin .
62003006	Everyone who resides in him does not sin ; everyone who sins has neither seen him nor known him .
62003007	Little children , let no one deceive you : The one who practices righteousness is righteous , just as Jesus is righteous .
62003008	The one who practices sin is of the devil , because the devil has been sinning from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was revealed : to destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Everyone who has been fathered by God does not practice sin , because God’s seed resides in him , and thus he is not able to sin , because he has been fathered by God .
62003010	By this the children of God and the children of the devil are revealed : Everyone who does not practice righteousness – the one who does not love his fellow Christian – is not of God .
62003011	For this is the gospel message that you have heard from the beginning : that we should love one another ,
62003012	not like Cain who was of the evil one and brutally murdered his brother . And why did he murder him ? Because his deeds were evil , but his brother’s were righteous .
62003013	Therefore do not be surprised , brothers and sisters , if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have crossed over from death to life because we love our fellow Christians . The one who does not love remains in death .
62003015	Everyone who hates his fellow Christian is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has eternal life residing in him .
62003016	We have come to know love by this : that Jesus laid down his life for us ; thus we ought to lay down our lives for our fellow Christians .
62003017	But whoever has the world’s possessions and sees his fellow Christian in need and shuts off his compassion against him , how can the love of God reside in such a person ?
62003018	Little children , let us not love with word or with tongue but in deed and truth .
62003019	And by this we will know that we are of the truth and will convince our conscience in his presence ,
62003020	that if our conscience condemns us , that God is greater than our conscience and knows all things .
62003021	Dear friends , if our conscience does not condemn us , we have confidence in the presence of God ,
62003022	and whatever we ask we receive from him , because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing to him .
62003023	Now this is his commandment : that we believe in the name of his Son Jesus Christ and love one another , just as he gave us the commandment .
62003024	And the person who keeps his commandments resides in God , and God in him . Now by this we know that God resides in us : by the Spirit he has given us .
62004001	Dear friends , do not believe every spirit , but test the spirits to determine if they are from God , because many false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	By this you know the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesses Jesus as the Christ who has come in the flesh is from God ,
62004003	but every spirit that does not confess Jesus is not from God , and this is the spirit of the antichrist , which you have heard is coming , and now is already in the world .
62004004	You are from God , little children , and have conquered them , because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world .
62004005	They are from the world ; therefore they speak from the world’s perspective and the world listens to them .
62004006	We are from God ; the person who knows God listens to us , but whoever is not from God does not listen to us . By this we know the Spirit of truth and the spirit of deceit .
62004007	Dear friends , let us love one another , because love is from God , and everyone who loves has been fathered by God and knows God .
62004008	The person who does not love does not know God , because God is love .
62004009	By this the love of God is revealed in us : that God has sent his one and only Son into the world so that we may live through him .
62004010	In this is love : not that we have loved God , but that he loved us and sent his Son to be the atoning sacrifice for our sins .
62004011	Dear friends , if God so loved us , then we also ought to love one another .
62004012	No one has seen God at any time . If we love one another , God resides in us , and his love is perfected in us .
62004013	By this we know that we reside in God and he in us : in that he has given us of his Spirit .
62004014	And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son to be the Savior of the world .
62004015	If anyone confesses that Jesus is the Son of God , God resides in him and he in God .
62004016	And we have come to know and to believe the love that God has in us . God is love , and the one who resides in love resides in God , and God resides in him .
62004017	By this love is perfected with us , so that we may have confidence in the day of judgment , because just as Jesus is , so also are we in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love , but perfect love drives out fear , because fear has to do with punishment . The one who fears punishment has not been perfected in love .
62004019	We love because he loved us first .
62004020	If anyone says “ I love God ” and yet hates his fellow Christian , he is a liar , because the one who does not love his fellow Christian whom he has seen cannot love God whom he has not seen .
62004021	And the commandment we have from him is this : that the one who loves God should love his fellow Christian too .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ has been fathered by God , and everyone who loves the father loves the child fathered by him .
62005002	By this we know that we love the children of God : whenever we love God and obey his commandments .
62005003	For this is the love of God : that we keep his commandments . And his commandments do not weigh us down ,
62005004	because everyone who has been fathered by God conquers the world . This is the conquering power that has conquered the world : our faith .
62005005	Now who is the person who has conquered the world except the one who believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	Jesus Christ is the one who came by water and blood – not by the water only , but by the water and the blood . And the Spirit is the one who testifies , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	For there are three that testify ,
62005008	the Spirit and the water and the blood , and these three are in agreement .
62005009	If we accept the testimony of men , the testimony of God is greater , because this is the testimony of God that he has testified concerning his Son .
62005010	( The one who believes in the Son of God has the testimony in himself ; the one who does not believe God has made him a liar , because he has not believed in the testimony that God has testified concerning his Son . )
62005011	And this is the testimony : God has given us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	The one who has the Son has this eternal life ; the one who does not have the Son of God does not have this eternal life .
62005013	I have written these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God so that you may know that you have eternal life .
62005014	And this is the confidence that we have before him : that whenever we ask anything according to his will , he hears us .
62005015	And if we know that he hears us in regard to whatever we ask , then we know that we have the requests that we have asked from him .
62005016	If anyone sees his fellow Christian committing a sin not resulting in death , he should ask , and God will grant life to the person who commits a sin not resulting in death . There is a sin resulting in death . I do not say that he should ask about that .
62005017	All unrighteousness is sin , but there is sin not resulting in death .
62005018	We know that everyone fathered by God does not sin , but God protects the one he has fathered , and the evil one cannot touch him .
62005019	We know that we are from God , and the whole world lies in the power of the evil one .
62005020	And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us insight to know him who is true , and we are in him who is true , in his Son Jesus Christ . This one is the true God and eternal life .
62005021	Little children , guard yourselves from idols .
63001001	From the elder , to an elect lady and her children , whom I love in truth ( and not I alone , but also all those who know the truth ) ,
63001002	because of the truth that resides in us and will be with us forever .
63001003	Grace , mercy , and peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
63001004	I rejoiced greatly because I have found some of your children living according to the truth , just as the Father commanded us .
63001005	But now I ask you , lady ( not as if I were writing a new commandment to you , but the one we have had from the beginning ) , that we love one another .
63001006	( Now this is love : that we walk according to his commandments . ) This is the commandment , just as you have heard from the beginning ; thus you should walk in it .
63001007	For many deceivers have gone out into the world , people who do not confess Jesus as Christ coming in the flesh . This person is the deceiver and the antichrist !
63001008	Watch out , so that you do not lose the things we have worked for , but receive a full reward .
63001009	Everyone who goes on ahead and does not remain in the teaching of Christ does not have God . The one who remains in this teaching has both the Father and the Son .

64001001	From the elder , to Gaius my dear brother , whom I love in truth .

64001004	I have no greater joy than this : to hear that my children are living according to the truth .
64001005	Dear friend , you demonstrate faithfulness by whatever you do for the brothers ( even though they are strangers ) .

64001007	For they have gone forth on behalf of “ The Name , ” accepting nothing from the pagans .

And not being content with that , he not only refuses to welcome the brothers himself , but hinders the people who want to do so and throws them out of the church !
64001011	Dear friend , do not imitate what is bad but what is good . The one who does good is of God ; the one who does what is bad has not seen God .

65001001	From Jude , a slave of Jesus Christ and brother of James , to those who are called , wrapped in the love of God the Father and kept for Jesus Christ .
65001002	May mercy , peace , and love be lavished on you !
65001003	Dear friends , although I have been eager to write to you about our common salvation , I now feel compelled instead to write to encourage you to contend earnestly for the faith that was once for all entrusted to the saints .
65001004	For certain men have secretly slipped in among you – men who long ago were marked out for the condemnation I am about to describe – ungodly men who have turned the grace of our God into a license for evil and who deny our only Master and Lord , Jesus Christ .
65001005	Now I desire to remind you ( even though you have been fully informed of these facts once for all ) that Jesus , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , later destroyed those who did not believe .
65001006	You also know that the angels who did not keep within their proper domain but abandoned their own place of residence , he has kept in eternal chains in utter darkness , locked up for the judgment of the great Day .
65001007	So also Sodom and Gomorrah and the neighboring towns , since they indulged in sexual immorality and pursued unnatural desire in a way similar to these angels , are now displayed as an example by suffering the punishment of eternal fire .
65001008	Yet these men , as a result of their dreams , defile the flesh , reject authority , and insult the glorious ones .
65001009	But even when Michael the archangel was arguing with the devil and debating with him concerning Moses’ body , he did not dare to bring a slanderous judgment , but said , “ May the Lord rebuke you ! ”
65001010	But these men do not understand the things they slander , and they are being destroyed by the very things that , like irrational animals , they instinctively comprehend .
65001011	Woe to them ! For they have traveled down Cain’s path , and because of greed have abandoned themselves to Balaam’s error ; hence , they will certainly perish in Korah’s rebellion .
65001012	These men are dangerous reefs at your love feasts , feasting without reverence , feeding only themselves . They are waterless clouds , carried along by the winds ; autumn trees without fruit – twice dead , uprooted ;
65001013	wild sea waves , spewing out the foam of their shame ; wayward stars for whom the utter depths of eternal darkness have been reserved .
65001014	Now Enoch , the seventh in descent beginning with Adam , even prophesied of them , saying , “ Look ! The Lord is coming with thousands and thousands of his holy ones ,
65001015	to execute judgment on all , and to convict every person of all their thoroughly ungodly deeds that they have committed , and of all the harsh words that ungodly sinners have spoken against him . ”
65001016	These people are grumblers and fault-finders who go wherever their desires lead them , and they give bombastic speeches , enchanting folks for their own gain .
65001017	But you , dear friends – recall the predictions foretold by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ .
65001018	For they said to you , “ In the end time there will come scoffers , propelled by their own ungodly desires . ”
65001019	These people are divisive , worldly , devoid of the Spirit .
65001020	But you , dear friends , by building yourselves up in your most holy faith , by praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	maintain yourselves in the love of God , while anticipating the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ that brings eternal life .
65001022	And have mercy on those who waver ;
65001023	save others by snatching them out of the fire ; have mercy on others , coupled with a fear of God , hating even the clothes stained by the flesh .
65001024	Now to the one who is able to keep you from falling , and to cause you to stand , rejoicing , without blemish before his glorious presence ,
65001025	to the only God our Savior through Jesus Christ our Lord , be glory , majesty , power , and authority , before all time , and now , and for all eternity . Amen .
66001001	The revelation of Jesus Christ , which God gave him to show his servants what must happen very soon . He made it clear by sending his angel to his servant John ,
66001002	who then testified to everything that he saw concerning the word of God and the testimony about Jesus Christ .
66001003	Blessed is the one who reads the words of this prophecy aloud , and blessed are those who hear and obey the things written in it , because the time is near !
66001004	From John , to the seven churches that are in the province of Asia : Grace and peace to you from “ he who is , ” and who was , and who is still to come , and from the seven spirits who are before his throne ,
66001005	and from Jesus Christ – the faithful witness , the firstborn from among the dead , the ruler over the kings of the earth . To the one who loves us and has set us free from our sins at the cost of his own blood
66001006	and has appointed us as a kingdom , as priests serving his God and Father – to him be the glory and the power for ever and ever ! Amen .
66001007	( Look ! He is returning with the clouds , and every eye will see him , even those who pierced him , and all the tribes on the earth will mourn because of him . This will certainly come to pass ! Amen . )
66001008	“ I am the Alpha and the Omega , ” says the Lord God – the one who is , and who was , and who is still to come – the All-Powerful !
66001009	I , John , your brother and the one who shares with you in the persecution , kingdom , and endurance that are in Jesus , was on the island called Patmos because of the word of God and the testimony about Jesus .
66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lord’s Day when I heard behind me a loud voice like a trumpet ,
66001011	saying : “ Write in a book what you see and send it to the seven churches – to Ephesus , Smyrna , Pergamum , Thyatira , Sardis , Philadelphia , and Laodicea . ”
66001012	I turned to see whose voice was speaking to me , and when I did so , I saw seven golden lampstands ,
66001013	and in the midst of the lampstands was one like a son of man . He was dressed in a robe extending down to his feet and he wore a wide golden belt around his chest .
66001014	His head and hair were as white as wool , even as white as snow , and his eyes were like a fiery flame .
66001015	His feet were like polished bronze refined in a furnace , and his voice was like the roar of many waters .
66001016	He held seven stars in his right hand , and a sharp double-edged sword extended out of his mouth . His face shone like the sun shining at full strength .
66001017	When I saw him I fell down at his feet as though I were dead , but he placed his right hand on me and said : “ Do not be afraid ! I am the first and the last ,
66001018	and the one who lives ! I was dead , but look , now I am alive – forever and ever – and I hold the keys of death and of Hades !
66001019	Therefore write what you saw , what is , and what will be after these things .
66001020	The mystery of the seven stars that you saw in my right hand and the seven golden lampstands is this : The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches and the seven lampstands are the seven churches .
66002001	“ To the angel of the church in Ephesus , write the following : “ This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who has a firm grasp on the seven stars in his right hand – the one who walks among the seven golden lampstands :
66002002	‘ I know your works as well as your labor and steadfast endurance , and that you cannot tolerate evil . You have even put to the test those who refer to themselves as apostles ( but are not ) , and have discovered that they are false .
66002003	I am also aware that you have persisted steadfastly , endured much for the sake of my name , and have not grown weary .
66002004	But I have this against you : You have departed from your first love !
66002005	Therefore , remember from what high state you have fallen and repent ! Do the deeds you did at the first ; if not , I will come to you and remove your lampstand from its place – that is , if you do not repent .
66002006	But you do have this going for you : You hate what the Nicolaitans practice – practices I also hate .
66002007	The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches . To the one who conquers , I will permit him to eat from the tree of life that is in the paradise of God . ’
66002008	“ To the angel of the church in Smyrna write the following : “ This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who is the first and the last , the one who was dead , but came to life :
66002009	‘ I know the distress you are suffering and your poverty ( but you are rich ) . I also know the slander against you by those who call themselves Jews and really are not , but are a synagogue of Satan .
66002010	Do not be afraid of the things you are about to suffer . The devil is about to have some of you thrown into prison so you may be tested , and you will experience suffering for ten days . Remain faithful even to the point of death , and I will give you the crown that is life itself .
66002011	The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches . The one who conquers will in no way be harmed by the second death . ’
66002012	“ To the angel of the church in Pergamum write the following : “ This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who has the sharp double-edged sword :
66002013	‘ I know where you live – where Satan’s throne is . Yet you continue to cling to my name and you have not denied your faith in me , even in the days of Antipas , my faithful witness , who was killed in your city where Satan lives .
66002014	But I have a few things against you : You have some people there who follow the teaching of Balaam , who instructed Balak to put a stumbling block before the people of Israel so they would eat food sacrificed to idols and commit sexual immorality .

66002016	Therefore , repent ! If not , I will come against you quickly and make war against those people with the sword of my mouth .

66002018	“ To the angel of the church in Thyatira write the following : “ This is the solemn pronouncement of the Son of God , the one who has eyes like a fiery flame and whose feet are like polished bronze :
66002019	‘ I know your deeds : your love , faith , service , and steadfast endurance . In fact , your more recent deeds are greater than your earlier ones .
66002020	But I have this against you : You tolerate that woman Jezebel , who calls herself a prophetess , and by her teaching deceives my servants to commit sexual immorality and to eat food sacrificed to idols .
66002021	I have given her time to repent , but she is not willing to repent of her sexual immorality .

66003001	“ To the angel of the church in Sardis write the following : “ This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who holds the seven spirits of God and the seven stars : ‘ I know your deeds , that you have a reputation that you are alive , but in reality you are dead .
